Aañ ba' jai' pui'x buam jup ba tu tatda', gu' aañ matgɨm cham jax jiñ aa' ji sia ku mɨt jiñ buupra bhammɨ Jerusaleen. Ku gu' cham tu' ji dai no' mɨt jiñ buupra nañ ba' cham jax jiñ aa', gu' ja'pji sia ji no' mɨt jiñ mua nañ cham jax jiñ aa', pɨx ji no' mɨt dhɨ' kɨ'n jiñ bhaamkidhak jiñ mua nañ mi' pui' duiñchu' na jax jix aa' gui' nar Gɇ'kam na Jesuus tɨɨ'.
Ba' nat gu' cham jich kai nach jax tɨi pup tɨtdaimɨk, aach ba'p kai'ch: ―Dho bak gu' pui' tu tui'ka' ku gi na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'.
Ba' gatuuk dai na chich jax jix kɨɨ'ch dhuu, pu jii chich bhammɨ ja'k Jerusaleen.

Ba' jai' dhɨt jup mach oi mɨt guch jaaduñ gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' nammɨ nat ba jur, mach baidhak jamɨt nach tɨbiappu' mu ja'p na pai' kioka' maa'n guch jaduuñ na pui' tɨɨ' Nasoon. Ba' dhi' bɨjɨk dɨr ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jir mu ja'k kam ka' na pai' alhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Chipre.
Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk bhammɨ ba ai Jerusaleen, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlh jamɨt guch jaaduñ gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
Ba' buimgidhak na chich ba paxiaram mu ja'p na pai' kioka' gu Santiago, jai'p mach oi gu Paablo. Ba' ampɨk bɨɨx mi'p daraa am gui' nam ja guguuxi'ñdha' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
Ba' gu Paablo xi ja ñio'kdhak ba ja aagi'ñ nat jax ja'k palhbui gu Dios nat jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu duu ja bui gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam.

Ba' na mɨt pui' jɨ' kai, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlhdhak ma tu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios. Mi' dhɨr ba' moop tɨtda am gu Paablo: ―Dho gu'ch jaduuñ, nap jax bax maat jia na mɨt mui' ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam gui' nam jir ya' kam dhi Israel, ba' nam gu' pui' ɨlhii'ñ na pui ja a'm jum aa' nam mi' pui' jiimda' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka'.

Gu' ji nam gu' ya' pui' ja tɨtda na sap gui' nam jir ya' kam nam mu ja'p oi'dha' jai' kap na pai' jax cham jir Israel, nap sap aap pui' ja tɨtdaidha' mu ja'p ji oilhidhat na cham kam aa' nam mi' pui' jiimda' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka', nam sap cham ka ja matgilhchudidha' gu ja maamar na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam jir Israel kam ka'.
¿Jax jap ba' xi ɨlhii'ñ gu dhi' pui'ch jaduuñ? Ja'p dho ji nam gu' pui' ba tɨ kaaya' gu ja'tkam na pich ya' ba ai.
No' pich gi ja'pni ja'k tu duu nam kapbhai' ya' jai'ch maakob guch jaaduñ na mɨt ba tu dai buiñor gu Dios nam tu makgɨrxidha'.

Dhi'p xi ja baidhai mu jimia' mu gɇ' chiop nap ba' ja bɨɨm mi' pui' xi chu kuugalhdha' na mɨt jax ja'k ba tu dai buiñor gu Dios. Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na pim pu'ñi ba tu kuugalhdha', aap ja a'mkam xi chu namkidha' na ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k bax bhaai'n ka' nam jiika' gu ja kuup nam ba'm tɨgia' gu ja'tkam nap tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu pui' na jax ja'k tu aagix, nam ba' bax mat ka' na cham tu'r pui' nam jax kai'ch aap jum bui.

Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k cham jir ya' kam dhi Israel na mɨt pui'p tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui' ja'k mui' ba tu ja ua'ñxi chich nam cham ka tu kua'da' gu tu' na ja bui makgɨrxix ka' gup duiñxim didios, sia gu ɨ'ɨɨr nam cham kua'da' gam gu sasoi' gui' nam ja bhiikchudat ja koo'nda', gio ba' nam cham jai'x bhai' ka ja tɨtdada' gu u'uub.

Ba' gu Paablo pui' tɨip tu buim nam jax tɨtda gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Mui' ma jii xi ja baidhak gu maakob jich jaaduñ, buimgidhak ba' dai na mɨt pɨx pui' ja'k bhaan ji baapam nam ba tu kuugalhdhim gu pui' na mɨt jax ja'k tu dai buiñor gu Dios nam pu tu duñia'. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat mu ba baa gu Paablo gɇ' chiop nat ba tu aagam nam pai' dhuuk tu makgɨrxidha' gu Dios bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.

Gu' ji na gu' jano' na pai' dhuuk bam aajidhat nam pai' dhuuk ba tu kuugalhdha' gɨt gu pui' na mɨt jax ja'k tu dai buiñor gu Dios, ba tɨɨ mɨt gu Paablo na mi' oirɨ na pai'r gɇ' chiop jɨ'kchi gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' nam bhammɨ dɨr ja'p oi'ñka' na pai' jax bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr. Bhai' ji ja iatgi mɨt gu ja'tkam nam sap ba' bhai' ji bhaaku' buiñor gu Paablo,

jup ja tɨtda am gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Gor jich palhbui'ñ jich jaaduñ Israel kam kuch daagɨi tulhiiñchuda' dhi maa'nkam na nai' jimdat ja iatgidhidha' guch ja'tkam tuk, na pui' ja tɨtdaidha' na sap pur cham tu' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka', gio sap ya' dhi gɇ' chiop sia pur cham tu'. Daman nat ya' ja baapai gu jai' ja'tkam nam cham jir ya' kam dhi Israel, sia ku gu'x io'm tɨix chu xidhuu.

Ba' dhi' gu Troopimo aagɨt jup kai'ch am, gui' nar bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam Eepeso, nam gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ka nɨi'ñ nam bha ja'p maap ka jim gu Paablo na pai' jax jir gɇ' kiicham, ba' ja'p jum aa' am nat mu baidhak gɇ' chiop.

Ba' na mɨt pui' ji ja kɇɇk gu ja'tkam, giilhim bhai' ji bhaak jamɨt, pɨx giilhim ba kai'ch am bɨɨx kap bhai' na jɨ'x juugɨt jir gɇ' kiicham. Ba' jai' dhɨt mu boopok bhai' pu ji dhaa mɨt gu Paablo, tɨɨmɨrak jamɨt gamai' pu bhɨich mu ja'k na pai'r dɨɨrap dɨr bhai' gu gɇ' chiop, ba' xi buusaidhak jotmoda' bhai' pu tu kukpa mɨt gu kiki'ñgob nam gu' giilhim jix bhaaktu'.
Ba' ja'p pɨk ba ji mu'aak jamɨt, gu' ji nat gu' moo ampɨk pui'p ba tɨ kai gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x gu Rooma kam nam giilhim jix bhaak gu ja'tkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x juugɨt jir gɇ' kiicham.

Ba' nat jax maap ja jumaap gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ mu dai'bus. Ba' na mɨt ba tɨɨ gu ja'tkam na mui' ba mɨlhchu' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x gio gu jai' sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, mi' pui' pup tu'ii' am nam mi' ka gɨbchu' gu Paablo, cham ka juan am.

Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x mui' xi ɇɇk mia'n xi dhaagɨk gu Paablo xi ja chia gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ nam buuplhia' gook bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n. Mi' dhɨr ba' ba ja tɨkka gu ja'tkam nar jaroi' dha' gio nat tu' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam kum ba' mi' bax mu'aam.

Gu' ji na gu' cham maatɨt ja kɇɇ, nam gu' giilhim gɇ' kɨ'n bha jiiñak gio nam bɨɨx aixim kai'ch, jai' maakam jup kai'ch am gio jai' maakam ɨp. Ba' pui' ma tu chia nam bhɨika' gu Paablo mu ja'k nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x.

Ba' na mɨt mu ba aich na pai' dhɨr mu tɨm tɨssa'n mi' na pai' dhɨr jax mui' ji chum bapkɨ mɨjɨ' nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x, tɇ'kob daagɨk ma bhɨɨk jamɨt gu Paablo nam ba' cham daagɨi mu'aa' gu ja'tkam gui' nam mi'x bhaak buiñor,
nam gu' gatuuk dɨr giilhim mu boopo' jiiñkidhat, jup xi kai'chidhat am: ―¡Mu gor mu'aiñ dhi maa'nkam!

Ba' na mɨt kia'pɨx ba ji kuu gu Paablo mi' nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x, ba tɨkka gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' jɨ' gu sandaarui'x, jup tɨtda: ―¿Cham jir am aa no' ñich alhio ka xi chum a'giñ jaduuñ? Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x jup kai'ch: ―¿Ja'p aa griago ñi'ook kɨ'n tu ñiok ap jiñ jaaduñ?
¿Dho bak gu' cham tu' aap jir di' ji jia gu Ejipto kam maa'nkam gui' nat maa'nnim mummɨ ma tɨ jɨgialhchuda gampɨx jix chu gak kɨr ja bɨɨm maakob miil gu sandaarui'x nat ja kokda gu Rooma kam?

Ba' gu Paablo jup kai'ch: ―Cham, aañ jir jumai ji matgɨm jiñ jaduuñ. Jir ya' kam iñ dhi Israel, mu ja'k jañich maaxir na pai'r gɇ' kiicham na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tarso gui' na bhaan bipio' gu Siliisia dɨbɨɨr. Ba' aañ ja'p tɨi xim tɨɨdam jiñ jaduuñ nap gɨt alhioñ dho'ñcho' nañ ka xi chu ja a'gidha' dhi ja'tkam nam ya'x bhaak.

Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk jup xi chia na tu ja a'gidha' gu ja'tkam. Ba' bhai' xi kɨkbok gu Paablo na pai' dhɨr mu tɨm tɨssa'n, ja'p xi ja duiñ gu ja'tkam nobii'ñ kɨ'n nam sap cham ñiokda', ba' gui' pɨx cham jup ñio mɨt. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat bhai' ji chu ja a'gi ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n, jup ja tɨtda:
―Ea na pim alhio ka xiñ kaaya'ñ jaaduñ nañ jax jam tɨɨda'.
Ba'x io'm pɨx cham ñio mɨt gu ja'tkam na mɨt kai na ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n tu ja a'gi'ñ. Ba' ja'pni mui' ji kɨi:

―Dho gu' aañ pui'p jir ya' kam dho dhi Israel jiñ jaaduñ, mu ja'k jañich maaxir na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tarso, ya' ja'k jañich ba' gɨ'ɨɨr dhi Jerusaleen. Ba' buiñor tuñ mamtuxdhak jañich gu Gamalial, ba' tu maat jañich gu pui' na mɨt jax ja'k tu ua'nak gux io'm bɨjɨk dɨr kam guch bopxi kat. Pui' kuñ ba' aañ gammɨjɨ buiñor tu daanda' gu Dios ja'p na jax aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim gammɨjɨ tu daanda'.
Ba' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr giilhim jix ja bhaamki'ñdha' iñ gui' nam jɨ'k pu'ñi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gui' na ja'p ji buusan nar xibkam gu boi, ja da'ngɨt jañ ja kukpada' gu chichio'ñ gam u'uub.

Jix maat dho gu dhi' pui' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop ja a'mkam tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, sia gux a'aixkam jum aa'ndam jich jaaduñ, na mɨt gu' dhi' muñ joot mu Damaasko jiñ maakak maa'n gu u'uan nañ ja tɨɨ'ñchuda' guch jaaduñ gui' nam mummɨ oi'ñka' gu ya' dɨr ja'p kam Israel, na sap ba' dhi' kɨ'n jix bhaai'n ka' nañ ja da'ngɨi bha ja ui'ka' gɨt guch jaaduñ gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor gu Jesuus Nasareet kam, nach ba' ya' Jerusaleen ja aichdhai ja tulhiiñchuda' gɨt.

’Gu' ji na gu' gammɨjɨ gu bɨɨx boi nañ mui' ka jim jix dhaam duuk, nañ kia'pɨx ba aajidhat mu Damaasko, ba tɨɨ ñich nat jiñ a'm bɨɨx xikoolh bhai' ba tum ton bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam giilhim jix o'jo' kɨ'n.
Ba' aañ mi' pu ia nañ jax ka jimdat, ba' ba kai ñich nat bhai' ba tum ñio bhammɨ dɨr na pai' bha tum tanoor, jup tum kai'ch: “Aapi' Saulo, ¿jax kup ba'ñ o'bhagi'ñchu'?”

Ba' aañ xi chɨkka nar jaroi' dha', ja'p jañ chɨtda: “¿Jir jaroop gi dha' aapi' Gɇ'kam?” Ba' gui'p kai'ch na bhammɨ dɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ: “Aa dho aañi' dhor di' gu Jesuus Nasareet kam gui' nap jaroi' o'bhagi'ñchu'.”
Ba' giilhim jix chotdon am gui' nañ ja bɨɨm jim, nam gu' bɨɨx jup nɨi'ñ na bha tum tanoor bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, dai nam cham kɇɇ gu jaroi' na bha ñiok bhammɨ dɨr. Dai aañ dɨɨlh nañ ba' kɇɇ.

Ba' aañ giop xi chɨkka gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha ñiok, ja'p jañ chɨtda: “¿Tu'p jix aa' nañ jax dhuñia' aapi' Gɇ'kam?” Ba' gui'p kai'ch: “Dho nap bamgɨi giop ba jimda' dho mu ja'k nap pai' ja'k jim Damaasko. Mummɨm ba'm aagi'ñdha' nap tu' jax dhuñia' aañ jiñ a'mkam.”
Ba' nañ gu' cham ka ñia nat pui'ñ dhooda gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha tanoordat, pui' mɨt jiñ ñobchɨk mañ baidhak mu ja'k Damaasko gui' nañ ja bɨɨm jim.

’Ba' maa'n mi'p kioka' guch jaduuñ Ananiiyas tɨɨgim nax io'm tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios na mi' pui' jimda' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka', gio nam bɨɨx pɨx joidham jix kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gui' nam jɨ'k ya' dɨr ja'p Israel mummɨ ja'k oi'ñka' Damaasko .

Ba' dhi' jɨ' dhich jaduuñ Ananiiyas tɨɨgim mui' ma jii mu na mɨt pai'ñ chɨbiaptuda, jup jiñ chɨtda ba' mu ji ɇɇk: “Aapi'ñ jaduuñ Saulo, bhañ joot guch Gɨ'kora' nap sap giop bax ñia ka' xib dɨr ja'p ja'k.” Ba' mi' jotmoda' bhai' ji ñiata ñich nat jax puñ chɨɨ'n. Jix bhai' giop bax chu maax nañ nai' xi chɨ nɨi'ñ.

Mi' dhɨr ba' moo ja'pni ja'k bhai'p ji chuñ a'gi, jup jiñ chɨtda: “Jum a'm ba tɨ tɨɨ jiñ jaduuñ gu ja Dios tuk guch bopxi kat nap sap ba'x io'm jix bhai' ba machia' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa', gio nap ba' tɨgia' maaxik gui' na jaroi'x io'm jir jix bhai'kam, gio nap ba' pu'ñi kɇɇkɇ' na bha tum a'gi'ñdha',
nap sap gu' aap ba'r di' ka' jia nap nai' tu ja a'gidha' gu ja'tkam na pich jɨ'k jax ba tɨ tɨɨ gio na pich jax ja'k ba tɨ kai.
Ba' gu xib jum aa' nap xim dɨkoo'ñdha' nap bam bakuanmɨra' mu ja'p pai' na jax suu'nka' gu suudai' soi'm ɨlhdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam na ba' uañchuda' gum ua'tulhdhara'.”
’Ba' na ñich pai' dhuuk gio ya'p ba ai dhi Jerusaleen, mui' ma jii ñich mu gɇ' chiop na ñich ba tu daañim. Ba' nañ mi' ka tu daan,

ba tɨɨ ñich gu Gɇ'kam jich Gɨ'kora' nat mi ja'p bam maax, jup jiñ chɨtda ba': “Ba jimia' ap ya' dɨr dhi Jerusaleen, xib moo, nam gu' cham jɨ'xkat jum jɨɨgi'ñdha' sia kup tɨi ja aagi'ñ nañ jir tu'p tu'm da' aañ.”

Ba' aañ bhai' tɨi soi' ji chɨɨ'n ja'p jañ chɨtda: “Ja'pji nam gu'x maat nañ aañ bɨɨpɨ' dɨr mu ja'p nai' ja da'ngɨt ka ja tulhiiñchu'nda' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' aap jum bui, na jax aa' kuñ pui' ja gɨbdat ja ko'ktulhi'ñdha'.

Gio jano' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ma'yasimɨk mua gu Teeban, gui' nam a'mkam ka tu a'gat gu pui' nap jax ja'k jix aa', nam gu' bɨɨx jup jix maat nañ aañ jai' mi ja'p jup xi kɨɨk nañ ja nuukxi'ñ gu daam dɨr kam ja tɨi'dhara' gui' na mɨt mi ja'p xi ja darsak na mɨt mi' ba ji mua. Jai' ja'xbui' pui'p xiñ chaat iñ na sap pɨk ba'r am nam mu'aa'.”
Ba' maa'n na jax jiñ chɨtda gu Gɇ'kam jich Gɨ'kora', jup kai'ch: “Ja'pji nap ba jimia', nañ gu' aañ jix aa' nap mɨk ja'k bhɨɨya' ja bui gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam.”
Ba' ja'xbui' juugɨt pɨx kai mɨt gu Paablo nat tu ja a'gi, mi' dhɨr gu' gio pɨx jiiñak jup suulh jamɨt ji, jup kai'ch am: ―¡Mu gor mu'aiñ dhi maa'nkam, na gu' cham jir am gu pui' na jax kai'ch!
Ba' pɨx mɨjɨ dɨr ji kɨksa am nam pui' kai'ch, gio nam mi ja'p nai' xi ja xiixkaim gu ja jajannulh, nam gu' giilhim jix bhaak, gio gu dɨbɨɨr nam jax da'ngɨ nai' tɇ'kob xi buppa am.

Ba' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x xi chu chia nam giop baidhika' gu Paablo mu ja'k nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x, gio sap nam xi gɨɨ'bia' na sap ba' tu aaga' nam jax kai'ñkam jix bhaamki'ñ gu ja'tkam.

Gu' ji na gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ba buupra gu Paablo nam ba' moo ba gɨɨ'bia' gɨt, ba tɨkka gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, jup tɨtda: ―¿Aagix aa na pim ja gɨbda' gui' nam jɨ'k jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, pui' na jax aañ nañ maadɨt jir di', gio no' pu'ñi chakui maatɨ' no' ñich tu' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam ka' ba' gu' cham?

Ba' nat pu'ñi kai gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, xi mɨɨ nat aa'ñdham gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, jup tɨtda: ―¿Jax jap ba' ɨlhii'ñ gu maa'nkam na pich jich chia nach gɨɨ'bia'? Maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam.

Ba' nat jax pui' tɨ kai gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, mu dai'bus nat tɨkkam gu Paablo, jup tɨtda: ―¿Jir sɨlhkam aa nap aap maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam? Ba' gu Paablo jup kai'ch: ―Jir pui' dho nap jax kai'ch jiñ jaduuñ.

Ba' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x jup tɨtda: ―Aañ mui' tuumiñ tu namki nañ ba' maadɨt bar di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam. Ba' gu Paablo jup kai'ch: ―Ja'pji aañ ɨlhi'chdham dɨr pur pu chu'm ji.

Ba' pui' cham ka gɨɨ' mɨt gu Paablo, na mɨt gu' dai bax chooto'n na mɨt ba maat na maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, sia ji gu' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x giilhim jix choo'n nat gan tu chia nam buuplhia' bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n.

Ba' buimgidhak ba tu chia gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x nam sap alhio ka xi dho'ñcho' gu Paablo na buupulh bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat ba tu ja joochxi gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam gio ba' jai' gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka', nax maachim nam jax kai'ñkam buiñor jix bhaak gu Paablo. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bɨɨx mi' bam jumaap mi' na pai' tum a'gada', ba tu chia nam mu baidhika' gu Paablo, mi ja'p ba' xi ja kɨɨx ja saagi'ñ gui' nam mi' bax iattulhdham.
Ba' gu Paablo bha ja'p nai' xi ja tɨɨgɨk gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam mui' mi' ba jumpax nam mi' bax iattulhdham, jup ja tɨtda: ―Aañ gammɨjɨ mi' pui' jim jiñ jaaduñ na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
Ba' gu Ananiiyas gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam, xi ja chia nam bha gɨɨ'bia' chiñi'ran gu Paablo gui' nam jɨ'k mi ja'p amuub jup tu'ii'.

Gu' ji na gu'p tɨtda gu Paablo: ―Aap dho pui' ja'p jup ji buusnia' nam gɨɨ'bia' gu Dios, na gu'm tulhiiñchuda'. Tɨɨ' nap gu' cham mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' nap moo mi ja'p daakat bhai'p ba tu chian nam bhañ gɨɨ'bia' dhi ja'tkam jiñ chiñ am, sia ku gu' tɨi cham tu' pui' ja'k tu aagix, gio nap sap pɨk ba' ya' ba xi chuñ a'gidham na jax ja'k jir am nañ mi' pui' jimda' na jax ja'k tu aagix.

Ba' gu jai' gui' nam mi'p tu'ii' ɨp jup tɨtda am gu Paablo: ―¿Jax ba' kup ba' pui' pɨk jup tɨtda dhi' nat Dios gɇ'kam kɨ'n dai na ba' pu'ñix io'm jir ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam?

Ba' gu Paablo gio mui'p ji ñio, jup ja tɨtda: ―Dho gu' aañ cham maatɨt jiñ jaaduñ no' moop jir di' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Na gu' gu u'uan ta'm pui'm kai'ch jia gui' na mɨt bhaan mi chu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios na sap pu'ñi cham jir am nañ giilhim tɨtdada' gu jax chu'm gɇ'kam na ja sɨlhka'nda' gu ja'tkam.

Mi' dhɨr ba' moo ja'pni ja'k bhai'p ji chu ja a'gi nat ba ja tɨɨ nam jai' dhɨt mi'p tu'ii' gui' nam pariseos jum tɨɨtɨ'nda' gio ba' jai' gui' nam saduseos jup jum tɨɨtɨ'nda', jup ja tɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Aañ dho pui' maadɨt jup jir di'ñ jaaduñ gui' nam pariseos jum tɨɨtɨ'. Ja bui maaxir jañich, ba' pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ iñ nam gio duduardat jup bapmi' gu koi'ñga'n. Pui' ku pim ba' dhi' kɨ'n xiñ bhaamkidhat ya' ba xiñ iattulhdham.
Ba' nat jax pu'ñi ja tɨɨ'n gu Paablo, ma tu a'ga mɨt gu pariseos jum tɨɨtgɨdam ja bɨɨm gu saduseos. Mi' dho gu' cham maa'n ñi'ook kap duuk am nam tɨi pup xi chu a'gimɨk.

Nam gu' jai' maakam jup kai'ch, pui' na jax gu saduseos nam gu' pui' kai'chdha' nam sap cham tu' duduardat giop ka bapmi' gu koi'ñga'n, gio sap nam cham tu' jai'ch gui' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu Dios, ni jax chu'm ii'mda' dho sap moo ku mu pai' ka oirɨda'. Gu' ba' gu pariseos pui'p kai'chdha' am ɨp nam sap gu' giop duduardat jup bapmi' ji gu koi'ñga'n, gio sap gui' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam jix jai'ch, sia gu jax ña pɨx chu'm ii'mda' sap na mu pai' oirɨda'.

Gɇ' kɨ'n dho gu' pɨx jiiñak bɨɨt am bɨɨx nam jɨ'k mi'p tu'ii' nam pu'ñi kai'ch, jai' nam pui' kai'ch na cham tu'r pui' na jax kai'ch gu Paablo, jai' ba' nam pui' kai'ch na sɨlhkam jir pui' ji na jax kai'ch. Gio jai' mi' dhɨr ja'p na mɨt jax jup guguu gui' nam sap jix mat ka' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nam pui' ja'k jup tu jimda' na jax gu pariseos, jai' bhai' bhaankam jup ji ñio mɨt gu Paablo, jup kai'ch am: ―Dho gu' maaxik cham tu' jax bua ji dhich jaduuñ gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam. ¿Jax jach gi bia' nach jup tɨɨda' no' gu' pui' ja'k aagi'ñ maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' pui' ja'k tu jim, piam gu jax chu'm ii'mda'? Dho gu' cham jir am dho nach jax dhui moop ba ji soo'mchulhdha'.

Gu' ji na gu' jai' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ gu dhi' pui' ja'k, giilhim cham tɨ jɨjɨkgɨr am nam bhax bhaak. Ba' pui' too'nnɨk giop ka xi chu chia gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x nam giop ka xi kuupa' gu Paablo mu ja'p nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x nam sap ba' cham daagɨi gɨbiimɨi ta'tak jup dooda'.

Ba' moo jano' nat jax gamai' ji chuk, buiñor bam maax guch Xoi'kam mi' na pai' kuup gu Paablo, ba'p tɨtda: ―Aap moo cham jax jum aa'nda' Paablo, nam gu' cham jɨ'xkat jax jum dooda' sia kum jax tɨi ɨlhii'ñ gui' nam xim bhaamki'ñ gu ya' kam dhi Jerusaleen. Na gu' kam aa' nap jiñ a'mkam bhammɨ dɨr ja'k ka tu ja a'gi'ñmɨra' gu ja'tkam na pai'r Rooma ja'p na pich jax ja'k ba tu ja a'gi ya' dhi Jerusaleen.

Ba' moo jano' buimgidhak nat jumai gamai'p ji chu maaxir, jai' dhɨt maap jim jumpadak ba tu a'ga mɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam pui' kai'ch nam sap mu'aa' gu Paablo. Gio na mɨt pui' tɨi nam sap cham tu' jugia' gio nam cham tu' i'ya', nam pai' dhuuk xi mu'ai sap nam ba' ba tu jugia'. Piam sap no' mɨt gu' moo jax dhuukat cham jax dhooda, dɨɨlh dho sap ba' cham bhai' tu ja jimia'.
Ba' dhi' na mɨt jɨ'k pu'ñi ja'k maa'n ñi'ook jup duu, aix am gook oo'm damdɨr jɨ'kchi pup.

Gatuuk ba' na mɨt pu'ñi xi chu a'gak, dai na mɨt ba ja aa'ñdham gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam gio gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka' gu Israel ja'tkam, jup ja tɨtdaim am mu ji ɇɇk: ―Aach pui' ba tɨi nach cham tu' jugia' gio nach cham tu' i'ya', nach pai' dhuuk xi mu'ai gu Paablo nach ba' ba tu jugia'. Piam ku chich gu' moo cham jax dhooda, dɨɨlh dho ba' cham bhai' tuch jimia'.

Ba' gu xib ja'pni ja'k jix bhaai' na pim aapi'm mu jimia' ja bɨɨm gu jai' ja'ppɨx jich gɇ'gɇrkam tuk na pim pu tɨɨ'npu' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x na kabuimuk bha jam bai'ñxidhika' gu Paablo, ja'p japim xi iatgidhai na pim jix bhai'x chɨkkam nat tu' ba' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam. Aach ba' dai nach gama ja'k pai' boi cha'm ba tɨ nɨɨrda' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nach ba' mi' pu mu'aa' na bhai' ka bai'ñchu'nda'.
Gu' ji na gu' moop ja kɇɇ maa'n gu biapma' nar tataalhi'ñ gu Paablo, ba' jotmoda' xi mɨɨ nat aa'ñdham mu na pai' kuup ja bui gu sandaarui'x.
Ba' gu Paablo nat pui' jɨ' kai, maadɨt ba tu joochxi gu sandaarui'x, ba' pui' ba tɨtda nat pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai na sap mu baidhika' gu biapma' buiñor gu ja gɇ'kam tuk na sap ba'x xɨ'lhim tu a'gidha'.

Ba' gu sandaarui'x cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk mui'p ma baidhak gu biapma' mu ja'k na pai' daaka' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk, jup tɨtda ba' mu ji ɇɇk: ―Aañ ya' bai'ñchu' dhi biapma' nat bhañ joot gu Paablo gui' na mu kuup, na sap jix xɨ'lhim xi chum a'gidham.
Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x xi ñobchɨk mu ja'p xi baidhak gu biapma' na pai' cham jaroi' xi ja kɇɇkɇ' nam jax kai'chdha', ba tɨkka ba', jup tɨtda: ―¿Jax jap xiñ chɨɨdam jiñ jaduuñ?

Ba' gu biapma' mui' ji ñio, jup tɨtda: ―Dho gu' na ñich bham aa'ñdham dho na mɨt maa'n ñi'ook bap duu gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam sap pɨk ba' bha jimɨi pum tɨɨda' nap kabuimuk mu ja bai'ñxidhika' gu Paablo nam sap pɨk ba'x bhai'x chɨkkam nat tu' ba' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam.

Ku gu' aap cham mi ja jɨɨgi'ñdha' ji no'm moo ya' pai' jiimdat pui' bam tɨtdaim, nam gu' pui' kai'ch jai' dhɨt gu ja ja'tkam tuk nam sap gook oo'm aixkam damdɨr jɨ'kchi pup mi' pai' tɨ nɨɨrda' boi cha'm jix ɨxchuixim, nam sap ba' mi' pu mu'aa' gu Paablo nap mui' ka bai'ñchu'nda', na mɨt gu' sap bɨɨpɨ' dɨr pui' ja'k ba tɨi nam cham tu' jugia' gio nam cham tu' i'ya', nam pai' dhuuk xi mu'ai sap nam ba' ba tu jugia'. Piam sap no' mɨt gu' moo jax dhuukat cham jax dhooda, dɨɨlh dho sap ba' cham bhai' tu ja jimia'. Ba' gu xib dai aap pɨx nam ka xim kaim nap jax chɨ'ya'.
Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x pɨx cham jax jup tɨi. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat xi soo'mchulhdhak ba joot gu biapma' na sap dɨɨlh pɨx pui'x chu mat ka' gu pui' nat jɨ'k jax ba tu a'gi.

Gatuuk ba' dai nat gook ba ja bai gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, jup ja tɨtda ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai nam sap xi ja chiñia' gu jai' sandaarui'x chugi'ñ nam jix kɨɨ' bam duñia' nam ba' ja'xpɨx gamai' ji jimia' na ji chukgia' nam do'ñchopu' gu Paablo mu ja'k na pai'r Sesareeya, jɨ'k gook jix cha'tmam oo'm sap nam jiimda' gui' nam aagix nam pui' ja tooton kɨ'n oipoda', gio ba' jai' baik oo'm daman mambhɨɨx aixkam ɨp sap gui' nam kakbai cha'm jup aagix nam oipoda', gio ba' gook jix cha'tmam oo'm ɨp sap gui' nam jup aagix nam dai laansas ja ua'dat jup oipoda'.
Gio nat xi ja chia ɨp nam ja ulhña' gu kakbai na ba' maa'n bhaan jup jimda' gu Paablo, gio nap ja tɨtda nam sap jix bhai' bai'ñchu' gɨt mu aichulhdha' gux kai' Peeles.
Damdɨr maa'n u'uan mui'p xi ja maa na ja'pnim kai'chim na mi chu ua'ñixchu':
“Aañi' nañ pui' tɨɨ' Klaudio Liisias ya' dɨr jañ mui' xi chum guguuxi'ñ bhaan dhi u'uan nap jax jum ɨlhii'ñ aapi'ñ jaduuñ Peeles nap jir jix kai'.

Mi' dhɨr jañ ba' moo ja'pni ja'k jup xim tɨɨdam na mɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam ya' daa dhi maa'nkam gio ba' na mɨt ja'p pɨk ba ji mu'aak, gu' ji na ñich gu' aañ mu dai'ññɨk ma palhbui ja bɨɨm guñ sandaarui'x chuk, na ñich gu' pui' ba tɨ kai na dhi' maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam.
Gatuuk jañich ba' tɨi ma baidhak mu nam pai' tu a'gada' jim jumpadat gu Israel kam ja'tkam gu tu' no'm bax a'gam, nañ gu' tɨix maachim nam tu' ba' kɨ'n jix bhaamki'ñ.

Ba' bhaan bhai' ji chu a'ga mɨt gu pui' na jax ja'k tu aagix nam tu jimda', gu' ja'p gu tu'x buam jum duukam gu' cham pai' aa' am ji na jax ja'k moor am nam ba' mu'aa', nich chu' palhɨɨp jup jum duukam dho moo na jax ja'k moor am ka' gɨt na ba' mi' pai' pu'ñi ba kuupka' gɨt.

Gu' ji na ñich gu' ya' pui' ba tɨ kai na mɨt sap maa'n ñi'ook bap duu gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam pui' kai'ch nam mu'aa'. Ba' mu ja'k jañ mui' xi chu jootsa' nam mum bai'ñxidhika', gio ba' gui' nam jaroi'x bhaamki'ñ bɨɨx pui'p ba ja tɨɨ'n jañich nam mummɨ jimɨi aap jum bui mi' pu tɨ'ya' nam jax ba' kai'ñkam pui'x bhaamki'ñ. Ja'pni daipu'.”
Ba' gu sandaarui'x pui'p tu buim am na jax ja tɨtda gu ja gɇ'kam tuk, ma baidhak jamɨt gu Paablo nat pai' dhuuk gamai' ji chuk mu ja'k na pai' Antiipatris tɨ tɨɨ'.
Kabuimuk ba' jai' mi' dhɨr ja'k ba suulh jamɨt gu sandaarui'x gui' nam pui' jiim ja tooton kɨ'n, dai gui' nam kakbai cha'm jiim jamɨt ba' pu oi gu Paablo mu ja'k Sesareeya.
Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mummɨ ba ai, mi' xi maa mɨt gu u'uan gux kai', gio gu Paablo mɨt bɨɨx mi ja'p jup xi kɨɨx.
Ba' gux kai' xi jiñkuidhak gu u'uan bhai' ba tɨkka gu Paablo na sap jir pai' kam. Ba' nat ba maat nar mu ja'k kam na pai' Siliisia bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr,

jup tɨtda: ―Dho bak gu'r am ji nañ jum kaaya' nap jax ja'k xi buada' nap tu a'ga'da' no' mɨt ya' ba ai gui' nam pui' xim bhaamki'ñ. Ba' daipu' xi chɨ'ɨɨk ba tu chia nam kuupa' gu Paablo pu mi' pui' na pai' jax kio dɨɨlh, na pai' kiokat ɨp bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu Eroodis kat.

Ba' gu Ananiiyas gui' nax io'm jir ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam, jix chamaam jurni'ñ kɨ'n mummɨ ba ji buus na pai'r gɇ' kiicham ka' Sesareeya tɨ tɨɨgim ji ja baidhat jɨ'kchi gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, damdɨr maa'n jup xi bai'ñchu' gui' nax matda' ka' na tu a'ga buiñor gu jax chu'm gɇ'kam, Tertulo tɨɨgim. Ba' dhi' jɨ' dhi ja'tkam mu ba ai mɨt buiñor gui' na mi'r jix kai' Peeles tɨɨgim nam mi' bax iattulhdham gu Paablo.

Ba' xi chu joot gux kai' nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo mu ja'p na pai' kuupka' nam sap ba' mi' ba tu a'ga' maap gui' na mɨt jaroi' mi' ba ai nam jix bhaamki'ñ. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba aich, mui' ji chu a'ga gu Tertulo, jup tɨtda gux kai' Peeles: ―Taxchaab ba'ch jaduuñ, moo pɨk ja'p joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' ich ji. Taxchaab ɨp gum matda' na joidham bɨɨx aixim jix bhai' ji chu buusnichu' aach jich bui nach jir jum ja'tkam tuk.
Ba' bɨɨx dhi' pui' aach gammɨjɨ bhaan gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'ch chaat nap ba' moox mat ka' aapi'ch jaduuñ Peeles.
Ba' na cham jix io'm ba ji mɨɨkidha' nach ya' tum a'gi'ñ, ka xich kaaya' ap nach ja'pni ja'k jum tɨɨda':

Dho gu' dhi maa'nkam aach pui' nɨi'ñ ji na giilhim nai' jimdat ja kokdhichdhaim gu Israel kam ja'tkam, na ja iatgidhim na jax ja'k cham jir am. Dhi' dhor di' gui' nar ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam nasareenos jum tɨɨtɨ'.

Gio bhammɨ chiop na pai' tɨi giilhim jix chu xidhuu, nat cham tu' ka'm tɨ tɨɨ nat agree'n mu ja baapai gu jai' ja'tkam nam cham jir Israel kam. Ba' aach pu kai'ñkam tɨi daa nach ba' pu tɨɨdai tulhiiñchuda' gɨt na cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu pui' na jax ja'k tu aagix aach jich bui.
Gu' ji nat gu' mu dai'ññɨk jup jich baabui gu Klaudio Liisias gui' nar ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x. Pui' chich dho ba' cham jax dhooda,

na gu' pui'ch chɨtda nach sap ya' ja'k aap jum bui tu a'ga' gu dhi' pui' nach jax ba kai'ch. Jix maat dho no' pich bhai' xi chɨkka dɨɨlh nap ba' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' nach sɨlhkam jup kai'ch gu dhi' pui' nach jax ba tum a'gi'ñ.
Ba' gui' nam mi ja'p jup daraa gu Israel kam ja'tkam bɨɨx pui'p xi kai'ch am na jax kai'ch gu Tertulo na mi' iattulhi'ñ gu Paablo.

Ba' gux kai' ja'p xi duiñ gu Paablo na sap mui' xi chu a'ga'. Ba' gui' mui'p ji chu a'ga, jup kai'ch: ―Dho gu' aañ jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt ya' pui' xi chɨ'ya' dho nañ jax ja'k jup xiñ maat, nañ gu'x maat nap aap mui' oidha' ya' bar jix kai' na jɨ'x juugɨt bhaan bipio' dhi dɨbɨɨr.
Dho gu' aañ nat kia'pɨx mambhɨɨx daman gook tanoolh ba juruuñ na ñich bhammɨ ai Jerusaleen na ñich mu tu daañim buiñor gu Dios, kagɨt nap tɨkkada'ñ jaduuñ nar pui' nañ jax kai'ch.

Ku gu' cham pai' jaroi' buiñor ñiokbo ñich ji, ni mɨjɨ ɨrban dɨr gu gɇ' chiop kuñ cham pai' ja kokdhichu'n gu ja'tkam, ni mu ja'p pai' nam jax jum jumpadat tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, ni sia dho moo bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham.
Ku gu' dhi' pui' nam jax kai'ch dhi ja'tkam ni jɨ'x ji iam kur pui', cham bia' am dho nam jax tɨ'ya'.

Na gu' aañ dai jia nañ mi' pui' jim nat jax ja'k tu dai xib gu Dios gui' nam pui'p daanɨt gux io'm bɨjɨk dɨr kam jich bopxi kat, na gu' dai nax aa' nach jix bhai' mi' pui' jiimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Dhi' ba'r di' gu xibkam boi nam ja'p ɨlhii'ñ dhi' nam xiñ bhaamki'ñ nach dɨɨlh pɨx pu tu bua nach jax ɨlhii'ñ nach jɨ'k maap jich dhaa'. Gu' matgɨm aañ jix maat ji na jax ja'k tu aagix na mɨt tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, ba' mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' iñ dho.

Ba' pu'ñip jix biiñak iñ aañ buiñor gu Dios na jax dhi' am nam pui' ja'k jix biiñak nam gatuuk duduadɨi giop baapmigia' bɨɨx gu koi'ñga'n, pui' na jax gui' nam cham u'ua'tulhdhix ka' gio gui' nam jix u'ua'tulhdhix ka'.
Pui' kuñ ba' aañ jiñ dhɨkoo'ñdhatu' nañ mi' pui' jim na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios gio gu ja'tkam ja bui.

’Ba' mɨkkat jɨ'kchi oidha' kɨ'n nañ maakam ja'k xi oilhimɨk na pai' jax cham jir Israel, bhai' ma jii ñich ya' ja'k nañ jir pai' kam na ñich bha ja do'ñchidham gu tuumiñ gui' nam cham bia' nam tu' kɨ'n tu saba'da', gio na ñich bha tu makgɨrxidham gu Dios bhammɨ gɇ' chiop.

Ba' bhai' pui' ka tu kuugalhdhim iñ na jax ja'k tu aagix buiñor gu Dios, bam aajidhat nañ pai' dhuuk pui' tu kuugalhdha' gɨt, gu' ji na mɨt gu' jano' pɨk bhai'ñ chɨɨgɨk gɇ' chiop bhai' puñ dhaa gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' nam jir bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr, ku gu' tɨi cham pai' ja kokdhichu'n iñ ji gu ja'tkam.
Dho gu' gui' ji jia nam ya'ni bha jimɨi pu tɨ'ya' nam jax kai'ñkam ba' pui' xiñ bhaamki'ñ.
Piam kum gu' dhi' nam ya'p tu'ii', dho ya' pui' xi chɨ'ya' am no' mɨt mooñ chɨɨ nañ jix buam tu bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam jano' nañ pai' dhuuk bhammɨ kap tu'ii' ja bui nam pai' tu a'gada'.
Ja'p jañich pɨx xi chɨi gɇ' kɨ'n jano' nañ pai' dhuuk bhammɨp tu'ii' ja bui: “Pu kai'ñkam ya'ñ iattulhi'ñ japim nañ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam gio duduardat jup bapmi' gu koi'ñga'n.”

Ba' gux kai' Peeles mi' pui' cham ka ja kaim gui' nam mi' tɨi ka iattulhi'ñ gu Paablo, na gu' pui' pu tɇ kɇɇkɇ' na bhaan tum a'ga guch Xoi'kam gui' na pui' ji buusan nar xibkam boi. Ba'p ja tɨtda: ―Moo chi jano' ba' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x na Liisias tɨɨ' nañ ba' jam aagi'ñdha' na jax ja'k jir am ka' gu dhi' pui' na pim tu' bhaan tu a'ga.

Ba' daipu' xi chɨ'ɨɨk gux kai' Peeles, ba chia gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ na giop ka xi kuupmɨra' gu Paablo amuub mi' dhɨr ja'p, ku gu' sap cham tu' ji na moop buupulh ka' na ba'x bhaai'n ka' na jɨ'x mi ja'p jup xi oirɨda', gio nam cham ja juanda' gui' nam jɨ'k mi aajidhat jix chɨɨgik ka'.

Mi' dhɨr ba' gatuuk nat pu'ñi ja'k xi chianɨk gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, jɨ'kchi jurni'ñ kɨ'n gio mi'p ba ai gux kai' Peeles na pai' tum a'gada', bɨɨx jup xi bai'ñchu' gu bɨnga'n Drusiila tɨɨgim na pui'p jir Israel kam ka'. Mi' dhɨr ba' moo xi chu joot gux kai' Peeles nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba aich, bhai' ji chu ja a'gi na jax ja'k jix bhai' nam mi' pui' jiimdat jix biiñak ka' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

Gatuuk ba' ja'pni ja'k bhai'p ji chu ja a'gi, na sap tu' cham jir am nam pu tu buada', nam gammɨjɨ tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñdha' na ba' cham ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Ba' giilhim pux choo'nnɨt kai gux kai' Peeles, mi' pui' dho gu' cham ka kaim, dai nat ba soo'mchulh pɨx gu Paablo na ka tu a'ga, jup tɨtda: ―Bax bhai' pɨx tu a'ga ap jiñ jaduuñ. Ba jimia' ap, gatuuk jañ ba' giop bam bai'ñdha' nañ pai' dhuuk cham tu' jax buada'.
Gu' na ja'p tɨi ɨlhdhat ɨp ji gux kai' Peeles na gɨt tu' tuumiñ ba aagi'ñdha' gu Paablo na ba' ba do'ñcho' gɨt, pui' ku ba' mi'mia'n tɨi bai'ñdha' nam gook dɨt tu a'gada'.

Gook oidha' dho gu' moop duu na maa'n na bai'ñdha' na jɨ'x juugɨt jir jix kai' kat. Mi' dhɨr nat gu' bam pataasa, jumai ba' bhaankam mi' bar jix kai', Porsio Pesto tɨɨgim. Ba' gu Peeles, na gu'x aa' nam jix kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, pui' cham xi dho'ñchok gu Paablo. Dɨɨlh chi sap panaas jix maat na jax dhuñia' gui' na gatuuk mi' bar jix kai'.
Ba' mi' ba ai gu Pesto na pai'r Sesareeya nam ba' mi'x kai' kɨ'n ba daasa'. Ba' gatuuk baik jurni'ñ kɨ'n mi' dhɨr ma jii bhammɨ ja'k Jerusaleen.

Ba' nat pai' dhuuk bhammɨ ba ai, bhai' ji iattulh jamɨt gu Paablo gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam ja bɨɨm gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka' gu Israel kam ja'tkam,
nam pui' tɨtda na sap tu chiñia' nam mu baidhika' bhammɨ Jerusaleen. Gu' ja'pji nam tɨi ɨlhdhat ji nam sap bhammɨ pai' boi cha'm mu'aa' gɨt nam mui' ka bai'ñchu'nda'.
Gu' ji na gu' cham jup aa' gux kai' Pesto, dai nap ja tɨtda pɨx na mi' pɨx kuupka' Sesareeya, na gu' sap cham xiim gio mu ja'k jup bhɨɨya'.

Jup ja tɨtda: ―Mummɨ ji nam muñ oidha' gu jam gɇ'gɇrkam tuk nañ pai' dhuuk ya' dɨr gamai' ji jimia' mu ja'k Sesareeya. Ba' no' gu' moo sɨlhkam pui'x buam tu dooda gu Paablo, dho gu' mi' dho ba' pui' xi kai'chdha' pim nat jax pui' tu dooda.

Ba' bhammɨ ka pup xi juruuñ gux kai' Pesto na pai'r Jerusaleen jɨ'k xijum baik tanoolh, gatuuk ba' dai nat ba jii mu ja'k Sesareeya. Ba' nat mu ji ɇɇk buimgidhak bhammɨ ba daibu atooxkor ta'm na pai' daaka' gu gɇ'kam, na pai' dhɨr jix bhaai' na daakat nai' tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam. Mi' dhɨr ba' moo ba tu joot nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo.

Ba' nat pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai gu Paablo, mui' xi ai mɨt jix io'm mia'n gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' na mɨt Jerusaleen dɨr mu ai. Mi' ba' bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji iattulh jamɨt, panaas kum moox ñɨi'ñdham xi kai'ch gu tu' nat jax dhuu nar jix buam jum duukam. Gu' pɨx ja'p kai'ch am ji, nim maa'n ku iam jir pui', pu cham dho jax dhooda mɨt.

Ba' gu Paablo na jax jup xim maat mui'p ji chu a'ga, jup kai'ch: ―Aañ nañ jax pɨx jup ba kai'ch dho nañ cham pai' dhuuk tu'x buam jum duukam jax bua, ni nañ pai' dhuuk jax kai'ch na cham tu' kam aa' nach mi' pui' jiimda' na jax chu aagix aach jich bui nach jir Israel kam ja'tkam, ni sia dho moo gu gɇ' chiop kuñ cham pai' dhuuk jax kai'ch na cham tu' bhai', ni buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam kuñ cham pai' dhuuk buam pɨx tu bua.

Ba' gux kai' Pesto nax aagɨt nam jix kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, xi chɨkka gu Paablo, jup tɨtda: ―¿Ka'ch ji sap mu jimia' aa bhammɨ Jerusaleen nach ba' bhammɨ tu a'ga' gu dhi' pui' na pim tu' bhaan tu a'ga?

Gu' ji na gu' gu Paablo jup tɨtda pɨx: ―Dho gu' ya'p tu'ii' iñ ji na pai' juugɨt jir gɇ'kam gu Rooma kam na pai' pɨk jix io'm jum aa' na pim pu'ñi tuñ a'gidha'. Gio na gu' nap jax bax maat nañ aañ cham tu'x buam jum duukam jax ja buixi'ñ gu Israel kam ja'tkam.

Gu' no'ñ gu' moo sɨlhkam pui'x buam tu dooda' gɨt gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam, cham jañ dho jax kai'chɨt sia ku mɨt bañ mua, na gu' pui' ja'k pɨx bar am ka' gɨt. Gu' ji nañ gu' cham tu' pui' tu bua nam jax jiñ iattulhi'ñ, cham bhai' dho ba' moo na jaroi' mui'p bañ bai'ñchu'nda' ja bui. Gu' aañ bhammɨ dɨr ja'k ji nañ jix aa' nañ bhɨɨya' buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam nach ba' maap tu a'ga' gui' nam jaroi'ñ iattulhi'ñ.

Ba' gux kai' Pesto nat pu'ñi kai, xi ja tɨkkarak gui' nam aagi'ñdha' na jax ja'k jir am ka' gu tu' no' jax jix dhuñiim. Mi' dhɨr ba' moo gio mi'p ji ɇɇk jup tɨtda gu Paablo: ―Dho bak gu' bhammɨ dɨr ja'k bhɨɨya' ap ku giñ jaduuñ buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, nap gu' dɨɨlh pui' ba kai'ch.
Ba' gui' nar gɇ'kam ka' Agriipa tɨɨgim bɨɨma'n gu bɨnga'n Berniis tɨɨgim mummɨ ba ai mɨt Sesareeya nam paxiartudim gux kai' Pesto.

Ba' na mɨt gu' mui' tanoolh mi' juruuñ, ba' gux kai' Pesto ba aagi'ñ gu gɇ'kam na jax ja'k tu tu'ii' buiñor gu Paablo, jup tɨtda: ―Maa'n ya' kuup gu maa'nkam nat ya' pu cham xi do'ñchok gu Peeles gui' na bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ya'r jix kai' kat.

Ba' maa'nnim na ñich ma jii bhammɨ Jerusaleen, bhai' pui' bañ chɨtda am gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam gio gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu Israel kam ja'tkam nañ sap tu chiñia' nam mu'aa' gu Paablo.

Gu' ji nañ gu' aañ jup ja tɨtda nach cham tu' pui' ja'k tu jim aach nach jɨ'k jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam nach moop ba ji mu'aa' gu jaroi' no' mɨt pu'ñi chakui tu a'ga gu jaroi' bɨɨma'n nam xim bhabhaakui'ñdha' na ba'x maatɨ' ka' na jax ja'k jix chu buusnia'.
Ba' moo jano' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ya' ai, pu buimgidhak ba tu chia chich nam bha baidha' gu Paablo mi' na pai' tum a'gada' nam ba' mi' tu a'ga' maap.
Ku gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' ji chu a'ga, cham tu' pui' ja'k ji chɨi mɨt ji nañ aañ jax ja'k ɨlhii'ñ nam tɨ'ya' gɨt, nim maa'n dho moo ku mɨt bhaan tu a'ga gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam.
Dai nam jax ja'k tu jim dɨɨlh jamɨt pɨx bhaan bhai' ji chu a'ga na sap cham mi' pui' jim gu Paablo, gio sap na pui' kai'ch nat giop dua gu jaroi' na pui' tɨɨ' Jesuus na mɨt tɨi mua.

Gu' ba' aañ nañ gu' cham maat na jax ja'k jir am gu dhi' pui' nam jax kai'ch, aañ xi chɨkka gu Paablo no' moox bhai' nach mu jimia' bhammɨ Jerusaleen nañ ba' bhammɨ ja kaaya' gu dhi' pui' nam jax kai'ch.

Gu' ji na gu'p kai'ch na sap bhammɨ dɨr ja'k buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam jix aa' nam maap tu a'ga' gui' nam jaroi'x bhaamki'ñ. Ba' aañ ya' pɨx ka xi chu chia nam kuupka' nañ ba' mi' dhɨr gatuuk mui' ba tu jootsa' nam mu baidhika' pai' na duuk jir am ka'.

Ba' nat pai' dhuuk tɨɨmu na pui' xi chu a'gimɨk gux kai' Pesto, mui' ji ñio gu Agriipa, jup tɨtda: ―Aañ dho pui'p jix kaim gu jaduuñ nap jaroi' aa' na jax ba' ja'k moo xi bua na tu a'gada'. Ba' gu Pesto gio mui'p ji ñio, jup tɨtda: ―Jir am dho jia nach kabuimuk kaipu'. Kagɨt na jax xi buada' nap kaaya'.

Ba' na bar buimgidhak, mui' ma jii gu Agriipa bɨɨma'n gu bɨnga'n Berniis na mɨt ba kaim gu Paablo na jax ja'k xi buada' na tu a'ga' mi' na pai' jax ba tum a'gada'. Dai na mɨt jai' xi chɨm tɨi'dhak gu jajannulh gui' nam jax chu'm gɇ'gɇrkam ja tɨ'ka' na sap ba'x maatɨ' ka' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai na mɨt mui' ba baap mi' na pai' tum a'gada' ja bɨɨm gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu sandaarui'x gio gui' nam jɨ'k jir a'aixkam mi' dhi gɇ' kiicham. Mi' dhɨr ba' xi chu joot gux kai' Pesto nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo.

Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba aich, mui' ji chu a'ga gux kai' Pesto, jup kai'ch: ―Dho ya' dho bap tu'ii' dhich jaduuñ nap saak jix kaim aapi'ñ jaduuñ Agriipa gio aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ya'p tu'ii'. Ba' dhi' gu Israel kam ja'tkam maa'n nam ya' iattulhi'ñ aañ jiñ bui, sia bhammɨ Jerusaleen na ñich mu jimɨɨk maa'nnim pu'ñip jiñ chɨtda am, gio na pɨx cham jɨ'x ɨɨkix nam bhañ chian nañ sap tu chiñia' nam mu'aa'.

Gu' ji na gu' aañ nañ pui' xiñ aa', panaas cham tu' jax bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam na jax ja'k moox bhaigɨt nañ tu chiñia' nam mu'aa'. Gu' ji nat gu' dɨɨlh pui' ja'k jup tɨi na sap buiñor ja'k gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam maap tu a'ga' am gui' nam jaroi'x bhaamki'ñ, ba' mui' tɨip jix chu jootsam ka' iñ nam mu baidhika'.

Gu' ji na gu' cham bhai' nañ jax ja'k mui' xi chu ua'ñxidha' gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, nañ gu' cham maat nat tu' jax dhuu dhich jaduuñ Paablo. Ba' aañ pu kai'ñkam bha jam bai'ñxi xib aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ya'p tu'ii' gio aap gɇ'kam jiñ jaduuñ Agriipa, na pim ba' kaaya' na jax ja'k tu a'ga' na ba' gu' aañ jup jix bhaai'n ka' nañ jax ja'k mu tu ua'ñxidha' gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam.
Ja'p dho ji na gu' cham jir am aañ jiñ bui nañ moo ja'p pɨx mui'p ba tu jootsa' gu jaroi' nam mu baidhika' no' ñich cham bɨɨx mu tu joot gu u'uan na pui'm kai'chidha' nat tu' jax dhuu.

Ba' gu Agriipa xi chia gu Paablo na mui' xi chu a'ga', jup tɨtda: ―Eap xi chu a'gañ jaduuñ nap jax ja'k ɨlhii'ñ. Ba' gu Paablo nobii'ñ kɨ'n ja'p xi ja duiñ gu ja'tkam nam sap cham ñiokda', ba' mui' ji chu a'ga, jup kai'ch:
―Moox bhai'ñ chaat iñ na ñich ya' ba ji chu a'ga aap jum bui gɇ'kam jiñ jaduuñ Agriipa, nañ gu'x maat nañ aap jum buiñ palhbuidha' gu dhi' pui' nam jax ja'k jiñ iattulhi'ñ gu Israel kam ja'tkam.

Nap gu' aap jix bhai'x maat jiañ jaduuñ gu dhi' pui' nach jɨ'k jax ja'k tu jim aach nach jir Israel kam ja'tkam gio nach jax ja'k tu a'gada' gu tu' no'ch bax a'gak. Ba' gu xib aañ pum tɨtda nap jix bhai' ka xiñ kaaya' gɨt no'p moo pui'p ɨlhii'ñdha' gɨt nañ jax jum tɨɨda'.
’Bɨɨx jam dhox maat gu Israel kam ja'tkam nañ jax ja'k tu jimdat jano' nañ pai' dhuuk ja bui kiokat bhammɨ Jerusaleen, sia gu pu ɨlhi'chdham dɨr.

Pui'p jix maat am dho nañ gammɨjɨ pui' ja'k tu jimda' na jax gui' nam pariseos jum tɨɨtɨ', gui' nam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax ja'k tu aagix. Jum aagi'ñdha' am dho no'm moo pui'p ɨlhii'ñdha' gɨt nam bha jimɨi ya' pum tɨɨda'.
Ba' gu xib dhi' kɨ'n pɨx ya'ñ chulhiiñchu'n am nañ mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ja daaxdhak gu Dios gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam jich bopxi kat na gatuuk pu tu duñia'.

Ba' aach nach jɨ'k jir bopxi'ñ gu mambhɨɨx gook maamra'n gu Jakob, tɨ nɨɨr ich na pai' dhuuk pui' ji chu buusnia' gu dhi' pui' nat jax ja'k tu ja daaxdhak, pui' kuch ba' aach gammɨjɨ tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios nabap tanoolh gio nabap tukaa'. Ba' gu xib dhi' jɨ' kɨ'n pɨx ya'ñ iattulhi'ñ am gu Israel kam ja'tkam, nap ba' moox mat ka'ñ jaduuñ,
nam gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jia na gu Dios jir gɇ'kam, nax ai'chu'n na pu tu duñia' nam gio duduadɨip baapmigia' gu koi'ñga'n.
’Aañ dho bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nañ chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor gu Jesuus Nasareet kam, pui'ñ aa'nda' iñ nañ bɨɨx aixim tu dooda' na jax ja'k dui cham jaroi' bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchuka' gɨt buiñor.

Pui' ñich dho gu' tu dooda' maa'nnim bhammɨ Jerusaleen kɨ'n gu u'uan na mɨt jiñ maa gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Mui' ñich dho gu' ja da'ngɨk ja kuu nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor gu Jesuus, gio ba' nam pai' dhuuk ba ji ja kooda', aañ jai' bɨɨx pui'p xiñ aa'nda' nar am gu pui' nam jax ja buada'.

Gio ba' nañ gammɨjɨ ja gɨbdat ja chianda' nam pu tɨ'ya' nam cham tu' ka tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor gu Jesuus. Bɨɨx kap jañich dho gu' pui' ja dooda nam jɨ'k kap jum jumpadat tu daanda', sia gui' nam mu ja'p oi'dha'ka' jai' kap na pai' jax cham jir Israel.
’Ba' dhi' pɨx kɨ'n jañ mui'p ka jim mu ja'k Damaasko ji ua'dat gu u'uan gui' na mɨt jiñ maakak muñ joot gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam.

Gu' ji na gu'x dhaam duuk nañ gamai' ka jim gu bɨɨx boi ja bɨɨm gui' nam jiñ oi'ñchu', ba tɨɨ ñich nat bɨɨx xikoolh jich a'm bhai' ba tum ton bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam giilhim jix io'm jix o'jo' kɨ'n, cham tu' pui' na jax jix o'jo' gu tanoolh.

Ba' aach mi' pu ia'rɨ bɨɨx nach jɨ'k mui' ka jiimdat, ba' ba kai ñich nat bhai' ba tum ñio bhammɨ dɨr na pai' bha tum tanoor, jup jiñ chɨtda gu ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n: “Aapi' Saulo, ¿jax kup ba'ñ o'bhagi'ñchu'? Jum ko'ktulhi'ñ ap dho aap dɨɨlh, na gu' ja'p ji buusan nap joi' cha'm tɨ kɨɨyas.”
Ba' aañ xi chɨkka, ja'p jañ chɨtda: “¿Jir jaroop gi dha' aapi' Gɇ'kam?” Ba' gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha ñiok jup jiñ chɨtda: “Dho aañi' dhor di' gu Jesuus Nasareet kam gui' nap jaroi' o'bhagi'ñ.
Ba' gu xib bamgɨip xi kɨkbo', na ñich gu' pu kai'ñkam jum a'm ba tɨ tɨɨ nap tu a'ga' gu dhi' pui' na pich jax bañ chɨɨ gu xib, sia nañ jax jum aagi'ñdha' gatuuk.
Gio nañ aañ pɨx pui' tu duñia' nam cham jax jum dooda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, sia gui' nam cham jir Israel kam nañ jaroi' ja buim jootsa'.

Ba' dhi' ja'p kai'ñkam jañ mum jootsa' nap ja aagi'ñdha' nam ba' ba machia' nam jax ja'k mi' pui' jimia' nam ba' cham jix chu tukgam kɨr ka oipoda', nam ba' cham ka kaichgɨda' gu ja'ook. Gu' ja'pji nam mi' pui' ba jimia' ji na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gio nam ba' ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui. Dhi' pu'ñi ja'k duuk ba' ba uañchudhix ka' gu ja ua'tulhdhara', gio na ba' ja a'm bi'ya' gui' nat tu' ba ja iimchuda gui' na jɨ'k ja a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios.”
’Ba' aañ pui' tu duu dho na ñich jax ja'k tɨ tɨɨx dhaam gio na ñich jax ja'k kai gui' nat bha tuñ a'gi,

na ñich bhai' pu ji chu ja a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook gui' nam mummɨ oi'dha'ka' Damaasko. Mi' dhɨr ba' bhammɨ ja'k Jerusaleen jañich bhai'p ji chu ja a'gi, mi' dhɨr ba' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir Judea. Sia gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam jañ pui' ja tɨtdaim nam cham kam ua'tulhi'ñdha', dai nam mi' pui' ba jimia' pɨx na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gio ba' nañ pui' ja tɨtdaidha' nam jir jix bhabhai'kam ka' na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam tu' sɨlhkam cham tu' pui' ja'k ka tu jim na jax bɨɨpɨ' dɨr.
Ba' dhi' jɨ' kɨ'n pɨx jiñ dhaa mɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam na mɨt bhammɨ jiñ chɨɨgɨk gɇ' chiop, gio ba' na mɨt tɨi ɨlhdhak nam mooñ mu'aa' gɨt, gu' ji nat gu' cham pui' ji chu buus.

Ku gu' aañ maa'n ji nañ jax mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' nañ tu ja a'gi'ñchu' gu ja'tkam gam a'aalh sia gɇ'gɇr, na gu' gu Dios jiñ palhbui'ñchu'. Gammɨjɨñ pui' tu ja a'gi'ñdha' na mɨt jax ja'k tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankam tu a'gimɨk gu Dios gio gu pui' nat jax ja'k jup tu ua'nak gu Moisees na jax ja'k ji chu buusnia' gatuuk,

na saak pu'ñi gatuuk ya' aaya' guch Xoi'kam nam ba' mu'aa', ku gu' sap gatuuk na xi muukɨi, dhi' pɨk jir bɨɨpɨ' kam ka' ji na giop bamgia' duadɨi mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr. Mi' dhɨr ba' ja'p ji buusnia' na ja bɨ'ñxidha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam na ba ja aagi'ñdha' na jax ja'k duuji uañchuda' gu Dios gu ja ua'tulhdhara', sia gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam.

Ba' nat pai' dhuuk ba tɨɨmu gu Paablo na pu'ñi xi chu a'gimɨk na jax ja'k jup xim maat, gɇ' kɨ'n jiiñkɨt mui' ji ñio gux kai' Pesto, jup kai'ch: ―¡Iat ap dho Paablo! Gu' na pich giilhim xi' pɨk ba tum mamtux cham aagix kam. Gu' ba' ampɨx pui' bax ñaanbi' ap, pui' kup ba' jax ñap pɨx ba kai'ch.
Ba' gu Paablo jup tɨtda: ―Ja'pji cham tu' ji nañ jix ñaanbigɨt jup kai'ch jiñ jaduuñ Pesto, gu' ja'pji sɨlhkam ji nañ ya' tu a'ga na jax ja'k jir pui'.

Mi'ñi dho daa dhiñ jaduuñ Agriipa na pui'p jix chu maat gu dhi' pui' nañ jax ba kai'ch. Pui' kuñ ba' aañ kaixdhat ya' pui' xi kai'ch, nam gu' bɨɨx pɨx pui'x chu maat gu ja'tkam, nat gu' cham tu'x ɨxchuixim pui' tum duu.
¿Jia nap gu' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ gu pui' na mɨt jax ja'k tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankam tu a'gimɨk gu Dios? Aañ jix maat nap tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
Ba'p tɨtda gu Agriipa: ―Alhi'ch pɨx dho ba aagɨt nañ tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam nañ xim kɇɇ.

Ba' gu Paablo jup tɨtda ɨp gio: ―Dho gu' no' moox aa'nda' gɨt gu Dios na gɨt cham tu' dai aap nap tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gu' ja'pji sia bɨɨx gɨt ji nam jɨ'k ya'ñ kɇɇ gu xib nañ ya' tu a'ga nam pu'ñip ji buusnia' gɨt na jax aañ, sia kum gu' cham pu'ñi buupulh dhi bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n.
Ba' nat pai' dhuuk tɨɨmu na pu'ñi xi chu a'gimɨk gu Paablo, mi' dhɨr nat jax kɨkbo gu Agriipa gio gu bɨnga'n Berniis gio gux kai' Pesto gio ba' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k mi'p tu'ii',
mu ja'p dɨlhkob jamɨt xi jimɨɨk ma tu a'ga, jup kai'ch am: ―Cham bhaigɨt ji na ya' pai' kuupka' gɨt dhi maa'nkam, ni na cham jir am nam mu'aa', na gu' cham tu' jax bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam.

Ba' gu Agriipa mui' ji ñio ɨp, jup kai'ch: ―Jir am kat ji nap do'ñcho' no' gɨt chakui pu kai'chdha' nam bhammɨ dɨr ja'k baidhika' buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam nam pui' maap tu a'ga' gui' nam jaroi'x bhaamki'ñ.

Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ba bhɨɨk gu Paablo bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Italia dɨbɨɨr ja bɨɨm gui' nam maap mi kuupich, maa'n chia mɨt gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x na pui' tɨɨ' Julio ja bɨɨm gui' nam maap jir sandaarui'x. Ba' dhi' dhi sandaarui'x pui' ja'k jix ja mat ka' am nam sap jir sandaarui'x chugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam.

Ba' maa'n ampɨk mi' dhɨr suudai' jugii'ñ jup bar jimdam gu gɇ' kanuub na sɨlh jim bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr, ba' dhi' pui'r bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam ka' na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Adramiitio. Ba' aach dhi' ka'm bhaan bhai' xi chɨɨtɨs, gio ba' maa'n bhai'p xi chɨs ɨp guch jaduuñ na pui' tɨɨ' Aristaarko na sap jir bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tesaloonika, gui' na bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr.

Ba' buimgidhak bhammɨ dɨr ba ai chich na pai' gɇ'r kiicham ka' ju'ñdharan gu gɇ' suudai' na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Sidoon. Ba' ma paxiaram gu Paablo mu ja'p nam pai' oi'ñka' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' gu Julio gui' nar ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gu sandaarui'x cham jax tɨi, gio na mɨt jix bhai' dhuu sia cham pai' jax tɨi.

Ba' bhammɨ dɨr Sidoon na chich gio gamai'p ji jii gu bɨɨx suudai' dhaam bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub, mɨjɨ dɨr ja'p jachich bhɨi bɨɨx gakoolh mi' na jɨ'x alhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Chipre, na gu' mɨjɨ dɨr ja'p cham pɨk jix io'm tɨ gɨb gu jɨbɨɨlh, na gu' mi' dhɨr ja'k pɨk bhai'p jɨbɨɨr nach pai' ja'k jiim, ba' cham bhai' nach sɨlh mu bhɨɨya', na gu' bha ja'k nu'yas gu gɇ' kanuub nach bhaan jim.

Nammɨ dɨr jachich ba' ja'p ba noo amuub na pai'r dɨbɨɨr ta'm gui' na Siliisia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio'. Mi' dhɨr ba'x io'm gama ja'k gio ja'p jup ba bhɨi chich na pai' gu Panpiilia dɨbɨɨr bhaan jup bipio'. Bhammɨ dɨr jachich ba' ba ai na pai' Miira tɨ tɨɨ', gui' na bhaan bipio' gu Liisia dɨbɨɨr.

Ba' bhammɨ dɨr ampɨk maa'n bhai' dhɨr jup bar jimdam gu Alijandriiya kam gu gɇ' kanuub na sɨlh jim bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Italia dɨbɨɨr. Ba' ba tɨɨ gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, ba' dhi' ka'm bhaan bhai' xich chɨɨssa'ñ na chich giop ba jii bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na chich pai' ba jii.

Ba' cham pɨk xi' jimmɨ gu gɇ' kanuub na chich gamai' tɨi ji jii gu bɨɨx suudai' dhaam, na gu' pui bha jɨbɨɨr mu dɨr ja'k nach pai' ja'k jiim, ba' siamri dɨkoo soi' tui'dhi' kɨ'n ba bubua chich na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Niido. Ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k ba bhɨich jamɨt gu gɇ' kanuub na pai' ja'k cham pɨk jix io'm jɨbɨɨr na ba' xi' pa' ba jimda'. Ba' nammɨ ja'k jup ba bubua chich amuub na pai' ɨlhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Salmoon, mɨjɨ dɨr ja'p jachich bhɨi bɨɨx gakoolh mi' na jɨ'x jumai ɨlhi'ch jup jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Kreeta.
Ba' gamai' bɨɨx ju'ñdharan ji bhɨɨk jachich nammɨ dɨr jup ba ai na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Buenos Puertos. Ba' bhai' dhɨr mia'n bipio' baasɨ'n ja'k na pai'r gɇ' kiicham na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Laseeya.

Ba' nat gu' mui' tanoolh bap duu nach tɨi jiim, ba' cham kar am no' chich gio gamai' tɨip ji jii gu bɨɨx suudai' dhaam, na gu' ba miamlhim jano' na pai' dhuuk jix jɨɨpdharda' gio na duukda' jɨbɨɨlh kɨ'n. Ba' gu Paablo pui' ba ja tɨtda nam ka xim nɨɨrada' na ka xi buusnia' na jɨ'x juugɨt jix jɨɨpi'ñ ka',

jup ja tɨtda: ―Ja'p tu tu'ii'ñ jaaduñ na cham kar am no' chich gio gamai' tɨip ji jii, na gu' mu pai' ja'k dɨr gɨɨsɨi am xi bakia' dhi gɇ' kanuub, pu bɨɨx dho gu' mai' tɨ gɨxia' gu tu' nach bha tu ua', gio aach nach bhai'kui ko'ya'.
Gu' ji na gu' cham jɨɨgi'ñ gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, dai gui' mu ja'k ji kai gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam jix bhai' buidha' gu gɇ' kanuub nam sɨlh bhɨichdhidha' no' gama ja'k pɨx jim.

Ba' bɨɨx pɨx pui' ji chɨi mɨt na sap cham jir am nach mi' tɨ nɨɨrada' na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Buenos Puertos na jɨ'x juugɨt jix jɨɨpi'ñ ka'. Ba' mi' dhɨr ba jii chich mu ja'k na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Peniis, gui' na dhi' pɨx bhaan jup bipio' gu Kreeta dɨbɨɨr, nach sap ba' mu ja'k ka xi chɨ nɨɨrada' na jɨ'x juugɨt jix jɨɨpi'ñ ka', gio na gu' mi'r am na mi' kɨkbo' gu gɇ' kanuub.
Ba' gamai' ji jii chich gu bɨɨx suudai' dhaam bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub, na gu' palhɨɨp pɨx bhai' ka jɨbɨɨr mu dɨr ja'k jurnip dɨr. Ba' mɨjɨ dɨr ja'p bɨɨx gakoolh bhɨichu' ich mi' na jɨ'x jir Kreeta.
Gu' ji nat gu' ja'xpɨx ja'p dɨr ja'k xia'lhbui bhai' ji jɨb giilhim jix io'm, ba' am ja'x bua gu gɇ' kanuub nach bhaan mui' ka jiim,
ba' ja'p ja'k gamai' ji nu'ya. Ba' cham bhai' nach jax dhui ja'k ka bua' mu ja'k na pai' dhɨr bha jɨbɨɨr, bhai' pɨx jach ba' pu daraichu'.

Ba' nammɨ pai' ba bubua chich amuub mi' dhɨr ja'p bɨɨpgan na pai' ɨlhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Kauda. Ba' mi' xi chɨ saa'ñdhak jachich gu ɨlhi'ch kanuub gui' nach gatuuk dɨr tɨɨmɨr, na gu' mi' cham pɨk jix io'm jɨbɨɨr, ba' dɨkoo pɨx bhammɨ ji chɨsaa'ñ jachich.

Gatuuk tɨtropiñ kɨ'n xi buuprak jachich gu gɇ' kanuub, gio na chich xi chɨbaañdhak gu komaarak jannulh gui' na kɨ'n jim gu gɇ' kanuub, nach gu' giilhim bax chotdontu' nax io'm gɨ'nxim bhaan gu o'ya gui' na pui' tɨɨ' Sirte.
Ba' buimgidhak nach nai' tɨi xi chɨ nɨidhim, pui' na jax ba tum bua, ba' aach gio jai' nammɨp xi chu iabu suudai' chɨr gu tu' nach bha tu bhiiñor.
Ba' nat jumai gamai'p ji xia', jai' chich nammɨp xi chu iabu bɨɨx dhɨt gui' na kɨ'n jimmɨda' gu gɇ' kanuub.
Ba' mui' tanoolh pu cham ton, ni gu chiichia' kut jum maax bha ja'p jix dhaam, ba' aach pu cham ka ɨlhii'ñ no'ch moop ka bubuakia' gɨt mi' dhɨr suudai' chɨr, na gu' giilhim jix io'm pui bha jɨbɨɨr.

Gio nat mui' tanoolh bap duu na chich chakui tu juu, ba' gu Paablo mi ja'p jich saagi'ñ xi kɨkbok jup jich chɨtda: ―Aañ moo tɨi pu ba jam aagi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ nach gɨt mummɨ pɨx ka darka' Kreeta, gu' ji na pimɨt gu' cham jiñ kai. Tɨɨ' ba' nach jax ya' bach chulhiiñaim.
Ba' xib tu' na jax chui'ka', cha'pim jax jum aa'ntu'nda', na gu' cham tu' jaroi' maadɨt bhai'mui mukia', sia kut gu' dhi kanuub mu pai' am xi jaikɨ.
Pui'ñ chɨtda maadɨt gui' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu Dios nat tukaa'ñ buim maax, nat gu' bha joot,

jup kai'ch: “Cha'p too'nnichu'nda' Paablo, na gu'm a'mkam aa' nap buiñor aaya' gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam. Ba' gu Dios pui' tu duñia' na cham jaroi' maadɨt bhai'mui mukia' na pim jɨ'k ya' jiim bhaan dhi gɇ' kanuub, nap gu' aap ya jim.”
Pui' kuñ ba'p jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ na pim cham jax jum aa'ntu'nda', nañ gu' aañ buiñor jix biiñak gu Dios, na gu' pui' ji chu buusnia' na jax jiñ chɨtda gu nobii'ñ.
Ku ba' gu' na ka nui'ññika' ji gu jɨbɨɨlh dhi gɇ' kanuub nach bhaan jiim pai' na ja'k jax chu'm dɨbɨɨr.

Ba' maa'nnim tukaa' nat gook simaan bap duu, ba maat jachich nach mummɨp tu'ii' na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Adriatiko, nat bak mu ja'k bhɨich gu jɨbɨɨlh nu'yasidhat, na gu' ja'p ja'k jup bhɨichdha' jia gio ja'p ja'k ɨp. Ba' moo jano' gu ɨraab tukaa' ba maat jamɨt gui' nam ua' gu kanuub nach bak mia'n ba aajim bhaan gu dɨbɨɨr.

Ba' xi jupaaba'n am na jɨ'x kax chuuk gu suudai', ba' maa'n oo'm obrasaa'n jix chuuk. Mi' dhɨr ba' palhɨɨp gama ja'k na chich ji bhɨi, giop xi jupaabai mɨt na jɨ'x pɨx moo bax chuuk, ba' mambhɨɨx daman jix chamaam obrasaa'n pɨx bax chuuk.

Ba' na gu' pɨx am ba tu sissapim gu kanuub bhaan gu joodai, ba' mui' xi dhado'nkosa mɨt maakob gui' na kɨ'n cham ka jimda' gu kanuub, dai na mi' pɨx ba sɇ'ka' suudai' dhaam. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nam mi' pɨx ka tu daan buiñor gu Dios na ba' pui' tu duñia' na jotmoda' ba xia'lhia'.

Ba' gui' nam ua' gu kanuub tɨi ɨlhdhat am nam dɨɨlh mi' dhɨr ba jimia' gɨt jix ɨxchuixim, na mi' pup sɇ'ka' sap gɨt gu ja kanuub. Ba' tɨi mui' ji chɨbaañ jamɨt gu ɨlhi'ch kanuub, panaas sap kum ja'p xi chu buada' gɨt nam jai' mi' dhɨr ja'k mui'p xi dhado'nkosa' gɨt gui' na kɨ'n mi' pɨx sɇ'ka' gu gɇ' kanuub.

Gu' ji nat gu' ba ja tɨɨ gu Paablo, ba' ba ja aagi'ñ gu sandaarui'x gio gu ja gɇ'kam tuk, jup ja tɨtda: ―Ba jii mɨt gui' nam ua' dhi kanuub. Dhi' moo mi' pai' bhai'kui ko'ya' pim no'm cham bɨɨx ya' ka jiim.
Ba' gu sandaarui'x xi ɨ'kɨ mɨt gu tɨtropiñ gui' na kɨ'n ka gigia'rxix kat gu ɨlhi'ch kanuub, mui' dho'ñcho mɨt ba' suudai' chɨr.

Mi' dhɨr ba' na bar katukgab, soi' ba ja tɨtda gu Paablo gu ja'tkam nam sap xi jugai gu tu' na jai'ch ka', jup ja tɨtda: ―Gook simaan ba jip duu na pimɨt chakui ba ji chu juuñ jaaduñ, na pim jix chotdontu' nach panaas mi' pai' bhai'kui am xi ko'ya'.

Ba' aañ pu jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ na pim cham jax jum aa'ntugɨt xi chu jugai gu tu' nach ua', na gu' dhi'x io'm jum aa' jia no' pim dho jix aa' na pim duduatgɨda'. Na gu' tɨi cham tu' jaroi' maadɨt mi' pai' bhai'mui mukia' jia, nich chu' kuupa'n dho moo ku jaroi' maadɨt mai' bua'.

Ba' daipu' nat pu'ñi xi ja tɨɨdak gu Paablo, bhai' ji dhaa gu paan. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat xi chu taxchaabgidhak buiñor gu Dios mi' pui' ja saagi'ñ gu ja'tkam nai' xi ja maa ta'tak gio ba' nat bhai' ji chu juu dɨɨlh.
Ba' aach bhai'p jich guguux na chich ma ji chu juu.
Ba' bɨɨx nach jɨ'k jiim bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub, aix ich gook jix cha'tmam oo'm daman baik oo'm damdɨr mambhɨɨx xijum maa'n (276) pup.
Ba' gatuuk na chich xi chu jugaak nach jɨ'x jix chu naa, nammɨp xi iabu chich gu tiriik suudai' chɨr na ba'x jabkam sai'chgɨda' gu gɇ' kanuub.

Ba' nat ba xia', cham maatɨt tɨ nɨi'ñ am gui' nam ua' gu gɇ' kanuub na jax tɨ tɨɨ' mu ja'p na pai' pɨx jix chu maax nar dɨbɨɨr ta'm, ba' ba tɨɨ mɨt mu ja'p na pai' dhɨr joidham jix komaalhim mu suu'n gu suudai' mi' na pai' dhɨr bar dɨbɨɨr.

Ba' xi ɨ'kɨ mɨt gu tɨtropiñ gui' na kɨ'n mi' pɨx ka sɇ'kat gu gɇ' kanuub, mi' ba' pup baapax suudai' chɨr. Gio ba' gu u'uux gui' nam kɨ'n ka tu bhiijidhat na ba' jimda' gu gɇ' kanuub mummɨ xi iabu mɨt suudai' chɨr. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai na mɨt bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ja'k xi sa'iich maa'n gu komaarak jannulh, ba' gu kanuub gamai' ji jii mu ja'k suudai' jugii'ñ.

Gu' ji na gu' palhɨɨp gama ja'k nat ji bhɨi, mi' ba tu siis bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ja'k bhaan gu o'ya na mi'x oidha'. Mi' dho gu' pu cham bhaai' na ka jimia', nat gu' giilhim jix bhai' mi' ba tu siis. Dai nat bhai' pɨx ji jaikɨ gatuuk dɨr ja'k, na gu' giilhim na bha nu'yas gu suudai' na bha sɨlh gu'nguk.
Ba' gu sandaarui'x mi' bax ja koodam kat am gui' nam ja bai'ñchu' na mɨt ba ja kuupam, sap nam ba' cham ja o'ñxidha' nam ji bubuakɨi mi' dhɨr nam mui' ji chu suulhgia' mu ja'k na pai'r dɨbɨɨr ta'm.

Gu' ji na gu' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk dhi' jɨ' dhi sandaarui'x jotmoda' ja soo'mchulh, na gu' cham aa' nam jai' bɨɨx jup ba ji mu'aa' gu Paablo. Dai nat xi ja chia pɨx gui' nam jɨ'k jix maatɨt tu suulhi' nam bɨɨpɨ' mui' xi chu suulhgia' mu ja'k na pai'r dɨbɨɨr ta'm.

Gio ba' gu jai' nam jɨ'k cham maatɨt tu suulhi', xi ja chia ɨp nam sap taa'mlas bhaan mui' xi chu suulhgia', piam sap gu ta'tak ga'n gu gɇ' kanuub gui' nat mi' ba jaikɨ. Ba' dhi' pu'ñich buidhat siamri bɨɨx dappaam ma tɨɨtɨs jachich mi' na pai'r dɨbɨɨr ta'm.
Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk bɨɨx ba bubua mi' dhɨr suudai' chɨr, ba maat jachich nach mi'p tu'ii' na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Malta.
Ba' gu mi' oi'ñkam pɨx jix bhai'ch chɨtda am gio na mɨt mi ja'p ba tu nai gɇ', na gu' giilhim jix jɨɨpi'ñ na bha duuk, ba' bach bai'ñ am nach mui' xi juukgipu'.
Ba' gu Paablo jai' xi u'uuk gu ku'aa' mi'p xi chua tai dhaam. Ba' maa'n mɨjɨ dɨr jimɨɨ gu ko' na ba mɨidhim gu tai, ba' nobi'ran jum bhiibgak pu kɨi.

Ba' gu mi' oi'ñkam na mɨt tɨɨ nat nobi'ran ba kɨi gu Paablo gu ko', jup jum tɨ tɨtda am dɨɨlh: ―Jir tu mua'kam dho bak dhi maa'nkam nat ba' ba kɨi gu ko', na gu' giilhim jix ua'tulhdhix, sia kut gu' tɨi cham mu pai' bhai'muk muu suudai' chɨr. Gu' ji na gu' gu Dios cham aa' na duaka'.
Ba' gu Paablo mi' tai dhaam xi dhaagɨk xixiix gu nobii'ñ na ba' jigɨxia' gu ko', ba' pu cham tu' jax jum duu.

Ba' bɨɨx dhɨt pɨx am nɨi'ñ am na pai' dhuuk bhai' ji baigɨkia' piam na pai' dhuuk am xi mukia', gu' ji nat gu' chakui pai' jax ba jim duu nam tɨi xi nɨi'ñ, tɨi gu' ba mɨɨkim. Ba' gatuuk pui' ji chɨi mɨt na sap jir dios ji gu Paablo, nat ba' cham maimtuda gu ko' nat tɨi kɨi.
Ba' mi' ju'ñdharan nach pai' xi juukgimɨk, mi' dhɨr amuub bipio' gu dɨppɨr ga'n gui' na mi'r gɇ'kam ka' na pui' tɨɨ' Publio, gui' nat jich chɨbiaptuda baik tanoolh gio nax bhai' tuch maakda'.

Ba' gu taata'n gu Publio jano' pɨk jup ɇɇka' gu toiñdhi' bɨnkam gu book ko'k, ba' gu Paablo mui' ma tɨɨgim. Ba' dai na jax jim xi chu daanɨk buiñor gu Dios bhai' xi dhaa gux ko'kkam, jix kɨɨ' dho gu'p jum duu mi' jotmoda'.
Ba' na mɨt pui' ba tɨ kai gu jai'x kako'kkam nam mu ja'p oi'ñka', jum dɨkoo'ñ jamɨt na mɨt mu jii buiñor gu Paablo. Ba' gui' pɨx ja'x jup ji ja dudua'ñ, jix kɨkɨɨ' dho gu'p jum duu mɨt bɨɨx.

Mi' dhɨr ba' dai na mɨt ma tuch onbai' bɨɨx aixim gu tu', gio na chich pai' dhuuk ba jii bhaan gu jumai gɇ' kanuub bɨɨx jamɨt jup xi chuch maa na jɨ'k tu'ch a'm jum aagaidha' gammɨjɨ nach jax jiimda'.

Ba' gu baik masaa'n na chich bhammɨ dɨr xi juruuñdhak na pai' ɨlhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr, ba jii chich bhaan gu jumai gɇ' kanuub gui' nat pui' bhai'p juruuñ na jɨ'x juugɨt jix jɨɨpi'ñ kat. Ba' dhi gɇ' kanuub jir bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam ka' na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Alijandriiya, ba' bhaan bha tuuttu' am bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ja'k gook gu ja didios tuk gu bhammɨ dɨr kam, na pui' tɨɨ' maa'n Kaastor, gio ba' gu jumai Poolus ɨp.
Ba' bhammɨ dɨr ba ai chich jumai momkoran na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Sirakuusa, ba' bhai'p juruuñ jachich baik tanoolh.

Mi' dhɨr ba' giop ba jii chich bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' jumaip jir momkoran na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Reegio. Ba' buimgidhak ampɨk bhai'p ji jɨb mu dɨr ja'k jurnip, ba' aach mui' pu xi jii bhammɨ dɨr ja'k nach pai' ja'k jiim, maa'n tanoolh jachich ba'p duu na chich ba' bhammɨ dɨr jup ba ai na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Putioli.

Ba' bhai' ba ja tɨɨ chich ɨp jai' guch jaaduñ gui' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' bach baidhim am mu ja'p nam pai' oi'ñka', ba' aach mui'p ma jii, maa'n simaan jachich dho gu' ja buip juruuñ. Ba' dhi' pu'ñich buidhat siamri dɨkoo ba aajim ich bhammɨ dɨr Rooma.

Ba' gui' nam bhammɨ ja'k jup oi'ñka' Rooma guch jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, pu bax maat am nach mui' ba jiim, ba' bhai' ma jii mɨt na mɨt bhach ñamkim bhai' na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Pooro de Aapio, gio ba' bhai' na pai' pui'p tɨ tɨɨ' Baik Tabernas. Ba' nat ba ja tɨɨ gu Paablo, bhai'x bhai' jim ɨlh, ba' ma tu taxchaabgi buiñor gu Dios.

Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk bhammɨ dɨr ba ai Rooma, mui' xi ja aich gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x buiñor gu jumai ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x gu bhai' kam, gui' na ja bai'ñchu' nat mui' ba ja kuupam. Ba' gui' xi chu chia nam ja kuupa' mi' nam pai' mi' pu ja kukpada' gu ja'tkam. Dai ba' gu Paablo dɨlhkob ja'k tu chia mɨt nam kuupa', gio sap na maa'n pɨx mi' nuuka'nda' gu sandaarui'x.

Ba' baik jurni'ñ kɨ'n nai' ba tu ja joochxi gu Paablo gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' nam bha ja'p oi'ñka' Rooma. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bɨɨx bhai' bam jumaap, bhai' ji chu ja a'gi, jup ja tɨtda: ―Aañ mañ dhaa mɨt bhammɨ Jerusaleen gu Israel kam ja'tkam sia kuñ tɨi cham tu' jax ja buixi'ñ, ni kuñ cham pai' iam cham tu' ka'm jup nɨi'ñ gu pui' nam jax ja'k tu jimdat guch bopxi kat, ba' ja chia mɨt gui' nam ya' dɨr bhammɨr gɇ'gɇrkam nam jiñ chulhiiñchuda'.
Ba' tɨi ba xiñ dho'ñchom kat am, nañ gu' cham tu' bhaan kuiñcha bia' kum gu'p bañ mu'aa' gɨt.

Gu' ji nam gu' gu Israel kam ja'tkam giilhim ba xiñ mu'aam, ba' aañ pui' mañ dɨkoo'ñ na ñich pu tɨɨ'n gui' na bhammɨ dɨr jir gɇ'kam Judea na tu chiñia' nam bhañ bhɨika' ya ja'k Rooma buiñor gui' na ya'r gɇ'kam na ba' ya'ñ chɨkka' no'ñ moo kuiñcha bia'ka' ba' gu' cham, sia kuñ gu' aañ cham ja iattulhdham guñ jaaduñ Israel kam.

Ba' aañ ja'p kai'ñkam mu tu jam joochxiñ jaaduñ nañ xi jam tɨɨgim gio nañ bhaan xi chu jam a'gidham gui' nach jaroi' saak nɨɨrada' na bha jimda' gɨt ya' aach jich bui nach jɨ'k jir Israel kam ja'tkam, gui' nañ jaroi' buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nañ ba' ya' buupulh xib kɨ'n dhi bapaiñum tɨtropiñ.

Ba' gui'p kai'ch am: ―Dho gu' aach ya' cham pai' jax tɇ kɇɇ ji, na gu' cham pai' jaroi' pui' ja'k bha tuch ua'ñxi'ñ gu bhammɨ dɨr kam Judea, gio jai' tɨi bhammɨ dɨr jup jiim am guch jaaduñ, sia cham pai' jax kai'ch am no'p moo mu pai' pɨx oirɨt jix buam tu bua.
Ba' aach tɨi xim kaim dho gu pui' nap jax jix chu a'gam jich jaduuñ, na gu' aach nach jix maat, bɨɨx kap pɨx pui' kai'ch am gu ja'tkam na sap cham tu'r sɨlhkam gu dhi' pui' nap jax kai'ch.

Ba' ba tu dai mɨt nam pai' dhuuk bhai'p tui'ka'. Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jum ai, mui' bhai' bam jumaap jamɨt, ba' bhai' ji chu ja a'gi gu Paablo kabuimuk dɨr pu nai' ji jur. Ba' mi' bhaan tu ja a'gidhimɨk mi' nat pai' tu ua'nak gu Moisees gio ba' mi' na mɨt pai'p tu ua'nak gui' nam pui' bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n jup tu a'gimɨk gu Dios nam sap ba'x maatɨt kɇɇji ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor gu Jesuus.
Ba' jɨ'ma'n siamri tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jamɨt gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ja a'gi gu Paablo, jai' ba' pu cham,

dai na mɨt xi ñiokboidhat ba jii. Ba'p ja tɨtda gu Paablo: ―Pui' ba ji bubua pimɨt jiñ jaaduñ nat jax tu ua'nak maadɨt gui' nam jir jich bopxi kat, gui' nam bhaankam tu a'gat gu Dios nat pui' ja'k jurtudak gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', gui' na pui' tɨɨgich Isaiiyas, na ja'pnim kai'ch mi' nat pai' tu ua'nak:

Xi ja aa'ñdhamɨr dhi Israel kam ja'tkam nañ jax ja'k jix aa' nam mi' pui' jimia'. Dai ji na gu' no'p tɨi pui' ba tu ja a'gi'ñ, pu cham maatɨt kaaya' am, piam no'm tɨim nɨi'ñ nap jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu bua, pu cham maatɨt tɨgia' am na jax jir jum duukam ka'.

Nam gu' pu cham maatɨt tɇ kɇɇ dhi' dhi ja'tkam, panaas ba' ku ja'p ji buusan nam pu cham ñiññia gio nam pu cham tɇ kɇɇ. Pui' kum ba' cham xim ga'ngada' na jax jir jum duukam ka' gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam no'm tɨi nɨi'ñ, gio nam cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n xi chɇ kɇɇkɇ' gu' nam ba' jax dhui pɨx cham mi' pui' jimia' dho nañ jax jix aa'. Ku gu' aañ cham tu'p jiñ buixi'ñdha' ji ja bui.

Ba' xib dɨr ja'p ja'k bax mat ka' pim jiñ jaaduñ nañ cham tu' aapi'm ka tu jam a'gidha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, dai gu jai' ja'tkam jañ pɨx ba tu ja a'gidha' gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ka', nam gu' gui'x kaim jia.
Ba' nat pai' dhuuk tɨɨmu na tu a'gimɨk gu Paablo, ba jii mɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam xi ñiokboidhat.
Ba' gook oidha' bhai' juruuñ gu Paablo bhai' nat pai'm taiñbui maa'n gu ba'aak tu namkidhat. Ba' mui' bhai' aajidha' am gu ja'tkam, ba' gui' pɨx jix bhai' ja tɨtdada'.
Ba' cham jaroi' soo'mchulhi'ñka' na tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na bhaan tu a'gada' guch Xoi'kam gui' nar Gɇ'kam.

Aañ jir Paablo, jam ñio'ki'ñ iñ bhaan dhi'ñi u'uan aañ nañ jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ a'm tɨ tɨɨ nañ pu'ñi chu'm kɨ'n jir nobii'ñ ka'. Ba' nañ nai' tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nat bhaan jiñ a'm tɨ tɨɨ, dhi' ba' bhaan jir tujuandam tugi'ñ iñ gio nañ jir nobii'ñ.

Ba' gui' na bhaan tu a'ga dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, gu Dios dɨɨlh ja aa'ñ gui' na bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n ya ja'p tu a'gimɨk na pu'ñi gatuuk ya' aaya', dhi' ba' mi' dhɨr pui' ja'k tu ua'na mɨt.

Ba' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios bhaan tu a'ga gu Maraa'n, dhi' nach jaroi' iim aach nar jich Xoi'kam gio nar jich Gɇ'kam tuk, na tuuku' bhaan jir boxii'ñ gu Dabii gui' na bɨjɨk jir gɇ'kam kat. Nat gu' guch Xoi'kam maaxik maa'nkam jup jim duuk ya' maaxir dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, dai gu ii'mdaga'n nar jix uañ.

Ba' nat pai' dhuuk muukɨk giop dua guch Xoi'kam, dhi' bhaan matgir na sɨlhkam jir Maraa'n gu Dios na bɨxchu'x bhaai' na pu tu duñia', na ni jaroi' gu ja'ppɨx maa'nkam cham jɨ'xdhat pu tu duñia', gam nat cham tu' bhaan jum ua'tulh sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt.

Ba' dhi'r di' guch Xoi'kam nat xiñ joi'mdak jiñ chɨɨgɨk jiñ dhai nañ jir nobii'ñ ka' nañ ba' mi' pu tu duñia' na jax jix aa', nam ba' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n jai'chdhɨlhia' gui' nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai mi' pui' ba jiimda' na jax jix aa'.

Pui' na jax aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim bhai' oidha' Rooma, ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ japimɨt buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios xi jam joi'mdak pui' ja'k tu duu na pim ba' bar ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka' guch Xoi'kam. Ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' am na pim ba' joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka'.

Bɨɨpɨ'ñ ja'p xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nañ aañ taxchaabgi'ñ gu Dios na pim jix io'm buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, bɨɨx kap nai' pui' tum kai'ch na pim jix io'm buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.

Nañ gu' aañ gammɨjɨ jam a'mkam tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios na ba' jam palhbuidha' na pim jix io'm buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha'. Jix maat dho gu' gu Dios nañ gammɨjɨ jam a'mkam tu daanda', nañ gu' gammɨjɨ jam tɨ'ñchoka'. Gu Dios gui' nañ jaroi'r tujuandam tugi'ñ jañ aagɨt jup kai'ch, nañ jaroi' bhaankam nai' tu ja a'gidhim gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na bhaan tu a'ga gu Maraa'n.

Ba' pui' ja'k jañ jup tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios na gɨt gui' dɨɨlh aaga' nañ mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra', na gu' no't gui' dɨɨlh pui' ba tɨi nañ mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra', gui' dɨɨlh pui' tu duñia' na jax ja'k jix bhaai'n ka' nañ mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra'.
Tɨi mur jimdam iñ gu' nañ xi jam tɨɨgim gio nañ xi jam gu'nguxdham bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jam i'ii'mda'ɨr bhaan na pim ba'x io'm mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.

Piam nach maap jich gu'nguxdha', jax ña pɨx. Pui' na jax aapi'm jiñ guguuxdha' na pim tu' bax maat na pim jɨ'x buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, gio aañ nañ tu'p jix maat nañ jɨ'x buiñor jup ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.

Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, aañ mui'kim tɨi ba ji tu dai nañ mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra', gu' ji na gu' tu' na pɨx bhaan cham jax kax bhaai'n ka' panaas. Nañ gu' tɨix aa' na pim ja'xbui'p ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam na jax aañ, ja'p na jax jai' kap nam ja'xbui'x io'm jup ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na jax aañ. Dhi' ba' ja'p ji buusnim na jax no'ñ tu oraim.

Jum aa' gu' nañ bɨɨx kap nai' tu ja a'gidha' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k jix jai'ch, cham jax bua sia kum jai' dhɨt jir jix chu mamatdagɨm piam ku gu' cham, piam sia kum jai' dhɨt tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñ gu jai' ja'tkam, piam sia gui' nam gampai' tu'm, sia jaroi' na pɨx jiñ a'm jum aa' nañ tu a'gidha' sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt.
Pui' kuñ ba'x aa' nañ mu jimia' Rooma nañ mu tu jam a'gi'ñmɨra' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, tɨi aa'nda' gɨt iñ nañ bhammɨ ba aaya'.

Aañ cham tu' xi'ɨr bhaan gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, na gu' dhi'x bhaai' na mi' dhɨr baabu' gu jaroi' na mu ja'k ka jimda' na pai' gammɨjɨ gɨt mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', ba' jumai boi bhaan kɨɨsa' na pai'x bhai' ba tu jimda' gammɨjɨ, ku gu' no't tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak mi' pui' ba jii ji na jɨ'k jax jum kai'ch. Gu Israel kam ja'tkam pɨk gɨt jam bɨɨx tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai mi' pui' jimia' na jax jum kai'ch, na gu' dhi' pɨk tɨi ja bui jim gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook. Gu' pɨx ji na gu' sia pui' ja buip jim gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam, jum aa' ɨp ba' sia nam kɇɇji mi' pui' jimia'.

Gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, dhi' bhaan jich aagi'ñ gu Dios nax u'uañ kɨ'n jich chuttu', dai pɨx no' chich soi'ch ɨlhdhak ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui' na mɨt jax tu ua'nak gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam nap jum kai'ch: “Gu jaroi' na mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios gio no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, dhi' gammɨjɨx bhai' ba tu jimda'.”

Aañ jix maat na gu Dios jix dhaam dɨr jix bhaamut ja nɨi'ñ gu ja'tkam gui' nam cham mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa', na gu' dai nam bɨɨx aixim tu bua nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ, pui' ku ba' bɨxchu' bhaan pɨx ba ja tulhiiñchu'n. Na gu' pui' nam jax cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ja'p ji buusan nam dhi' tu soobhi'ñ nam cham machia' gu jai' ja'tkam na jax pɨk ja'k jir mi' pui' nam tui'ñgɨda'.
Jix bhai'x maat am tɨi dhi' dhi ja'tkam nam jax ja'k dui machia' na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, gu' pɨx ji no'm jix maachik ka' gɨt. Nat gu' gu Dios dɨɨlh jup tu duu gui' nam tu' bhaan machia' gɨt.

Na gu' no'ñ jix bhai' bhaan xiñ ga'nga gui' nat jɨ'k tu'p tu duu gu Dios, pu dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' na jax jir tu'm dɨɨlh gu Dios, sia ku gu' cham maax gu maaxik bhaan. Pui' na jax dhi oi'ñga'n nach xi ñɨi'ñ na jax jir tu'm nat jup duu, dhi' bhaan jix bhai'x maatɨ' na jax jir gɇ'kam na ba' bɨxchu'x bhaai' na pu tu duñia'. Pu dhi' bhaan jix bhai'x maatɨ' sia na cham jɨ'xkat jum tɨɨmo' na bɨxchu'x bhaai'n ka' na pu tu duñia' sia tu' na pɨx. Cham tu' dho ba' bhaai' nam tu' bhaan jax tɨ'ya' dhi' dhi ja'tkam,

nam gu' tɨix maat gu Dios na jax jir gɇ'kam, gu' pɨx ji nam gu' dɨɨlh cham xim gu'nguxi'ñ nam iam gɇ'kamtuda' na jax ja'k jum aa' nach gɇ'kamtu'nda' nar Dios. Ni kum cham iam jup xi taxchaabgi'ñ sia tu' bhaan, dai nam bɨɨx aixim bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñcho na tu' pu cham tu' mim nɨnɨi'ñ. Jix chu tukgam tɨr ja'k tɨtɨɨ'ñcho am dai, cham tu'x chu maax kɨr ja'k.
Pui' xi kai'chɨt am nam jix io'm jix chu mamatda', gu' ja'pji nam pu cham tu' maat gux matgɨm.

Tɨɨ' na mɨt ja'p xi dhuuk gu Dios gui' na cham tu mumkɨ, ba' dai gui' na dɨɨlh gu ja'tkam jup jir ja duiñ bhai' ji ja daanɨ mɨt. Iam nam gu sɨlhkam Dios ba' pɨk daanɨt gɇ'kamtu'n nam kapbhai' bax maat na jax jir gɇ'kam. Gu' dai gui'm pɨx ba ja daan nam jup jir tu duiñxim, na pu chu'm ka' ɨp na dɨɨlh gu maa'nkam, gam u'ji'p tu duiñxim, gam gu tu' nam maakob tu tooton, gam kooko'p tu duiñxim.

Ba' dhi' bhaan gu Dios xi ja do'ñcho pɨx nam ba' dɨɨlh mu pu tu duñia' nam jax ɨlhii'ñ gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam, pui' ku mɨt ba' bɨɨx aixim jix buam tum duu'nkam bhai'p jip tu duu na tu' cham jir kɨɨ'.

Dɨɨlh bhai' ji gaa mɨt nam jax ja'k duix ia'tbi' ka', iam chi na mɨt ja'kbui' kat gaa nam jax ja'k sɨlhkam tu a'gada' na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Gio nam bɨɨx aixim ja bui ba tu daan na tu' Dios pɨx jup jir duñii'ñ, iam chi nam gui' ba' pɨk buiñor tu daan na jaroi'p jir tu duñii'ñ bɨɨx dhi' nam ja bui tu daan. Na gu' dai gu sɨlhkam Dios jix dhaam kam jix bhaai' nach dhaanda' gammɨjɨ sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt. Iam gɨt jach bɨɨx pui' duiñchu'nda' gammɨjɨ.

Dhi' jɨ' ji bhaan ba' gu Dios xi ja do'ñcho dhi' dhi ja'tkam nam ba' pu tu duñia' nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ, pui' ku mɨt ba' bhai' jip tu duu gui' na tu' cham jir kɨɨ'. Jai' dhɨt gu ja bɨpna' dhi' dhi ja'tkam, jai' u'uub jamɨt ja oi, cham tu' kap jum buix jamɨt gu ja chichio'ñ chuk, jix xi'ɨraam jum duu mɨt.

Gio jai' dhɨt gu chichio'ñ pui'p jum duu mɨt, jai' mɨt ja oi gu chichio'ñ, cham tu' mɨt kap jum buix gu ja bɨpna' u'uub, nam gu' daix buam tu'm bhaan ba tɨtɨɨ'ñcho. Xim ja joojoi mɨt dai chichio'ñ gio dai u'uub, cham tu'r am tɨi pui' na mɨt jax jum duu, jir jix xi'ɨraam dhi' pui'. Ku gu'm tulhiiñ am ji pui' ji chu't ja tutku' bhaan, nat gu' pu chu'm ja daam ba jii na mɨt jax jix aagɨk pui'm duu.

Ku gu' dɨɨlh ji gu Dios nat xi ja do'ñcho pɨx nam pui' ja'k jum duñia', gio nam pu tu duñia' nam jax jix aa' dɨɨlh, na mɨt gu' cham aa nam mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa', na mɨt gu' dai bhaan ba tɨtɨɨ'ñcho gu tu' na cham jir kɨɨ'. Ba' cham jax bua siam chi ba' pum buimɨk jax ñam ɨlhii'ñ dɨɨlh, sia ku tɨi cham jir am.

Gio gu' bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu jim am na jax cham jir kɨɨ', cham tu' dai pui' pɨx. Jix jɨɨgak ka' am gu jaroi' sia tu' na pɨx bhaan. Gio nam jir tu koo'n kam. Gio nam ja'p pɨx ja ñioki'ñdha' gu jai' sia kum cham tu' jax bua. Gam nam jix ia'tbi'. Joidham ɨlhdhat pu buada' am gu tu' na cham jir kɨɨ', gam nam nai' ja a'gidhat ja axiidha' gu ja'tkam.

Gam nam pui' ja a'gada' gu jai' ja'tkam nam jix buam tu jim, dɨɨlh ba' pu cham jum nɨi'ñdha' am. Gio nam jix bhaamki'ñ gu Dios. Gio nam cham tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu jai' ja'tkam, gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka' am pɨx, jix aa'nda' am nam joidham jix bhai' ja aa'nda' gu jai' gu tu' nam jax buada'. Gio nam dɨɨlh pɨx jix aichu'nda' nam jax ja'k duñia' gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam. Gio gu ja gɨgɨ'kora' pu cham tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñ am.

Gio pu cham maatɨt tɇ kɇɇ am sia jaroi' tɨi tu ja a'gi'ñ. Gio cham jɨ'xkat pu duñia' am jax no' mɨt tɨi xi chɨi. Gio nam cham tu'x joi'mdat nɨi'ñdha' gu jaroi'. Gio nam cham jɨ'xkat tu uañdha' gu jaroi' no't tu' bhaan mam ua'tulh ja bui, nam gu' pu cham maatɨt taat na jax tu tatda' no'ñ jix chu joi'gɨ'n.

Jix maat am tɨi nat gu Dios pui' ja'k tu dai, na gu jaroi' no'x buam tu bua nam jax jix buam tu jim dɨɨlh, dhi' mu ja'k bhɨɨya' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', gu' pɨx ji nam gu' ja'p xi dhuukat pu tu duñiim sia kum tɨix maat. Joidham pɨx nɨi'ñdha' am gu jaroi' no' pui'p xi chu bua nam jax tu buada' dɨɨlh.

Ba' aapi'm Israel kam ja'tkam, cham jir am na pim jix u'uañ jum ɨlhdhat pui' ja tɨtdada' gu jai' ja'tkam nam jir jix u'ua'tulhdhix kam, na gu' cham jam joi'mda' gu Dios jano' na pim pai' dhuuk buiñor tɨi ba aaya', sia ku pim gu' aapi'm pui' ɨlhii'ñ panaas na xi jam joi'mda' na pim jir Israel kam ja'tkam. Jax dhui na pim gu' pu chu'm kɨ'n jup jix u'ua'tulhdhix na jax gui' am.
Jix maat ich dho na gu Dios ja tulhiiñchuda' bɨɨx gui' nam pu'ñi ja'k tu jim.

¿Gu' ba' aapi'm ja'p jum aa' aa ba' na katti iam pu'ñi ja'k cham jam tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios na pim pui' ja tɨtdada' gu jai' nam jir jix u'ua'tulhdhix kam? Chaam tu' ji matgɨm. Dhi' kɨ'n ji ba'x io'm jam tulhiiñchuda', na pim gu' ja'xbui' pɨx jup jix u'ua'tulhdhix na jax gui' am.

Gu' ji na gu' gu Dios joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n, tu nakoo' pɨx kia' na pim tu' jax bua, na gu' tɨ nɨɨra no' pim iam mi' pui' ba jimia' na jax jix aa', sia ku pim gu' aapi'm pu cham maat na jax jum aa' gu Dios jam bui.

Gu' ji na gu' aapi'm cham tu' iam pui' bam aa' na pim mi' pui' ba jimia', ja'kbui' kat japim jix io'm jum ua'tulhdhim. Ba' gu Dios jix io'm bhaamuim ɨp jam bui, bɨɨx jam bi'chulhdhim jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na bɨɨx ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam pu'ñi cham mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa', jano' na dɨɨlh gu Dios maaxik ja bui xim maaxdhai ja aagi'ñdha' na tu' ja a'm bipio'da' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gu ja'tkam jax ñam ja'k tu jimia' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.

Gui' nam jɨ'k pu gaaga' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n nam jax dhui aaya' buiñor gu Dios, gio na jax ja'k dui pɨx jix bhai' ja aa'nda', gio nam jax ja'k dui cham jimia' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', nam mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, dhi' jɨ' am, gu Dios ja baidha' nam buiñor bap tui'ka' gammɨjɨ.

Gu' ba' gui' nam gammɨjɨ pɨx jum ua'tulhdha', nam cham jɨ'x aaga' nam mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, nam dai gux buam jum duukam jix joojoidha', dhi' jɨ' am gu Dios cham ja joi'mdai mu ja'k xi chu chiñia' nam ja iabo' nam pai'x io'm gammɨjɨ pup jum tulhiiñdha', na gu'x io'm bhaamu' ja bui.

Bɨɨx jum tulhiiña' am gui' nam jɨ'k jum ua'tulhdha', tɨix buam jum aa'nda' am ba'. Aapi'm pɨk jam bui jim dhi tulhiiñara' na pim jir Israel kam ja'tkam, ku gu' sia ji na pui' ja buip jim gui' nam cham jir Israel kam.

Piam ku gu' ja'pni ɨp, joidham jix bhai' ja duñia' gu Dios gui' nam mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa', pɨx jix bhai' ja aa'nda', ba' gui' pɨx jix bhai'p jum taat ka' am. Gui' pɨk jix bhai' ja duñia' nam jir Israel kam ja'tkam, ku gu' sia pui'x bhai'p ja duñia' ji gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ka'.
Na gu' gu Dios maa'n na jax pɨx ja bia' gui' nam jir Israel kam ja'tkam gio gui' nam cham jir Israel kam.

Na gu' sia kum jai' dhɨt cham bia' gu u'uan gui' na bhaan tu daaxix na jax ja'k tu aagix nat tu ua'nak gu Moisees, sia mu ja'k bhɨɨya' am nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', nam gu' pui' pɨx jup jum ua'tulhdha', sia kum gu' tɨi pu cham maat na jax ja'k tu aagix. Gu' ba' gui' nam tɨi bia'ka' gu u'uan na mi tu daa na jax tu aagix, gu' pɨx ji no' mɨt gu' ja'p xi dhuuk jum ua'tulh, dhi' bhaan bhai' ji ja dagia' gu Dios na mɨt jax kai'ñkam cham mi' pui' jii, nam gu' tɨix mat ka'.
Cham tu'r bi'xim ka' am gu' gui' nam ja'p pɨx kaaya' na jax tu aagix nat tu ua'nak gu Moisees, gu' gui' ji nam pu duñia' na jax jum kai'ch nam ba' cham jum tulhiiña'.

Na gu' gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam, sia kum gu' pu cham maat na jax tu aagix nat tu ua'nak gu Moisees, gu' ji no'm gu' dɨɨlh jup bia' na jax ja'k jup tu aagix ja bui, bhaan tu daa'ñchu'nda' am na jax tu aagix ka' sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt.

Ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na ja jujur am pɨx tu ua'ñix na jax tu aagix nam tui'ñgɨda'. Ba' nam tu'x mat ka' na cham jir kɨɨ' gio na tu'r jix kɨɨ', dhi' bhaan mui' xim ga'ngada' am nam tu' pu duñia' gio nam tu' cham pu duñia', dai ba' nax bhai' ba tu ja jimia' no' mɨt gu'x kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu duu. Piam ku gu' cham, dho dai na cham bhai' tu ja jimia'

jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' gu tanoolh na gu Dios bɨɨx ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax xi buimɨi ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, pui' na jax jum kai'ch dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam nañ jax chu'm bhaan tu a'ga aañ, sia kum gu' cham jum matda'ɨr pɨx pu buim xib nam jax ɨlhii'ñ.

Ba' aapi'm na pim pui' kai'ch na pim jir Israel kam ja'tkam, ba' na pim pui' ji kai'chɨt dhi' bhaan tu daa'ñchu' pim na jax tu aagix nat tu ua'nak gu Moisees. Ba'x bhai'm taatɨt am gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat japim na pim xi iim gu Dios jix dhaam kam.
Jix bhai'x maat japim ɨp na jax ja'k jix aa' na pim tui'ñgɨt mi' pui' jiimda', na gu' na jax tu aagix nat tu ua'nak gu Moisees, jix bhai' jam aagi'ñ na tu' pɨk jum aa' na pim mi' pu duñia'.

Ba'x bhai'x maat japim panaas na pim sɨlh ja bai'ñchu' bhaan gu boi gui' nam cham jɨ'x ñiññia, gam nax bhai' mɨimtu' panaas gu jam taai' na pim kɨ'n ja bɨ'ñxi'ñchu' gui' nam jix chu tukgam tɨr jiimchu'.

Nañ ja'pni kai'ñkam jup kai'ch na pim panaas jix bhai'x maat na pim pui' xim aa' na pim jax ja'k jix bhai' ja aagi'ñ gui' nam pu cham jɨ'x maat nam jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gio na pim panaas jix bhai'x maat na pim jax ja'k ja palhbui'ñchu' gui' nam kia'pɨx maachim nam jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda', na pim gu' aapi'm jix bhai' bax maat na jax jir mi' pui', na pimɨt gu' bhaan dɨr maat gu u'uan gui' na mi' tu daa na jax ja'k tu aagix gui' nat Moisees tu ua'nak.

Gu' ba' na pim kapbhai' tu ja mamtuxi'ñ gu jai' nam jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda', ¿cham bhaai' aa na pim dɨɨlh pu'ñip xi chum mamtuxdhat na pim jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda'? Na gu' no' pim jax ja tɨtda gu jai' na cham jir kɨɨ' nam gan tɨ ɨɨxi'ñdha', ¿gu' jax ku pim ba' aapi'm bɨɨpɨ' kat tɨ ɨɨxi'ñ?

Piam no' pim jax ja tɨtda na cham jir am nam jai' ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu u'uub, daipux bhaai' gu ja bɨpna', ¿gu' jax ku pim ba' aapi'm nai' pɨx ja bɨɨm boppo gu jai' u'uub, iam na daipu' gu jam bɨpna'? Gio no' pim baabui' sɨlhkam cham ja kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu didios jup duiñxim ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, ¿gu' jax ku pim ba' gan jix xɨ'lhim mu baapkɨt ja chichiop am mi' dhɨr ja ɨɨxi'ñ gu ja tumñi' ganai' bɨɨx aixim nax dha'ram tu namɨɨk?
Tɨi bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat japim dho pui' na jax tu aagix nat tu ua'nak gu Moisees, gu' pɨx ji na pim gu' cham tu' bhai' bi'iim buiñor gu Dios, na pim gu' cham tu' mi' pui' jiim na jax tu aagix.
