Aapi'm chi gu' ja'p jum aa' na pim pui' pɨx jup jimia' jix dhaam ja'k sia ku pim ja'x ji chɨ kɨɨsaim na pim jumpadaim dhix dha'ram namkɨm xib na ya' bar mia'n na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha'. Ja'kbui' kat ja'p ji buusnia' ji na dhi' ba' mu ja'k xi jam iabu' tai chɨr na pai' cham tutkɨ, na gu' dhi' bhaan jam tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios na pim dai jumpadim gux dha'ram namkɨm, iam gu' mi' pui'p ba ji jii pimɨt na jax jix aa' na pim ba' pu'ñi duuji jimia' gɨt buiñor.

Daman gu jam tujuandam tuk japim pui' pu cham ja namkidha' pai'jɨ, sia kum alh tɨix bhai' bua nam jam ɨxii'ñdha' gio nam tu orda'. Tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' pim, ni jɨ'x ku pim jix ja joi'gɨ'nda'. Ku ba' gu' na gu' gu Dios jix bhai' ja kɇɇ nam gɇ'kam kɨ'n tɨi soi'm ɨlhii'ñ buiñor na pim ja tulhiiñchu'n, gui' ba' dɨɨlh jup bax maat na jax dhui ja palhbuidha',

sia ku pim gu' aapi'm cham tu'p jum buixdhat gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', dai gu' na pim bɨɨx aixim tu bua na pim dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ. Ja'p ji buusan na pim jum gii'ñchudaim na ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p tu jam dooda' na jax gu sasoi' nam ja gii'ñchudat ja koodat ja kua'da',
na pimɨt gu' gɇ' bam ua'tulh na pimɨt bɨɨx ja tulhiiñchudak ba ja koi gui' nam cham tu' bhaan kuiñcha bia'kat.

Aapi'm moo cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt tɨ nɨɨrka'ñ jaduuñ jano' na pai' dhuuk bha jim guch Xoi'kam, Dios japim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak ka' cham jim o'jolhdhat. Ja'pni na jax ba' gu jaroi' no't tɨ ɨi, na gu' soi' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' na ba' bha duukda' na kɨ'n tu kaibhaidha', mi' dhɨr ba' tɨ nɨɨrda' na pai' kabka' na ba' pɨk ba tu oraa', cham tu' gu mi' jotmoda' nax aa'nda' na gɨt ba tu oraa'.

Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' na cham ob pai' aajim guch Xoi'kam na pim tɨi xi chɨ nɨɨra, Dios japim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak ka' cham jax jim aagɨt nañ jax ba jam tɨtda. Pu ka na gu' jootom ya' pɨx ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham, dai ji nach cham oodat pɨx am tɨ nɨɨrda'.

Aapi'm jix bhai' xi chu jimda' dai. Cha'pim bɨɨx aixim jum i'iattulhdhat jum ñiñiokboixi'ñdha', ni ku pim cham jum bhabhaakui'ñdha', na ba' gu' cham pui' jam tɨɨdai jam tulhiiñchuda' guch Xoi'kam no't ya' ba ai. Na gu' no' pim aapi'm pu'ñi ja'k pɨx tu jim, pui' ji jam tɨɨda' na pim dhi' bhaan kuiñcha bia', pui' jam tɨɨda' na pimɨt dhi' bhaan cham tu' mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', ba' dai na ba jam tulhiiñchuda'. Alh moo cham jɨ'x ka mɨɨkidha' ji gu' na ya' pɨx ba aaya' guch Xoi'kam, am bha mia'n bam kɨisap ji gu' na bhai' bar jimdam.

Aapi'm gu' mi' pui' xi jiimdat ji na jax jix aa' jix biiñak ka' buiñor, cha'pim jax jim aagɨt sia ku jax giilhim cham bhai' tu jam jim xib bɨɨx aixim bhaan. Mi' pim pui' xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' nat jax tu ja jii gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora' nam pu'ñi giilhim jum tulhiiñaimɨk bɨɨx aixim bhaan nam tɨi tu a'gada' gu ñio'ki'ñ.

Aapi'm ba' pu'ñi ɨp, na gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gammɨjɨ jich a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jich palhbui'ñchu' guch Gɨ'kora' nach ba' gammɨjɨx bhai'ch chaatɨt jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' guch i'ii'mda' bhaan, sia kuch pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim bhaan jich chulhiiñ. ¿Jax japim gi bax maat nat tu jii bɨjɨk gui' na Job tɨɨgich? Jaiñ nat giilhim jum tulhii bɨɨx aixim bhaan, ku gu' mi' nat xi ñakoo sia ku jax giilhim jix buam tu tatda', joidham jix bhai' tu jii ji, gɇ'p jum duukam jup tu duu gu Dios buiñor, jix joi'ndat palhbui, na gu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidhat jup tui'ka'. Aach ba' pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ no'ch xi ñakoo' siach pu'ñi giilhim jich chulhiiñ tu' na pɨx bhaan, gui' dhoch palhbuidha', na gu' gui' joidham jir jix bhai'kam, dai pɨx ji no'ch jix biiñak buiñor.

Gio ja'pniñ ba' moo tɨip kai'chɨt jiñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim tui'ñgɨda' gɨt, na pim cham pai' dhuuk jax kai'chdha' dho na dhix dhaam bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nar pui' ka' jax na pim kai'chdha', piam dhi oi'ñga'n, piam sia gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, na pim pui' jim aagɨt na dhi' ba' jam palhbuidha' piam ku jam tulhiiñchuda' no' jax dhuukat cham jir pui' jax na pim kai'chdha'. Ja'pji daipu' na pim pu tɨ'ya' pɨx na cham no' pim jix maat na cham jir pui'. Piam no' pim jix maat nar pui', dho daipu' na pim pu tɨ'ya' pɨx na jɇɇ'. Daipu' dhi' nax aa' guch Gɨ'kora' nach sɨlhkam tuch a'a'gi'ñdha' na ba' cham dhi' bhaan jich chulhiiñchuda' gatuuk no't ba tum kuugalh.

Gu' ba' no' moo maadɨt aapi'm cham bhai' tu jim na tu' na pɨx bhaan jum tulhiiñ, jum aa' na soi'm ɨlhdhai pu tɨɨda' gu Dios na palhbuidha' na ba' mi' dhɨr cham kam tulhiiñdha'. Piam ku gu'x bhai' tu jim, ba'x jɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' nax bhai' tu tatda', dho gu' dai dho na laala'ñxi'ñdha' gu alabaa'n buiñor gu Dios na taxchaabgi'ñdha'.

Piam ku gu' jaroi' maadɨt ɇɇ gu jax chu'm kokdai' na kɨ'n jix ka'ook, dai na ja umua'ñdha' dho guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gui' nam jɨ'k bɨjɨk dɨr ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam tu daañxidha' buiñor gu Dios na dua'ñdha' xi juulhdhai am palhɨɨp gu asait.
Dua'ñdha' dho guch Gɨ'kora' no' mɨt bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n soi'm ɨlhdhak buiñor tu daañxi, tu ua'ñdha' ɨp no't tu' bhaan jum ua'tulh buiñor.

Pu'ñi ja'k jum aa' na pim duiñchu'nda'ñ jaaduñ. Xi chu a'gat japim xi chum uañdhat maa'n ñi'ook xip bua't no' pimɨt tu' bhaan mam ua'tulh dai aapi'm jam bui, na ba' gu'p jam kɇɇkɇ' gu Dios na pim pai' dhuuk pu'ñi soi' ba tɨtdada' na pim tum daañxi'ñdha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na jam dudua'ñdha' no't ba ji jam ai gu jax chu'm ko'kdai', sia gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan. Na gu' gu jaroi' no' moo mi' pui' xi dhuiñchu' na jax ja'k moox aa' guch Gɨ'kora', bɨxchu'x bhai'm duukam jix bhaai' na pu tu duñia' bhaankamu'n, na gu' kɇɇkɇ' na pai' dhuuk mui' ba taanda'.

Ja'pni na jax gu Eliiyas gui' na bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora'. Jaiñ na tɨi pui' pɨx jup jir tu'm kat na jax aach, cham tu' mu pai'r tu'p tu'm da' kat. Tɨɨ' na kɇɇkɇ' gu Dios na pai' dhuuk taanda' gu tu', na gu'x mat ka' na mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa'. Jaiñ jano' nat soi'm ɨlhdhat pu tɨɨ'n gu Dios na cham tu duukchuda' baik oidha' daman taak mi' na jɨ'x jir Israel. Pui' dho ji chu buus, kai gu Dios nat jɨ'k jax tɨɨ'n.

Gio mi' dhɨr nat xi buus gu ja'kbui' baik oidha' daman taak, gio soi'm ɨlhdhak pui'p xi chɨɨ'n gu Dios nax bhaai' na ba tu duukchuda'. Pui' giop ji chu buus, giop ba duu'n mi' na jɨ'x jir Israel na mɨt ba' giop ba tɨ ɨ'sa gu ja'tkam. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' aach no'ch moox biiñak buiñor guch Gɨ'kora'.

Gu' ba' no' moo jax dhuukat jaroi' maadɨt cham tu' kap jim buix buiñor gu Dios, no' gu' maakam pɨx ba tui'dhi' na jax cham pui' ja'k aa', ba' no't gu' jaroi' maadɨt jix joi'ndak tɨɨgɨk guguux na gio mi' pui'p ba jimia' na jax jix aa' gu Dios,

dhi' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' ba duñia', na gu' guguuxdhaimɨi na jax ja'k dui giop bax biiñak ka' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora', ba' bɨɨx pu tu uañdha' ɨp gio gu Dios na jɨ'k ua'tulhdharga'n. Mi' dhɨr ba' cham tu' mu ja'k ka bhɨichgɨda' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt.

Aañ Peegro nañ jir nobii'ñ guch Xoi'kam, ya' dɨr mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim mummu ja'p oi'dha' mui' kap na pai' jai' dɨppɨr bhaan bipio', pui' na jax aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim mummu ja'k oi'dha' na pai' Ponto dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', gio aapi'm na pim mummu ja'k jup oi'dha' na pai' Galaasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan jup bipio', gio ba' moo aapi'm ɨp na pim mummu ja'k oi'dha' na pai' Kapadoosia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', gio ba' aapi'm na pim mummu ja'k oi'dha' na pai' Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan jup bipio', gio aapi'm na pim mummu ja'k jup oidha' na pai' Bitiinia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio'.

Nat gu' bɨjɨk dɨr pu chu'm kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ gu Dios na pim pu'ñi tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam, gio ba' nat bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jam tajaañ gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n na pim ba' kaichgɨt mi' pui' xi bhɨichgɨda' na jax ja'k jam jurtudidha', gam na jam mattu'nka' nat guch Xoi'kam tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara' jano' nat pai' dhuuk jaax gu ɨ'ra'n bhai' bhaan gu kuruus na mɨt sissapa, na pim ba' mi' dhɨr cham tu' ka ua'tulhdhix ka'. Ja'pni, moo gɨt ba' gu Dios pɨx jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' na pim ba' gammɨjɨ cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka'ñ jaaduñ.

Ja'p moor gɇ'kam ji gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gui' nat bha joot gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, tu daanda' ich buiñor jiñ jaaduñ na gu'r jix bhai'kam. Tɨɨ' nat jix bhai' duu nat xich joi'ndak tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara' nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix kat, nat tuch ñamkix guch Xoi'kam jano' nat muukɨk duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt pai' tɨi yaas. Ba' xib ja'p ji buus na chich giop ba maaxir nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, xib ba' gu' dai ji nach jix bhai'ch chaatɨt pɨx am tɨ nɨɨrda' nach a'm tu bi'ya' gui' nat tuch iimchuda gu Dios,

nap kai'ch na saak jich makia' gatuuk gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam no' chich bhammɨ ba ai na pai'p tu'ii', gui' na cham jɨ'xdha' jax jum duñia' ni gu cham pai' dhuuk kɨlhii'ñchai nai' ji dhɨbaa'. Ka gɨt na gu' pui' ji chu buusnia' nañ jax jam tɨtda,

na pim gu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n bax biiñak buiñor gu Dios, gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim ba' gu xib. Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, dai na ba jam baidhika'x dhaam na pim pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', cham tu' mu ja'k na pai'r tu tulhiiñara'.

Ba' aapi'm dhi' kɨ'n jix bhai' pɨx bam taat ka'ñ jaaduñ na pim ba tu iimchudhix, cha'pim kuu' jimmɨda' sia ku jɨ'x cham bhai' tu jam jim tu' bhaan. Mui' pim xix biiñak ka' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' na gu' gatuuk joidham jix bhai' tu jam jimia'.

Na gu' dhi' cham pɨk jir tu' sia ku pim jum tulhiiñ tu' na pɨx bhaan, na gu' bhaan pɨx jix maatɨ' ka' no' pim moo tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor guch Gɨ'kora'. Ja'pni na jax ba' jia gux uam totbikdam nax dha'ram namɨɨk, nam gu' xi mɨmɨi'ñdha' tai chɨr nam mi' pɨx mamtɨda' no' moor di' gux kɨɨ', piam ku gu' gui' na cham pɨk tu' bhai'. Aapi'm ba' pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pɨx bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' no' pim moo sɨlhkam jix biiñak buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' no' pim pu'ñi tu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ. Ba' no' pim pur maa'n na pim jax jix biiñak, ja'p ji buusnia' buiñor gu Dios na pim aapi'm jir di' gui' nax dha'ram namɨɨk. Jix io'm tu' ka'm jam ɨlhii'ñ gu Dios, cham tu' pui' na jax gux uam totbikdam, na gu' dhi' pui' pɨx jup jum xichui'dha' saalhiom. Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk ya' ba aaya' guch Xoi'kam, joidham pɨx jix bhai' jam tɨɨdai jam baidhika' buiñor, na gu'x mat ka' na pim aapi'm gammɨjɨx biiñak kat buiñor sia ku pimɨt jum tulhii.

Na pim gu' aapi'm buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat tu' ka'm nɨidhat guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa', sia ku pimɨt cham tu' maaxik tɨɨgɨk na ya' xi oilhimɨk. Jix maat iñ na pim bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor, sia ku pim jix maat na cham tu' ya' kap tu'ii' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, gam na pim gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'm taatɨt buiñor jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' na pu cham bhaai' na pim jax xim buada' ni na pim jax xi chɨtdada',

na pim pui' xim aa' nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' ba duu nat tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara' na pim ba' mi' dhɨr cham tu' kam tulhiiña', dai na ba jam baidhika'x dhaam nat pai' tu jam iimchuda. Pui' ku pim chi ba' cham jax jum aagɨt mui' xix biiñak buiñor bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n sia ku pim jum tulhiiñ tu' bhaan.

Na gu' gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, pui' tu a'gimɨk am gio na mɨt pui' tu ua'nak na sap pu'ñi jax chu'm tanoolh jix joi'ndat jam tɨɨgɨi gu Dios tu jam uañdha' gu jam ua'tulhdhara' na pim ba' cham jum tulhiiña' gatuuk.

Dɨɨlh guch Xoi'kam pui' ja'k ja jurtu'nka' gui' jɨ' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gada' gu ñio'ki'ñ jano', na jɨ'k jax tu duñia' no't pu'ñi ya' ba ai dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, gam na jax ja'k jum tulhiiña' ja a'mkam na ba' mi' dhɨr jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daasa' guch Gɨ'kora'. Tɨi ba' xim ga'ngada' am ja jujur am bhaan nam jix maachik ka' na jaroi' ba' pui'r jich Xoi'kam ka', na pai' dhɨr buusnɨi ba' pui' ba ja palhbuidha' gu ja'tkam, gam na pai' dhuuk ba' pui' tum duñia' gu pui' na jax ja jurtu'nka' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.

Ba' dɨɨlh gu Dios ba ja mattuda gui' jɨ' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gada' na cham tu' jano' pui' tu kuugalhdha' na pui' tu ja uañdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam nam pai' dhuuk mi' kapup oipoda' gui'. Ja'pji sap jix io'm gatuuk ji na ba' pui' ba tu kuugalhdha', xib bak ba' nach pai' dhuuk pu'ñi ya' ba oipoda' aach. Jaiñ, pui' dho ba tum kuugalh ba' xib na mɨt jɨ'k jax tu ua'nak gui' jɨ' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora'. Ya' dho ɇɇk guch Xoi'kam pui' xi chu duuk nat tu' kɨ'n bha jii. Xib ba' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook nai'p ba tum a'gichu' na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, nat jɨ'k ja a'm tajaa gu Dios gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gui' na ja a'm tajaañixchu'ndat gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk, na ba' ja mattudidha' nam jax ja'k tu a'gada', piam nam kɨ'n machia' gu tu' no'm jix maachik sia moo jax jix xijai, nam sia gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios cham jɨ'xdha' machia' siam tɨix maachik.

Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim siamri mi' pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' pɨx am tɨ nɨɨrda' jano' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya' guch Xoi'kam na ba' mi' dhɨr ba jam makia' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam nat jam iimchuda gu Dios na jam makia'.
Cha'pim mu ja'k bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n na pim jax tu buimɨk jano' na pim chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim gu' aapi'm xib bar maamra'n gu Dios.

Gu' ja'pji dai ji na pim pɨx bhaan ji baapmigia' na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax ja'k moox aa' guch Gɨ'kora' na pim ba' pu'ñi duujix chu uañ kɨr bap tui'ka' ja'p na jax gui' nat jaroi' xi jam joi'ndak jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ na joidham jix uañ.
Na pim gu' bax maat na jax jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ mi' pai' u'uan ta'm na tu ua'ñix nap jum kai'ch bo: “Joidham japim jix chu uañ kɨr jup tui'ka' ja'p na jax aañ nañ joidham jix uañ.”

Gu' ba' gu xib jum aa' na pim siamri soi'm ɨlhdhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gui' na pim pui' ba iim xib nar jam Gɨ'kora', na pim ya' kapup dudua dhi oi'ñga'n dhi jam tutku' bhaan, na ba' jam baidhika' jix dhaam ja'k. Na gu' gui' cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' joi'nda' no'x maat nat cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat. Bɨɨx ji na mi' pui' xi ja tɨɨda' nam sɨlhkam kuiñcha bia' na mɨt cham mi' pui' jii nat jax tu daasak, cham tu' na gu' jɨ'k ba'p jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' sia ku mɨt cham tu' ka'm tɨɨ.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ cham pu chu't, tu' ka'm japim xi ñɨidhat gu Dios, nat gu'x bhai' ba duu nat tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara' nach buam pɨx tu jimdat nam jax tu jimdat guch bopxi kat gam jich kukuulsi kat, nat bha joot guch Xoi'kam na ya' tuch ñamkixdha' kɨ'n gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, cham tu' kɨ'n gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n na sap pɨk ba' pui' tɨix dha'ram jup namɨɨk, pui' na jax gux uam totbikdam gio gux chua totbikdam na nai' pɨx jim xichui'dha' mɨkkat.

Gu' ja'pji gu ɨ'ra'n guch Xoi'kam nat jaax bhaan gu kuruus nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk nat kɨ'n tuch ñamkix nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix kat, na mɨt mua sissapak kuruus ta'm na ba' mi' dhɨr pu'ñi duuji tuch uañdhix ka' guch ua'tulhdhara'. Ja'p jum duu na jax maa'n gux kɨɨ'x dhuakam gu kasnir nam ba makgɨrta' bhaan gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar.

Gu Dios bɨjɨk dɨr na chakui ya'r oi'ñga'n ka' pu pu chu'm kɨ'n dai jia guch Xoi'kam na sap ba' pu'ñi bha jimɨi ya'ch a'mkam jum tulhiiña' na tuch ñamkixdha' nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix, nach ba' mi' dhɨr cham mai' ka suulhgia'. Dho jaiñ, pui' tum duu dho, ya' dho xi ɇɇk pui' xi chu kuugalhdhak. Ja'p moo joidham iam, tɨɨ' na gu' jano' pɨk nach pai' dhuuk ya' ba oipo aach, jix bhai' tuch jii dho gu', nat gu' ba tuch uañ gu Dios guch ua'tulhdhara'.

Jix bhai' duu dho guch Xoi'kam nat tuch ñamkix, nach gu' mi' dhɨr ba' pu'ñi duuji dai gu Dios pɨx buiñor bax biiñak ka', gui' nat jaroi' dua'ñdhak giop bamii' guch Xoi'kam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt pai' tɨi yaas gu ja'tkam xi mu'aak nat ba' mi' dhɨr jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba dai bhammɨx dhaam. Ba' xib dai gui' pim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak kat tɨ nɨɨrda' na pui' tu kuugalhdha' nat jax tuch dhaaxdhak.

Na pim gu' aapi'm jix chu uañ kɨr ba'p tu'ii' ba' xib, na pim gu' kɇɇkɇt gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios mi' pui' ba bhɨichu' na jax jix aa' tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' ba tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara', gio na pimɨt ba maat na pim jax ja'k dui jix bhai' kai'chɨt xim jajoi'gɨ'ndat tu oi'ñka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gammɨjɨ . Ba' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k japim duiñchu'nda' gammɨjɨ nabap tanoolh, cha'pim tu' bhaan jum kokdada', gu' ja'pji na pim joidham jix bhai' kai'chɨt jix bhai' xim tɨ tɨtdat xim ja joi'gɨ'nda' ji bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n gio na pim jɨ'x jup jum taat.

Na gu' aapi'm na pim mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, ja'p ji buus na pimɨt giop ba maaxir gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan, cham tu' gu ya' maaxik na jax na pimɨt pai' dhuuk maaxir dhi tuuku' bhaan. Gu ja'pji na pim mi' pui' ba jiim ji na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' na jax bam kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ, nat gu' ba pataasa gu jam i'ii'mda', cham tu' pui' ja'k ka tu jim japim na pim jax chu jimdat. Ba' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na pim kaichgɨt mi' pui' ba jiim, cham pai' dhuuk jum pataasa' ni ku cham pai' dhuuk jugia', gammɨjɨ ya' pui' pu tu daaxix ka' na jax ba tu ua'ñix.

Pui' na jax ba tu ua'ñix maa'n kap gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nap jum kai'ch: Bɨɨx na jɨ'k gu ja'tkam ja'pni pɨx ji buan am na jax gu sai' na mu ja'p tuut. Ba' nam pai' dhuuk bar gɇ'gɇrkam ka', ja'p pɨx jup ji buanda' am na jax gu yooxga'n. Ba' na pai' dhuuk bhaatai nai' ji gakia' gu sai', bɨɨx gu yooxga'n pɨx cham pai' matgilhia', na gu' ba gakia' gu toona'n.

Pu'ñi ɨp gu ja'tkam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, alhio pɨx nam ya' oipoda', gu' matgam gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios cham pai' dhuuk jugia' ji, gammɨjɨ ya' pui' pu tu daaxix ka' nat jax ba tu dai na tu aagix ka', ni ku cham pai' dhuuk jum pataasa'. Ba' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam na jax jir tu'm kam na xib mui' kap tum a'gichu', jir di' pɨx gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na gammɨjɨ pui' pup tu aagix ka'.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', cham tu' na pim pui' pɨx xim tɨɨtgat na pim jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham pu cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' na jax jix aa', sia ku pim gu' pui' tɨi xi chu bua nam jax ja'k bhaan pui' jam ɨlhii'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na pim jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Gu' ja'pji na pim sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' ji. Cha'pim bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam kap tu buada', ni ku pim cham jum i'iatgi'ñdhat, sɨlhkam japim tu a'gada'. Ni ku pim cham tu' ka jɨɨgak ka' maa'n no' tu' bia', gam na pim cham nai' ka tu a'gada'.

Gu' ja'pji dai ji na pim joidham bax maachik ka' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na pim tui'ñgɨda', na pim kɨ'n joidham jix kokba'n ka' gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan, ja'p na jax gu a'aalh gui' nam kia'pɨx maaxilhia' nam gu' joidham gammɨjɨ pɨx kax xi'iik ka'. Pu'ñi ɨp aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, mui' pim xi gaa'ñchu'nda' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' na pim ba' cham mu ja'k ka bhɨichgɨda' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt,
no' pim dho ji moo baabui' pui' bax chu maat na joidham jir jix bhai'kam gu Dios piam ku gu' cham.

Mui' pim xix biiñak ka'x io'm buiñor guch Xoi'kam jiñ jaaduñ, na gu' gui'x io'm jir gɇ'p jum duukam buiñor gu Dios, pui' kut ba' gɇ'kam kɨ'n bhaan tɨ tɨɨgɨk bha joot ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Gui' ja'p ji buusan jia na jax maa'n gu jodai gui' nax io'm jir jix kɨɨ' na mɨt tu' pɨx ɨlhdhak ja'p xi dhuuk gu ja'tkam cham kɨɨgalhdhak.

Ba' aapi'm no' pim moo bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gu Dios pu chu'm jup jam duñia' na jax gu joodai gux kɨkɨɨ' joidham, mi' dhɨr ba' kɨ'n kɨɨsa' gux abhaar gu chiopga'n. Piam na pu chu'm jup jam duñia' na jax gui' nam mi'r gɇ'gɇrkam ka' jax chu'm chiop, nam mi' oipot tu makgɨrxi'ñdha' gu Dios gam nam tu kubhioñxi'ñdha' na gammɨjɨ gui' na joidham jix kɨɨgalhdhidha'. Aapi'm pu'ñip ji bubuakia'ñ jaaduñ no' pim moo pɨx bhaan ji baapmigim na pim mi' pui' jiimɨt jix biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam nar gɇ'p jum duukam buiñor gu Dios,

pui' na jax bam kai'ch mi' pai' u'uan ta'm na pai' tu ua'ñix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nap jum kai'ch: Maa'n jañ mu jootsa' gui' nañ a'mkam ja palhbuidha' gu Sion oi'ñkam nar gɇ'p jum duukam aañ jiñ bui. Gui' ja'p ji buusan na jax maa'n gu gɇ' jodai nax io'm jum aa' nam mi' daasa' gu bhibhii'ñbakchadam nam pai' bhaan jum o'to'nka' gu jai' joodai. Ba' gu jaroi' no't soi'm ɨlhdhak tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor, gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' ba tu jimia' gio nañ ba palhbui'ñchu'nda' gammɨjɨ.

Aapi'm dho pui'p bax maat nar gɇ'p jum duukam gui' jɨ' na ja'p ji buusan na jax gu jodai gux kɨɨ' joidham, na pim gu' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n. Gu' ba' gui' nam jɨ'k cham kɨɨgalhdhat cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, dhi' bhaan pɨx pui' ba tum kuugalhdha' nat jax tum ua'nak bɨjɨk nap jum kai'ch: Gu jodai na mɨt mai' tɨi xi buak gu bhibhii'ñbakchadam, xib mi' daa na pai'x io'm jum aa' nam bhaan jum o'to'n gu jai' joodai.

Gio jumai kap ja'pnip jum kai'ch ɨp: Dhi' jɨ' dhi jodai bhaan jutbui ia'lhia' am gu ja'tkam. Maaxik dho pui' ba ji buusan nam ba ia'lhix jutbuk bhaan dhi jodai gui' nam jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', na gu' dai na ba ja tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk nam cham tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam na tɨi tum a'ga gu ñio'ki'ñ. Dhi' ba' pu'ñi ja'k ja bi'chulhi'ñ.

Aapi'm nat gu' xi jam joi'ndak jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ gu Dios na pim ba' pu'ñi tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' na ba' jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha', gio na pim ba' pui' bar tuutu'm ka' na jax gui' nam mu ja'p tu juanda' chiop bhaankamu'n gu Dios, gam na pim sap ba' joidham jix chu uañ kɨr bap tui'ka' gammɨjɨ na jax gui', na pim gu' mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa'. Pu chu'm kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ ɨp gu Dios jiñ jaduuñ na pim joidham tu' ka'm nɨidhat nai' xi jimia' bɨɨx kap na pim tu a'gapu' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, na pim ja aa'ñdhidha' gu ja'tkam nat gui' xi jam joi'ndak jam boosolh mu dɨr jix chu tukgam tɨr na pim pai'p tu't, na pim ba' mi' dhɨr pu'ñi joidham jix chu maax kɨr bap tui'ka'.

Na gu' jano' na pimɨt chakui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdhak buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' jam a'm tɨ nɨidhat gu Dios, ni ku cham pai' xi jam joi'gɨ'ndat. Gu' matgam xib na pim ba kaichu', gɇ'kam kɨ'n ji na jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat xi jam joi'gɨ'n, na pim gu' buiñor bap tui'dhi' mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa'.

Ja'pniñ ba' moo tɨip kai'chɨt jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, na pim gammɨjɨx bhai' pɨx jum taat ka', na pim gu' cham xiim ba jimia' maakam ja'k na pai' joidham jix chu abhaar. Na gu' xib ja'p ji buusan na pim ya' pɨx ja'p bhɨichu' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, ja'p na jax pai' no'ñ cham jir mi' kam. Pui' ji buusan na pim cham tu'r ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, ba'm aa' na pim siamrix bhai' xi chu jimdat na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora' na pim ba' jimia' jix dhaam. Cha'pim pui' ja'k jup tu jimda' nam jax tu jim gu ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios. Xi ñakoo'nda' pim sia ku pim tɨi pui'p jix chu duñiik.

Jix bhai' pim xi chu jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios mi' ja bui gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Na ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na ja aagi'ñdha' gu Dios bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat, ba machia' am na pimɨt aapi'm sɨlhkam tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨk guch Xoi'kam, nam gu' xi jam nɨi'ñdha' na pɨx jix bhai' jam tɨɨdai jam aichdha' na pai'p tu'ii'. Ba' dai nam ba gɇ'kamtuda' gu Dios, sia kum gu' xib ka xi jam bhaamki'ñ nam jam nɨi'ñ na pim maakam pɨx tu jim na jax cham ja ko'raar.

Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp jiñ jaaduñ na pim tu' ka'm xi ja nɨidhat gu gɇ'gɇrkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, pui' na jax gux io'm gɇ'kam Rooma kam. Pu'ñi ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu' gu Dios na pim tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu gɇ'gɇrkam.

Sia gui' pim tu' ka'm ja nɨidhat nat jix kakai' kɨ'n mu ja'p ja darai jam bui na gɇ'gɇr jir kikcham na ba' bhaankamu'n ja sɨlhka'nda' gu ja'tkam, gio nam ja tulhiiñchu'nda' gu jɨ'k nam buam pɨx tu buada' na jax cham jir am. Dai ba' gui' nam tu' ka'm tɨ nɨidhat jix bhai' tu jimda'x kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam ja bia'ka' am.

Na gu' guch Gɨ'kora' pui' ja'k jix aa' na pim tu' ka'm tɨ nɨidhat jix bhai' xi chu jimda' na jax ja'k jir am, nam ba' cham tu' bhaan jax jam a'gada' gui' nam cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ. ¿Jax jam gi bia' nam ba ji chɨ'ya' jam bɨɨbhi' dhɨr no' pim gu'x bhai' xi chu jim?

Ku pim ji gu' cham pɨk moo ja'p xi' pɨk jup ka xim ua'tulhi'ñdha' ji jiñ jaaduñ na pim pui' jim aagɨt na gammɨjɨ tu jam uañi'ñka' guch Xoi'kam nat ba tu jam namkix bhaan gu kuruus, gu' ja'pji na pim jix bhai' ba tu jimda' ji ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, dai na pim jix bhai'm taatɨt bhaankamu'n ba tu juana' gu Dios.

Soi'm ɨlhdhat japim tu' ka'm xi ñɨidhat gu Dios, sia gux io'm gɇ'kam Rooma kam nañ jax ba jam tɨtda bɨɨpɨ', sia gui' nam jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gam sia gui' nam bar jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham japim jix ja joi'ndat ja palhbuidhat kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha'.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim nai' ja'p jir tujuandam, jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim tu' ka'm xi ja nɨidhat gui' na pim ja bui tu juan. Mi' pim pui' xi dhuñiidhat jax ña jam tɨɨdaidha', sia ku cham pɨk jir kɨɨ' maa'nkam gu jaroi' na pim buiñor tu juanda' no' cham jir jix bhai'kam. Cham tu' na gu' moo dai no'r jix bhai'kam na pim ba'x bhai' tu juañxi'ñdha', ja'pji sia ji no'r jax chu'm.

Cham jax bua sia kum jam tulhiiñchu'n, na gu'r joidham aach jich bui nach ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no'm pu'ñich chulhiiñchu'n ja'p pɨx sia kuch cham tu' jax bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam, dai nach jix bhai'ch chaatɨt mui' xix biiñak ka' pɨx buiñor gu Dios. Gui' dɨɨlh jich guguuxi'ñdha' na ba' cham pɨk moo jax xi chu tatda' ka', na gu'ch a'm tɨ nɨidhat jup tui'ka', gio na gu'x mat ka' nam ja'p pɨx jich chulhiiñchu'nda'.

Gu' ji no' chich gu' dɨɨlh tu' jax dhuu nar jix buam jum duukam, ¿jax jach dhuix bhai'ch chaatɨt tu nakoo'nda' no' mɨt pu'ñi bach chulhiiñchuda, no' chich gu' dɨɨlh cham am ji buak ja bui? Pui' pɨx chu'm jich a'm bam aa'nda' gu', nach gu' bach ua'tulhdha'. Gu' ji no'ch gu' tɨi moo cham tu' jax bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam, no' mɨt bhai' jich chulhiiñchuda, dhi' jɨ' ji nax abhaaruix buiñor gu Dios, jix bhai'm taat ka' ɨp no'ch aach cham jax jich aagɨt xi ñakoo' no'm pu'ñi bach chulhiiñchu'n.

Pu'ñi ja'k aa' nach tui'ñgɨda'ñ jaaduñ, mi'ch pui'p xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' nat jax jum duu guch Xoi'kam jano' nat jum tulhii jich a'mkam, nat gu' xich joi'ndak ba tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara'. Dai ba' nach pu'ñi mi' pɨx pui'p ji bhɨɨya' nat jax tu jii gui',
nat cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhdhak, ni nat cham pai' dhuuk iatda' tu a'gak, sɨlhkam tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam.

Jaiñ na gu' jano' na mɨt mi ja'p daasak giilhim tɨtdaimɨk na jax aa', gam nam giilhim ai'chuxdhimɨk, cham pai' jax kai'ch, ni kut iam mu dɨr bha ja'k giilhim bhai'p ja tɨɨ'n na jax aa', mi' pɨx ji na pu tu'ii'. Gio na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' ji chulhiiñchuda, na mɨt bhai' ji gɨbiimɨ, cham pai' jax xim bua na gɨt xim palhbuidha', ni ku pai' xim o'to'n, daipu' na soi' xim ɨlhii'ñ buiñor gu Dios bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam na pai'p tu'ii', na jaroi'x bhai'x maat no' kuiñcha bia' ka' ba' cham.

Guch Xoi'kam dho ba' tɨ bhɨɨk bɨɨx guch ua'tulhdhara' jano' na mɨt pai' dhuuk pu'ñi xi chulhiiñchudaimɨk gu ja'tkam ba sissapa kuruus ta'm, nach sap ba' mi' dhɨr cham tu' ka u'ua'tulhdhix ka', nat gu' bɨɨx bhammɨ ja'k ji bii tukgaran guch Xoi'kam guch ua'tulhdhara'. Xib ba' dai nach pɨx bhaan ji baapmigia' nach mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' nach tui'ñgɨda'. Guch Xoi'kam pui' kai'ñkam pɨx jum tulhii jia jich a'mkam nach ba' aach ba duduadhia' nach jix kako'k kat kɨ'n guch ua'tulhdhara', na ba' mi' dhɨr jich a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha'.

Nach gu' aach ja'pni pɨx tu't na jax gu kakaasnir no' cham jaroi' jai'ch na ja bipia'da', nam gammɨjɨ pɨx cha'tak jiimda', jai' ja'p ja'k gio jai' ja'p ja'k. Gu' matgɨm xib bax maat ich ji na jaroi'r jix kɨɨ' bipia'dam, guch Xoi'kam dho nach jaroi' buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat bax biiñak. Gui' ji na ba'ch a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jich nuukdaim nach ba' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', nach gu' cham tu' mai' ka suulhgix.

Gio aapi'm u'uub jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim tɨ bɨpna', jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim siamri tu' ka'm xi ja nɨidhat gu jam bɨpna' na pim maap tu oi'dha', na ba' gu' no'm jax dhuukat jai' dhɨt cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, saalhiom bhai' ji chɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' am, dai nam xi jam nɨi'ñdha' pɨx no' pim aapi'm joidham jir jix bhabhai'kam ja bui. Cham pɨk jum aa'nda' ba' na pim gammɨjɨ tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios,

daipu' nam xi jam nɨi'ñdha' pɨx na pim aapi'm joidham jix bhai' tu jim na jax ja'k jix abhaaruix, gam no' pim joidham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ. Mi' dhɨr ba' pui' jim aaga' am na bak gu'r joidham ji no'ñ ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

Gio ba' na pim pai' dhuuk jum iamtu'nda', cha'pim pɨk moo ja'p jix a'bhar tɨm tɨtɨi'ñdha' gu jajannulh na jax chu'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, am buixim japim pɨx jix bhai'm buada'. Sia na pim jum gaxbuda', ja'xchudhix kam pɨx, cham tu'x io'm jix bhai', ni ku pim cham pɨk tu baapasda' gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk nar jix uam totbikdam.

Gu' ja'pji gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan ji na bɨɨpɨ'm aa' na pim jix bhai'm duuka'. Ja'p ji buusnia' na pim gammɨjɨx a'bhar tɨm tɨ'ii'ñka' gux dha'ram namkɨm na pu cham jax jum bua, na pim gu' gammɨjɨ soi' pɨx jum ɨlhdhat mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'. Ba' mi' dhɨr dai na jam a'm ba tajaañixchu'nda' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na jam guguuxi'ñdha' na pim ba' gammɨjɨ cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka'. Dhi' jɨ' ji nax io'm jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.

Gui' nam bɨjɨk ya' oipimɨk gu u'uub nam pu'ñi buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat guch Gɨ'kora', pu'ñi ja'k tu jimdat am ji nañ jax ba jam tɨtda, nam gu'x io'm mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Cham pai' tu'x io'm jix bhai'm duuka' am, am buixim pɨx, gio nam joidham tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu ja bɨpna', cham tu' nam pu tu duñiidha' nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha'.

Pui' na jax gui' na Saara tɨɨgich, jaiñ na joidham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu bɨnga'n Abraam nam maap tu oi'ñka', gɇ'kam tugi'ñ xi iimɨt, na gu' gampai' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' buiñor, cham pai' tu' na dɨɨlh gɇ'kam jum taat ka'. Aapi'm ba' pu'ñi ɨp u'uub jiñ jaaduñ, tu' ka'm japim xi ja nɨidhat jix bhai' xi chu jimda' ja bui gu jam bɨpna'. Mi' pim pui' xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' nat jax chu jii bɨjɨk gu Saara na ba' ja'p ji buusnia' na pim jir maamra'n, na pim gu' pui' ja'k jup xi chu jimda' nat jax tu jii. Ba' no' pim pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu' nañ jax jam tɨtda, cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jix chotdon ka' pim ja bui gu jam bɨpna', na pim gu' tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha'. ¿Tu'm gi bhaan bhaaku' jam bui?

Gu' ba' aapi'm na pim jir chichio'ñ, jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim siamrix bhai'p xi ja tɨtdat gui' nam jir u'uub nam jir jam bɨpna'. Cha'pim ja bhaamki'ñdha', xi ja palhbuidhat japim tu' nam jax buada' mi ja'p. Na gu' gu ubii cham tu' ja'xbui' pui'x oo' na jax gui' nar chio'ñ, pui' ku ba'm aa' na pim jix ja joi'ndat ja palhbui'ñdha' na ba' gu' pui'x bhai' tu tatda' ka'. Gio na gu' gu Dios ja'xbui' pui'p jix ja joi'gɨ'n gui' nam jir u'uub na jax aapi'm, pui'p ja baidhika' gatuuk jix dhaam ja'k nat pai' jam iimchuda aapi'm na jam aichdha', nam gu' pui'p ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Na ba' no' pim pu'ñix bhai' kai'chɨt maa'n ñi'ook jup duuk na pim jir jum bɨpnagɨm, jam kɇɇkɇ' gu Dios tu' na pim mui' ba taanda' soi'm ɨlhdhat.

Ba' bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jam guguuxi'ñ iñ na pim joidham jix bhai' kai'chɨt tu oi'ñka'. Joidham japim maa'n ñi'ook xip duukat bɨɨx dhɨt xim ja joi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, panaas ku pim moo jir maa'n na pim jax pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, cham tu' jai' maakam. Gam na pim joidham jir jix bhabhai'kam ka' ja bui gu jai', gio na pim gampai' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha'.

Tu uañi'ñka' pim gu jaroi' no't tu' jax ma jam duiñ, cham tu' na pim ya' dɨr mu ja'k pui'p dooda'. Sia no't jaroi' giilhim jam tɨɨ'n na jax cham jir am, tu uañi'ñka' pim sia, cham tu' na pim moo pui' giilhim mui'p tɨɨda' ya' dɨr mu ja'k na jax cham jir am. Xi chu daañxi'ñdha' pim pɨx buiñor gu Dios nax bhai' tu jimda' sia ku buam pɨx jam bua, na ba' jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' ɨp aapi'm gu Dios, na pim gu'r jix bhabhai'kam ka'.

Pui' na jax bam kai'ch mi' pai' u'uan ta'm na tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nap jum kai'ch: Gu jaroi' no'x aa' na gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' gio na joidham jix bhai' ba tu tatda' ka', jum aa' nax bhai' ba tu ñiokda' na jax jir am, cham tu' na giilhim pɨx kai'chdha' na jax cham pui' tum ñiok, gio na cham tu' iatda' ka tu a'gada', ja'pji sɨlhkam na tu a'gada' na jax jir pui'.

Gio ba' na cham tu' bɨɨx aixim jix buam ka tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gu' ja'pji dai ji na pɨx bhaan ji bamgidha' nax bhai'm duukam bap tu buada' na jax jix aa', na ba' pu'ñi duuji gammɨjɨ cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt jix jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', gammɨjɨ na pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu'nda', cham tu' pai' pɨx.

Na gu' gu jaroi' no' moo pu'ñi tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' xi jim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', gɇ'kam kɨ'n bhaan tɨ nɨidhidhat ba nuukdaidha' na ba' cham tu' duñia', gio na maa'n jimdam kaaya' na pai' dhuuk soi'm ɨlhdhat mu taanda' gu tu', makia' ɨp. No' gu' pu cham mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa', no' gu' dai na buam pɨx tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, pu cham tu' dho bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha', dai na ba bi'chulhi'ñka' na tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk.

Ba' aapi'm cham pu chu't jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios. ¿Jaroo gi jax jup jam dooda' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n no' pim aapi'm tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' xi bhɨichu' na jax jix abhaaruix? Na gu' jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' guch Gɨ'kora'.

Piam no' mɨt gu' moo sia bhai' ji jam tulhiiñchuda gu ja'tkam sia ku pim jix bhai' tu jim na jax jir am, jix bhai' pim pɨx jum taat ka'. Cha'pim jax jum aa'nda', ni ku pim cham pai' totdon ka' siam jax ba xi jam doodak nam xi jam bhaamkidhat.

Mui' pim pɨx xix biiñak ka' soi'm ɨlhdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, tu' ka'm japim xi nɨidhat, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam gam na jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim. Gu' ba' no' jax dhuukat jaroi' maadɨt bhai' ba jam tɨkka' na pim jax kai'ñkam ba' pui' tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam maakam ba tu jim, na tu' ba' mim nɨnɨi'ñ nañ pui' ja'k tu jimda', aapi'm sɨlhkam xi ja aagi'ñdha' cham jax ji chɨ'ji na jax kai'ñkam. Xi ja aagi'ñdha' pim na pim jix jimiik jix dhaam ja'k nat pai' jam iimchuda guch Xoi'kam na jam aichdha', pui' ku pim ba' tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa'.

Ku gu'x bhai' pɨx ji na pim xi ja aagi'ñdha' soi'm ɨlhdhat gio tu' ka'm ja nɨidhat, cham tu' na pim gɇ'gɇrkam jim taatɨt, ni ku pim jix bhaakut. Pu ka gɨt nam gu'x xi'ɨ'ra' gui' nam xi jam bhaamkidhat bɨɨx aixim jam ai'chuxi'ñ, nam xi jam nɨi'ñdha' na pim aapi'm joidham jir jix bhabhai'kam gio na pim tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix bhai' tu jim na pim jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

Ba' cha'pim jax jum aa'nda'ñ jaaduñ sia ku mɨt gu' moo bhai'p ji jam tulhiiñchuda sia ku pim cham tu' jax bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam, no' moo pui' ja'k jup jix aa'nda' gɨt gu Dios na pim jum tulhiiña'. Jix bhai' pim pɨx jum taat ka' buiñor. Ba' no' pimɨt gu' dɨɨlh cham am bua mi' pai', pui' dho pɨx chu'm jam a'm ba jimmɨda' nam jam tulhiiñchuda'.

Gu' matgɨm cham jax bua ji siam jam tulhiiñchu'n no' pim gu' tɨi cham tu' jax bua. Pui' kam dho no'ch ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jaiñ sia dɨɨlh guch Xoi'kam pu'ñi pɨk jum tulhii jano' nat pai' dhuuk tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' pu daipu' maa'nnim pɨx, na ba' mi' dhɨr pu gammɨjɨ ba tuch uañdhix ka'. Gui' tɨi cham tu' pai'x buam tomaatɨt dho, ni nax ua'tulhdhix kat, cham tu' kuiñcha bia'kat nam pui' dooda' gɨt. Gu' ja'pji na gu' aachi' nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix, nat xich joi'ndat ba' pui'm duu jich a'mkam, na sap ba' mi' dhɨr bax bhaai'n ka' nach bhammɨ aaya'x dhaam na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios. Ba' sia ku mɨt tɨi mua, gu ii'mdaga'n gu' pui' ji na jax ba dua,

mummu ja'k pu oirɨ gu ii'mdaga'n na jɨ'x ka muukix gu tukga'n nam pai' kuupich jum tulhiiñ gu ja i'ii'mda' gu ja'tkam nam ba ko'iix. Mu ja'p xi chu ja a'gidhimɨk gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.

Jir di' pɨx am gu ja i'ii'mda' gui' na mɨt jano' cham jɨ'xkat tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor gu Dios na tɨi pup tu ja a'gidhimɨk gu Noee jano' nap duñiidha' gu gɇ' kanuub. Tɨi pup xi ja nɨɨraimɨk ɨp gu Dios nam gɨt soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' na jax jix aa' ampɨk na tɨɨmo' gu Noee nap duñiim gu gɇ' kanuub, na ba' bax bhaai'n ka' nam bhaan jum o'ñcho' gɨt na pai' dhuuk jix io'm duudui bhai' ji chɨsdia' gu suudai'. Gu' ji na gu' cham, tu' pɨx ɨlh jamɨt. Xijum baik jamɨt ba' pɨx bha tɨɨtɨs bhaan gui' gu kanuub nat pai' dhuuk bhai' ji chɨs gu suudai' na mɨt jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gu jai' pu bɨɨx koi mɨt.

Ba' gu xib nach ya' dɨr mui' xich ga'nga, ja'p ji buus nat jum bakua gu Noee gui' gu suudai' kɨ'n nat tɨs jano', na gu' soi'm ɨlhii'ñ buiñor gu Dios, pui' kut ba' cham muu bhai'muk. Aach ba' pu'ñip ba ji bubua xib, nach gu' cham tu' mai' ka suulhgix, na chich gu'ch bopkonak suudai' kɨ'n pui' ba tɨɨ'n guch Xoi'kam nach gammɨjɨ ba kaichgɨda'. Nañ jiñ bakuana' suudai' kɨ'n, cham tu'r pui' na jax nañ batbia' no'ñ bax ikoora', gu' ja'pji na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' ji nañ mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k soi' bañ ɨlhii'ñdha' buiñor gu Dios, gam nañ mi' pui' ba jimda' na jax ja'k jix aa' nañ tui'ñgɨda', gio ba' nañ pui' xi chɨɨda' guch Xoi'kam na gammɨjɨ ba tuñ uañi'ñka' guñ ua'tulhdhara', nat gu' xiñ joi'ndak jix bhai' ba duu nat jiñ a'mkam muukɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr,

gui' na jaroi' ya' xi oilhimɨk giop tɨs bhɨjɨmmɨni ja'k jix dhaam, na xib bhammɨ sonpan ba daa gu Dios kɨɨ'n dɨr ja'k. Ba' bɨɨx pɨx tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ am gui' nam bhammɨr noonbi'ñ gu Dios, sia gui' nam bhammɨ gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n dalhxix.

Ba pui' na pim jax bax maat jiñ jaaduñ, nat guch Xoi'kam jix io'm jum tulhii bo jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk tuuku' bhaan, jaiñ na cham pai' jax jum aa'. Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' sia pimɨt bhai' jim tulhii tu' na pɨx bhaan, jix bhai' pim pɨx jum taat ka'. Na gu' no' pim pu'ñim tulhiiñ, gammɨjɨ soi' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' pim, cham pai' tu' bhaan ka xim ua'tulhdha'ka' pim,

dai ji na pim gammɨjɨ pɨx bhaan ji baapmigidha' na pim mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' na jax pɨx ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na pim tui'ñgɨda'. Cham tu'x buam jum duukam kap jix chu duñiik ka' pim nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, ni na pim dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha', na pim gu' kai'ñkam soi' pɨx bam ɨlhii'ñdha' buiñor no' pim xim tulhiiñ.

Sia ku pimɨt gu' gɇ'm ua'tulhdhak buiñor gu Dios na pim chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim bɨɨx aixim tu bua't na pim dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' nar ya' kam pɨx dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, pui' na jax na pim jix maik ka' gɇ'gɇr xi chu kua'dat mi ja'p pai' maap jim jumpadat, gam na pim bɨxchu' bhaan jum tutkagi'ñka' na pim jup tu duñia' nar jix buam jum duukam, gio na pim tu daanda' ja bui gu didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam nam jir jup duñiixim pɨx, na tu' ni jɨ'x ku cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu Dios gui' nax dhaam jup tu'ii'.

Ba' gu xib na pim cham pui' ja'k ka tu jim na pim jax tu jimdat, xi jam bhaamkidhat bɨɨx aixim jam ai'chuxi'ñ am gui' nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim cham ka ja bɨpnat nam jix buam tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, na pim gu' aapi'm maakam ba tu jim.

Ku ba' gu' aapi'm cham jax jum aa'nda' ji jiñ jaaduñ siam xi jam bhaamki'ñ na pim cham ka ja bɨpnat, na gu' dhi' kam aajim na pai' dhuuk ja aagi'ñdha' gu Dios na mɨt cham tu' bhai' tu jii gu pui' nam jax ja'k tu jim xib, jano' nam pai' dhuuk bɨɨx maap jum jumpada' gu ja'tkam, sia gui' nam ba ko'iix gio gui' nam ka duduaka', na ja aagi'ñdha' gu Dios na mɨt jax tu jii bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, no' mɨt tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨk piam ku gu' cham.

Na gu' gu ja i'ii'mda' gu ja'tkam gui' nam pu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ba ko'iix nat chakui muukɨk guch Xoi'kam, mu jimɨɨk bɨɨx pui' ba tu ja a'gi dɨɨlh nat jax kai'ñkam jum tulhii ja a'mkam, na sap ba' jɨ'k nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai soi'm ɨlhdha' buiñor dai jano', jimia' am jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm ba'p tui'ka', sia ku mɨt gu' cham tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨk gu Dios nam ka duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan.
Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gammɨjɨ pim soi'm ɨlhdhat tu daanda' buiñor, na gu' dhi' ya' bar mia'n na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha'.

Gampai' pim pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, joidham japim xim jajoi'gɨ'ndat bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jix bhai' kai'chɨt. Xi chum uañdhat japim no' pimɨt tu' bhaan mam ua'tulh dai aapi'm jam bui, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jum bua no'ñ tu' sɨlhkam jix chu joi'gɨ'n, nañ tu uañi'ñka' gu jaroi' siat jax jiñ dhooda.

Gio na pim joidham pɨx jix bhai' tɨɨdai aichdha' gu jaroi' cham jax ji chɨ'ji no' jam paxiaraim mu ja'p na pim jax oi'dha'. Xi ja tɨbiaptudidhat japim jix ja joi'ndat, gio na pim xi chu ja onbai'ñdhat no' pim pup bia' gu koi'.

Na gu' aapi'm xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios, pui' ku pim ba' aapi'm pui'p jix ja joi'ndat xi chu ja maakidhat gu jai' gu tu' na jam maakidha' xi jam joi'ndat guch Gɨ'kora'. Pui' pim xi chu duñiidha' jax ña pim ja'k jix joojoi'ñdha' na pim bhaankamu'n tu juana' gu Dios, nat gu' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ba jam maa na pim jax tu duñia' bhaankamu'n.

Pui' na jax no' gu jaroi' maadɨt jix joojoi'ñ na bhaankamu'n tu a'ga' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, dho dhi'r di' ka', dai ji na ba oidhidha' na ba tu a'gichgɨda'. Na gu' gu Dios dɨɨlh aa'ñdhidha' na jax ja'k tɨ'iidha', na gu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha'. Piam ku gu' jaroi' maadɨt jix joojoi'ñ pɨx na bhaankamu'n ja palhbui'ñdha' gu ja'tkam gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha', pui'p jir am dho, na gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios guguuxdhatgɨda' na ba' cham oodat pɨx bhaan ji bamgidha' nax bhai' ja buada'. Dhi' pim ba' pu'ñi ja'k tu bua't bhaan gɇ'kamtu'nda' gu Dios na pim jix bhai'm taat ka' nat jix bhai' duu guch Xoi'kam nat tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara'. Gammɨjɨ pim ba' moo tu daañchu'nda' buiñor, na gu' gui' gammɨjɨr gɇ'kam. Ja'pni ba' pɨx tui'ka'.

Gio ba' pui' nañ jax ba jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, na pim alh moo xi chu nakoo'nda' sia ku pimɨt jax jix io'm bhai' jim tulhii na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Cha'pim jix buam ɨlhii'ñdha',

nat gu' dɨɨlh guch Xoi'kam pu'ñi pɨk jup jum tulhiiñak. Pui' ku pim ba' aapi'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' na pim pui'p jum tulhiiñ nat jax jum tulhii gui' jich a'mkam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk gu tuuku' bhaan, na ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda' jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlhdha' pim buiñor, na gu' pɨx jix bhai' jam tɨɨda' na pimɨt pui'p tu jii na jax gui'.

Sia no' jaroi' giilhim jam ai'chuxi'ñ piam ku giilhim jam tɨtda na jax aa' na pim maakam ba tu jim na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gɇ'kam kɨ'n japim jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' sia, na gu' aapi'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios pui' ji chu't, na gu' jam a'm ba tajaañix gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n.

Cham tu'r jix xi'ɨraam jia no'm jam tulhiiñchu'n na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ pɨx buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jɨɨ' ji no' pimɨt tu' jax dhuu nar jix buam jum duukam, pui' na jax no' pimɨt maa'n mua gu maa'nkam, piam ku pimɨt tu' tɨ ɨɨx, piam ku pimɨt tu' jax ja duiñ gu jai'. Dhi' ji na ba'r jix xi'ɨraam no'm pu'ñi chu'm kɨ'n mu pai' bañ chulhiiñchu'n.
Gu' cham ji no' gu' na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ pɨx buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam ba jam tulhiiñchu'n, cham dho jax bua. Xi gɇ'kamtu'nda' pim pɨx gu Dios jix bhai'm taatɨt nam pui' jam bua, cha'pim xi'ɨrda'.

Na gu' xib ya' aach jich bui nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, bar bhaan na pai' dhuuk matgilhia' nach jɨ'k moo jimia' jix dhaam ja'k buiñor gu Dios. Pui' ku ba'm aa' nach jich chulhiiña' xib nach ya' ka dudua dhi tutku' bhaan, na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' no'ch sɨlhkam buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, piam kuch gu' pɨx jap kai'ch. Dho jaiñ nach gu' aach pui'p xich chulhiiña' palhɨɨp sia kuch ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nach ba' pɨk ba jimia' nach pai' ja'k cham kach chulhiiña'. ¿Gui' gi ba' nam pu cham kɨɨgalhdhat pu cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor sia kum tɨi tu ja a'gi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ, jax japim ɨlhii'ñ na ji chu buusnia' ja bui? Dho dai na xi ja aagi'ñdha' dho na mɨt pu cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', mi' dhɨr dai na ba ja tulhiiñchuda'.

Jaiñ no' gu' aach nach tɨi tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, jich chulhiiñaimɨk ich na chich ba' pɨk ba jiix dhaam na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios. ¿Gui' gi ba' nam pu ni jɨ'x kum Dios tɨ'ñchokat bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, nam gammɨjɨ pɨx jum ua'tulhi'ñ, jax japim ɨlhii'ñ na ja dooda' gu Dios jano' na pai' dhuuk ba tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n? Dho dai dho na ba ja tulhiiñchuda' pɨx, cham tu' na pui' pɨx ja nɨi'ñdha'.

Pui' kuñ ba'p jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ na pim aapi'm cham tu' jax jum aa'nda' sia ku pimɨt bhai' jim tulhii bɨɨx aixim bhaan, no' gu' moo pui' ja'k jup jix aa'nda' gɨt dho ji gu Dios, na gu' alhio pɨx na pim jum tulhiiña'. Aapi'm gu' mi' pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' jix bhai'm duukam xip tu buada' ji jiñ jaaduñ, Dios japim pɨx tɨ'ñchoka' gammɨjɨ nat jaroi'p jam duu bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Gui' dɨɨlh jam palhbui'ñchu'nda', na gu' gammɨjɨ jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha', cham jɨ'xdha' pai' dɨɨlh jam iabu'.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim jix io'm bɨjɨk dɨr ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na pim bax maat gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, palhɨɨp jañ jup xi chu jam a'gidham na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda' nañ kapbhai' bax maat pa' na jax ja'k jix bhai'. Nañ gu' aañ pui' pɨx am jup bax maat gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na jax aapi'm, nañ gu' pui' bɨjɨk dɨr jup ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, gio na ñich gu'x bhai' tɨɨgɨk jiñ buupui kɨ'n guch Xoi'kam nat jax jum duu jano' nat jum tulhiiñak jich a'mkam bhaan gu kuruus. Ba' pui'x bhai'p jiñ ɨlhdha' iñ jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda'x io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n na pim jax jix bhai'm ɨlhdha' aapi'm, na gu' maap bach baidhika'.

Ja'p jañ ba'p xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ na pim bhaan bax kaapak gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, na pim joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt mui' xim guguuxdhatgɨda' na pim ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Ja'p ji buusnia' na pim ja bipia'da', nam gu' ja'p ji buan nam jir jam kakaasnira'. Ku gu' cham tu' ji na pim bhaan pɨx jix mai'chik ka' gu tuumiñ ku pim ba'm dakoo'ñdhatgɨda' na pim ja aagi'ñdha', sia ku pim jix oo'n no' pim gu' cham joojoi'ñ gu pui' ja'k. Gu' ja'pji na pim joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt ji, dɨɨlh pɨx na pim joidham jix aa'nda' na pim pu'ñi ja'k bhaankamu'n tu juanda' guch Gɨ'kora'.

Ni na pim gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt jix bhaakut mu ja chianda' nam mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa' gu Dios na pim pui' jim aagɨt na pim jix io'm bax maat gu ñio'ki'ñ. Ja'pjix bhai' pɨx ji na pim ja aa'ñdhat xi ja guguuxi'ñdha', gio aapi'm dɨɨlh na pim jix bhai' mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios nam ba' jam nɨidhat mi' pui'p bhɨichgɨda'.

Na ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk jich baidhika' guch Xoi'kam gui' na jaroi'r jam gɇ'kam tuk na pim tu bipi'ñxi'ñ gu kakaasnir ga'n, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlhdha' pim buiñor, na gu' pɨx jix bhai' jam tɨɨdai ba jam tuttuidha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gu kuruun nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, na pu cham jax jum bua, dhi' ba' kɨ'n jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' bam ɨlhdha' pim.

Gu' ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim kar biipibop, jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim siamri tu' ka'm xi ja nɨidhat gui' nam jam aagi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, nam gu' gui'x io'm bax maat, nam gu' bɨjɨk dɨr ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim jix bhai' xi kai'chɨt bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, cha'pim jai' dhɨt gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' gu jai'. Ja'pji gampai' pɨx na pim jum ɨlhii'ñdha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, na gu' ja'pnim kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios mi' na pai' tu ua'ñix: Cham tu' ja kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu Dios gui' nam gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt giilhim xim ɨlhii'ñdha', ni ku ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñdha', dai gui' nam jɨ'k gampai' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' na ba' joidham jix ja joi'ndat ja a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat ja palhbui'ñchu'nda' tu' na pɨx bhaan.

Ba' aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, cha'pim gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka', soi' pim pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' na ba' jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' tu' na pɨx bhaan, na ba' cham xi' gampai' xi chu tatda' ka'.

Sia xib no' pim tu' bhaan jix buam jum aa' na cham bhai' ji buusnim, soi'm ɨlhdhai pim pui' xi chɨɨda' gu Dios na jam palhbuidha'. Na gu' gui' joidham xi jam joi'gɨ'n bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, pu moo jano' jam palhbuidha' no' tu' ba jam duiñchu', dai ji na pim mui' xix biiñak ka' pɨx buiñor.

Moo pim alh jix bhai'ñ jaaduñ, cha'pim am ɨrdat darka'. Tu daanda' pim buiñor gu Dios, cha'pim kooksɨt darka', na ba' cham jax jam dooda' gu ja'ook. Na gu' giilhim xi jam bhaamki'ñ na pim ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam, giilhim nai' mɨmra na tu ga'nga no' jaroi' pai' am ɨrdat daa, na ba' mi' pu xi mai'chɨi maakam ja'k bhɨichdha' na pai' ja'k mai'x chɨ gɨɨxi'. Na gu' gui' ja'p ji buusan na jax gu mabii'ñ no' giilhim bax bhio' na gɇ' kɨ'n jɨɨrkɨt nai' tɨ nɨi'ñdha'.

Aapi'm xi ñakgat maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' no't tɨi bhai' ji jam tulhiiñchuda gu ja'ook tu' na pɨx bhaan. Mui' pim pɨx xix biiñak ka' buiñor gu Dios, nam gu' sia pu'ñim tulhiiñ guch jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam nai' ja'p oi'dha' na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na bɨxchu' bhaan ja tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'ook.

Ku ba' gu' aapi'm cham jax jum aa'nda' ji jiñ jaaduñ, na gu' nañ jax ba jam tɨtda na sia ku pim palhɨɨp jum tulhiiñ ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, gatuuk joidham jix bhai' tu jam jimia'. Na gu' gu Dios gui' na joidham jir jix bhai'kam jam baidhika' jix dhaam ja'k na pim pai' gammɨjɨ joidham jix jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Gio na gu' no' pim moo mui' xix biiñak pɨx buiñor gu Dios, gammɨjɨ jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam palhbui'ñchu'nda', gam na jam guguuxi'ñdha' na pim jɨ'x ya' kapup oipo na ba' cham pɨk moo xi'x buam xi chu tatda' ka' no' pim jum tulhiiñ, na pim gu' aapi'm ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
Dai gui'ch ba' pɨx moo gɇ'kamtu'nda' gammɨjɨ sia nar pai' dhuuk, na gu'r gɇ'kam. Ja'pni ba' pɨx tui'ka'.

Mɨjɨ ñich ba' xi joot guñ jaduuñ Silbaano nañ jaroi'x maat na joidham bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', na mu jam do'ñchi'ñmɨra' dhi u'uan na ñich bhaan mi' tu dai na pim jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gio nañ bhaan jam guguuxi'ñ na pim jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka', gam na pim ba' bhaan jix mat ka' na gu Dios joidham xi jam joi'gɨ'n bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Bɨɨx jañich mi'p xi chu dai na pim jax ja'k gammɨjɨx bhai' kai'chɨt tu oi'ñka', gio na pim xim ja joi'gɨ'nda'.

Ba' guñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam ya' oi'dha' Babiloonia, nat pui'x ja joi'ndak ja a'm jup tɨ tɨɨ gu Dios na jax aapi'm, mu jam ñio'ki'ñ am no' pim jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ. Bɨɨx gu Maarkos mui'p xi jam ñio'ki'ñ na pim jax jum ɨlhii'ñ, dhi' nañ jaroi'ñ mar ɨlhii'ñ guch Xoi'kam bhaan.

Ja'pniñ ba' pɨx jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ. Moo gɨt ba' gammɨjɨ pɨx jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' pim bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na pim ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam. Xim ñiñio'kdhat japim ba' xim kookmikɨk na pim pai' dhuuk bam tɨtgia', jix bhai' pim jum taatɨt na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

Aañ Simoon Peegro nañ jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam, mu jam ñio'ki'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ bhaan dhi'ñi u'uan no' pim mɨjɨ ja'p pai'x bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ, nañ gu'x bhai'ñ chaat na pim aapi'm pui'p tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak buiñor gu Dios jich Xoi'kam na jax aach, gui' nat jaroi' joidham xich joi'ndak tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara' nach ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k cham mai' ka suulhgix ka'.

Moo gɨt ba' gammɨjɨ jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda' tu' na pɨx bhaan, gio na pim ba' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' cham tu' bhaan ji chotdonɨt, na pim gu'x maatɨt mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' gio gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam na pim jaroi' buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.

Na gu' gu Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam xich joi'ndak tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara' nach ba' mi' dhɨr jix bhai'ch chaatɨt ba tu daanda' buiñor cham tu' bhaan jax jich aagɨt, gio ba' nach joidham jix bhai' ba tu jimda' na jax jix aa', nach gu' bax maat nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'm duukam jup tu duu aach jich bui nach ba' cham mai' ka suulhgia'.

Mi' dhɨr ba' xich aagi'ñ ɨp na jax ja'k jich palhbui'ñchu'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n nach jɨ'k tu' ka'm ba nɨi'ñ, nach ba' mi' dhɨr pu'ñi duuji pui' ja'k jup xi chu jimda' na jax gu Dios, ba' cham tu' bhaan kach chutkagi'ñka' ich gu tu' nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, ni nach jix buam kax chu duñiik ka' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.

Ba' gu xib kapbhai' nat xi jam joi'ndak ba jam palhbui gu Dios, jam a'm jum aa' na pim tu' ka'm nɨidhat gammɨjɨ tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak ka' buiñor gui', jix bhai' na pim xi chu jimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨgalhi'ñ na pim ba' mi' dhɨr bhai'x maatɨt ji kaaya' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.

Mi' dhɨr ba' no' pimɨt jix maatɨt ba kai gu ñio'ki'ñ, bhai'p ji machia' pim na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' na pim tui'ñgɨda', ba' dai na pim jix maatɨt mi' pui' ba jiimda' dɨɨlh jam jujur kɨ'n, cham kam aa'nda' na jaroi' jam aagi'ñdha'. Gu' ba' no' pim pu'ñi ja'k ba duiñchu', cham pɨk jax kam aa'nda' pim sia cham ob pui' ji chu buusnim jax ña pim ɨlhii'ñdha', gio na pim bax ñakoo'nda' no't tu' ba ji jam duu, dai na pim jix bhai'm taatɨt xi gɇ'kamtu'nda' pɨx gu Dios.

Mi' dhɨr ba' bhai' ji machia' pim ɨp na pim jax ja'k tu' ka'm ja nɨidhat jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, nat gu' jam a'm bam tajaa gux chu joi'gɨ'n na pim ba' kɨ'n gammɨjɨ bax chu joi'gɨ'nda'.

Dhi' jɨ' bɨɨx no' pim pu'ñi ja'k ba duiñchu' nañ jax tu jam a'gi'ñ, dho gi ba' gu'x bhai' ba machia' pim ji na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨt mi' pui' jiimda' na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, cham tu' na pim ja'p xi dhuukat am ɨrdat darka' sia ku pim tɨix maat.

Na gu' gu jaroi' no' cham pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu' nañ jax jam tɨtda, dhi' ja'p pɨx ba ji buusnia' na jax gu jaroi' no' cham ñia, piam no' cham mɨk ñia. Ba' dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na ja'p xi dhuukat sia ku tɨix maat nat jix bhai' duu gu Dios nat tu uañ gu ua'tulhdharga'n na gɇ'x ua'tulhdhix kat, gio na cham aa' na tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha'.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, mui' pim xim dɨkoo'ñdhatgɨda' na pim mi' pui' xi jimɨi nañ jɨ'k jax jam tɨtda na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na gɇ'kam kɨ'n xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios. Ba' mi' dhɨr cham tu' ja'k jix xuulhgik kam ɨlhii'ñdha' pim na pim jax tu jimdat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pim chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

Pu'ñi ja'k no' pimɨt duu nañ jax kai'ch, joidham cham tu' bhaan jax ji chɨ'ji jam aichdha' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam bhammɨx dhaam na pai' dhɨr nai'r gɇ'kam, gui' nat jaroi' xich joi'ndak tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara' na ba' mi' dhɨr pu'ñi bax bhaai'n ka' nach baidhika'.

Aañ gammɨjɨ pu'ñi ja'k tu jam a'gi'ñdha'ñ jaaduñ nañ jax ba jam tɨtda na pim ba' bhaan tɨ'ñchoka' na pɨn jax ja'k jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', sia ku pim gu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor bax biiñak, gam na pim jix maatɨt mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na mɨt ba tu jam a'gi.
Nañ jɨ'x ya' kapup duañ jaaduñ, pu'ñi ja'k jañ tu jam a'gi'ñdha' gammɨjɨ na pim ba' tɨ'ñchokat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, sia kuñ gu' alhio pɨx ya' bap tu'ii' dhi oi'ñga'n.
Na gu' pui' kam tu tatda' nañ jootom ba mukia' panaas, dɨɨlh gu gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam pui' ja'k jiñ jurtu'n na jootom bañ baidhika'.

Pui' kuñ ba' tɨiñ dhɨkoo'ñdhatu' nañ tu jam a'gi'ñ dhi' pui' nañ jax ba jam tɨtda na pim ba'x bhai' machia', na ba' sia ku ñich aañ am xi muu, aapi'm tɨ'ñchokat pui' na pim jax mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'.

Na gu' dhi' na chich jɨ'k jax ba tu jam a'giñ jaaduñ bhaankamu'n gu Dios nach jup kai'ch nar gɇ'kam kat bɨxchu'x aichu'n gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, gam nach jup kai'ch na gio bhai'p jimda' gatuuk, cham tu'r iatda' pɨx dhi', ni ku chich dɨɨlh pui' ja'k xi duuk nai' ja'p pu chu'm ba tu a'gim, ni ku cham tu'r sapooki'ñ. Ja'pjir sɨlhkam ji dhi', maaxik jachich tɨɨch buupui kɨ'n gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam nax bhai'm duukam jup tu buimɨk na ya' xi oilhimɨk kuch ba' pui' ba tu jam a'gi'ñ.

Jix bhai' kai chich ɨp guch Gɨ'kora' maa'nnim nat bhammɨ dɨr ba ñio jix dhaam na gɇ'kamtu'n guch Xoi'kam nach maap jiim, jup kai'ch: “Dhi'r jiñ mar nañ jix io'm jix dha', gɇ'kam kɨ'n jañich bhaan tɨ tɨɨgɨk mu joot. Jix bhai'ñ chaat iñ ɨp ba' buiñor.”

Jix bhai' tɨ'ñcho ich na pu'ñi bha kai'ch guch Gɨ'kora' bhɨjɨmmɨ dɨr jix dhaam jano', nach gu' pu maap jiim gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam bhammɨ maa'n kap oidha' ta'm nat pai' dhuuk bhai' ba tum ñio. Dhi' jɨ' jich ba' bhaan pui' kai'ch nar gɇ'kam ji guch Xoi'kam.

Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim kɇɇkɇt mi' pui' xi jiimda' nach jax tu jam a'gi'ñ dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na cham tu'r ja'p pɨx na mɨt jax tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios nam dhi' pɨx aagɨt jup kai'ch guch Xoi'kam na pu'ñi bha jimda'. Dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook ba' pui' ji buusan na joidham gɇ' tanoor, na tu tonni'ñka' pai' no'x chukgam. Gammɨjɨ ya' pu gɇ' tanoorda' dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nammɨ juugɨt na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam. Jano' guch Xoi'kam ja'p ji buusnia' na jax gu gɇ' chi'ɨɨ' gui' na katukgab bha tɨssa'n na ba' mi' dhɨr dɨɨlh ba jam bɨ'ñxi'ñka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jam jujur am bhaan.

Gio ja'pniñ ba' moop xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ, na pim cham tu' maakam ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios no'm tu jam a'gi'ñ, sia ku cham tu' pui' ja'k kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch. Na gu' no'ch aach dɨɨlh pɨx tɨix maachik nach jir ja'tkam, maakam pɨx ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' ich no'ch gu' cham taan gu Dios nach mattuda'.

Na gu' gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, cham tu' dɨɨlh na mɨt jax ɨlh nam pui' tu a'gimɨk, gu' ja'pji na jax ja'k jix aa' ji gu Dios, na gu' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja a'm tajaañixchu'nda' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n na ja mattudidha' nam jax ja'k tu a'gada' gu ñio'ki'ñ, nam gu' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa'.

Ba' mui' gui' nam tɨip tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam bhai' ji jai'chdhɨlhia' am nam bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji chu jam a'gidha' nam sap pɨk ba' tɨi Dios ñio'ki'ñ xi chu a'gada', gu' ji na gu' maakam pɨx na jax cham jir pui'. Pu chu'm jai'chdhɨlhia' am na mɨt jax chu'm jai'chdhɨrɨk bɨjɨk ya' ja bui gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Bɨɨx aixim jam tu a'gidha' na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, nam jax dhui pɨx bhaan bam tulhiiña' gatuuk. Sia gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam jam bɨɨx aixim jix bhaamut a'gada' nat jaroi' tɨix ja joi'ndak ja palhbuidhak ja boosolh mu dɨr jix chu tukgam kɨr. Ku gu' dhi' dai ji ba' nam pɨx am tɨ'ñchoka' na pu maa'n jimdam ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios mu nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.

Mui' gu ja'tkam joidham ɨlhdha' am nam jax ja'k tu a'gidha' dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, nam gu' pui' tu ja a'gidhidha' na cham tu'r ua'tulhdhara' ka' siam chi bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham jir am. Ba' bhai' ji bhaamkidha' am gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios dhi' na tɨi sɨlhkam tum a'ga, nam gu' maakam ba ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam nai' jiimɨt maakam tu iatgidhidha' pui' xi kai'chɨt nam Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gada'. Ba' gui' nam chakui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, bɨɨx aixim bhai'p ji ai'chuxdha' am gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, iatda' pɨx ba ɨlhii'ñdha' am.

Ku gu' dhi' nam bhaan pɨx xi jam boosgidhak ka' ji gu jam tumñi' nam ba' pu'ñi mu ja'p jiimɨt maakam jam iatgidhidha', cham tu' nam sɨlhkam ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios tu a'gidha' joidham jix joojoidhat. Ku ba' gu' dhi' kam aaya' ji gu tanoolh nam pai' dhuuk jum tulhiiña' ja'p io'm pa', nat gu' gu Dios pu bɨjɨk dɨr tu dai na pu'ñi ja tulhiiñchuda' gu pu'ñi chu'm gu ja'tkam.

Ja'pni nat jax ja dooda' jano' gu noonbi'ñ na mɨt jum ua'tulh buiñor. Tɨɨ' nat moo jano' tu chia nam ja da'ngɨi ja buuprai mu ja'k xi ja iabu' na pai'r tu tulhiiñara', na giilhim jir jix chukgam kɨr, cham tu' nat pai'p tu ja uañ na mɨt jum ua'tulh buiñor. Xib dho gu' dai nam pɨx am tɨ nɨɨr jano' nam pai' dhuuk bhammɨ aaya'x dhaam na pai' ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam na mɨt tu' bhaan jum ua'tulh nam ba' bam tulhiiñ.

Gio ja'pni ɨp na jax gui' nam bɨjɨk ya' oipimɨk gu ja'tkam nat cham jɨ'xdhat tu ja uañ gu Dios nam pu'ñi giilhim bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, gu' ja'pji nat pu maa'n jimdam ja koi ji suudai' kɨ'n jano' nat jix io'm tu duukchuda nat ba' mi' dhɨr bhai' ji chɨs gu suudai' na mɨt ba' kɨ'n ba koi bhai'kuk. Daipu' gu Noee jix joi'ndak palhbui na cham mukia' bhai'mui ja bɨɨm gux xijum gook gu jajaa'nni'ñ. Na gu' gu Noee mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa', gam na bhaankamu'n tɨi pup tu ja a'gidhimɨk gu ja'tkam, gu' ji na mɨt gu' cham jɨ'xdha' tu' ka'm tɨɨ gu Dios.

Gio pui' na jax gui' nam bɨjɨk mu oi'ñkat Sodooma gio ja'pni ja'k na pai' Gomorra tɨ tɨɨgich nam pu'ñi cham tu' ka'm nɨidhat gu Dios, bɨɨx aixim tu buada' am na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Jaiñ nat pui' cham jup ja joi'gɨlh gu Dios, pu maa'n jimdam ji nat ja koi tai kɨ'n, mataip ja dooda bɨɨx dappaam. Dhi'm sap ba' bhaan jix mat ka' gu jai' ja'tkam nam jai'chdhɨlhia' gatuuk na pu'ñip tu ja dooda' no'm jax dhuukat cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ pu'ñi, no'm gu' bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.

Jano' maa'n pɨx gu maa'nkam Lot tɨɨgim mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios bhai' ja bui gu Sodooma oi'ñkam, sia ku gu' tɨix buam ja nɨi'ñdha' nam jax ja'k tu jimda'. Pui' kut ba'x joi'mdak palhbui gu Dios na ba' cham bhai' mɨɨya' bɨnkam gu jai' nat pai' dhuuk ja mɨi'ñ.
Na gu' mi' pui' xi jimda' na jax jix aa'nda' gu Dios sia dɨɨlh, xi ñakgat sia ku tɨix buam ja nɨi'ñ nam bɨɨx aixim tu buada', gio nam bɨɨx aixim kai'chdha' gu mi' oi'ñkam gammɨjɨ nabap tanoolh.

Ba' pu'ñi ɨp aach no'ch moo tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' xi jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gui' dhoch palhbuidha' no't ba jich ma'iich gux buam jum duukam. Gu' ba' gui' nam bɨxchu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñ xib, dai na ba ja bi'chulhi'ñ na ja tulhiiñchuda' xi ja aa'ñdhai na mɨt tu' bhaan jum ua'tulh jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' nam buiñor aaya' guch Xoi'kam.

Bɨɨx ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios gui' nam tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ na tɨi tum a'ga, nam dai bɨxchu' bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñcho nar jix buam jum duukam, nam gu' ja'p moo cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu ja'tkam, gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt bɨɨx aixim tu buada' am, gam nam bɨɨx aixim jix buam xi ja ai'chuxdhat ja a'ga gu noonbi'ñ gu ja'ook.

Gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios cham tu' moo pui' pɨk gɇ'gɇrkam jup jum taat am, sia kum gu'r gɇ'gɇrkam pa', cham pai' dhuuk tu' pɨx ja ɨlhdhat bɨɨx aixim ja ai'chuxi'ñ am gu noonbi'ñ gu ja'ook, ni nam pai' xi ja iattulhi'ñ buiñor guch Gɨ'kora'.

Gu' matgam dhi' dhi ja'tkam ni jɨ'x ji kum iam ja jur bia', ni jɨ'x nam xim ga'nga na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda'. Ja'p pɨx nam dudua ja'p na jax gu sasoi' nam pu cham ja jur bia', ja'p pɨx nam mɨkkat ja koodai ba ja bioma'. Dhi' pu'ñi ja'k pɨx ji buan am, gammɨjɨ pup kai'chidha' am nam jax aajidha' nam sia dɨɨlh pu cham maatɨt kɇɇkɇ'. Ku ba' gu' dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam am tɨ'ñchoka' am ji na ja'p tu ja jimia' na jax gu sasoi' nam ja koodat ja kua'da' gu ja'tkam.

Na mɨt gu' dhi' giilhim gɇ' bam ua'tulh nam bɨɨx aixim bhaan ja tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'tkam. Pui'm dho ka xi chu bua xib nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ nam bhaan jix bhai'm taatɨt gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka'. Ja'p chi moox buam gio nax xi'ɨraam no' pim aapi'm jai' mɨjɨmmɨp xi oipo pai' nam tu piastatda' dhi' dhi ja'tkam, nam gu' bɨɨx aixim jum buada' mi' pui' ji chu bua't.

Nam gu' kai'ñkam gammɨjɨ pɨx jum ua'tulhi'ñ jia. Sia tu' ubii no' mi ja'p pai' oirɨ dho gu'x joidhat nɨi'ñdha' am ji, maakam jum aagɨt nɨi'ñdha' am. Dhi'm ba' ji ja nɨidhat pui' ja'k jup tɨ bhɨɨjidha' gu jai' nam cham jir pu chu'm, gio gu' bɨxchu'x aa'nda' am nam tu bia'ka' jix dha'ram namkɨm. Dhi' ba' kɨ'n pui' bam kai'ch nam cham tu'r jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam.

Ba' dhi' pu mai' ba suulhgix kat jup tu'ii' am, nam gu' cham tu' mi' pui' jiim na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda', dai dɨɨlh pɨx nam jax ɨlhii'ñ. Pui' pɨx ja'k jup tu jim am gu' nat jax tu jii bɨjɨk gui' na Balaam tɨɨgich, maraa'n gu Beor, na tɨi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor gu Dios, gu' ji na gu' pu'ñi mui'x mai'chim ka' gu tuumiñ nam namki'ñdha' gu ja'tkam, sia ku gu'r jix buam jum duukam gu tu' nam chianda' na jax dhuñia' na jax cham pui' ja'k aa' gu Dios.

Gu' ji nat gu' maa'nnim cham pui' ka ji chu buus na jax tɨi ka tɨ ɨlhii'ñchu'ndat. Mummu pai' boi cha'm na ka jim, mi' ma juraap gu bhuru'xi'ñ na bhaan jim. Jotmoda' bhaamda' kɨ'n bhai' ba ñio, ba' mi' dhɨr too'nnɨk pu ja'k gɨi gu Balaam, nat gu' dhi' bhaan ba maat na cham jir am gu pui' na jax jum aa'ntugɨt mui' ka jim.

Dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam ja'pni pɨx ji buan am na jax no' tɨi mu ja'p pai' gɇ'gɇr kakolhbixdhix gu suudai', gu' ji no' gu' pu cham mi suu'n, jir ja'p pɨx ka' ba' na mi kakolhbixdhix ka'. Piam ja'pni ɨp na jax gu tɨbaa' no' bha ja'p pai' ka daraa, gu' ji no't gu' jotmoda' mui' ji jɨb, pu cham pai' matgilhia', na gu' pai' na ja'k jax ja dooda'. Pu'ñi pɨx ja'k jup ji bubuakia' am dhi', nam gu' dhi' ba bi'chulhdhix nam mu ja'k bhɨɨya' na pai' giilhim jix chu tukgam, na pu cham tu maax ni jɨ'x.

Nam gu' giilhim gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt bɨɨx aixim kai'chdha' dai, cham pai' dhuuk gampai' pɨx jum ɨlhdhat tu a'ga' am. Gam nam ja iatgidhat ja chianda' nam jix buam jum duukam jup tu duñia' gui' nam kia'pɨx bax mat ka' na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda'.

Pui' xi ja tɨtdat am nam dai pu'ñi ja'k jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' no'm pui' xi chu bua nam jax ja'k tu jimda' dɨɨlh, gio sap nam cham tu'm tulhiiña' sia kum pu'ñi ja'k tu jim. Gu' ji nam gu' pu dɨɨlh mai' suulhgix kat jup tui'ka' nam giilhim bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios. Bax bhai' ba ja dagia' gux buam jum duukam, nam gu' mi' pui' xi chu buidha' na jax ja chianda'. Iam gu' nam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gɨt gu Dios.

Ba' gui' nam pu'ñi tɨi ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nam bax mat ka' nat ja a'mkam muu kuruus ta'm nam ba' cham kam tulhiiña', gu' ji no' mɨt gu' gio ja'k jup suulh mu ja'k na pai'r tu ua'tulhdhara' nam giox buam jup ba tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, jix io'm jix buam tu'm pɨx ba bi'ya' am, cham tu' pui' kia' na jax bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nam chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jix io'm jix buam pɨx ba tu buada' am na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.

Jir am kat nam pu cham mamtɨda' gɨt na jax jir tu'm kam guch Xoi'kam nam ba' cham pu'ñix io'm bam ua'tulhdha' no' mɨt alhio pɨx xi chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor guch Xoi'kam gio ja'k jup suulh mu ja'k na pai'r tu ua'tulhdhara' ja'p xi dhuuk na jax ja'k tɨix aa' guch Xoi'kam nam tui'ñgɨda' gɨt.

Dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam pui' pɨx ja'k ba tu jimda' am na jax gu gagoox no't mi ja'p pai' ma bio, ja'xpɨx giop xi jugai gu bioxi'ñ. Piam pui' na jax gu tooxkolh no' mɨt tɨix bhai' batbich jix kɨɨ' suudai' kɨ'n, nam pai' dhuuk xi dho'ñcho', giop xi dhai'ññia' nam bakchira' mu na pai'x chu jaraam, pui' na jax jix ikoora' mi ja'p ba oirɨda'. Pu'ñi pɨx ja'k tu jimda' am gui' nam ja'k suulhgɨi giop bam ua'tulhdha', sia kut tɨi ba tu ja uañdhak guch Xoi'kam.

Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, aañ ya' dɨr gio mui'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ, dhi' kɨ'n ba' moo bar gookim. Bɨɨx gook ka'm dhi' u'uan jir maa'n na ñich jax pɨx mi' tu jam ua'ñxi nañ bhaan jam guguuxi'ñ na pim jax ja'k jir maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu'n na jax jix aa' gu Dios na pim ba' cham maakam ba jim aaga' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.

Tɨ'ñchokat japim mi' pui' xi jiimda' na mɨt jax tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, gio nat jax ja'k jup xi chɨ'ɨɨk gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam gui' nat jaroi'ch a'mkam muu na ya' xi oilhimɨk, gam na mɨt jax tu jam a'gi gu noonbi'ñ nam bɨɨma'n oipimɨk.

Ja'pniñ ba' moop xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ na pim ba' moo tɨ'ñchokat, na jano' na pai' dhuuk ba miamlhidha' na tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, bɨɨx aixim pɨx ba tu buada' am gu ja'tkam nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' na pu cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gam nam bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji jam tɨɨda' nam bhaan pɨx jam asda' aapi'm na pim ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam.

Jup jam tɨtdada' am: “¿Jax jum duu na saak gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam na pim jup kai'chdha', nat ba' moo cham pai' ba ji ai? Ja'p moo na pur iatda' ji bak. Bɨjɨk dɨr pu chu'm ba tum a'ga, yammɨ pui' ba koi mɨt guch gɨ'kora' kat pu chu'm jup xi chɇ kɇɇjimɨk. Gio gu' ni ku cham pai' iam maakam jup ba tum duñiim no' moo tum pataasaim, pui' na jax pɨx ba tu tu'ii' na jax pu ba tu tu'ii' nat dɨr jup jum duu dhi oi'ñga'n. Ja'p moo na pur iatda' ji dhi'.”

Pu'ñi ja'k jam tɨtdada' am jai' dhɨt gu ja'tkam, nam gu' cham mat ka' nax io'm bɨjɨk dɨr nat jax jup duu gu Dios dhi oi'ñga'n gio dhix dhaam, chakui pai'x maax kat gu dɨbɨɨr na jax xib. Na gu' suudai' pɨx ya suu'n kat bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n moo jano' nat jax jup duu gu Dios, cham pai' maa'n kap jix chu gak kat. Gu' ji nat gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios pɨx jup tu duu nat ba' jɨ'ma'n kap pɨx jim tua gu suudai', pui' kut ba'x chu gak kɨr jup tum duu jai' kap.
Gio xib pa' nat tum surnɨk ya' dhi oi'ñga'n nat gɇ' tɨs gu suudai', gu Dios pɨx jup tu duu ɨp, na gu' bɨxchu'x aichu'n.

Gu' ba' gu xib na ya' ba miamlhim ɨp na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, gu Dios na jaroi' bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia', pui' ja'k ba tu dai na tai kɨ'n mɨidhai tɨɨmo' dhi oi'ñga'n. Gio ba' na tai chɨr ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam jɨ'k buam pɨx tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, daipu' na xi ja aa'ñdhai na mɨt tu' bhaan jum ua'tulh jano' nam pai' dhuuk bhammɨm jumpada' gu ja'tkam buiñor.

Tɨ'ñchokat japim na gu Dios cham tu' xijaichu'n na pu tu duñia', ni na mɨk kam tɨ ɨlhii'ñ siat chi mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' ba jur. Maa'n tanoolh dho pɨx tɨ ɨlhii'ñ gu ja'kbui' oidha', sia ku gu' aach jich bui mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' ba jur.

Cham tu' ji na moo nar saalhiom gu Dios na pui' tu kuugalhdha' nat jax tu dai na pui' saak gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam, sia kum pui' kai'ch jai' dhɨt gu ja'tkam na pur iatda'. Gu' ja'pji na tɨi ja nɨɨr pɨx ji nam gɨt bɨɨx gu ja'tkam kɇɇji gu ñio'ki'ñ mi' pui' ka xi jimia' na jax jum kai'ch nam ba' cham jum tulhiiña'. Na gu' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam tɨix ja joi'gɨ'n gu Dios, pui' ku ba' cham ob bha jimiim ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, na mɨt gu' chakui bɨɨx kai gu ñio'ki'ñ.

Ku ba' gu' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na bha jimda' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, ya' pɨx ji na ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham, cham jaroi' mat ka' na jax chu'm tanoolh. Ja'pni na jax ba' gu jax chu'm jix ɨxkum no' pai' bax chɨ ɨɨxdham ba'k chɨr na gu' pu cham aagi'ñdha' gu mi kiokam, mi' pɨx ba bakia'x xɨ'lhim. Pu'ñi ja'k jup ji buusnia' guch Xoi'kam na pai' dhuuk bha jimda', dai na jotmoda' pɨx giilhim ba tɨm tɨ'ya'. Ba' pu cham pai' matgilhia' dhix dhaam, gio gu chiichia' bhai' nai' ji mɨɨya' gam gui' na jɨ'k tu' bha ja'p tu daraa. Gio dhi oi'ñga'n bɨɨx pu mɨɨya' maa'n jimdam bɨnkam gu tu' na ya'x chu jai'ch, na gu' jano' bar bhaan ka' na pai' dhuuk ja aagi'ñdha' gu Dios gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan.

Dho jaiñ, bax maat japim dhoñ jaaduñ na jax jix ɨɨbhidham tum duñia' jano' na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, na pai' dhuuk bha jimda' guch Xoi'kam. Ba' mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios, cha'pim jix buam ka tu buada', na pim gu' bax maat ba' xib na jax chu ja dooda' gui' nam jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm tɨgia' gu Dios.

Gu' dai ji na pim mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' pɨx tɨ nɨɨrda' jano' na pai' dhuuk bha jimda'. Gammɨjɨ pim pu chu'm bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchokat pui' xi chu duñiidha' na jax jix aa' na ba' jotmoda' bha jimda'. Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk bar bhaan ka' na bha jimda' guch Xoi'kam, pu maa'n jimdam bhai' pu mɨɨya' dhix dhaam na bha'ñi ja'p bɨnkam gui' na jɨ'k bha ja'p tu' daraa. Pu cham pai' tu matgilhia', na gu' pu bɨɨx tɨ mɨɨya', na gu' giilhim nammɨ ka'n kɨkkidha' gu tai.

Ku ba' gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam jimia' ich ji na pai' gu xibkam oi'ñga'n gio na pai' gu xibkam jix dhaam, nat pai' tuch iimchuda gu Dios nach aichdha' na pai' dhuuk pu'ñi ba tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Bhammɨ ja'k dho gi cham tu' ka jai'ch ka' ji gu ua'tulhdhara', cham pai'x buam ka tum buada' na jax cham jir am.

Pui' kuñ ba'p jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim cham jax jim aagit mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios cham jim o'jolhdhat, na ba' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya' guch Xoi'kam, pu jam baidhika' maa'n jimdam, na pim gu' cham tu' bhaan u'ua'tulhdhix ka'.

Pu'jani pɨx kai'ñkam ba' cham ob pai' aajim guch Xoi'kam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, na gu'x aa' nach bɨɨpɨ'x bhai' mi' pui' ka xi jimia' na jax jix aa' na ba' bhai' ba jimda', ba' mi' dhɨr dai na bach baidhika'x dhaam nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Gu Paablo gui' na pui'p jir jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, dhi' pɨx bhaan jup tu a'ga mi' u'uan ta'm nat pai' tu jam ua'ñxi nañ tu' bhaan tu jam a'gi'ñ aañ xib, daipu' na jɨ'k jax jurtudim gu Dios na mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ.

Bɨɨx moo nat jɨ'kim ba tu jam ua'ñxi, dhi' pɨx pu chu'm bhaan tu a'ga nañ jax chu jam a'gi'ñ aañ, na pui' bhaan jup jam guguuxi'ñ na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda', sia ku jɨ'ma'n kap jix io'm jix xijaim tu a'ga na cham pɨk moo jaroi' maatɨt xi kaaya' na jax jir jum duukam. Ku gu'x maatɨt kaaya' am ji gui' nam bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor gu Dios. Gu' ba' jai' dhɨt nam cham pɨk buiñor jix biiñak kat gu Dios tu jiñkui'ñdha' dhi ua'na'n gu Paablo, maakam pɨx ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' am, cham tu' pui' na jax kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch. Ba' no' mɨt gu' cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n xim gaa na jax pɨk kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch, pu cham jɨ'xdha' maatɨt kaaya' am, maakam pɨx ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' am. Sia gu jai' ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na cham jir ua'na'n gu Paablo bhai' maakam ji dhuñia' am nam jax pɨx ja'k ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' dɨɨlh, cham tu' na jax pɨk kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch, nam gu' cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios tu jiñkuidha'. Ku ba' gu' dhi'x io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' ji gu Dios no' mɨt jax dhuuk maakam duu.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, tɨ nɨidhat japim nam cham jam iatgidhai mu ja'k jam aichdha' ja bui dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, nañ gu' ba jam aagi'ñ nam kai'ñkam mui' cham maatɨt kɇɇkɇ' na jax pɨk kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Sia kum gu' tɨi tu jiñkui'ñ, maakam pɨx ɨlhdhat kɇɇkɇ' am, nam gu' cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n xim ga'ngada' na jax pɨk kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch.

Aapi'm gu' dai ji na pim jix io'm mui' xi gaagidha' na pim jax ja'k jix bhai' machia' na jax jir tu'm kam gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam gui' nat jaroi' xich joi'ndak tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' bhammɨ kuruus ta'm, gio ba' na pim jix bhai' machia' na pim jax ja'k joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'nda'. Gammɨjɨch ba' moo tu daanda' buiñor sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ja'pni pɨx tui'ka'.

Mɨjɨ ja'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim pai' jax tu daraa nañ bhaan tu jam a'gi'ñ na jax jir tu'm kam guch Xoi'kam gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch. Aach jai' dhɨt jix bhai' maatɨk na jax jir tu'm kam, na chich gu' maaxik tɨɨgɨk jich buupui kɨ'n, ñio'kdhak jachich, kɇɇjimɨk ich ɨp na jax tu a'gimɨk. Dhi' pɨx jir di' gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr bhaan ba tum a'ga, jir di' pɨx ɨp gui' na tu maak gu ii'mda'.

Ba' dhi' jɨ' na jaroi' tu maak gu ii'mda', maaxik ya' xi oilhimɨk maa'nkam jup jum duuk. Aach jix bhai' tɨɨgɨk jai' dhɨt, jix maatɨt jach ba' ya' dɨr pu chu'm jup ba tu jam a'gi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim ba' moo mui' xim guguuxdha' na pim jix io'm mui' xix biiñak ka' buiñor na ba' jam makia' gu ii'mda' na pim kɨ'n gammɨjɨ pu ba duduaka' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam. Na gu' dhi' nañ jaroi' bhaan tu jam a'gi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ, cham tu'r ya' pai' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, matgɨm gu' dhi' bhammɨ dɨr ji nat bha jii jix dhaam na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios, nat pai' ja'k giop bhɨi na jax ya' xi oilhimɨk.

Ba' aach xib bhaankamu'n gui' jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor. Na gu' dhi' cham tu'r iatda' nach jax tu jam a'gi'ñ, gu' aach maaxik tɨɨgɨk ji jich buupui kɨ'n nañ jax ba jam tɨtda, jix bhai' kɇɇjimɨk ich na jax tu a'gimɨk. Ba' jam guguuxi'ñ ich na pim bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' na jax jix aa' nach ba' maap maa'n ñi'ook bap duuka' jam bɨɨm, ja'p na jax aach nach maap maa'n ñi'ook bap duuk gu Dios gio gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam, nach gu' bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor.
Bɨɨx dhi' pu'ñi ja'k jañ mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ, nañ gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' bañ chaat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim ba' aapi'm pu'ñi dhuuji pui'x bhai'p jum taat ka' buiñor.

Jano' nach maap oipimɨk guch Xoi'kam, pui' tuch a'gidhimɨk na gu Dios joidham gɇ' tanoor bhammɨ na pai'p tu'ii', cham pai' dhuuk jix chukgam kɨr jup tu'ii'. Ba' aach ya' dɨr pu chu'm jup ba tu jam a'gi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios nat jich aa'ñdhak guch Xoi'kam.

Ba' no'ch aach jax kai'ch nach sɨlhkam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa', gu' ji no'ch gu'x chu tukgam tɨr jup tu'ii' pui' xi kai'chɨt, ba iatda' ich pɨx, cham tu' pai' sɨlhkam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' ich buiñor.

Gu' no'ch sɨlhkam bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa', dho gi gu' pui' bam kai'ch ji nach tu' sɨlhkam jix chu maax kɨr jup tu'ii', na gu' tɨich bɨ'ñxi'ñka' gu Dios no'ch tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Gio gu' joidham jix bhai' kai'chɨt maa'n ñi'ook bap duuka' ich nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Dios, ba' gammɨjɨ ba tuch uañi'ñka' no'ch jich ua'tulhi'ñ kɨ'n gu ɨ'ra'n gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam nat jaax bhammɨ kuruus ta'm.

Ba' cham jir am no'ch aach jax kai'ch nach cham ka u'ua'tulhdhix, na gu' cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi'x uañ kɨ'n pu ba kɨɨka' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, na gu' ya'x chu ua'tulhdhix. Pui' kuñ ba'p kai'ch na cham jir am no' jaroi' pui'm aa' na cham ka ua'tulhdhix, na gu' cham tu'r mi' pui' ka' na jax jir sɨlhkam, dɨɨlh pɨx na pui' ɨlhii'ñdha'.

Jɇɇ' ji no'ch maaxik jax kai'ch nach gammɨjɨ pɨx jich ua'tulhi'ñ na ba'r pui' ka' na jax jir sɨlhkam. Tuch uañi'ñka' ɨp gu Dios no'ch soi'ch ɨlhdhat jax chɨtda na tuch uañdha' no' chich tu' bhaan mach ua'tulh.

Sia cham jir am no'ch jax kai'ch nach cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jich ua'tulhi'ñ, na gu' pui' pɨx ba ji buusnia' ba' gu Dios nar jix iatkum, na pui' kai'ch nach bɨɨx pɨx jix u'ua'tulhdhix nach jɨ'k ja'tkam, maaxik jup jir pui' gu' nach bɨɨx pɨx jix u'ua'tulhdhix. Ba' no'ch pui' kai'ch nach cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jich ua'tulhi'ñ, dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' nach cham tu' bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Dios.

Ba' aañ dhi' pu'ñi ja'k pɨx mi' tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nañ bhaan jam guguuxi'ñ na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, na pim ba' moo cham kam ua'tulhi'ñdha'. Piam kut gu' moo jax dhuuk jaroi' maadɨt mam ua'tulh cham jum ɨlhdham, maadɨt bia' ich ji gu' matgɨm gui' na jaroi'x bhaai' nach a'mkam nokia' buiñor gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora', na ba' tuch uañi'ñka' nach jich ua'tulhi'ñ. Gui' dho Jesuus jich Xoi'kam jañ aagɨt jup kai'ch na jaroi'x uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk,

nat jaroi' jich a'mkam jum makgɨrta bo jano' bhaan gu kuruus na ba' pu'ñi dhuuji tu namkix ka' bɨɨx nach jɨ'x jix ua'tulhdhix. Ku gu' cham tu' ji na dai nach jɨ'k jir ya' kam dhi Israel nat tuch ñamkix, ja'pji dappaam ji na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n kam gu ja'tkam.

Ba' no'ch mi' pui' xi jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' nach tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat tu' ka'm ba nɨi'ñ, ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' nach jix bhai' bax maat na jax jir tu'm kam.
Gu' ji no'ch gu' pu cham tu' mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa', sia kuch gu' pui' tɨi xi kai'ch nach bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, pɨx jap kai'chdha' ich, cham tu'r pui' ka'.

Gu' matgɨm gu jaroi' no't moo tu' sɨlhkam ba maat na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, joidham ji na tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa'. Dhi' ba' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, ba' maap bam kɇkɇɇ am gu Dios.
Ba' no' jaroi' jax kai'ch nam maap maa'n ñi'ook bap duuk gu Dios, jum aa' na pui' ja'k jup xi chu jimda' nat jax tu jii guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nar sɨlhkam.

Ba' dhi' nañ jɨ'k tu' mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ, jir di' pɨx gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na pim bɨjɨk dɨr pu ba kɇɇ na pu chu'm tum a'ga, nat pu bɨjɨk dɨr pui' ja'k tu dai gu Dios. Cham tu' na pim jax jum aa'nda' na dhi' ba' bar xibkam nañ aañ mui' ba tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ.

Ku ba' gu' dhi' nañ jɨ'k tu' mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ, ja'p ji buus ji nar xibkam ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, sia ku gu' bɨjɨk dɨr pu chu'm bhaan ba tum a'ga, nat gu' kia'pɨx pui' tum kuugalh na jax ya' xi oilhimɨk guch Xoi'kam. Dhi' ba'r di' ba' xib gui' na joidham gɇ' tanoor ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.

Ba' no' gu' maadɨt jax kai'ch nax chu maax kɨr bap tu'ii' na pui' jim aagɨt na ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gu' ji no' gu'x bhaamki'ñ gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu'x chu maax kɨr jup tui'ka', puix chukgam kɨr kap tui'ka'.

Jɨɨ' ji no' gu' joidham jix joi'ndat pɨx jix bhai' tɨtda gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, dhi' jɨ' ji na ba' pui' bam kai'ch na joidham jix chu maax kɨr bap tui'dhi', ba' cham jɨ'xdha' tu' bhaan jutbui ɨlhia'. Ja'p jañ kai'ñkam jup kai'ch na cham jɨ'xdha' mai'chia' gux buam jum duukam.
