Gu' ji no' gu' daix bhaamki'ñ gu jumaich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, dhi' dho gi gu' puix chu tukgam kɨr jup tui'ka' ji, ba' pu cham mat ka' na pai' ja'k bhɨichgɨda', pui' pɨx ba ji buusnia' na jax maa'n gu cham ñiakam.

Ja'pniñ ba' moo ya'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka', nat gu' ba tu jam uañ gu Dios bɨɨx gu jam ua'tulhdhara' nat jix bhai' duu guch Xoi'kam nat tuch ñamkix.

Ba' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k bar gɇ'gɇr ja'tkam, mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ ɨp nañ jix bhai'ñ chaat na pimɨt pui'p ba maat guch Xoi'kam gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, na gammɨjɨ pur gɇ'kam. Gio aapi'm na pim jɨ'k jir tu biipibop, pui'ñ mui'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ nañ jix bhai'ñ chaat na pim cham ka kaichu' gux buam jum duukam, na pim gu' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

Pu'ñi ja'k jañ dho ba' pɨx tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ nañ bhaan jam guguuxi'ñ na pim jix bhai' pɨx bam taat ka', na pim gu' bax maat ba' xib na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'. Gio aapi'm na pim jɨ'k jir gɇ'gɇr ja'tkam, pu'ñi ja'k pɨx jañ mui'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ na pim ba' moox bhai' pɨx jup bam taat ka' na pimɨt pui'p ba maat guch Xoi'kam gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch. Bɨɨx sia aapi'm na pim jir tu biipibop jañ pu'ñi pɨx ja'k mui'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ, nañ gu'x bhai'ñ chaat na pim bhaan bax o'jo' ba' xib buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim gu' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, ba' cham jɨ'xdha' jax ka jam dooda' gu ja'ook.

Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp jiñ jaaduñ na pim siamri mɨk ba bua' gu tu' nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n. Cha'pim bhaan kam tutkagi'ñka', ni ku pim pui' ja'k jup ka tu jimda' nam jax tu jim gui' nam chakui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Na gu' gu jaroi' no' dai mu ja'k bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñcho gu tu' nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na cham tu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios.

Na gu' cham tu' gu Dios na pui' ja'k jurtu'nka' no'x buam bax chu duñiim na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, ya' dɨr pɨx ji bhaan dhi oi'ñga'n na pu chu'm busaak. Bɨɨx nam jɨ'k tu' jax bua gu ja'tkam nar jix buam jum duukam, jir ya' kam pɨx dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, pui' na jax nam gɇ'gɇrkam bam taat ka' no'm bar jix chutumñigam, piam nam bɨxchu' bhax chu joi'ñdha' jix dha'ram namkɨm, gam nam jai' bhax ja joi'ñdha' gu u'uub.

Ku gu' dhi' alhio pɨx ji nam ya' pui' xi chu buimɨi dai ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, iam gu' gammɨjɨ kɨ'n ya' pux bhai'm taat ka' am gɨt. Na gu' na pai' dhuuk jum tɨɨmo' dhi oi'ñga'n, bɨɨx pu cham pai' matgilhia' gu tu' na ya'x chu jai'ch. Gu' matgɨm gu jaroi' no't ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gammɨjɨ ji na pux jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na gu' pu baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam na buiñor bap tui'ka'.

Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, ya' moo ba miamlhim na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan. Ba' na pim jax bax maat jiñ jaaduñ na pui' tum kai'ch bo na saak maa'n jai'chdhɨlhia' gui' nax bhaamut a'gidha' guch Xoi'kam na pai' dhuuk pu'ñi bar mia'n ka' na tum kuugalhdha'. Dho gu' xib mui' ji nam pu chu'm ba oipo gu ja'tkam nam jix bhaamut a'ga guch Xoi'kam. Dhi'ñ ba' bhaan pui' ba kai'ch na bar mia'n ji na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.

Dhi' dhi ja'tkam nam xib nai' jiimɨt jix bhaamut a'gim guch Xoi'kam, ya' maap jich jumpadat ich nach chu daandat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nam gu' panaas ka tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor. Gu' ji na mɨt gu' mɨkkat ya' dɨr ji jii jich bui, mummu ja'p jam pɨx jix bhaamut ba a'gim guch Xoi'kam. Dhi' ba' bhaan ba matgir nam bak gu' pu cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ ji sia pu bɨjɨk dɨr, nam gu' chi pu cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n. Na gu' no'm pux kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gɨt pu bɨjɨk dɨr, puich bɨɨm jup tui'ñgɨda'm gɨt sia gu xib.

Aapi'm na pim gu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ba' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jam a'm ba tajaañix gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n. Dhi' bax bhai' jam mattu'n na jax jir tu'm kam guch Xoi'kam, gio na jax ja'k jix aa' na pim tui'ñgɨda'.

Pui' kuñ ba' mɨjɨ tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ, nañ gu'x bhai'ñ chaat na pim jix bhai'x maatɨt tu' ka'm ba nɨi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, gam na pim bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor. Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k pu'ñix bhai' bax mat ka' na jax jir tu'm kam guch Xoi'kam, cham tu'x bhaamut aa'nda' am.

Gui' nam jɨ'k pui' kai'chdha' na gu Jesuus cham tu'r di' guch Xoi'kam nat Dios bha joot jix dhaam dɨr na ba' ya'ch a'mkam mukia', dhi'r di' ka' am gui' nam jix bhaamki'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam. Ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' nam tu' sɨlhkam jir jix iatkum ka', nam gu' nai' jiimɨt tu iatgidhidha' nam jix bhaamut a'gidha' guch Xoi'kam, ja'p jum aa'nda' am na gu' ja a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios nam chi sap pɨk ba' panaas tɨi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ gui' buiñor. Jax gi dhui ɨp nam gu' maap jup tui'dhi' gu Dios gio gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam. Ba' gu jaroi' no' tu' pɨx ɨlhdhat ja'p xi dhuukat gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam, cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios, na gu' pui' ji buusanda' na bɨɨx jix bhaamki'ñdha' no' tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam.

Na gu' kai'ñkam nañ jax ba kai'ch, na gu jaroi' no' tu' pɨx ɨlhdhat ja'p xi dhuukat gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam, cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios, sia ku gu' kai'ñkam tɨi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ dai gu Dios buiñor. Jɨɨ' ji gu jaroi' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n buiñor gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam na ba' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora', nam gu' kai'ñkam maap jum kɇkɇɇ gu Dios gio guch Xoi'kam.

Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ na pim cham tu' mɨk buppada' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na pimɨt jano' dɨr pu maat na pimɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jam jujur am japim xi baapsai na pim ba' gammɨjɨ tɨ'ñchokat mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu'nda' na pim jax ba jiim, na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gio gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam.

Na ba' no'ch pu'ñi mi' pui' xi dhuiñchu' na jɨ'k jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, dai na bach baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam nat pai' tuch iimchuda na saak jich aichdha'. Dɨɨlh pui' xich chɨɨdak gu' guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk.

Pui' kuñ ba' tɨiñ dhakoo'ñdhatu' nañ mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ nañ bhaan pɨx jam aagi'ñ nam jax jir tuutu'm gui' nam pu'ñi nai' jiimɨt jix bhaamut a'gidha' guch Xoi'kam, gam nam maakam tu iatgidhidha', na pim ba' moo cham ja kɇkɇɇda' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ no'm pu chu'm mi ja'p pai' ba gu'nguk, jir maa'n na pim jax tɨ nɨidhidha' na pim pai' jax ba jiim.

Na gu' aapi'm jam a'm ba tajaañix gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', dai dhi' ji na pim pɨx kaichgɨda' na jax ja'k jam jurtudidha'. Cham kam aa' na jaroi' pai' dhɨr jimdat jam aagi'ñdha' na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda'. Gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na jam a'm ba tajaañix bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, jir di' na pui' ja'k jam jurtudidha' na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda', gam na jam mattudidha' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' gu Dios. Gu' ba' no' pim mi' pui' xi bhɨichu', dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim sɨlhkam bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Xoi'kam.

Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim mui' xix biiñak ka' buiñor guch Xoi'kam cham tu'p jum buixdhat sia ku mi ja'p jax tum a'ga. Na gu' no' chich jax dhuuk cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', jix xi'ɨ'rai nai' gampai' jich dhuñia' ich jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda'. Gu' dai ji nach jix bhai'ch chaatɨt baasɨ'n ba namkia' no' chich mi' pui' jii,

nach gu' tu' sɨlhkam bar maamra'n ka'. Na gu' na pim jax bax maat jiñ jaaduñ nap kai'ch bo gu Dios na gu jaroi' no't tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨk mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', dhi' ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' na sɨlhkam jir maraa'n ka', ja'p na jax guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk nat gu' tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨk gu Dios.

Dho jaiñ na jax pɨk jir jix bhai'kam gu Dios, bɨɨx pui'ch bia' nach sap bar maamra'n, na gu' joidham xich joi'gɨ'n. Maaxik dho sɨlhkam bar maamra'n ich, nach gu' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam. Gu' ba' gui' nam jɨ'k cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, pu cham maat am nach jir tu'p tu'm da', nach jax kai'ñkam ba' pui' bach chɨɨtɨ' nach bar maamra'n gu Dios, nam gu' cham tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor xim ga'nga bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n nam iam ba machia' gɨt na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios nach jaroi' buiñor bap tu'ii'.

Aach dho gi nach gu' bax maat nach tu' sɨlhkam bar maamra'n gu Dios nañ jax ba jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ, sia kuch gu' chakui pɨk moo maat gu xib nach jax moo tu'm jup jich dhuñia' jano' nach pai' dhuuk buiñor bap tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam no't bach baidhak ya' dɨr dhi oi'ñga'n. Daipu' nach jix maat nach saak pui' tuutu'm jup jich dhuñia' na jax jir tu'm gui', nach gu' maap bap tui'ka'.

Gu' ba' gu jaroi' no'x aa' na bhammɨ aaya' na pai'p tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam, jum aa' nax bhai' xi chu jimda', na cham tu'x buam ka tu buada' na tu'r ua'tulhdhara'. Na gu' cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' bhammɨ aaya' no'x ua'tulhdhix, na gu' gui'x uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk na pai'p tu'ii'.
Na gu' gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham jir am, jum ua'tulhi'ñdha' buiñor gu Dios, na gu' gui' cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu pui' ja'k.

Pu kai'ñkam dho bha jii guch Xoi'kam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na ba' tɨ bhɨika' gu ua'tulhdhara' ya' dɨr dhi oi'ñga'n. Nat gu' gui' cham pai' dhuuk jum ua'tulhdhak, pui' kut ba'ch a'mkam jum makgɨrtak tɨ bhɨɨk.

Ba' no'ch tu' sɨlhkam pui' ja'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ bɨɨx jich jur kɨ'n buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jum aa' nach cham tu' bhaan kach ua'tulhi'ñdha'. Gu' no'ñ gu' puiñ ua'tulhi'ñ pui' xi kai'chɨt nañ ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, cham tu' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' iñ, pɨx jap kai'chdha' iñ.

Ja'pniñ ba' moop jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim siamri xi chɨ nɨidhat na cham jaroi' pai' dhɨr jimdat maakam jup ba jam iatgidha' na jax cham jir pui' na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Aapi'm cham tu' ji kɇkɇɇdat jir maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim dai gui' tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ.

Gu' no' pim gu' dai bɨɨx aixim tu bua na tu'r ua'tulhdhara', dhi' bhaan jup bax maatɨ' ka' na pim dai mu ja'k kaichgɨt gu ja'ook mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhim na jɨ'k jax jam tɨɨdaim. Na gu' gu ja'ook gammɨjɨ dhi' bhaan tu juan, bɨjɨk dɨr pum ua'tulhi'ñ nat dɨr jup duu gu Dios. Pu kai'ñkam ba' pɨx bha joot gu Dios gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam na ba' ya'ch palhbuidha' na pu'ñi tuch uañdha' guch ua'tulhdhara', na ba' mi' dhɨr cham jɨ'xdha' jax kach dhooda' gu ja'ook na jax tɨi ka ɨlhdhat.
Na gu' gu jaroi' no' sɨlhkam bar maraa'n gu Dios, cham tu' kam ua'tulhi'ñdha'. Jix bhai' pɨx ba tu jimda', na gu' bhaan jup tui'ñgɨda' gu Dios.

Pux bhai'x maatɨ' ka' jia nam jax ja'k tu jimda' gui' nam sɨlhkam jir maamra'n ka' gu Dios gio gui' nam jup jir maamra'n gu ja'ook. Pui' na jax gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na jax cham jir am, na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gio nam jix ja bhaamki'ñdha' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, dhi' cham tu' Dios jir maamra'n ka' am, gui' ji ja'ook.
Ja'pni ja'k jup xi chɨ'ɨɨk guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk, sap nach xich jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na pim jax ba tɇ kɇɇñ jaaduñ jano' dɨr na pimɨt jax tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor.

Cham tu'ch mi' pui'p ka tu daa'ñchu'n nat jax tu jii bɨjɨk gu Kayiin nat cham tu' kɨɨ' maa'nkam buus. Tɨɨ' nat bhaamkidhak mua gu sɨpdhi'ñ Abeel nat jax ja'k jurtuda gu ja'ook na bhaan jup tui'ñgɨt. ¿Jax japim ɨlhii'ñ nat kai'ñkam jup dooda'? Dho nax jɨɨgam dho, na gu'x maat na gu sɨpdhi'ñ tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, ba' joidham jix kɨɨgalhi'ñdha'. Dɨɨlh gu' gu Kayiin pu cham tu' mi' pui' jimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ba' pu cham kɨɨgalhi'ñdha', na gu' buam pɨx tu buada'.
Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp jiñ jaaduñ na pim cham tu' bhaan jax jum aa'nda' sia kum xi jam bhaamki'ñ gu ja'tkam na pim bar jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham.

Na gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' mu ja'k ka bhɨichu' ich nach pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jich chulhiiñdha' gɨt. Xib gu' dai ji nach sɨlh ba bhɨichu' nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', ja'p ji buus nach ko'iix kat gio duduadɨk jup ba baapam. Pui' kuch ba' xib joidham bax ja joi'gɨ'n guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jia no'ch sɨlhkam ba dua guch ii'mda' bhaan, gu' no'ch pui ka ko'iix guch i'ii'mda' bhaan, dai ji nach jix chu bhaamki'ñdha'.

Ba' gu jaroi' no'x bhaamki'ñ gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ja'p ji buusnia' na ba mu'aa', na gu' gu jaroi' na pu'ñix chu bhaamki'ñdha', ja'p ji buusanda' nar tu mua'kam ka', ba' cham jɨ'xdha' ja baidhika' guch Xoi'kam jix dhaam nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.

Aach dho gi gu' nach jɨ'k bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam jix bhai' bax maat ji nach jax ja'k tu buada' no'ch sɨlhkam jix chu joi'gɨ'n, nach gu' mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' nat jax tu duu guch Xoi'kam jano' nat joidham xich joi'ndak jich a'mkam muu nach ba' pu'ñi duuji cham kach chulhiiña'. Aach ba' pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, pui'ch jup xix chu joi'gɨ'nda' nat jax xich joi'gɨlh guch Xoi'kam, cham jax bua sia mɨt chi mach koi ja a'mkam gu jai', nach gu'x ja joi'gɨ'nda'.

Dhi' jɨ' pu'ñi ja'k no'ch xi dhuiñchu' na ba' pui' bam kai'ch nach bax maat na jax kai'ñkam pui'm kai'ch nach jix chu joi'gɨ'nda'. Gu' ji no' gu' pui' na jax gu jaroi' no' tɨir jix chumñigam, ba' no' gu' tɨi nɨi'ñ na tu' a'miram jum aa' gu jax chu'm jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, ji no't gu' pu cham pai' iam jix joi'ndak xi maa, dhi' pu cham tu'x mat ka' na jax kai'ñkam pui'm kai'chdha' nañ jix chu joi'gɨ'n, na gu' bak pu cham mat ka' na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios.

Ba' aapi'm cham pu chu't jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, ja'pji nach xi ja palhbuidhat guch jaaduñ kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha' na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nach sɨlhkam bax chu joi'gɨ'n, cham tu' nach pui' pɨx kai'chdha'.

Dhi' pɨx no'ch pu'ñi ja'k xi dhuiñchu' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' nach tu' sɨlhkam bax maat na jax ja'k jum aa' nach tui'ñgɨda' no'ch pui' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ba' pui' ba ɨlhii'ñdha' ich nach a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios.

Nach gu' cham jɨ'xkat tu' ɨxchuidha' gu Dios, sia kuch gu' jax jich aa' na chi cham maat no'ch mi' pai' maa'n kap cham mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa'. Jax gi dhui na gu' gui' bɨɨx jix chu maat sia nar tu', pux bhai'x mat ka' no'ch jich ua'tulhi'ñ. Tɨi pɨk aa nach gu' aach sia dɨɨlh jix mat ka' no'ch mi' pai' cham pu duiñchu' na jax jix aa', gu' gi ba' gui' nar gɇ'kam.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, xim ga'ngada' pim jam jujur am bhaan no' pim moo mi' pui'p duiñchu' na jax pɨk ja'k moox aa' gu Dios, piam ku gu' cham. Ba' no' pim gu' moo panaas mi' pui' bhɨichu' na jax jix aa' na pim mui' xim ga'nga, dho gu' dai dho ba' na pim joidham pɨx jix bhai'm taat ka' buiñor, na pim gu' bhaan bax mat ka' na jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim gui'.

Ba' gui' xi jam joi'ndat tu jam maakidha' bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k tu' mu taanda' bhammɨ ja'k na pai'p tu'ii', na gu'x mat ka' na pim tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' bhɨichgɨda' na jax chu daaxix gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gam na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa'.

Gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na tu daaxix, jir di' pɨx gui' na bhaan tu a'ga gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam na pui'm kai'ch nach sap tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor na ba' pu'ñi duuji uañchudhix ka' guch ua'tulhdhara'. Mi' dhɨr sap ba' dai nach ba xich jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja'p na jax guch Xoi'kam nat xich joi'gɨlh, dɨɨlh sia pui'p xich chɨɨdak na ya' xi oilhimɨk.

Dhi' jɨ' ba' no'ch bɨɨx mi' pui' xi dhuiñchu' pui' bam kai'chdha' nach mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhim na jɨ'k jax chu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Ba' gui'ch a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha', gio aach ya' dɨr mu ja'k buiñor jup tui'ñgɨda' ɨp, nach gu' maap bach kɇkɇɇkɇ'. Ba' pux bhai'x mat ka' ich no'ch a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios, na gu'ch mattu'nka' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n nat jich a'm tajaa.

Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, moo pim siamri xi chɨ nɨidhat na cham jaroi' pai' dhɨr jimdat maakam jam iatgidha' pui' xi kai'chidhat na Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gada'. Bɨɨpɨ' pim xi mamtɨda' no' moo sɨlhkam Dios jir tujuandam tugi'ñ piam ku gu' cham, nam gu' xib mui' nai' oipichu' gui' nam maakam tu iatgi'ñ pui' xi kai'chidhat nam sap pɨk ba' Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gim. Ba' aapi'm cham tu' maa'n jimdam ja kɇɇji mu ja'k jup ji ja kaaya', ka xi mamtɨda' pim.

Jix maatɨ' ka' am jia gui' nam sɨlhkam Dios jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gio gui' na cham. Gui' nam sɨlhkam Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'ga, pui' ja'k kai'chidha' am nat guch Xoi'kam maa'nkam jup jum duuk ya' ai dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan.

Ba' no' gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k kai'chim, dhi' cham tu'r di' ka' gui' na sɨlhkam Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'ga, gui' ji ja'ook na bhaankamu'n tu a'gidha', gui' pɨx na pui' ja'k kai'chidha', na gu'x bhaamki'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Nam gu' saak pu chu'm jai'chdhɨlhia' gu ja'tkam nam pu'ñix bhaamut a'gidha' guch Xoi'kam na pim jax ba tɇ kɇɇ. Dho gu' dhi' pu xib ji nam pu chu'm ba oipichu', cham tu' na pai' dhuuk.

Ku gu' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, cham jɨ'xdha' jam iatgidha'm ji dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam sia kum tɨi ɨlhii'ñdha' gɨt, na gu' aapi'm jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam nuukdaim gu Dios, na pim gu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor. Gio na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam gui' na jam buip tui'dhi' aapi'm, cham tu' pui' na jax gui' na ja buip tui'dhi' gui' nam pu'ñix bhaamut a'gidha' guch Xoi'kam.

Na gu' dai gu tu' nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n nam bhaan tu a'gidha' na jax ja'k ja jurtu'nka' gux buam jum duukam, cham tu' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Ba' joidham ja kɇɇkɇ' am gui' nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios, na gu' bɨɨx ja ko'raarda' nam jax ja'k tu ja a'gi'ñdha', na gu'r ya' kam ka' pɨx dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan.

Ku gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' kach bɨpnat ji siam jax tɨich iatgi'ñ gu dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, nach gu' aach jix bhai' bax maat na jax pɨk ja'k jir sɨlhkam, dai ji gui' nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam ba' joidham ja kɇɇkɇ'. Aach ba' no'ch tɨip xi chu ja a'gi'ñ gui' nar sɨlhkam ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, pu cham kaim ka' am, na gu' cham ja ko'raarda', dai ba' gui' nam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam ba' joidham jup jix kaik ka'. Pu'ñi ja'k japim ba' duujix mat ka' jiñ jaaduñ nam jax chu'm sɨlhkam Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gidha' gio ba' na jax chu'm cham.

Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp jiñ jaaduñ na pim siamri xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na Dios jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim, na gu' gui' joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n. Ba' gu jaroi' no' pu'ñi joidham jix ja joi'gɨ'n gu jai', dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na bax maat na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' na Dios bar Maraa'n.

Gu' no' ampɨx jix ja bhaamki'ñ gu jai', dho gi gu' bhaan jup bax maatɨ' ka' ji na pu chakui maat na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, na gu' bak pu cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor. Na gu' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' gɨt, pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'nda' gɨt jia na jax gu Dios na joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n.

Na gu'x bhai'x maatɨ' jia na joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n gu Dios. Tɨɨ' nat moo bha joot gu dai maa'n Maraa'n ya' aach jich bui, nat xich joi'gɨlh na sap ba' no' chich tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor, jich baidhika'x dhaam nach pai' joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.

Dɨɨlh pɨx nat xich joi'gɨlh gu Dios, sia kuch chakui mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa', dai pɨx nax mat ka' nach mu ja'k bhɨichu'n nach pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jich chulhiiñdha'. Pui' kut ba' bhai' ma joot gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam na ya'ch a'mkam jum makgɨrta' na ba' pu'ñi duuji tu namkix ka' nach jɨ'x jix u'ua'tulhdhix.

Dho jaiñ na jax pɨk jir jix bhai'kam gu Dios, gɇ'kam kɨ'n xich joi'gɨlh nach mai' ba suulhgix kat. Aach ba' mi' pui'p xi chu daa'ñchu'nda'ñ jaaduñ na jax gui', joidham jach xich jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.

Na ba' no'ch pu'ñi xich jajoi'gɨ'n bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, gammɨjɨch a'm ba kioka' guch Gɨ'kora', gam nax io'm ba xich joi'gɨ'nda'. Sia kuch gu' cham nɨi'ñ gu maaxik bhaan na jax chu'm, ku gu' ya'p tui'ka' ji jich bui no'ch pu'ñi ja'k xi dhuiñchu'.
Jix bhai'x maatɨ' nach a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios, gio aach ya' dɨr mu ja'k nach buiñor jup tui'dhi', na gu' pui' ja'k jich mattu'n gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' nat jich a'm tajaa bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.

Bax maat ich ɨp nat guch Gɨ'kora' bha joot gu dai maa'n Maraa'n ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na ba' ya'ch palhbuidha' bɨɨx nach jɨ'k ja'tkam nach ba' cham kach chulhiiña' gatuuk. Dhi' bɨɨx pu'ñi ja'k jich mattu'n gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.

Gu jaroi' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nat gu Dios bha joot gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam, dhi' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha', na gu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' nar sɨlhkam, gio gui' ya' dɨr mu ja'k buiñor jup tui'ñgɨda' ɨp.

Ba' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jix bhai' bax maat ich na gu Dios joidham xich joi'gɨ'n, na gu'r di' pɨx gux chu joi'gɨ'n. Ba' gu jaroi' no' pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'n na gui', dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na sɨlhkam bax maat gu Dios, ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' na bhaan ba tɨ nɨidhim.

Ba' no'ch aach pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'n na gu Dios, cham pai' totdon ka' ich jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan, nach gu' pui' xich aa'nda' nach pui' ja'k jup tu jimdat nat jax tu jii dɨɨlh jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk.

Na gu' no'ñ moo joidham xix chu joi'gɨ'n na jax gu Dios, cham tu' bhaan toodon ka' iñ, dai nañ joidham jix bhai' pɨx jiñ chaat ka', pu pai' na ja'k jax jum duñia' gu too'nni'. Gu' dai ji no'ñ cham pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'n na gu Dios nañ ba' tɨix choodon ka', nañ gu'x mat ka' nañ bañ chulhiiña' pɨx ba', nañ gu' dhi' bhaan cham am buatu'nda'.

Aach tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim ji ba' xib na jax jix aa' gu Dios, nat gu' gui' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr xich joi'gɨlh ampɨk nach ba' aach tu' ka'm jup ba nɨi'ñdha', cham tu' nat gatuuk xich joi'gɨlh nach aach pu tu' ka'm ba nɨi'ñ.

Ba' no' gu' jaroi' maadɨt jax kai'ch: “Aañ dho gi tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jim ji na jax jix aa' gu Dios”, gu' ji no' gu'x bhaamki'ñ gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pɨx jap kai'chdha', cham tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios. Na gu' no' pu'ñi cham tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix joi'gɨ'n gu jumaich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na ya' nɨi'ñ maaxik, ¿jax dhui tu' ka'm jup tɨgia' gu Dios na cham maax?

Gu' dhi'm aa' ji na pui'p xix jajoi'gɨ'nda' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham no' baabui' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, pui' nat jax ja'k xi chu daasak guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk nap kai'ch bo: “Gu jaroi' no' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, jum aa' na tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix joi'gɨ'nda' ɨp gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui.”

Gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na gu Jesuus jir di' guch Xoi'kam nat Dios bha joot, dhi' jɨ' pui' bam kai'chdha' na Dios jir Maraa'n. Ba' no' pui' bam tɨɨtɨ' na Dios bar Maraa'n, jum aa' nax ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja tɨtdada' gu jai' nam pui'p jir maamra'n gu Dios.

Ba' aach no'ch tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', jich a'm jum aa' nach jix ja joi'ndat tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nam gu'r maamra'n guch Gɨ'kora'.
Nañ mi' pui' xi jimda' na jɨ'k moo jax jix aa' gu Dios na ba' pui' bam kai'ch nañ tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Cham xijai ɨp nañ mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' nat jax tu dai, ni ku pai'x magooñi'.

Gio na gu' no'ñ sɨlhkam bar maraa'n gu Dios, cham tu' bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' iñ jia gu tu' nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, ni kuñ tu' bhaan ka xiñ ua'tulhdham ka', nañ gu' bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ba' cham jɨ'xdha' jax jiñ dhooda' gux buam jum duukam.

No'ñ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ dho siamri bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n na gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam Dios jir Maraa'n nat bha joot na ba' cham jax jiñ dhooda' gux buam jum duukam, na gu' bañ palhbui'ñchu'nda' gu Dios nañ ba' cham ka xiñ ua'tulhdham ka'.

Jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk guch Xoi'kam dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, suudai' kɨ'n jum bakuanak, gio mɨkkat na mɨt pai' dhuuk mua na mɨt sissapa kuruus ta'm, gɇ' jaax gu ɨ'ra'n. Dhi'ch ba' bhaan jix mat ka' na sɨlhkam ya' oilhimɨk. Bɨɨx gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' pui'x chu maat nat pu'ñim duu guch Xoi'kam, ba'm aa' nach jɨɨgi'ñdha' na pai' dhuuk pu'ñi ja'k jich jurtu'nka'.

Ba' pui' ji buusan nam baik pui'x chu maat nat sɨlhkam ya' ɇɇk guch Xoi'kam, pui' na jax gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', gio ba' gu suudai', gio ba' gu ɨ'ra'n ɨp. Ba' dhi' dhi bɨɨx baik xi chuut am nam pui' kai'ch nat sɨlhkam ya' ɇɇk ji guch Xoi'kam, ba'm aa' nach tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' no'm pui' ba tuch a'gi'ñ.

Na gu' ja'pni jia na jax ba' gu jaroi' no' ya'ni ja'p pai' kɨɨkat jax tuñ a'gi'ñ, nañ gu' joidham pɨx jix dhappaam jɨɨgi'ñdha' no' jax kai'ch. Gu' dhi' gi ba' na Dios jir ñio'ki'ñ, pu moo jano' ji nach joidham kɇɇji ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' no'm pui' ba tuch a'gi'ñ, nam gu' pui'ch chɨtdaidha' na guch Xoi'kam Dios jir Maraa'n nat bha joot bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam. Dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios gɇ'p jum duukam bhaan tu a'ga, cham tu' tu' palhɨɨp jup jum duukam.

Ba' gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na guch Xoi'kam sɨlhkam Dios jir Maraa'n nat bha joot, cham tu' iatda' ɨlhii'ñdha' no' jaroi' pui' ba tu a'gi'ñ. Gu' no' gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na Dios jir Maraa'n guch Xoi'kam, iatda' dho pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na bhaan tu a'ga na guch Xoi'kam jir Maraa'n nat bha joot bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, pui' ba' pɨx ba ji buusnia' nax iatbi' gu Dios.

Gu' gu Dios pui' tɨi ba tɨi ji na sap jich baidhika'x dhaam nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', ku gu' sap no'ch tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' ji buiñor gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam. No'ch gu' sap cham tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha', cham tu' dhoch baidhika'.

Na gu' dai gu jaroi' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Maraa'n gu Dios na ba' jimia'x dhaam na pai'p tu'ii'. No' gu' pu'ñi cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, dho gi gu' cham tu' jimia' ji, ya' pup bi'ya' na pai'r tu tulhiiñara'.

Ba' aapi'm jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka'ñ jaaduñ, na pim gu' aapi'm jimia'x dhaam na pim pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na pim gu' aapi'm bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nar Maraa'n gu Dios.

Na gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, dai gu Dios jach pɨx buiñor bax biiñak, nach gu'x maat nach kɇɇkɇ' nach pai' dhuuk soi'ch ɨlhdhat mu taanda' gu tu' nach a'm jum aa'nda', no'x maat na sɨlhkam jich a'm jum aa'.
Ba' dai nach pɨx tɨ nɨɨrda' na gui'ch makia' maa'n jimdam gu tu' nach mu tañia' nach a'm jum aa', no'ch dho ji baabui' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na gui'ch kɇɇkɇ' nach jɨ'k tu' mu taanda' soi'ch ɨlhdhat.

Gioñ ba' moo ja'pnip xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ, no' pim maadɨt nɨi'ñ gu jax chu'm jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na cham pɨk mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', no' gu' pui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, tu daañxi'ñdha' pim buiñor gu Dios na tu uañdha' gu ua'tulhdharga'n na ba' cham ka tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk. No' gu' pu cham ka tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, dho gi gu' cham jɨ'xdha' tu uañdha' ji gu Dios, sia ku pim aapi'm tɨi tu daañxi'ñ buiñor na tu uañdha' gu ua'tulhdharga'n, na gu' pu cham pai' soi'm ɨlhii'ñdha', ba' dai na ba tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk.

Na gu' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, tu' nach pɨx bhaan bach ua'tulhdha' ji bo, ku ba' gu' no'ñ moo tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam soi'ñ ɨlhii'ñ, tuñ uañdha' ji gu Dios guñ ua'tulhdhara', ba' cham tu' kañ chulhiiñchuda' gatuuk.
Gu' ba' gu jaroi' no' Gɨ'korga'n ba iim gu Dios, cham ka joojoi'ñdha' nam ua'tulhi'ñdha', na gu' palhbui'ñchu'nda' guch Xoi'kam na ba' cham mai'chia' gux buam jum duukam.

Aach nach jɨ'k moo ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, Dios buiñor jup tui'dhi' ich, na gu'ch a'm tɨ nɨidhim. Gu' ba' gui' nam jɨ'k tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ guch Xoi'kam nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, dhi' dai bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨk gu ja'ook.

Aach nach gu' bax maat gu sɨlhkam Dios na jaroi'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, nat gu' bach mattuda gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam nat bhammɨ dɨr bha joot jix dhaam na pu'ñi ya'ch aagi'ñdha' na jax jir tu'm kam guch Gɨ'kora'. Pui' kuch ba' aach xib dai guch Xoi'kam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' bhɨichu' na jax jix aa', nach gu' bax maat nar di' gu sɨlhkam Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam, gio nax bhaai' nach baidhika' gatuuk jix dhaam ja'k nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.
Dai gu Dios japim ba' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' jiñ jaaduñ. Cha'pim mu ja'k ja daanda' gup duñiixim didios. Ja'pniñ ba' pɨx jam guguuxi'ñ.

Mɨjɨ ja'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim jɨ'k joidham maap jum jumpadat tu daan buiñor gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' tu' ka'm nɨidhat, nañ gu' aañ joidham jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt aapi'm jam bui xi jam joi'gɨ'n bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Bɨɨx siañ bɨɨm jix bhai'm taatɨt xi jam joi'gɨ'n am gu ya' kam jiñ jaaduñ nam pui'p kaichgɨt guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'.

Ba' aach ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham jɨ'xdha' mɨk ka bua' dhi' nach tu' bax maat xib, nach gu' bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na dhi'r sɨlhkam, cham tu' nar iatda'. Pui' kuch ba' xib joidham jix bhai' bach chaat aapi'm jam bui na pim pui' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jup ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ba' na pim cham tu' mɨk ka buppada' dhi' na pimɨt tu' ba maat.

Ja'pni ku ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' bɨɨma'n gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' am gammɨjɨ na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda', gam na pim ba' joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt, gio na pim ba' mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.

Joidham gɇ'kam kɨ'n jañich jix bhai'ñ ɨlh aapi'm jam bui na ñich pui' ba tɨ kai na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'.

Ba' aañ pui' tɨi jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim siamri cham jum kokdat, joidham japim xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' pɨx bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, na gu' pui' ja'k aagix jia gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na pim jax ba tɇ kɇɇ jano' dɨr na pimɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Cham tu' na dhi'r xibkam nañ aañ mui' ba tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ, pu dhi' pɨx ji na jax bhaan ba tum a'ga bɨjɨk dɨr.

Na gu' no'ñ moox aa' nañ tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora', jum aa' nañ bɨɨx mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' na jɨ'k moo jax jix aa', cham tu' nañ maa'n kap cham mi' pui' duiñchu'nda'. Ba' aach na chich pai' dhuuk dɨr tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui' puch chɨtda nach sap jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' gu jai', sia jaroi' na pɨx.

Moo pim xi chɨ nɨidhat jiñ jaaduñ, nam gu' xib jix io'm mui' nai' oipichu' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam pui' tu iatgidhim nat sap guch Xoi'kam cham tu' sɨlhkam maa'nkam jup jum duuk ya' ɇɇk, nam gu' dhi' cham tu'r jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam. Dhi' jim ba' bar di' gui' nam tu' sɨlhkam jix bhaamki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, pu cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ am gu' nat ya' ɇɇk, gu' chi ba' pɨk nam jup ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ cham pu chu't, ni ku pim cham ja kɇkɇɇda' gu dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam no'm jax jam iatgi'ñ. Jir maa'n na pim jax tu daa'ñchu'n na pim pai' jax ba bhɨichu' na ba' jam a'm tu bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam na saak tu jam makia' gu Dios. No' pimɨt gu' mu ja'k ji ja kai, dho gi gu' cham tu' jam makia' ji.

Ba' gu jaroi' no' jai' pup mi' xi baapsaim na dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' na pai' dhuuk tɨi sap pɨk ba' tu a'gada' gu Dios ñio'ki'ñ, cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios. Jɨɨ' ji no' daaxix kam pɨx tu a'ga, daipu' nat jax pɨx xi chu daasak guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk na ba' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios gio gu Maraa'n Jesuus.

Ba' no' jaroi' maadɨt mu ja'p pai' jimdat jam ki'aam jax ba tu jam a'gidhim, no' gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k kai'chim nat jax tu daasak guch Xoi'kam, sia ku gu' pui' kai'chim na Dios ñio'ki'ñ tu a'gim, cha'pim ja kɇkɇɇda', ni ku pim cham tu' pɨx jix bhai' ja tɨɨdai ja aichdha'.
Na gu' no' pimɨt aapi'm pɨx jix bhai' ja tɨɨdak ja aich, dhi' bhaan pui' bam kai'chdha' na pim jai'p ba ja bɨntatu' gui' nam jix bhaamut a'gada' guch Xoi'kam.

Bɨɨx aixim ji gu' nañ tɨi xi chu jam a'gidham jiñ jaaduñ dhi u'uan ta'm, gu' ji nañ gu' chi moo ja'xbui' pɨx mu tu jam ua'ñxidha' gu xib. Dɨɨlh jañ mu jim bhammɨ dɨr jam bui nañ ba' maaxik mi ja'p daibui jam aagi'ñdha' nañ jɨ'k jax ka xi chu jam a'gidham, nach ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k bɨɨx dhɨt joidham jix bhai' bach chaat ka'.

Ja'pniñ ba' pɨx mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ. Ba' mɨjɨ ja'p jam ñio'ki'ñ am gu ya' kam jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham no' pim jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ, nam gu'x bhai'm taat nax ja joi'ndat pui' ja a'm jup ba tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios na jax aapi'm.
Mu tum ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaduuñ Gaayo, nañ gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n xim joi'gɨ'n, nach gu' gook dɨt maa'n ñi'ook jup duukat jix bhai' maap jich dhaa'.

Aañ gammɨjɨm a'mkam tu daañchu'nda'ñ jaduuñ buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' nañ pui' tɨɨ'ntu'nda' nam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jum palhbui'ñchu'nda' na ba'x bhai' tum jimda' gu maaxik bhaan, nax bhai' ji buusnidha' gu tu' nap jax buada', ja'p na jax jix bhai' tum jim gum ii'mda' bhaan.

Joidham gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'ñ ɨlh jañich nam pui' ba tuñ a'gi'ñ jɨ'kchi guñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam bhɨjɨ dɨr jiim, nap sap joidham jir maa'n nap jax mi' pui' jim na jax pɨk ja'k moox aa' guch Gɨ'kora'

ja bɨɨm gu jai'ñ jaaduñ nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' gammɨjɨ pɨx joidham jix jɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' iñ nañ pui' xiñ aagɨt na pim jir maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' xi jiim na pim pai' jax ba bhɨichu'.

Aap dho gi tu' sɨlhkam jix biiñak kat buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' jir jix bhai'kam ji jiñ jaduuñ. Tɨɨ' nap gu' joidham jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja bua gu jai'ch jaaduñ nam mɨk dɨr ja'k tu jimda' nam mi' aajidha' jum ki'aam, nam mi ja'p tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.

Dhi'm ba' ya ja'p pui' ba tu a'gim nap jax jir tu'm kam jiñ jaduuñ, nap sap pu'ñi joidham jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja buada' na mɨt jɨ'kim bhai' ba ai jum ki'aam. Bɨɨx jam pui' bax chu maat gu ya' kam jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Ba' aañ jum guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ nap siamri pu'ñix bhai' xi ja bua't guñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan no'm bhai' aajim jum ki'aam, xi ja palhbuidhat ap kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha', na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.

Nam gu' dhi' tu juanaidhat jup tui'ñgɨda' jia buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ, cham tu' nam ja'p pɨx mu ja'p jiimda', na gu' sap cham jir am nam ja taanda' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha'.

Aach ba'ch a'm jum aa' nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nach pu'ñi xi ja palhbuidhat guch jaaduñ no'm jich aajim kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha' nam ba' kɨ'n jum guguuxdhatgɨda' nam tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' nach aach bɨɨx jup jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora' no'ch ja palhbui'ñ.

Maa'nnim jañich mɨjɨ tɨi tu ja ua'ñxi guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nañ ja aagi'ñ na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda'. Gu' ji nañ gu' ja'p tɇ kɇɇ nax bhaam gu Diotrepes nat mu bam aich gu u'uan, panaas ku gɇ'kam jum taat. Tɨix aa' nam dɨɨlh kaichgɨda' gɨt guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, pui' ku ba' cham aa' nañ aañ ya' dɨr jax jup ka ja tɨtdada' guñ jaaduñ, na gu' tɨix aa' na ja daam kɨɨka' gɨt.

Kuñ ji gu' aañ siamri xi aagi'ñdha' ji nañ pai' dhuuk mu jimda' na cham bhai' na pui' ja'k tu jimda', na gu' dhi' cham tu'r am buiñor gu Dios. Gio gu' bɨɨx aixim jich a'ga bɨɨx nach jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ ya ja'p buiñor guch Xoi'kam, sia ku cham jir pui', na pui' pɨx jich buixi'ñ na xich bhaamkidhat. Gio ja'p jup tɇ kɇɇ iñ na sap cham jɨ'xdha' ja tɨbiaptuda' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam mɨk dɨr mi' tɨi aajidha' kia'mi'ñ nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gidha' guch Xoi'kam. Piam no'm jai' dhɨt gu mi' kam jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham tɨix ja tɨbiaptudak, ja soo'mchulhi'ñka'. Ba' no't jaroi' maadɨt xi ja tɨbiaptuda, pu mai' ardimia' sap mi' dhɨr nam pai' tu daanda'. Ja'pni ja'k dho pɨx kaidha'.

Ba' aap jiñ jaduuñ cham pu chu't. Jix bhai'p xi chu jimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora' cham tu'p jum buixdhat sia kum jai' jax jup tu jim. Na gu' cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' jia saak gu Dios gu jaroi' no'x buam pɨx tu jim na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, jɇɇ' ji gu jaroi' na joidham jix bhai' xi chu jimda' na ba' joidham bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha'.

Gio guñ jaduuñ Demetrio pui' joidham jup kaidha', bɨɨx pɨx jix bhai' aa' am, jup kai'ch am na sap joidham jir jix bhai'kam. Tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ iñ dho nar sɨlhkam na jax kaidha', nañ gu'x maat na gui' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', nap jax bax maat jiñ jaduuñ.
Ja'xbui'ñ pɨx mu tum ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ. Bɨɨx aixim ji gu' nañ mui' tɨi xi chum ua'ñxidham kat, ji na gu' chi moo ja'xbui' pɨx gu xib.
Dɨɨlh jañ mu jim nañ mum paxiarmɨra'ñ jaduuñ mu nap pai' kio, muñ ba' moo bam aagi'ñdha' dho gi ji ba' nañ jɨ'k jax ka xi chum a'gidham.

Ja'pniñ dho ba' pɨx mu tum ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ. Moo gɨt ba' joidham gammɨjɨ pɨx jix jɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' ap. Ba' ya' dɨr mum ñio'ki'ñ am gum jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan no'p jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ, gio aañ ya' dɨr mɨjɨp ja ñio'ki'ñ gu mu ja'p kam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam jax jum ɨlhii'ñ, nap ba' mi' dhɨr jiñ a'mkam ja ñio'kdha'.

Aañ Juudas nañ jir ja'nni'ñ gu Santiago gio nañ jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan mu ja'p na pim jax tu oi'dha' na jɨ'k xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no' pim siamri mɨjɨ ja'p pai'x bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ.
Moo gɨt ba' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat xi jam joi'gɨ'nda' gu Dios na pim ba' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm pɨx jup tui'ka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, gam na pim xim jajoi'gɨ'nda'.

Bɨjɨk dɨr jañ mɨjɨ tɨi xi chu jam ua'ñxidham ka'ñ jaaduñ, nañ tɨi bhaan xi chu jam a'gidham ka' nat jɨ'k tu' jax dhuu guch Xoi'kam jano' nat tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' nach ba' cham kach chulhiiña' gatuuk. Ku ba' gu' xib jumai bhaan xi chu jam a'gidham iñ ji, cham tu' dhi'. Xib gu' dai ji nañ pui' tɨi xi jam tɨɨdam dhi u'uan ta'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim mui' xim guguuxdhatgɨda' na pim jix biiñak kat bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', nat jich chianɨk nach saak mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' na jɨ'k xich joi'ndat jich a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim.

Tɨix buam jiñ aa' iñ gu' na mɨt bhɨjɨ ba ji kai'ñcha jam bui gui' nam tu iatgi'ñ, nam pui' kai'ch na sap cham tum aa' nach tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam, na gu' sap pur cham tu'. Gam nam pui' kai'chɨt oipo na sap cham jɨ'xdha'ch chulhiiñchuda' gu Dios sia kuch jix buam tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, na gu' sap gui'r jix bhai'kam, cham jɨ'xdha' na moop ba jich chulhiiñchuda'. Ku ba' gu' dhi' am tɨ'ñchoka' am ji nax io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' guch Gɨ'kora', na mɨt gu' giilhim gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor. Pui' ja'k tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ mi' nat pai' tum ua'nak bɨjɨk na jax ja dooda' gu pu'ñi chu'm gu ja'tkam. Cham jir am gu' gu pui' nam jax kai'chɨt oipo bhaan xim iatat nam sap pɨk ba' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nat gu Dios jix ja joi'ndak ja palhbui, gu' na jax dhui pɨx bhaan cham maatɨ' ka' ji nam cham kɨɨgalhdhat jix bhaamut aa' guch Xoi'kam, gam nam bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.

Na gu' dhi' ja'pni jia nat jax tu ja dooda bo bɨjɨk guch bopxi kat. Pu kani gɨt nañ moo palhɨɨp bhaan xi chu jam a'gidha'. Jano' nam bhammɨ dɨr tu ja juantu'nda' Ejipto gu Israel kam ja'tkam, gu Dios ja palhbui na mɨt ba' bha bubua yammɨ dɨr ja'k Kanaan. Yammɨ dɨr nat ja aichdhak ba' moo dai nat jup ba ja koi gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm tɨɨ na jax tɨix aagat. Dhi' pu'ñip tu ja dooda'.

Gio ja'pni ɨp na jax gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios jano' na mɨt gɇ'kam kɨ'n jum ua'tulh buiñor, na mɨt dai dɨɨlh gɇ'gɇrkam ba jim ɨlh, gio na mɨt pui' ba ji chu duu nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ. Jaiñ nat cham tu' tu ja uañ gu Dios, pu moo jano' ji nat tu chia nam ja buuprai bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n mɨjɨ ja'p ka xi ja kuupa' mi' maa'n kap na pai'x io'm jix chu tukgam, jano' juugɨt na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na xi ja aa'ñdhai na mɨt tu' bhaan cham am bua na ba' moo mu ja'k xi ja iabu' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.

Gio ja'pni ɨp na pim jax bax maat nat tu ja dooda bɨjɨk gui' nam mu oi'ñkat Sodooma, gio ja'pni ja'k na pai' Gomorra tɨ tɨɨ', gio mi' dhɨr ja'p bɨɨx xikoolh na jax a'lhich jir kikcham kat, nat tai kɨ'n ja koi bo gu Dios nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha'. Pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim tu buada' am na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñdha', gam nam giilhim mui' ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu u'uub, gam sia dɨɨlh dai chichio'ñ. Gammɨjɨ nam jax aajidha' nam pu tu buichgɨda', ja'pni kai'ñkam ba' ja mɨi'ñ gu Dios, na mɨt gu' giilhim gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor. Sia xib jam dho pui mɨɨjim mu na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai na cham jɨ'xdha' tukia', ba' dhi' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' am. Dhi'ch ba' bhaan tɨ'ñchoka' xib na pu'ñip tuch jimia' aach no'ch jax dhuuk cham tu' ka'm tɨgia' gu Dios.

Ba' dhi' dhi ja'tkam nañ jaroi' ja aa' na mɨt bha ja'p maakam ba ji jam iatgi, pu'ñi ja'k jup tu ja dooda', na mɨt gu' pui' gɇ'p bam ua'tulh bɨxchu' bhaan, gam nam pui' kai'chɨt oipo na cham tu'r jich Gɇ'kam tuk guch Xoi'kam. Gio gu' cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ am pui' xi kai'chɨt, daman tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ am gui' nam ya ja'p jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Sia gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios gampai' pɨx ja bia' am, dai nam giilhim xi ja ai'chuxdhat, nam gu' ja'p moo tu' nam pɨx bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka'.

Cham pui' na gu Migial gui' nar nobii'ñ gu Dios, na cham pai' moo ja'p pu'ñi pɨk gɇ'kam jum taat sia kur ja gɇ'kam tuk bɨɨx na jɨ'k noonbi'ñ gu Dios. Jaiñ na cham pai' jax xi chɨtda gu ja'ook dɨɨlh gɇ'kam jum taatɨt na jax ɨlhii'ñ jano' nat joot gu Dios na baabuidhai yaaspa' gu tukga'n gu Moisees nat ba muu. Jup tɨtda pɨx soi'm ɨlhdhat: “Dho gu' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' ji nam aagi'ñdha' na jax jup ɨlhii'ñ. Aañ nañ gu'r tujuandam tugi'ñ pɨx, cham bia' iñ nañ jax jum tɨɨda'.”

Gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam ja'pji nam moo pu cham ja jur bia', ja'p pɨx ji nam moo gɇ'gɇrkam jim taatɨt bɨɨx aixim kai'chdha' nam sia dɨɨlh pu cham maatɨt kɇɇ nam jax kai'ñkam jup kai'chdha'. Sɨlh pɨx nam gammɨjɨ pup kai'chidha' nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha', ja'p pɨx ji buan am na jax gu sasoi' na ni jɨ'x kum ja jur bia'. Dhi' ba' pui' pɨx ba ji buusan nam dɨɨlh gaa'ñchu' nam jax dhui mu ja'k suulhgia' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.

Tɨix buam jiñ aa' iñ ja a'mkam, na gu' dhi' cham bhai' tu ja jimia', nam gu' buam pɨx tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora'. Pui' ja'k jup xi chu jim am gu' nat jax tu jii bɨjɨk gu Kayiin nat mua gu sɨpdhi'ñ. Gam nam bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam bhaan mui'x mai'chik gu tuumiñ, ja'p nat jax tu jii ɨp bɨjɨk gui' na Balaam jup tɨɨgich, na pu'ñi dai tuumiñ mui'x mai'chim kat. Ba' dhi' saalhiom dai na ja'pni pɨx ba tu ja dooda' nat jax jum duu bɨjɨk gui' na Koree tɨɨgich, nat bhaa gu dɨbɨɨr nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n bam ua'tulh buiñor gu Dios.

Ja'p chi alh moox xi'ɨraam no'm jai' mɨjɨmmɨp xi dharaa pai' na pim tu piastatda' daich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na pim jix bhai'm taat ka' buiñor gu Dios. Nam gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ, ni nam jix maatɨt tu xi'ɨ'ra, gɇ'gɇr bha chu koi'mɨi am nam jɨ'x ɨlhii'ñdha', nam jax dhui pɨx ba' mi' ba jam ia'ñdha' nam jax jir tuutu'm no' pim gan ja bɨɨm tu kua'. Nam gu' mu dɨr bha ja'k pu cham xi jam joi'gɨ'nda', dai dɨɨlh pɨx nam xim joi'gɨ'n. Dhi' ja'pni pɨx ji buan am jia na jax no' tɨi pɨx jix chuk sai'chu' gu tɨbaa', gu' ji no' gu' cham bha duuk, dai na pɨx ji jim gammɨjɨ pai' na ja'k ua'ka' gu jɨbɨɨlh. Piam ja'pni ɨp na jax gu jax chu'm ɨ'ɨɨx no' cham i'bhai'ñchar sia kut tɨi bam ai na pai' dhuuk iibhai'ñchai ba bhaaya' gɨt. Ja'p ji buusan nam pu ba ko'iix dhi' dhi ja'tkam, nam gu' cham xiim bam tulhiiña'.

Gio ba' ja'pni ja'k pɨx jup ji buan am dhi' na jax gu gɇ' suudai' na giilhim bha sɨlh gu'ngukda' no'x jɨbɨɨr. Gu ja ua'tulhdhara' ba' ja'pni ɨp na jax gu tokso' na mi' dhɨr ja'p katka' bɨɨx suudai' jugii'ñ, jix ikoora' giox chanaara' na jax aa' gu pu chu'm, nam gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam giilhim bɨxchu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñ. Ja'pni pɨx jup ba ji buan am na jax gu chiichia' no'm gammɨjɨ pɨx pup jiim, na gu' dhi' ba ja bi'chulhdhix nam mummu ja iabu' maa'n kap na pai' giilhim jix io'm jix chukgam, nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.

Moo pu pui' ba kai'ch ji gu' gui' na Enok tɨɨgich na bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, na mɨk dɨr pa'r kuulsi'ñ gu Adaan, na sap jax tu ja jimia' gu dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, nap kai'ch: “Alh moo jootom bhai' ka jim gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' ja bɨɨm mui' cham daaxix kam gu noonbi'ñ

na bam aaya' na pai' dhuuk ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam nam tu jax buimɨi nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Ba' mi' dhɨr dai na ba ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam jɨ'k bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu buimɨi na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, gam gui' nam bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxdhat jix bhaamut a'gimɨi gu Dios.”

Ba' pu'ñi ja'k tu ja jimia' dhi' dhi ja'tkam nañ jaroi' bhaan tu a'ga, nam gu' giilhim buam pɨx tomaat na jax cham pui' ja'k aa' gu Dios. Jix bhai'x mat kam xim ɨlhii'ñdha' am gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt gampai' pɨx ja ɨlhdhat jix bhaamut ja aa'nda' am ba' gui' nam sɨlhkam tu a'gada' gu Dios ñio'ki'ñ pui' xi ja ai'chuxdhat nam cham tu' maat, nam sap ba' dai gui' pɨx mu ja'k ja kaichgɨda' gu ja'tkam. Jix bhai'm taat ka' am ba' no' mɨt mu ja'k ji ja kai, nam gu' mi' pɨx ja iatgi'ñdha'.
Tɨ'ñchokat japim jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam jax tu jam a'gidhimɨk gu noonbi'ñ gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam,

nam jup jam tɨtda bo na saak pu'ñi na pai' dhuuk ba miamlhia' na tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, mui' bhai' ji jai'chdhɨlhia' am gu ja'tkam nam pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim tu buada' nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha', gio gam nam bɨɨx aixim xi ja ai'chuxdhat tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' gui' nam bhaankamu'n tɨi tu a'gada' guch Gɨ'kora'.

Dho gu' dhi' jim ba' bar di' nam bha ja'p ba oipo jam bui nam ba xi jam kokdhichdhak na pim joidham maap maa'n ñi'ook jup duukat kax biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim sap ba'm jɨ'dɨlhkadai mu ja'k ji ja bɨnta' na pim jai' pui' ja'k jup ba tu jimda' nam jax tu jim dɨɨlh. Pui' kai'ñkam pɨx jam ba' maakam ba xi jam iatgidhak, na gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam cham tu' ja a'm tajaañix jia gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pui' ja'k ja jurtudim nam ba' xi jam iatgidhak, dɨɨlh pɨx ji nam gɇ'gɇrkam jim taatɨt.

Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, cha'pim ja kɇkɇɇda' no' mɨt jax ba ji jam iatgi dhi' dhi ja'tkam. Dios japim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak ka' mi' pui' jiimɨt na pim pai' jax ba bhɨichu'. Gammɨjɨ pim tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios na ba' jam aagi'ñdha' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda'.

Joidham japim tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' pɨx na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa', dai ji na pim pɨx tɨ nɨɨrda' jano' na pai' dhuuk bha jim gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, gui' na jaroi'x io'm xich joi'gɨ'n, na ya' dɨr jich baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.
Jix ja joi'ndat japim jix bhai'p xi ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam chakui bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam ba' maatɨi jum biiñkada' buiñor.

Gio jai' dhɨt nam chakui pai' kɇɇ gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jix ja joi'ndat japim xi ja aagi'ñdha' nam jax ja'k duñia' nam ba' cham mu ja'k ka bhɨichgɨda' na pai' giilhim gɇ' mɨim gu tai, nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha'. Ku pim ji gu'x bhai' ji nam cham ja'kbui' kat mu ja'k jam bhɨichdha' nam jax ja'k tu jim dɨɨlh nam giilhim bɨɨx aixim bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñ. Ja'p ji buusnia' na cham bhaai' na pim gan da'ngɨda' gu ja jajannulh no' mi ja'p pai' daraa na cham jam ia'ñdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara', na gu' giilhim gɇ' mi bhi'sap.

Ku ba' gu' gu Dios jich Xoi'kam dɨɨlh jam palhbuidha' ji na pim jax dhui cham gai suulhgia' tu' na pɨx bhaan, gui' nat jaroi' bha jimɨɨk tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara'. Gui' tu jam uañi'ñka' gammɨjɨ no' pim soi'm ɨlhii'ñ buiñor, na pim ba' cham u'ua'tulhdhix ka' jano' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya', ba' dai na pim joidham jix bhai'm taattugɨt ba oidha' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam.

Dai gu Dios jach ba' pɨx buiñor tu daanda' gammɨjɨ nat jaroi' xich joi'ndak jich boosolh mu dɨr na pai'r tu tulhiiñara', na gu' gui'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n ɨp, tɨɨ' nat bhach joochxi gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam na ya'ch palhbuidha' nach jax dhui cham mai' ka suulhgia'. Gammɨjɨch ba' moo tu daanda' buiñor sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ja'pni ba' pɨx tui'ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm, ya'ch aagi'ñ gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam nach jɨ'k ba kaichu' na jax tum duñia' gatuuk, pui' na jax ja'k jup mattu'n gu Dios. Ba' guch Xoi'kam mu joot maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios mummu buiñor gu tujuandam tugi'ñ Juan na sap ba' mattuda' na jɨ'k jax tum duñia' gatuuk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu Juan pui'p tu ua'na bɨɨx nat jɨ'k jax tɨ tɨɨ nat pai' dhuuk mattuda guch Xoi'kam bhaankamu'n gu Dios na tu' jax dhuñia'. Cham pai' maa'n kap tu ua'na na dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ, daipu' nat jax pɨx tɨ tɨɨ gio nat jax tɨ kai.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k tu jiñkaidhai mi' pui' ba jimia' na jɨ'k jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, bar mia'n gu' na pai' dhuuk pui' tum kuugalhdha' na jɨ'k jax ya' tu daaxix.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Aañ nañ Juan tɨɨ' mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan mu ja'p xijum gok kap na pim pai' jax jum jumpadat tu daan buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' na Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', nañ mu jam ñio'ki'ñ no' pim jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ. Gammɨjɨ gɨt ba' xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio na ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch ka', gam na gio bhai'p jim gatuuk, gio ba' gux xijum gook jix dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mda' nam bhammɨp tu'ii' sonpan na pai' daa,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: gio ba' gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam ɨp gui' nat duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, na xib jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa ja bui bɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Guch Xoi'kam gɇ'kam kɨ'n xich joi'gɨ'n jia, pui' kut ba' bha jimɨɨk tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' kɨ'n gu ɨ'ra'n nat jaax kuruus ta'm, na ba' pu'ñi duuji tuch uañdha' gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr pui' ja'k duu na gatuuk gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n jich dharsa' nach ja sɨlhka'nda' gu jai', gio ba' nach bhai' ba tu juanda' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'. Jaiñ na jax pɨk joidham. Gɇ'kamtu'nda' pim guch Xoi'kam, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam sia nar pai' dhuuk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam, tɨbaa'ñ cha'm bhaan bhɨjɨmmɨni dhɨr bhai' ji chɨmñia'. Bɨɨx tɨgia' am gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n kam, sia gui' na mɨt tulhiiñchudak sissapa kuruus ta'm jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk. Ba'x buam jum ɨlhdhai bhai' ji susuañia' am tɨi gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor nam ba tɨgia' na bhai' ba jimda', nam gu' pui' xim aa'nda' na mɨt cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'. Kani gɨt na pui' tum duñia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gui' nax io'm jir gɇ'kam, na bɨjɨk dɨr pur Dios, gio na ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ bar pu chu'm ka', gam na saak gio bhai'p jimda', ja'pni kai'ch: “Aañi' nañ bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, jup tu duu ñich bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch. Aañ ba' giop tu kuugalhdha', dai ba' aañ gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka'.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Aañ pui'p jir jam jaduuñ guch Xoi'kam bhaan, nañ gu' aañ pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, pui' kuñ ba' mɨjɨ tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ, pui' bhammɨp aaya' iñ buiñor gu Dios na pim pai' ja'k bhɨichu' aapi'm. Gio ja'xbui' pui'p jiñ chulhiiñ iñ bɨxchu' bhaan na jax aapi'm, gu' ji na gu' guch Xoi'kam jiñ palhbuidhat jiñ guguuxi'ñ nañ jax dhui nakga'. Xib jañ yammɨ dɨr ja'k jup tu'ii' suudai' ɨraab na pai' alhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na Patmos tɨ tɨɨ', na mɨt jiñ dhaagɨk yammɨ dɨr ja'k jiñ aich gu Rooma kam nam cham aa' nañ bha ja'p tu a'gada' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'nnim maa'n tumiiñku ta'm nañ ka tu daan buiñor gu Dios, gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'. Ba' mɨjɨ dɨr ja'p pai' bhai' ji chum ñio jiñ bɨɨbhi' dhɨr jix io'm gɇ' kɨ'n, ja'xbui' na jɨ'x tu kuu gu kuichdhakar,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: jup tum kai'ch: ―Tu ua'na' ap u'uan ta'm bɨɨx nap jɨ'k jax tɨ tɨgia' nañ tɨm tɨɨ'ñchoda', mu ja joochxidha'p ba' gui' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ mu ja'p xijum gok kap nam pai' jax jum jumpada' nam tu daan jiñ bui na Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', pui' na jax mu na pai' Eepeso tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' jumai mu ja'k jap jup tu jootsa' na pai' Esmirna tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' moo jumai mu ja'k ɨp na pai' Peergamo jup tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' moo mu ja'k ɨp na pai' Tiatira tɨ tɨɨ', gio pui' na jax mu ja'k na pai' Sardiis jup tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' moo mu ja'k Piladelpia ɨp, gio ba' mu ja'k Laodiisia.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' na ñich pai' dhuuk mui' ji chɨ tɨɨ nañ jix maachim na jaroi' ba' mɨjɨ pai' dhɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ, mi ja'p tuut xijum gook gui' na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir nar jix uam totbikdam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' ɨrban ba' kɨɨk maa'n gu maa'nkam, pui' kam tu'ii' na gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam. Tɇb jum tɨ'ii'ñ gu jannulh, dɨɨrap xi ju', gio ba' maa'n gu bhispara' bha ja'p jup xi bur bhaasturam na pui'p jir jix uam totbikdam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu kuupa'n joidham jix chuam maaxi'ñ ja'p na gu jabook kɨb, piam ja'p na jax gux chua bapoo, gio gu buupui'ñ gɇ'gɇr mɨmɨim ja'p na tai.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio gu tootna'n jix io'm jix mɨmɨim ja'p na jax tui'ka' gu baiñum no' tai chɨr baaxich, na giilhim bax mɨim ka' nax io'm bax choiñ ka'. Ba' na xi chu a'ga, giilhim gɇ'x kaidha', am tɨroon, ja'p na jax kai'chdha' gu suudai' pai' no' gɇ' mɨr na pu'ñi am tɨroonda' na sasbakda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'pni kɨɨ'n dɨr ja daa' xijum gook gu chiichia', gio ba' na chiñi'ram dɨr busaak maa'n gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk. Gio gu buibsa'n giilhim jix o'jo' tanoor, ja'p na jax gu tanoolh no'x dhaam ba daa.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ na ñich pu'ñi tɨɨ, mukxi kam jañich panaas mi ja'p pu gɨi tootnaram na ñich tu kaam, na ñich gu' giilhim jix choo'n. Ba' gui' bhai' xiñ dhaagɨk kɨ'n gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam nobii'ñ jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Aap moo cham toodon ka'ñ jaduuñ. Aañi' pɨx jir di' nañ bɨjɨk dɨr pu jai'ch na ñich jup tu duu bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch. Aañ ba' giop tu kuugalhdha', dai aañ ba' gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Aañ pɨx jir di' na ñich duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr. Ba' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k jañ gammɨjɨ pu ba duaka', cham jañ pai' dhuuk ka mukia'. Aañ ba tu daam kɨɨk ba' xib mu nam pai'm tulhiiñ gu koi'ñga'n, ja'p ji buusan nañ aañ ba ua' ba' xib gui' na kɨ'n jum kukpio'k gu ki'ñgob na pai' dhɨr mu tum bapkɨ, cham tu' kia' gu ja'ook.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ nap tu ua'na' bɨɨx nap jɨ'k jax tɨ nɨi'ñ xib gio nap jɨ'k jax ka tɨ tɨgia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' xim aagi'ñdha' iñ na jax jir jum duukam dhix xijum gook chiichia' nañ ja daa' gio dhix xijum gook na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir nap ya' nɨi'ñ. Dho dhix xijum gook chiichia', jir di' am guñ chujuandam tuk gui' nam mu ja'p bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu'kat ja aagi'ñ gux bhai'm kai'chdham jiñ ñi'ook gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Gu' ba' dhix xijum gook na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ mu ja'p xijum gok kap nam pai' jax jum jumpa'n nam jiñ dhaanda' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Mu tu ua'ñxidha' ap guñ chujuandam tuk na mu tu juan Eepeso jiñ a'mkam ja bui gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ bui. Ja'pnip ja'k mi chu daasa': “Gui' na ja daa' gux xijum gook chiichia', na mi' ɨrban kɨɨk na pai' xikoolh tuut gui' na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir nar jix uam totbikdam, nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, ja'pni kai'ch:

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua aapi'm na pim jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, gio na pim jɨ'k tu' jax bua't oipo. Jix maat iñ ɨp na pim pui' na pim jax bax biiñak aañ jiñ bui, sia ku pim bɨxchu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ, gam nam bɨɨx aixim jam tɨtdada' gui' nam jix buam tomaat. Siax bhai'x maat iñ na pim cham ja kɇkɇɇ gui' nam maakam tu iatgi'ñ mi ja'p oipot pui' xim tɨɨtgɨt nam aañ jir jiñ chujuandam tuk, na pim gu' bax maat nam bhaan pɨx tu iatgi'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix maat iñ ɨp nar maa'n na pim jax tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ bui sia kum giilhim jam tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'tkam na pim bañ kaichu'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Maa'n kap dai cham pui' ka duiñchu' pim nañ jax jix aa', cham tu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tu' ka'm kañ ñɨi'ñ japim, ja'p na jax moo jano' na pimɨt jax tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jiñ bui na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat. Xib ampɨx pui'x oodam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ japim jiñ bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ xib na pim gio soi'p jum ɨlhdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨt bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, na pim joidham tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Piam ku pim gu' cham pu tu duñia' nañ jax jam tɨtda, ja'k bhɨɨya' iñ gui' na tu jam bɨ'ñxi'ñ na pim ba'x chu maax kɨr jup tu'ii', ba' pui'x chukgam kɨr ji bi'ya' pim, nañ gu' xi' pɨk cham ka xi ñakgaim na pim jax tu jim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Siamri dho maa'n kap mi' pui' duiñchu' pim nañ jax ɨlhii'ñ aañ, na pim cham ja kaichgɨt pui' ja'k jup tu bua nam jax tu jim gui' nam Nikolaitas jum tɨɨtɨ', pui' cham jup ja kɨɨgalhi'ñ japim na jax aañ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu jɨ'k nam kɇɇji mi' pui' jimia' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daan jiñ bui gui' nam bañ kaichu', ja baidhika' iñ bhammɨ ja'k na pai' joidham jix chu abhaar, na bɨxchu' bha tɨ ɨ'xchix. Ja chiñia' iñ ba' nam jugia' gu bhaidha' na bhai'p kɨɨk nam kɨ'n gammɨjɨ pu ba duduaka'x jɨjɨkgɨm, sia gui' nam nakgair maa'n nam jax jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui sia kut jax bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam bhai' jam daam ji chu jii, nam gu' bhammɨ ja'k gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Mu ja'k jap jup tu ua'ñxidha' gu jumaiñ chujuandam tuk na mu ja'k jup tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Esmirna tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Ja'p jap tɨɨda': “Gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio na gammɨjɨ pu bax jai'ch ka' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, nat maa'nnim duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt tɨi mua, nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, ja'pni kai'ch:

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim giilhim bɨxchu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ mi ja'p na pim jax tu oi'dha', gam na pim gampai' pɨx tu'ii' na pim cham jir tu bia' kam. Ku ba' gu' aapi'm cham jax jum aa'nda' ji, na gu' kam aajim na pai' dhuuk jam a'm tu bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam, sia ku pim gu' xib cham tu' bia'. Jix maat iñ ɨp nam xi jam bhaamkidhat giilhim jam a'ga gui' nam pui'm aa' na gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu Dios, nam gu'r Judea kam, nam gu' paa gi mi' pui'p jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios pui' xi kai'chɨt. Na jax ja'k jix aa' gu ja'ook dho gi gu' jɇɇ' ji, pui' xi chu buim am dho na jax ja tɨɨdaim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aapi'm cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt gammɨjɨ mui' xix biiñak ka' buiñor gu Dios. Cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' sia kut bɨɨx aixim jix buam bhai' ji chu jam jii. Xi ñakoo'nda' pim sia no' mɨt bhai' ji jam tulhiiñchuda gu ja'tkam bhaankamu'n gu ja'ook, na gu' jax chu'm tanoolh pui' ja'k ja jurtuda' nam jam tulhiiñchudai jam kuupa', ku gu' dhi' na bhaan pɨx matgilhia' ji no' pim moox biiñak jiñ bui piam ku gu' cham. Gio gu' cham tu' mui' tanoolh jum tulhiiña' pim, mambhɨɨx tanoolh pɨx. Ba' no' pimɨt nakoo sia ku pim pu'ñi giilhim jum tulhiiñ, jam makia' iñ gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam nar jam namki' ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Na gu' gu jɨ'k nam kɇɇji mi' pui' jimia' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daanda' gui' nam bañ kaichu', cham tu'm tulhiiña' am gatuuk mu nam pai'm tulhiiña' gui' nam cham tu' ka'm tɨgia' gu Dios.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' guñ chujuandam tuk na mu tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Peergamo tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Ja'pnip mi chu daasa' u'uan ta'm: “Ja'pni kai'ch gui' na chiñi'ram dɨr busaak gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk:

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix maat iñ na pui' na pim jax bax biiñak bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jiñ bui sia ku mi' tu daam kɨɨk gu ja'ook na pim pai' oi'dha', ni ku pim cham tu' bhaan jax jum aa' sia kut mua gu ja'ook guñ chujuandam tuk Antiipas na mi' pui' jimdat nañ jax jix aa', na cham aa' na mi ja'p tu a'gada' gux bhai'm kai'chdham jiñ ñi'ook, na gu' mi' kia'mi'ñ tɨ ɨlhii'ñ na jɨ'x Peergamo tɨ tɨɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai maa'n kap moo cham jiñ ko'raar na pim jax ja'k duiñchu', na pim gu' jai' dhɨt pui' ja'k tu bua nat jax tu jii bɨjɨk gui' na Balaam tɨɨgich, nax ɨxchuixim aagi'ñ gu Balak na jax ja'k duñia' nam ba'm ua'tulhdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam na cham ja kɨɨgalhi'ñdha'. Pui' ku mɨt ba' saalh pui' mu ja'k ji ja bɨɨnat gu mi' kam ja'tkam na pai' kio gu Balak, jai'p ba tu daanda' am ja bui gu ja didios tuk jup duñiixim, gam nam tu kua'da' gu koi' nam ja tɨtki'ñdha' gu ja didios tuk, gio ba' nam jix bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu mi' kam u'uub. Ku ba' gu' gu Balaam ji nat tu'm da'p duu.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio jai' dhɨt dhi' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam pui' ja'k pɨx iam jup tu daa'ñchu' nam jax tu jim gui' nam Nikolaitas jum tɨɨtɨ'. Dhi'jani bhaan jañ ba' pui' kai'ch na pim cham tu' bɨɨx pui' tu kuugalhdhim nañ jax jix aa'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ na pim siamri soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui' xi jimɨi nañ jax jix aa', ja'p japim xi dhui na pim jax ja'k tu jim xib. Piam ku gu' cham, mu jimɨiñ jam tulhiiñchuda' jam bɨndai dhi' nam Nikolaitas jum tɨɨtɨ'. Ja'p ji buusnia' nañ jam kooda' kɨ'n dhi tɇb jiñ kuxiir nañ chiñ am dɨr busaak.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'pni ku pim ba' siamri mi' pui' xi jimɨi nañ jax jam tɨtda, na gu' no' pimɨt moo mi' pui' xi jii nañ jax jix aa' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt sia ku pimɨt bɨxchu' bhaan bhai' jim tulhii, aañ bhammɨ ja'k jam aichdhaix dhaam jam makia' gux kɨɨ' koi' na manaa jum tɨɨtɨ' na pim kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Gio ba' moo gu a'lhich ko'kmarak joodai sopkoñxim ɨp na joidham jix chooto na bhaan mi ua'ñixchu'nda' na pim jax ja'k ba tɨɨ'ka' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k. Cham jaroi' mat ka', dai aapi'm dɨɨlh. Gu ba' no' jaroi' maadɨt jix kaim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daanda' gui' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ja ua'ñxidha' gu Tiatira oi'ñkam nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, buiñor guñ chujuandam tuk na mi' tu juan ja bui, na ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha'. Ja'pnip ja'k mu tu ua'ñxidha': “Ja'pni kai'ch gui' na gɇ'gɇr mɨmɨim gu buupui'ñ, gio ba' gu tootna'n nax mɨmɨim ja'p na jax gu baiñum toiñdhichdhix kam:

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua mi' na pim pai' oi'dha'. Jix maat iñ ɨp na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix biiñak aañ jiñ bui, gam na pim joidham jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja bua't ja palhbui'ñ gu jai' kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aa'. Gio xib joidham bax chu joi'gɨ'n japim, cham tu' pui' na bɨɨpɨ' dɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ji na gu' cham jiñ ko'raar na pim jai' dhɨt pui' ja'k jup tu daa'ñchu' na jax tu jimdat bɨjɨk gu ubii na Jesabeel tɨɨgich, pui' kai'chdha' pim na pim Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gada' ja'p na jax kai'chdha' gui'. Paa gip jir sɨlhkam, pu cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ japim gu Dios pui' xi kai'chɨt. Tɨɨ' na pim jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppo gu u'uub, gam na pim tu kua' gu koi' na tɨkdhix kat gu didios jup duñiixim, pui' ɨp na jax ja'k tu buada' bɨjɨk gu Jesabeel. Dhi'jani bhaan jañ ba' cham tu'x bhai'ñ chaat jam bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx gui' nam pu'ñi ja'k tu jam a'gi'ñdha' na jax tu jimdat gu Jesabeel, tɨix ja joi'ndat ja nɨɨrka' iñ nam soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' gɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios, bɨɨx sia aapi'm na pim jɨ'k pui' ja'k ba tu jim. Gu' ji na pim gu' cham tu' soi' xim ɨlhdhak buiñor gu Dios, pui' na pim jax bam ua'tulhi'ñ, na pim jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppo gu u'uub, gam na pim tu daan ja bui gu didios jup duñiixim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu xib na tu' jax tui'ka', jam tulhiiñchuda' iñ ko'kdai' kɨ'n, cham jax bua sia pimɨt jai' dhɨt ma koi no' pimɨt cham nakoo. Ba' no' pim gu' sia cham soi'm ɨ'lhi'ñ buiñor gu Dios, dho gi ba' gu'x io'm ba jam tulhiiñchuda'ñ ji, no' gu'r maa'n na pim jax pui' ja'k tu jim nat jax chu jii gu ubii na Jesabeel tɨɨgich,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: nam ba' dhi' bhaan jix chotdon ka' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam mui' kap jum jumpadat tu daan, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jup tu ja jimia' no'm jai' pui' ja'k jup tu jim. Gio nam ba'x mat ka' nañ aañ bɨɨx jix mat ka' nam jɨ'k jax jum aa'nda' gu ja'tkam, gam nam jax tu buada', gio nam tu' jax jix dhuñiik ka'. Ba' bhaan jup ba machia' am ɨp nañ aañ tu maak na jax ja'k ja a'm bipio'da' gui' nam pu'ñi tu' pɨx ɨlhdhat cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k cham pui' ja'k tu jim na jax tu jimdat gu Jesabeel, cham jañ jam tulhiiñchuda', na pim gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k jup tu bua na jax tu bua't gui', na gu' dhi' ba' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' gɨt na pim pui'p kaichu' gu ja'ook na jax gui'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai nañ jam guguuxi'ñ na pim cham mɨk buppat gammɨjɨ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui jano' juugɨt nañ pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio no' pimɨt mi' pui' jii nañ jɨ'k jax jix aa', gam no' pim pu gammɨjɨx biiñak jiñ bui sia kut tu'x buam jum duukam bhai' jam daam ji jii, gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n jam darsa' iñ ja bui bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na pim ja sɨlhka'nda',

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ja'p na jax aañ nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n jiñ dhai guñ Gɨ'kora' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp gatuuk, jɨ'ma'n japim ja daada' ka' gu bapaiñum o'xia, aapi'm ba' ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na mɨt tu' bhaan cham am bua nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan, ba' ja'p ji buusnia' na pim ja jaisa' kɨ'n gu jam o'xia ja'p na bhi'ñ jaja'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' pu'ñi ja'k tu'm kɨ'n jam darsa' iñ na jax gu gɇ' chi'ɨɨ' na katukgab bha tɨssa'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu ba' gu jaroi' no' tu' sɨlhkam jix maachim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'ga gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpa'n gui' nam bañ kaichu'.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' guñ chujuandam tuk na mu ja'k jup tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Sardiis tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Ja'p jap tɨɨda': “Ja'pni kai'ch gui' na ja daa' xijum gook gu chiichia' gio gux xijum gook jix dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mda', nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba kaichu': Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua mu ja'p na pim pai' oi'dha'. Cham tu' mi' pui' jiim japim nañ jax jix aa', pui' xi kai'chɨt japim na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Dios, gu' paa gi tu' ka'm jup nɨi'ñ japim pui' xi kai'chɨt. Ba' dhi' ka daasaim na pai' dhuuk jam tulhiiñchuda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ku ba' gu' no' pimɨt moo soi'm ɨlh pu xib na kapbhai' xia'lhidhat kapup tu maaxilhim, cham tu' jam tulhiiñchuda' ji. Jix io'm japim mi' pui' xi jimia' na jax ja'k jix aa', cham tu' palhɨɨp pɨx na pim jax tui'dhi' xib. Alhi'ch pɨx ba aa' gu' na ba jam tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios no' pimɨt chakui soi'm ɨlh, ba' dhi' ja'p ji buusnia' na jam kooda', na gu' cham tu' kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu pui' na pim jax ja'k tu jim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Siamri pim moo mi' pui' xi jimɨi na jɨ'k jax jix aa' gu Dios, ja'p na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨt moo jano' na pimɨt jax tɨ jɨɨ'ñ aañ jiñ bui na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat. Soi' pim bam ɨlhdha' ɨp gio, cha'pim kooksɨt darka'. Na gu' no' pim aapi'm cham tu'p jum buixdhat am ɨrdat oipo, cham tu' jam baidhika' iñ bhammɨ ja'k nat pai' tu jam iimchuda gu Dios na saak jam aichdha', nañ gu' aañ jotmoda' pɨx mi' pɨx ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham nañ pai' dhuuk mu jimda'. Pu cham jaroi' mat ka' na pai' dhuuk, ja'p na jax ba' gu jax chu'm jix ɨxkum pai' no't ba tu o'bhai' jax chu'm ba'k chɨr na tɨ ɨɨxdha', na gu' cham tu' na mu pai'p ja aagi'ñdha' gu mi oi'ñkam, mi' pɨx ba bakia'. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' aañ nañ pai' dhuuk mu jim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai ba' gui' nam jɨ'k jiñ ñɨɨr jañ xi ja baidhai, pui' na jax gui' nam jɨ'k mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios mi' dhi' Sardiis, nam cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñ. Ba' gammɨjɨñ bɨɨm oipoda' am bhammɨx dhaam joidham jix chooto ji chɨm tɨi'dhat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k mi' pui' jimia' nañ jax jix aa', pu'ñi chu'm jañ tu ja tɨi'dha' joidham jix chooto, gio ba' nañ mi' xi ja daasa' u'uan ta'm nam jax chɨɨ' nañ pai' ja daasaim gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim nañ jax jix aa' nañ ba' gatuuk pu sɨlh ja baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Aañi' pu tɨɨda' jano' gu Dios ja kaixdhat bɨɨx gu noonbi'ñ na ñich aañ bɨɨx tu ja uañ gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm jiñ chɨgia' xib.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' no' jaroi' tu' sɨlhkam jix maachim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na mu jimɨi bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpa'nda' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ bui nam tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' guñ chujuandam tuk na mu ja'k tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Piladelpia tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui. Ja'pnip mu tu ua'ñxidha': “Gui' nar Maraa'n gu Dios, na joidham jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk gio nax io'm jir gɇ'kam, cham tu' pui' na jɨ'x jir gɇ'kam kat gu Dabii, gam na cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' soo'mchulhdha' no' tu' jax jix dhuñiim, pui' tu kuugalhdha'. Ja'pni kai'ch nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba kaichu':

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua ɨp aapi'm. Jix bhai' mi' pui' jiim japim nañ jax jix aa' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt, sia ku pim jum tulhiiñ bɨxchu' bhaan. Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ nañ jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi'ñ soo'mchulhdha' nañ jɨ'x gɇ'kam kɨ'n xi jam joi'gɨ'n, dai ji no' pim jix biiñak pɨx aañ jiñ bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Aañ pui' ja'k tu duñia' nam xi jam ɨɨbhidhai tu' ka'm jam tɨgia' bɨɨx gui' nam kaichu' gu ja'ook, gui' nam pui'm aa' na gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios nam jir Israel kam, nam ba' machia' nañ aapi'm xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim, nam gu' gui' cham tu' mi' pui' jiim nañ jax jix aa', dai na jax ja'k ja tɨɨdaim pɨx gu ja'ook.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Aapi'm ji na pim ba' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat jix biiñak jiñ bui, tɨɨ' na pim gammɨjɨ mi' pui' jiim nañ jax jix aa'. Ba' aañ xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' na pai' dhuuk bhai' ja daam ji jimia' gu tulhiiñara' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na bhaan pɨx matgilhia' nam jɨ'k moo tu' sɨlhkam jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui, gio na jɨ'k cham. Aapi'm jañ ba' dai jam palhbuidha', na pim gu' gammɨjɨx biiñak jiñ bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'm aa' na pim pu'ñi gammɨjɨ tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui na ba' jam a'm tu bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam jano' nañ pai' dhuuk jam baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam. Na gu' no' pim am ɨr, jumai bhaan bi'ya'. Bar mia'n gu' nañ pai' dhuuk mu jim nañ mu ja bai'ñmɨra' jɨ'k nam jiñ ñɨɨra.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' nam pu'ñi mi' pui' jimia' nañ jax jix aa', gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n ja darsa' iñ bhammɨx dhaam, ja'p ji buusnia' nam gui' bhai' siisap ka' gu chiop ga'n gu Dios. Gammɨjɨ bhai' pu bap tui'ka' am, cham tu' jɨ'x juugɨt. Ja a'm ua'na' iñ na jax chɨɨ' gu Dios gio na jax tɨ tɨɨ' bhai' na pai' dhɨr nai'r gɇ'kam, nax io'm gɇ'r kiicham, na xibkam Jerusaleen jup tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' nañ jax jup ba tɨɨ'ka' ɨp aañ mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' no' jaroi' tu' sɨlhkam jix maachim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpa'nda' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui nam tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Xib jap ba' mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' gu jumaiñ chujuandam tuk na mummu ja'k tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Laodiisia tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ. Ja'pnip mi' tu daasa' bhaan gu u'uan nap mu joochxidha': “Gui' nat jup duu dhi oi'ñga'n bɨɨma'n gu Dios gio na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, na joidham jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk, gam na pui' tu kuugalhdha' jax no't ba tɨi, ja'pni kai'ch nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba kaichu':

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jɨ'k tu' jax bua't tu dudua mu ja'p na pim pai' oi'dha'. Jix maat iñ ɨp na pim cham tu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat jix biiñak aañ jiñ bui. Cham tu'x bhai' mi' pui' jiim japim nañ jax jix aa', palhɨɨp pɨx. Ja'p pɨx ji buan japim na jax gu suudai' no'x juuk pɨx, na cham tu'x io'm jix choiñ ka' piam na cham io'm jix jɨɨpi'ñ ka'. Ba' aañ jiñ bui cham tu'r am gu pui' na pim jax tui'dhi', ja'pji no' pim jix aa' na pim jiñ kaichgɨda', bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ɨp na pim tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat mi' pui' jiimda' nañ jax jix aa', cham tu' palhɨɨp pɨx. Piam no' pim jup jix oo'n na pim tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨi'ñdha', cha'pim pui' kai'chdha' na pim jiñ kaichu'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu xib na tu' jax tui'ka', cham tu'ñ jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha', na pim gu' cham tu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat mi' pui' jiim nañ jax jix aa', sia ku pim gu' pui' kai'ch na pim jiñ kaichu'. Ja'p ji buusnia' nañ jam biñbo' ya' dɨr jiñ chiñ am, na pim gu' pui' pɨx ji buan na jax gu suudai' no'x juuk na pu cham i'oob no'ñ tɨi xi io'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Pui' kai'chdha' pim gu' na pim jir jix chutumñigam, na pim saak bɨɨx tu bia' na tu' jam a'm jum aa' jam i'ii'mda' bhaan gio gu maaxik bhaan, gam na saak gammɨjɨx bhai' tu jam jim, gio na bɨɨx jix bhai' ji chu buusnidha' gu tu' na pim jax buada'. Gu' aañ jiñ bui, paa gip jir jix chutumñigam japim. Cham tu' bɨɨx tu bia' pim na tu' jam a'm jum aa'. Ja'pni pɨx ji buan japim na jax gui' nam alh gampai' tu'ii', nam cham jir tu bia' kam. Ja'p ji buusan ɨp na pim pui'x dha'npakat oipo, gio na pim cham ñiññia, sia ku pim gu' aapi'm pui' kai'ch na pim jir jix chutumñigam, pui' ku pim ba' cham Dios ka tɨ'ñcho.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Paa gip jir pui' na pim jax jum aa'. Cham tu' bia' pim gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk. No' pim jix aa' na pim bia'ka' dhi' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, jum aa' na pim aañ jiñ chañia', na ba' dhi' kɨ'n pui' bam kai'chdha' na pim jir jix chutumñigam. Daipu' aañ bia' jia dhi' jɨ' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk. Ba' no' pimɨt jiñ chaa, cham tu'x dha'npakat ka oipoda' pim gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan, ja'p ji buusnia' gu' na pim ba tɨm tɨi'dha' joidham jix chooto gu jajannulh, gio na pim ba tum juulhia' gui' na dudua'ñdha' gu jam buupui na pim cham ñiññia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'p jañ dho kai'ñkam jup jam tɨtda, na pim soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' nañ jax jix aa', cha'pim kam ua'tulhi'ñdha'. Piam ku gu' cham, jam tulhiiñchuda' iñ na pim jɨ'x pɨx juugɨt soi'm ɨlhdha' aañ jiñ bui, nañ gu' tɨi xi jam joi'gɨ'n. Pu'ñi ja'k jañ ja bua't ja sɨlhka'n jia gui' nañ jɨ'k jix ja da'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Tɨix aa' iñ nañ bɨɨx jam a'm jup tui'ñgɨda' gɨt, ja'p ji buusan nañ mi' dhɨr ki'ñgob kɨɨkat mu tu son na pim pai' jax chu oi'dha'. Ba' no't jaroi' maadɨt jiñ kupio'kdhak jiñ chia nañ mu bakia' ɨrban dɨr, mui'ñ dhop ji bakia' cham jax ji chɨ'ji, ba' mi' dhɨr dai nach maap daraibui ba tu jugia'. Pu'ñi ja'k jum aa' na duñia' gu jaroi' no'x aa' nañ bhaan jup tui'ñgɨda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu jɨ'k nam jiñ buix biiñak kat mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhim nañ jɨ'k jax jix aa' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt sia tu' ba ji ja duu, aañ gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n ja darsa' ya' nañ pai' Gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa sonpan gu Dios, nam jai'ñ a'mkam ja sɨlhka'nda' gu ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' no' jaroi'x bhai'x maachim gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na mu jimɨi bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios gui' nam jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', bhammɨ ja'k jup ba tum maax jix dhaam. Maa'n kap gɇ' kiidha' na pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr kuup na pai' tuut gu ba'bhak, kupio'kix ji gu', cham tu' kuup. Ba'p jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio gui' na mi' tuñ a'gi'ñ, nax io'm gɇ' tu ñiok ja'xbui' na jɨ'x tu kuu gu kuichdhakar: ―Bhai' xi jiim yammɨni ja'k nañ pai'p tu'ii', nañ tɨm tɨ'ñchoda' na jax chum duñia' jano' nañ pai' dhuuk tu kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat gu' gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', bhammɨ ñich ba ai jix dhaam. Ba' bhai' kɨɨk maa'n gu atooxkor nam jax chu'm bhaan daraaka' gui' nam jix io'm jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Jaroi' maadɨt ba' bhai' dhaa bhaan dhi' dhi atooxkor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Joidham jix a'bhar totbik gu tɨi'dhar ga'n gio dɨɨlh, ja'p na jax chu'm totbikda' gu joodai gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Gio maa'n gui' na ja'p tu'm na ki'oor bhai'p kɨɨk daam dɨr na pai' daa, pui' bɨɨx aixim tu'm kɨ'n jup mɨmɨim joidham jix a'bhar.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moo bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr jup tuut ɨp jai' maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu a'toxkar nam jax chu'm bhaan jup dadarrɨ gui' nam cham pɨk jir gɇ'gɇrkam ka'. Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n dhi a'toxkar bhaan daraa am maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam bar jagɨ'gɨr pa', nam jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios. Jix chooto tɨ tɨ' am bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, gio nam ja tuttu gu kukrun jix u'uam totbikdam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' giilhim gɇ' tɨm tɨroon mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, ja'p na jax kai'chdha' gu duuk no' tɨrooñ, gio ba' na gɇ' kɨ'n tum a'ga. Amuub ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ba'p mɨmɨim gui' na ja'p tuutu'm na kañdhiir xijum gok kap, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ gux dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mdaga'n gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' gu suudai' mi ja'p jup suu'n joidham jix kɨɨ'x uañ, cham pai' ikoora'. Gio ba' moo bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam gio gu jai' nam jir tujuandam tugi'ñ, mi'p guguuk am maakob gu sasoi' kam tuutu'm nam jir dudua kam gio nam pui' ja jur jup bia' na jax gu ja'tkam, bɨɨx kap tu buupui am na jɨ'x jir ja tutku'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Maa'n ja'p tu'm na gu mabii'ñ, jumai ba' ja'p tu'm na gu tuur, gio ba' moo gu jumai ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu maa'nkam, gio ba' moo gu jumai ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu bha'aa' na jax tui'ñgɨda' no' dai'chu'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n dhi sasoi' xijum maa'n tu kakarbo am, sia bɨɨx kap tu buupui am na jɨ'x jir ja kakarbo, daam dɨr gio bɨtaa'n dɨr. Ba' gammɨjɨ cham jum jɨɨpi'ñka' am nam laala'nda' nam gɇ'kamtu'nda' gu Dios, jup kai'chdha' am: Ja'p moox uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk ji dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na ya' daa. Joidham bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia', na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam. Dhi'x io'm bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch na chakui jai'ch kat gu oi'ñga'n, gio xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch ka'. Dhi' ba' dɨɨlh giop kuugalhdha' gu oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gammɨjɨ gu maakob sasoi', nam pai' dhuuk gɇ'kamtu'ndat taxchaabgi'ñdha' gui' na bhai' daa gɇ' atooxkor ta'm na gammɨjɨ pu dua sia nar pai' dhuuk, gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam bɨɨx xɨkoolh dhɨr daraa, jotmoda' ja o'lhia kɨ'n gu'kɨt tu daanda'm ɨp buiñor, nam pui'p gɇ'kamtu'nda', xi ja kookosat am gu ja kukrun mu xi ja daraasdat ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gu Gɇ'kam. Jup kai'chdha' am:

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai aap jix bhai' nam tu' ka'm jum nɨidhat jum gɇ'kamtu'nda' gammɨjɨ Dios jich Gɨ'kora', nap gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, gio nap bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia'. Tɨɨ' na pich jup tu duu bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, sia gui' nam jir tu dudua kam, aap ja taiñbui'ñ gu ii'mda' nam kɨ'n dudua xib.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
