verse_text: Ba' gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm, ja'pni kɨɨ'n dɨr daa' maa'n gu u'uan bhiibgixim na bɨxxik dɨr mi tu ua'ñix, xijum gok kap ba' bhiibhi'sap kɨ'n gui' nax kabkam tu bhibhi'sap, na sap ba' cham jaroi' sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bha ja'p kɨɨkat jup kai'ch gɇ' kɨ'n na jɨ'x tu jiiñak: ―¿Jaroo chix bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch dhi u'uan bhiibgixim?

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Pu cham jaroi' jai'ch gu' nax bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' gu u'uan na jax mi tu ua'ñix gui' nam jɨ'k bhammɨ ja'p jup tu'ii' jix dhaam nam jir noonbi'ñ gu Dios, gio gui' na mu ja'p jix chu jai'ch na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, piam sia chi moor pa ja'k kam ka' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ jix buam jiñ aagɨt ma susua nat moo pui' pɨk cham jup jai'chdhɨr gu jaroi' nax bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' gui' gu u'uan.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ji na gu' maadɨt gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob nam mi' daraa bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Aap moo cham jax jum aa'nda'ñ jaduuñ, ba jɨkgɨ ap. Matgam ya' pai' jai'ch ji maadɨt nax bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch dhi u'uan bhiibgixim, nat gu' gui' ba ma'iich gux buam jum duukam. Gui'ñ dho aagɨt jup kai'ch nar boxii'ñ gu Judaa, na xib jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa, sia bɨɨx jai' bhaankamu'n gu Dabii, na gu' pui'p jir boxii'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' nat ja'p ji buus na gux kɨɨ' kasnir mi'p kɨɨk ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, mi' ɨrban nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' gio gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm, xijum maakob tu a'aa', gio gu buupui'ñ ja'kbui' ɨp. Dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch gux xijum gook jix dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mdaga'n gu Dios nat mui' kap ja joot bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Gui' jɨ' na pui' ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, bɨɨx kap jix bapaiñmi' gu tukga'n nam pai' jax gɨbiimɨk jano' nat jum makgɨrta,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ba' mu jimɨɨk bhai' ji dhaa gu u'uan bhiibgixim na ja'pni kɨɨ'n dɨr daa' gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk, gio gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr jup daraa, mi' ja o'lhia kɨ'n ji guguu mɨt ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' kɨɨk gui' jɨ' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja daada' am gu sasaasbikar gio gu a'lhich jaja' jix u'uam totbikdam, susdagɨm mi jim gui' na joidham uub na jax chu'm jum kubhioñxi'ñ gu Dios. Dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ gui' nam jɨ'k ba tu daan buiñor gu Dios nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na gu' pui' ji buusanda' nam tu kubhioñxi'ñdha' nam pai' dhuuk tu daanda' buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bɨɨx dhɨt bhai' ji laalagɨ mɨt maa'n gu xibkam alabaa'n na ja'pnim kai'ch: Dai aap jix bhai' nap bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch dhi u'uan bhiibgixim nap mi' daa', na pich gu' pu kai'ñkam jum tulhiiñaimɨk jum makgɨrta jano' nat gɇ' jaax gum ɨ'ɨɨr bhaan gu kuruus ja a'mkam bɨɨx dappaam gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm tu ñiok gam bɨɨx aixim tuutu'm, na pich gu' bɨɨx ja saba'lh kɨ'n gum ɨ'ɨɨr na pich kɨ'n tu ja namkix gu ja ua'tulhdhara' na ba' mi' dhɨr bax bhai' ka' nam yammɨ aaya' na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' xib pui' ja'k ba duu pich nam jai' dhɨt ba tu daam kɨɨka' na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gam jai' nam nai' ba tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, nam pui' ja tɨtdaidha' gu ja'tkam nam ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' soi'm ɨlhdhai aap jum bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr mui' cham daaxix kam mi' bam maax jamɨt gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, gio nam pai' daraa gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam gio ba' gu maakob sasoi'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jup kai'ch am gɇ' kɨ'n: Gɇ'kamtu'nda' ich dhi' na pui' ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, nat gu'm makgɨrta kuruus ta'm. Na gu' xib jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa, bɨɨx bhaan ba tu bii gu tu' nax chu jai'ch, pui' na jax gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam gio gu a'lhich jup tum duu'nkam. Xib dhi' bax bhai' na pu tu duñia' jax ña ɨlhii'ñdha' ja bui bɨɨx gu ja'tkam. Ja'pni kuch ba' moo gammɨjɨ tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx gui' nat jɨ'k tu'p tu duu gu Dios na bhammɨ ja'p jix chu jai'ch jix dhaam, gio ba' mu ja'p na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n bhaan, gam mu ja'p suudai' chɨr, jup kai'ch am ɨp: Gammɨjɨch moo tu' ka'm nɨidhat tu daanda' buiñor gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm gio dhi' nat ja'p ji buus na gux kɨɨ' kasnir nat jum makgɨrtak, nam gu' gammɨjɨ pur gɇ'gɇrkam sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam jup kai'ch am ɨp: ―Pui' dho. Gu' ba' gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gui' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa, na mɨt jax ja o'lhia kɨ'n guguu bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, maa'n kap xi bhi'spio' gui' jɨ' u'uan bhiibgixim na daa'. Ba' maadɨt gu maakob sasoi' jup jiñ chɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n, pɨx am nammɨ ja'p tu baapkichu'n: ―Pu kani muni ja'k xi chɨ tɨɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' na ñich mui' xi chɨ tɨɨ, maadɨt mu kɨɨk gu maa'nkam jix chua kabai cha'm gaat ji dhaagɨt. Ba' maa'n xi kɨɨx jamɨt gu kuruun na bhaan jix maatɨ' nat ba tu ma'iich nat tu kokdarak ja bui gui' nam jix bhaamki'ñ, gio ba' na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' ɨp na mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ tu daam ba kɨɨka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim gui' jɨ' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp jumai maadɨt gu maakob sasoi': ―Mi'ñi ja'k jup xi chɨ tɨɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' na ñich mui' xi chɨ tɨɨ, maadɨt mu ja'k jup kɨɨk gu maa'nkam jix bɨ' kabai cha'm. Ba' maa'n xi maa mɨt gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk, gio ba' na mɨt xi chia na ja kokdhichdha' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na pui' ja'k tu duñia' nam dɨɨlh pɨx bhai' jim kokda', nam cham maa'n ñi'ook kap duuka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim na ba' moo baik kap ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka', jumai bhai'p ji ñio maadɨt gu maakob sasoi', jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp: ―Muni ja'k jap jup xi chɨ tɨgia'. Ba' na ñich mu ja'k jup xi chɨ tɨɨ, jumai mu ja'k jup kɨɨk gu maa'nkam jix chuk kabai cha'm ji ua'dat maa'n gui' na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na jɨ'x jix bɨt ka' gu tu'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' ɨrban nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk gu sasoi', bhai' ji chum ñio, jup tum kai'ch: ―Ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gook kiilo pɨx ba aix ka' gu juun na jɨ'k mai'chia' gu maa'n tanoolh no't tu jua gu jaroi', piam baik kiilo gu tiriik. Pu'ñi ku pim ba' siamri cham xi buada' gu asait gio gu uubas baraa', na pim gu' pu'ñi cham tu' gammɨjɨ gɇ' bia'ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, na ba' moo maakob kap ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka', jumai bhai'p ji ñio gu maakob sasoi', jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Mi'ñi ja'k jap jup xi chɨ tɨgia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ mu ja'k jup xi chɨ tɨɨ na pai' ja'k tuñ aagi'ñ. Mu kɨɨk ɨp jumai gu maa'nkam jix uam kabai cha'm, Muuki' sap tɨɨ' gui' gu maa'nkam. Ba' dhi' jumaip oi'ñchu' gu maa'nkam na Tulhiiñara' tɨɨ', na dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch mi' nam pai'm tulhiiña' gatuuk gu ja'tkam. Ba' bɨɨx gook jup ja tɨtda am nam sap ja kooda' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k daaxix mui' kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam pui' ja'k tu duñia' nam dɨɨlh pɨx bhaakui bhai' ji chɨ jɨgialhchuda' nam jax dhui pɨx ko'ya', gam jai' nam ua'mai, nam ja a'm jimiichdha' gu bhiogi', gio jai' ko'kdai' kɨ'n, gam jai' nam ja jugioka' gu gampɨx kam sasoi' nam jix bhaa'mna'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim na ba' moox chamaam kap ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka', mi sonpan gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar na mi ja'p kɨɨk, ba tɨɨ ñich nam mi'm maaxi'ñ gu ja i'ii'mda' gui' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios na mɨt ja bhaamkidhak ja koi gu ja'tkam nam cham aa' nam tu a'gada'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p kai'ch am mi' ji gu'kat gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Aapi' Gɇ'kam Dios jich Gɨ'kora', nap joidham bɨxchu'x aichu'n gio nap joidham jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk, gam nap pui' tu kuugalhdha' jax no' pich ba tɨi, ¿paa duuk jum aaya' nap saak ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk gu ja tutku' bhaan kup ba ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' na mɨt jich bhaamkidhak jich koi nach mu ja'p jum a'mkam ka tu a'gat gux bhai'm kai'chdham jum ñi'ook?

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n dhi' nam mi' guguuk sonpan gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar, xi ja tɨi' mɨt gu jajannulh joidham jix chooto, gio ba' nam jup ja tɨtda nam sap ka xim nɨɨra' alhi'ch pɨx ba', nam bɨɨx bhammɨ ka xi aaya' gui' na mɨt chakui ja koi, nam pui ka tu a'gichu' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jɨ'k daaxix nam pu'ñi ja kooda', na ba' mi' dhɨr pui' ba tu kuugalhdha' gu Dios nam jax kai'ch.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim, giilhim gɇ' bhai' ji chɨm tɨr, gio gu tanoolh bhai' pɨx ji chukuur, jix chuk bhai' pup daa, ja'p na gu jax chu'm jannulh no'x chukuum jix chuk, gio gu masaa'n jix bɨ'p jum duu ja'p na ɨ'ɨɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio gu chiichia' nat mui' ji ii' mu ja'k oi'ñga'n bhaan, ja'p na jax gu iibhai'ñga'n gu iigɨx na giilhim mui' mu pɨx tɨtronia' dɨɨrap no't jix io'm bhai' xi jɨb.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio gux dhaam pɨx cham pai' matgir, ja'pni pɨx jum duu na jax gu u'uan no't jotmoda' xim bhiib. Gio ba' nat giilhim jix io'm bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, pɨx cham pai' matgir gu oi'dha' na mui' kap ka daraat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio gu a'lhich dɨppɨr na mu ja'p dɨr kax maaxich suudai' ɨraab.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' nam nai' ja'p daraa nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ma jiboi'ññor jamɨt bha ja'p oi'dha' ta'm na jax chiichio', jai' bha ja'p na jax tɨ dɨɨdɨ' na mɨt bam o'ñchom, ja bɨɨm gu jaja'tkam tuk gam gu ja tujuandam tuk, pui' na jax gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu ja sandaarui'x chuk, bɨɨx sia gui' nam jir jix chutumñigam, sia gui' nam jix io'm jix o'jo', gam sia gui' nam jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p ja tɨtda am gu oi'dha' bhɨjɨ ja'p ji baapxich chiichiob gam bha ja'p na jax tɨ dɨɨdɨ': ―Iam gor bhai' xi ia'lh jich a'm, xich ɨxchu' pim, na cham jich chɨgia' gui' nax io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n daa bhammɨx dhaam, gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, na gu' giilhim jix bhaam jich bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bam ai gu' na pai' dhuuk jich chulhiiñchuda' aach na chich cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', gam gu jai'. ¿Jaroo gip jix ñakoo' nax io'm jum tulhiiña'?

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moo mi' dhɨr ja'pni ñich jup tɨ tɨɨ, maakob sap gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios maakob kap guguuk am na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na mɨt pui' ja'k ja tɨɨdak mu ja joot nam jix io'm tɨ jɨlhbichdha' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na ba' tum xichui'dha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch bɨɨx kap, sia mu ja'p suudai' chɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' jumai ja'pni jurnip dɨr ja'k mui'p ba jim gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ji ua'dat gui' na kɨ'n ja matgilhchu'n gu Dios gui' nam jɨ'k kaichgɨda'. Ba' mui' xi ja jiñkai gu jai' noonbi'ñ nam mu ja'p guguuk maakob kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na mɨt ja chia nam tu xichui'dha' jɨbɨɨlh kɨ'n bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, jup ja tɨtda:

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ―Chakui pim jix io'm tɨ jɨlhbichu'nda', nam gu' bɨɨx pu ko'ya' gui' nam jɨ'k tu dudua na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, sia bɨɨx pum xichui'dha' gu tutua gam sai' gio gu suudai', nach gu' ka ja matgilhdha' gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'. Dai nach ka xi ja matgilhdha' na pim ba' moo mui' ba tɨ jɨlhbichdha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios xi ja matgilh ja kokobtai' am gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam jir Israel kam ja'tkam, xijum gook oo'm daman maakob miil (144,000) ja matgilh.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ja matgilh gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Judaa, gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Rubeen ja'kbui' ɨp mambhɨɨx daman gook miil, gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Gaad mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: gio ba' gui' nam jup jir bopxi'ñ gu Aseer ja'kbui' mɨt jup ja matgilh mambhɨɨx daman gook miil, gio ba' gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Neptalii ja'kbui' mɨt jup ja matgilh mambhɨɨx daman gook miil, gio gu bopxi'ñ gu Manasees mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Simeon mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp, gio ba' moo gui' nam Lebiip jir bopxi'ñ ja'kbui' mambhɨɨx daman gook miil jamɨt jup ja matgilh, gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Isakaar ja'kbui' mambhɨɨx daman gook miil jamɨt jup ja matgilh,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: gio ba' moo gui' nam jɨ'k jir bopxi'ñ gu Sabuloon ja'kbui' ɨp mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp, gio ba' gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Josee mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp, gio ba' gui' nam jup jir bopxi'ñ gu Benjamiin ja'kbui' mɨt jup ja matgilh mambhɨɨx daman gook miil.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr mui' mi' bam maax jamɨt gu ja'tkam cham daaxix kam, ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, pu cham jaroi' maat nam jɨ'k aix, pui' pɨx tu'ii' am. Bɨɨx kap dɨr mi' guguuk am gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n kam, nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm tu ñiok gam bɨɨx aixim tuutu'm. Jix io'm mui' dho ba' ji gu ja'tkam nam mi guguuk, nam pu cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' ja tɨɨmo' siat tɨi ma ja ja'kɨlh. Bɨɨx jix chooto tɨ tɨ' am, gio nam jɨ'ma'n ja daada' gu ko'kmarak jaaja'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p kai'ch am gɇ' kɨ'n: ¡Ja'p moo gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' duu ji dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na bhai' dhaa atooxkor ta'm nat jich uañ guch ua'tulhdhara', nat gu' mu joot dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir na ba' pu'ñich a'mkam jum makgɨrta' na ba' kɨ'n tu namkix ka' guch ua'tulhdhara'! Gammɨjɨch jix bhai'ch chaatɨt tu daanda' buiñor, na gu'r jix bhai'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu mui' cham daaxix kam gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa, gio mi' nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gui' nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa', gio gu maakob sasoi', ja o'lhia kɨ'n gu'kɨk bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios na mi' daa ɨrban.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jup kai'ch am: Maaxik dhor pui' nam jax kai'ch dhich jaaduñ, gammɨjɨch dho tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na ya' gɇ'kam kɨ'n daa, na gu' maaxik jix io'm jir Gɇ'kam, bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Gammɨjɨch gɇ'kamtu'ndat taxchaabgi'ñdha' sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ja'pni tu tui'ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maadɨt gui' nam mi' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' jup jiñ chɨtda: ―¿Jaroom da' dhi ja'tkam jix chooto tɨ tɨ' kam nam ya' guguuk? ¿Paam dɨr ja'k jiim?

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ jup tɨtda: ―Cham ji nañ maat. No' pich mi' dhɨr iam jiñ aa'ñ jiñ jaduuñ nap jix maat. Ba' gui' xiñ aagi'ñ ɨp, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Jir di' am dho gui' nam giilhim jum tulhiiñaimɨk mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan, gio nam gammɨjɨ pux biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios siam jum tulhiiñ. Ba' xib yammɨ ja'k bap tu'ii' am jix bhai'm taatɨt, nat gu' bɨɨx dappaam tu ja uañ gu ja ua'tulhdhara' guch Xoi'kam, dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, kɨ'n gu ɨ'ra'n nat jaax bhaan gu kuruus, na mɨt gu' soi'm ɨlhdhak tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ya' jɨ' bar di' nam pai' gammɨjɨ bɨɨma'n bap tui'ka' gu Dios joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm, ja'p ji buusnia' nam gammɨjɨ ya' pu ba tu juanda' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios. Dhi' ba' dɨɨlh ja buip tu't ja nuuka'nda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham pai' dhuuk kax bhio'n ka' am, ni nam cham pai' dhuuk ka tanook ka', ni gu tanoolh ku cham pai' dhuuk ja a'm ka tonnia', ba' cham pai'x chatoiñ kɨr kam tulhiiña' am.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ ya' pu ba oi'ñka' am jix bhai'm taatɨt, cham tu' bhaan jum tulhiiñat ka suanda' am nam jax jum tulhiiñaimɨk mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, na gu' ya' gammɨjɨx bhai' tu tatda' buiñor dhich Gɨ'kora', gio na gu' gammɨjɨ ja bɨɨm oirɨda' dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, ja'p ji buusnia' na ja bipia'da' ja'p na kakasnir, gio na gammɨjɨ ja i'chu'nda' gux kɨɨ' suudai' nam kɨ'n gammɨjɨx bhai'm taat ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir na ba' kɨ'n bɨɨx ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka' na jɨ'k kap bhiibhi'sap kat, pɨx cham tum ñio bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir jix dhaam, mɨɨkim pa' moo na cham tum ñiok.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gux xijum gook gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa, xi ja maa mɨt jɨ'ma'n gu kukuichdhakar.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'xpɨx ba' moo jumai mi'p ba ai na pui'p jir nobii'ñ gu Dios alhi'ch kubhioñkar ji kusbiot nar jix uam totbikdam, ba' mi' ji kɨkbo sonpan gu gɇ' kubhioñkar na ja'p tu'm na sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar. Ba' gɇ' xi maa mɨt gui' na joidham uub na sap ba' kubhioñxidha' gu Dios bhaan gu kubhioñkar na mi' kɨɨk ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa, maap xi bɨndai gui' na mɨt tu kubhioñxi gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pui' ji buusan nam tu kubhioñxidhimɨk nam tu dañiimɨk buiñor tu' ka'm nɨidhat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk bhai' ji chu kubhiona, sɨlh mu ja'k bhɨi gu kuu'mxiga'n na pai' daa gu Dios, maap jum bɨndak gui' nam tu kubhioñxi'ñ guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' nat jax daa ɨp gio gu alhi'ch kubhioñkar, mi' xi suuduidhak gu tuupalh bhai' dhɨr bhaan gu gɇ' kubhioñkar mɨjɨmmɨ xi bua oi'ñga'n bhaan. Ba' bhai' pu ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, gio na gɇ' tɨm tɨroon ja'p na jax kai'chidha' gu duuk tɨrnɨdam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam jɨ'ma'n ja daada' gu kukuichdhakar, jix kɨɨ' bam duu mɨt nam ba tu kuichdha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk maadɨt xi chu kuich, jix dhaam dɨr mui' pu ji ii' gu chia mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, gio ba' gu tai ɨp bɨnkam gu ɨ'ɨɨr. Ba' pu mɨi alhi'ch gu dɨbɨɨr bɨnkam gu tutua gam sai' na mi ja'p ka tu tuutɨt na jɨ'x pɨx aagix na tɨ mɨɨya'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, maa'n jix dhaam dɨr mui' xi jibua mɨt gɇ' gui' na ja'p tu'm na oidha', dai na bɨɨx mɨimtu', sɨlh mummu gɨi ɨrban gu gɇ' suudai'. Ba'x bɨ'p jum duu taak dɨr gu suudai' ja'p na ɨ'ɨɨr na jɨ'x pɨx aagix na bɨ'lhia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' koi mɨt gu boptop gam gu jai' nam mi' ka tu oipot mi' nat jɨ'x bɨgiir gu suudai' na jɨ'k aagix nam ko'ya'. Gio gu ja'tkam nam mi ja'p ka oipot kaknub ta'm pui'p koi mɨt nam jɨ'k pɨx jup aagix, bɨɨx pu baap gu ja kaknub.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar baik ka', jix dhaam dɨr mui' ji jigɨi maa'n gui' na ja'p tu'm na chi'ɨɨ', ba' mu ja'p gɨi jɨ'kchi kap gɇ'gɇr jir a'kkɨ'n na pai' mɨr gu suudai' gio mu ja'p na jax jir biipiatam, na jɨ'k kap aagix na gɨxia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jix Xibu' sap tɨɨ' gui' gu chi'ɨɨ', ba' bɨɨx nat jɨ'k kap a'kkɨ'n gɨi, jix xibu'p jum duu gu suudai'. Ba' mui' koi mɨt gu ja'tkam na mɨt jɨ'k ii gui' gu suudai' na jɨ'k pɨx aagix nam ko'ya', nat ja maimtuda gu suudai' na gu' giilhim jix xibu'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar maakob ka', tɨi pup ɨrban juugɨt nai' ji chuu gu tanoolh, gio gu masaa'n, gio ba' gu chiichia'. Cham tu'x bhai' ka tu tonni'ñ gu tanoolh, gio gu masaa'n palhɨɨp pɨx ba tum masbagi'ñ gio gu chiichia', ba'x chukgam jup tum duu jai' kap na jɨ'k kap aagix na tum tukgamta', tataab ja'k gio tukaa' ja'k.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'n gu bha'aa' bhammɨ ja'p ji dhɇdɇ'dat jix dhaam jup kai'ch gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Ja'p moo joi'ndam jum duñia' am gu ja'tkam bɨɨx na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam pai' dhuuk xi chu kuichdha' dhi baik noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam ka bi'iix nam tu kuichdha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar jix chamaam ka', maa'n jix dhaam dɨr mui' ji jigɨi gu chi'ɨɨ' mummu oi'ñga'n bhaan, ba' xi maa mɨt gui' na kɨ'n jum kukpio'k mu na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' na cham pai' ju'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' xi kupio' mi' dhɨr na pai' kiidha', giilhim gɇ' mɨjɨ dɨr ji buus gu kuubhɨx ɨɨbhidham jix chuk jix kubha'biñ, ja'p na jax chu'm kuubhɨsda' gu tɨɨ'nkar no' jaroi' bax chu mamaim. Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' pɨx ji chɨm ɨɨka bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nat gu' ba taa'bi gu tanoolh gu kuubhɨx, na gu' giilhim jix chuk nat mɨjɨ dɨr buus na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ'. Sia gu jɨbɨɨlh cham tu' ka kɨɨ', nat gu' bɨɨx ba ia'ñ gu kuubhɨx.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bhɨjɨ dɨr ja'p bhaan gu kuubhɨx bhai' ji bubua mɨt mui' gu sossoi, bɨɨx kap ba oipo am na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, dai nam pui'x io'm jup jix bhaa'mna' na jax gu nankasɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Pui' ja'k ja tɨɨdak mu ja joot jamɨt nam ja ki'mna' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'k cham daaxdhix ka' ja kokobtai' am gui' na kɨ'n tu matgilhchu'n gu Dios na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam gui' kaichu', gio nam cham jax ja buada' gu tutua gam sai' na mi ja'p tu tuut, daipu' nam jax pɨx ja tɨtda.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moop ja tɨtda am ɨp nam sap cham tu' pu ja koodaidha' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k ja ki'mna', ja'pji dai nam jɨ'x pɨx bhaan jum tulhiiña'. Ba' dhi' jɨ' nam ja'p tuutu'm na sossoi, bhai' ji ja ki'mna mɨt bɨɨx gu ja'tkam jix chamaam masaa'n juugɨt, pui' ja'k tɨ kɨkɨ' am na nankasɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' jim tulhii gu ja'tkam na mɨt bhai' ji ja ki'mna gu sossoi, mui' tɨix aa' am nam ba ko'ya' gɨt nam cham mi' pum tulhiiñdha', gu' ji nam gu' cham ko' siam chi moo jax jum bua't tɨi muuki' dhaan, ja'p ji buus gu' nat mai' mɨɨ gu muuki' mi' dhɨr ja bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu sossoi ja'p tuutu'm am na gu kakbai, gio nam pui'x ja joiñi' nam nai' xi bapo' nam jax xim buada' gu kakbai pai' no'r jɨgialhi'. Dai nam bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja'p tu'm tu moom na ja'tkam, gio nam bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja tuttutu' gui' na ja'p tu'm na kuruun.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu ja kuup ba' ja'xbui'r tɇ'tɇb nam jɨ'x tu kuup gu u'uub, gu' ba' gu ja taatam ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu mabii'ñ gu taatmu'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir ja tutku' tu baapsatu' am gu ko'kmarak bapaiñum nam kɨ'n jum soo'mdhatu'. Ba' nam xi a'ngɨb ja'p tum kai'ch na jax no'm pai' dhɨr mui' mu boopo' gu kakbai ji ja tɨɨbiopat gu kakret no't ba ji chum kokda.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu ja bhaabhai ja'p tu'm na gu bhai'ñ gu naksɨr, kukgaram mi chuut gui' na kɨ'n tɨ kɨkɨ'. Dhi' ba' kɨ'n ja ki'mna mɨt gu ja'tkam jix chamaam masaa'n juugɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu ja gɇ'kam tuk dhi sossoi, Abadoon tɨɨ' gu ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n, gu' ba' gu griago ñi'ook kɨ'n Apolion. Dhi' pɨx jir di' gui' na mu ja'k jup jir gɇ'kam na pai' giilhim gɇ' tɨ dɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'pni ja'k tum bua, ku gu' gook ka bi'iix ji gu tulhiiñara' na ja a'm ka jimia' gu ja'tkam, cham tu' daipu'. Dhi' kɨ'n kia'pɨx maa'n ba jim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' nat pai' dhuuk xi chu kuich gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios na ka bi'iix, bhai' ji chum ñio bhai' dhɨr bhaan gu kubhioñkar nar jix uam totbikdam na mi' kɨɨk ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gu Dios,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: jup tɨtda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nat kia'pɨx tu kuich: ―Mi' dhɨr jap ja do'ñchora' gu maakob noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam mummu buupulh gɇ' akkɨ'n na Eupraates tɨ tɨɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios mu jimɨɨk jup xi ja do'ñcho gu jai' noonbi'ñ nam mummu buupulh ak jugii'ñ, nam sap ba' ba ja kooda' jɨ'kchi gu ja'tkam na jɨ'k aagix, nam gu' pu pu kai'ñkam mi' buupulh nam pu'ñi tu duñia' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' gu tanoolh gio gu oidha' na pui' tu kuugalhdha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu ja sandaarui'x chuk gook jix cha'tmam oo'm miyoones ja aa am nam aix, bɨɨx kakbai cha'm jiim am.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gu ja sandaarui'x chuk nam bha daraichu' kakbai cha'm, jɨ'ma'n ja baapsatu' am gu ko'kmarak bapaiñum nam kɨ'n jum soo'mdha', dai na gɇ' mɨimtu' ja'p na tai, taak dɨr jix chɨɨdu'm maaxi'ñ, taak dɨr ba'x uam. Gu' ba' gu ja kakbai' ja'p tu'm tu moom am na jax chu'm tu mo' gu mabii'ñ, ba' ja chiichiñ am dɨr busaak gu taix io'm jix choiñ kuubhɨx bɨnkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mui' ja koi mɨt gu ja'tkam kɨ'n gu tai nam jɨ'k pɨx aagix nam ja kooda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu ja bhaabhai ba' ja'p tuutu'm na kooko', tu moom kukgaram dɨr na jax chu'm gu ko'. Dhi' kɨ'n jamɨt ba' mui'p ja ki'mna gu ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' na mɨt bii na mɨt cham koi kɨ'n gu tai na ja chiichiñ am dɨr busaak gu kakbai, gio na mɨt cham ja ki'mna, cham pai' iam soi' ba jim ɨlh jamɨt buiñor gu Dios sia kum jax tɨ nɨi'ñ, pui' nam jax ba tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Jix io'm ba xi jii mɨt nam tu daan ja bui gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu ja'ook, gam ja bui gu didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam nax uam totbikdam kɨ'n jup duñiix, gam jai' gui' nax chooto totbik, gio jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm, gio gam jai' gui' nar u'uux jup duiñxim nam pu cham tu oipo sia kum tɨi tu tooton, ni nam tɇ kɇɇ sia kum tɨi tu naanak, gio nam cham ñiññia sia kum tɨi tu buupui, nam gu' pu cham tu' dudua, nam gu'r jup duñiixim pɨx.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' nam mui' ja bia'kat gu u'uub ja bɨɨm boppo, gio nam tɨ ɨɨxi'ñ, gam nam ja koo'n gu ja'tkam, gio ba' nam nai' tu jiboiñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jix dhaam dɨr mui' ba jurnim mu ja'k oi'ñga'n bhaan joidham tɨbaa'ñ cha'm. Gɇ'kam kam tui'dhi' gui' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, ki'oor bɨɨx xikoolh xi bhɨichdhixchu' bha mo'r daam, gio gu buibsa'n na gɇ' mɨimtu' ja'p na gu tanoolh, gio gu tootna'n pui' ɨp,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: maa'n daa'ñchu' gu u'uan sɨlhñixim na bɨxxik dɨr mi chu ua'ñix. Ba' mummu ji kɨkbo oi'ñga'n bhaan, maap dɨr suudai' chɨr tɨ kɨis gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam toona'n kɨ'n, gu o'nsop dɨr kam toona'n ba' dɨbɨɨr ta'm tɨ kɨis.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' xi jiiñ gɇ' kɨ'n, ja'p tɨi na gu mabii'ñ no' gɇ' kɨ'n jɨɨrok. Ba' mu pai' dhɨr bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n gio nat tɨm tɨr, jix xijum gook tɨi na mɨt bha ñio maap maa'n jimdam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ ba ji chu ua'nak nam jɨ'k jax kai'ch gui' nam mu pai' dhɨr bha ñiok, gu' ji nat gu' jotmoda' bhai' ba tum ñio bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Dhi'p dai cham tu' u'uanda' nam jax kai'ch dhi' nam mu ñiok, dɨɨlh jap pɨx pui'x chu mat ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mu kɨɨk oi'ñga'n bhaan, na maap dɨr suudai' chɨr tɨ kɨisap, xi bamii'ñdhak gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam nobii'ñ

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: jup kai'ch bhaankamu'n gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio na mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch ka', gam nat jup tu duu bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch: ―Ja'xbui' pɨx juugɨt tɨ nɨɨra gu Dios,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: na gu' xib na pai' dhuuk xi chu kuichdha' dhi jumai nobii'ñ nat chakui tu kuich, bɨɨx pui' ba tu kuugalhdha' nat jɨ'k jax ja tɨɨdak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ jix dhaam, jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Taañmɨr gu u'uan na daa' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mu kɨɨk oi'ñga'n bhaan, na maap dɨr suudai' chɨr tɨ kɨisap, ja'p jap tɨɨda' nam makia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ mu jimɨɨk bhai'p ba taan gu u'uan na daa', ba' gui'p jiñ chɨtda: ―Ya' dho, dai ji nap gu' bha jugia'. Joidham jix maikak ka' nap mui' ji jugia', ɨrban dɨr gum book ba' bhai' jim maimtuda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ bhai'p xi juu gu u'uan nat pai' dhuuk bhai' xiñ maa gu nobii'ñ gu Dios. Pui' dho joidham jix maikak ja'p na mɨɨbat na ñich mui' ji juu, nat pai' dhuuk ɨrban dɨr jum gaam ji guñ book nat ba' giilhim bhai' jiñ maimtuda.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ jix dhaam jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Jum aa' nap giop ka tu a'gara' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, nap ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na tu' jax dhuñia' gatuuk. Bɨɨx kap jap aaya' na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na gu' bɨɨx jum aa' nam pui' tu machia' na jɨ'k ja'tkam, sia nam jir jax chu'm, siam jir pa ja'k kam, piam siam jai' maakam tu ñiok, bɨɨx jap pui' tu ja a'gi'dha', sia gui' nam jir tɇ gɇ'gɇrkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mɨkkat maa'n xiñ maa mɨt gu jupaabdakar ja'p tu'm na tootkom, mi' dhɨr ba'p jiñ chɨtda am: ―Jupaabda' ap dhi' kɨ'n gu chiopga'n gu Dios gio gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar na bhaan tum makgɨrxi'ñ gu Dios, gio ba' nap ja ja'kɨlhdha' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k aix nam mi chu daan ɨrban dɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai mu ja'p dɨɨrap dɨr gu chiop jap cham jupaaba'nda', na gu' dhi' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja a'm bipio' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui. Na gu' dhi' ja'p jir jum duukam nam bɨɨx tu' pɨx ja ɨlhdha' gui' nam jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ gook mu ja jootsa' guñ chujuandam tuk nam jiñ a'mkam tu ja a'gidha' guñ ñi'ook bɨɨx gu ja'tkam baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt. Gampai' pɨx tui'ñgɨda' am, jix xaasak tɨ tɨi'chgɨda' am na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam soi' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñchu'nda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gui' jɨ' gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ am gu gook oliibos na ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr tu't bhai' na pai' daa gu Dios, gio gu gook na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk mu ja joot gu Dios gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ nam tu ja a'gi'ñpu' gu ja'tkam, cham jɨ'xdha' jax ja dooda mɨt gu ja'tkam sia kum tɨix ja bhaamki'ñ, na gu' bɨxchu'x bhai' nam pu tu duñia', ja chiichiñ am dɨr busaak gu tai. Ba' jai' dhɨt nam tɨix ja koodam, pu ja mɨi'ñ jamɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Siax bhai' na mɨt pui' tu duu nat cham duu'n baik oidha' daman taak na mɨt jɨ'x juugɨt tu ja a'gi gu ja'tkam gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na jax ja'k tu duñia' gatuuk, gio na mɨt ɨ'ɨɨr jup duu gu suudai', gio ba' na mɨt pui' ja'k tu duu nam bɨxchu' bhaan bhai' jim tulhiiña' gu ja'tkam na mɨt jɨ'x juugɨt ɨlh.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' nat pai' dhuuk jum ai na jɨ'x juugɨt daaxix nam tu a'ga', na mɨt bɨɨx kap ba tɨɨmo nam tu a'gimɨk gu Dios ñio'ki'ñ, maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm mɨjɨ dɨr buusnɨk na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' bhai' ji chu kokda ja bui, ja mai'chɨk pu ja koi.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' pɨx ja'p bɨɨt am ba'bhak sanoop, mi' ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham na Jerusaleen tɨ tɨɨ', na mɨt pai' gɨbiimɨk sissapa ɨp kuruus ta'm guch Xoi'kam jano' na mu xi oilhimɨk, mi' na pai' ja'p ji buusan na gook kɨ'n tɨ tɨɨ': Sodooma gio ba' Ejipto, nam gu' pui' ja'k jup tu jim gu mi' oi'ñkam Jerusaleen na jax gu Sodooma kam gio gu Ejipto kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Baik tanoolh daman taak mi' pu bɨɨt gu ja tutku' gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam ja tɨɨ mɨt nam mi' pɨx ja'p ko'iix, sia gui' nam mɨk ja'k oi'dha', gio jai' gui' nam maakam tu ñiok. Bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n ja tɨɨ mɨt, ba' pu cham jaroi'm guguux na ja yaaspa', mi' pɨx xi ja nɨi'ñ am, nam gu' tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai na mɨt joidham jix bhai' bhai' jim ɨlh bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam na mɨt ba ja tɨɨ na mɨt ba koi gui' jɨ' gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, pɨx am tum a'onbagi'ñ am bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gux dha'ram namkɨm, nam gu' pui' xim aa' na mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k joidham jix bhai' ba tu ja jimia', cham tu' bhaan kam tulhiiña' am, na mɨt gu' ba koi gui' nam pui' ja'k ka tu bua't.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr nat xim ai gu baik tanoolh daman taak, gu Dios giop ba ja dudua'ñ gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ, ba baapam jamɨt mi' dhɨr nam pai' ka bɨɨtɨt. Ba' giilhim bhai' ji chooto'n jamɨt bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam na mɨt ba ja tɨɨ gu gook ja'tkam na mɨt giop ba dudua nam ka ko'iix kat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'xpɨx bhammɨx dhaam dɨr mui' ba tum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n, jup ja tɨtda am gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios: ―Bhai' gor bi jiim. Ba' gu gook tujuandam gamai'p ji chɨɨtɨs jamɨt joidham tɨbaa'ñ cha'm na mɨt ba jii bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios ja nɨi'ñchudat bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam jix ja bhaamki'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr jix io'm bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n na mɨt jax pɨx bhammɨ ji bhiibhi'ñ gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, ba' jɨ'kchi ia'rɨ gu ba'bhak na jɨ'k daaxix na ia'lhia' gui' gu tanoolh, gio gu ja'tkam xijum gook miil jup koi mɨt nat ja tɨim gu ba'bhak. Ba' gui' na mɨt jɨ'k bii, jix chotdonɨk ma tu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios nax dhaam jup tu'ii'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gook moo ba jim gu tulhiiñara', maa'n pɨx ba bii na pui' tum kuugalhdha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nam ba' kɨ'n bar daipu' ka', mui' dhɨt bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, jup kai'ch am: Dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam, bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'gɇrkam am na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ba' gammɨjɨ pu bar gɇ'gɇrkam ka' am sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa', nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa mi' na pai' daa gu Dios, na mɨt jax ja o'lhia kɨ'n guguu, nai' ji mumgia mɨt, dɨɨrap xi chu sissap gu ja moom, bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: jup kai'ch am: Taxchaab Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nap jix io'm jir gɇ'kam kat bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia', gio nap bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch na chakui jai'ch kat dhi oi'ñga'n, nap gu' aap bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'kam ba' xib na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n gam sia nar pa ja'k.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mui' jai' dhɨt gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aap jum bui, tɨix bhaak am nap bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'kam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Ku ba' gu' nap gu' ba ja tulhiiñchuda', ya' bar bhaan gu' nap pai' dhuuk ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan, no'm jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu buimɨk piam ku gu'x buam jum duukam. Xib jap ba' ampɨx tu ja makia' gui' na tu' ja a'm bipio' gui' nam bɨjɨk jum a'mkam tu a'gimɨk gum ñi'ook, gio gui' nam jum a'mkam tu juanaimɨk, gam gui' na mɨt tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak mi' pui' jii nap jax jix aa'. Gio gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm jum tɨɨ, pui'p jup ja makia' na tu' ja a'm jup bipio', siam chi moor jix chutumñigam piam siam cham tu' bia'. Sia ja makia' ap na tu' ja a'm bipio' gui' nam tu ko'ktulhdhimɨk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' jim kupio' gu ki'ñgob bhai' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios. Ba' nañ mui' xi chɨ nɨi'ñ, bhɨjɨmmɨ pɨx daa ɨrban dɨr gux xidhuu kam kaaja. Ba' mi' dhɨr gɇ' bhai' ji chɨm tɨr, gio nat bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, gam nat bhai' ji ii' gu chia.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr maa'n bhammɨ ja'p bam maax jix dhaam gu ubii ji chɨ'kat maa'n gu jannulh na gɇ' tanoor, ja'p na jɨ'x tu tonni'ñ gu tanoolh, maa'n xi kɨɨs gu kuruun na mambhɨɨx daman gook bha daraa gu chiichia', amuub bɨtaa'n ja'p ba' daa gu masaa'n na pai' kɨɨk gu ubii.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jir alhi'ch kɨɨkam ji gu' gu ubii, ba' mi' dhɨr gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji saraa nat bhai' jix chu ko'kor nat bam ai na pai' dhuuk tɨgia' gu alhii na bia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx ja'p ja'k jup bam maax gu ja'ook, dai na giilhim ɨɨbhidham tu'm gu tukga'n, ja'p tu'm na tɨrook dai na gɇ' gio nax bɨ', xijum gook tu moom, mambhɨɨx ba' tu a'aa', ba' bɨɨx na jɨ'k moomoram jɨ'ma'n ja tuttutu' gu kukrun.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' gu bhai'ñ kɨ'n ja gɨbio'rak xi ja ii'ñxich mui' gu chiichia' na bha ja'p daraa na jɨ'k pɨx aagix, mummu ja'k xi ja iabu oi'ñga'n bhaan. Mi' dhɨr ba' mui' ji ai mu ja'k na pai' gu ubii na kia'pɨx ba duduar alhii kɨ'n, na sap ba' mi' pu jugioka' gu maraa'n na jax maaxilhia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu alhii nat tɨɨ gu ubii, jir chio'ñ. Dhi' sap ba'r ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nax oo' kɨ'n ja sɨlhka'nda' kɨ'n gu baiñum oxia. Ba' moo jano' nat jax maaxir gu alhii mi' dhɨr pum bhɨɨk baasɨ'n ja'k jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios, nam bhammɨ ja'k gɇ'kam kɨ'n daasa'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dɨɨlh mi' pup bii gu ubii, dɨ'ɨɨ'n gu alhii. Ba' mai' ba mɨɨ mu ja'p gampɨx na pai' cham jaroi' oirɨ na ba' cham jaroi' jax dhooda', sɨlh pu bhɨi mummu maa'n kap na pai' tu aagi'ñ gu Dios na aaya', nat gu' pu pui' ja'k ba duu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nam gu mi' oi'ñkam ka tu maakda' gu koi' na kɨ'n duaka' baik oi'dha' daman taak juugɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gatuuk jup ma jɨgialhich bhammɨx dhaam, gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nar ja gɇ'kam tuk gu jai' noonbi'ñ na Migial tɨɨ', ma tu kokda ja bɨɨm gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ buiñor gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook. Gu ja'ook tɨix io'm tu kokda ja bɨɨm gu noonbi'ñ na ɨlhdhat na moo ja mai'chia' gɨt gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ji nat gu' cham tu' jax ji dhuu, tu' pɨx dooda mɨt, ba' pu mai' ardi mɨt bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mu ja'k jamɨt xi ardi oi'ñga'n bhaan bɨnkam gu noonbi'ñ, ba' xib bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n oirɨt ja iatgi'ñ gu ja'tkam. Dhi' pɨx jir di' gu ko' na bɨjɨk dɨr pu jai'ch nat dɨr dhi oi'ñga'n jup jum duu, na gook kɨ'n tɨɨ': Ja'ook gio ba' Dhiabur.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mɨkkat bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam bhai' ba tum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n, jup tum kai'ch: ―Xib ba' ya' bam ai na pai' dhuuk saak jix ja joi'ndai gu Dios tu ja uañdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'kam ba' xib gu Dios ja bui gu ja'tkam, nat gu' guch Xoi'kam pui' ba tu kuugalh nat jax tɨɨdak mu joot mu oi'ñga'n bhaan, mai' ba ardi gu' gu ja'ook na ya' mɨmrat ka ja iattulhi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam, gammɨjɨ ya' kɨɨka' kia' na ja iattulhi'ñchu'nda' buiñor gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Xib na mɨt gu' mai' ba ardi, ba' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham ka bhaai' ka' na jax ja iattulhdha' gu ja'ook dhich jaaduñ, nat gu' ba tu ja namkix gu ja ua'tulhdhara' guch Xoi'kam gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, jano' nat jaax gu ɨ'ra'n bhaan gu kuruus na ba' pu'ñi duuji bɨɨx dappaam tu ja uañdhix ka' gu ja ua'tulhdhara'. Ba' cham jax ka ja dooda' xib gu ja'ook, nam gu' dhi' ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam. Pui' ku ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor, mi' dhɨr nai'p ji jii mɨt na mɨt tu ja a'gidham gu jai' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios cham tu' bhaan ji chotdonɨk sia mɨt chi ja bhaamkidhak ja koi, nam gu' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n bax biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ya ja'p tu oi'dha'x dhaam, gɇ'kam kɨ'n japim jix bhai' pɨx bam taat ka' na mɨt ya' ba ai dhich jaaduñ na mɨt mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' nam jich bɨɨm ba oi'ñka'. Dai aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mu ja'p jup tu'ii' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n dho gi gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix buam jum aa'nda' ji, na gu'x io'm jam tulhiiñchuda' gu ja'ook bɨɨx aixim bhaan nat ya' dɨr mɨjɨ xi mɨɨ, sia aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mu ja'p oipo suudai' dhaam kaknub ta'm, gam na jam iatgidhai mu ja'k jam bhɨichdha' na pai'x io'm jum tulhiiña' dɨɨlh, na gu'x maat na bar mia'n nam pai' dhuuk daagɨi tulhiiñchuda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mu ja'k xi ardi gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm na tɨrook oi'ñga'n bhaan, mu ɇɇk bax mu'aam gu ubii gui' nat kia'pɨx tɨɨ gu alhii, na gu' giilhim jix bhaamtu'. Gu' ji nat gu' jimiññor gu ubii, gu ja'ook ba' gatuuk dɨr mui'p ji ardi.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu Dios xi a'ngatuda' gu ubii ja'p tu'm na gu bha'aa' gu a'nga'n na sap ba' dɇ'ji nakga' gu ja'ook, gio na ba' jotmoda' aaya' mummu gampɨx nat pai' joot nam o'ñcho' baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt, na ba' cham mu'aa' gu ja'ook.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu ja'ook chiñi'ram dɨr mui' xi nua gɇ' gu suudai' na sap ba' bi'ñña' gɨt gu ubii nax mu'aam,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: gu' ji nat gu' gu dɨbɨɨr jotmoda' xim kupio' na mui' ba mɨlhiim gu suudai' mu na pai' gu ubii, mɨjɨ ja'k pɨx ji baap gu suudai' dɨbɨɨr bɨta', pɨx cham pai' matgir, pu cham jax dhooda.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Giilhim tɨix bhaam ji gu' gu ja'ook buiñor gu ubii nat cham jax dhooda. Ba' gatuuk na mɨt pai' xi mui'dha gu bipsalhi'ñ gu ubii, bhai' ji chu kokda ja bui. Gu bipsalhi'ñ gu ubii, dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch am gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gio nam gammɨjɨx biiñak buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm na gu tɨrook, mi' pɨx ji kɨkbu ju'ñdharam gu gɇ' suudai'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mɨkkat maa'n mɨjɨ dɨr ba ji buus suudai' ɨraab gui' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, pui' ɨɨbhidham tu'm jup tu tuuku', xijum gook jup tu moom, mambhɨɨx ba' tu a'aa'. Ba' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ka'm gu a'ga'n ja tuttutu' gu kukrun, bha moomoram ba' mui' bha ua'ñixchu' gu ñiiñio'k na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu tukga'n gui' jɨ' nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nat mɨjɨ dɨr ji buus suudai' ɨraab, ja'p tu'm na dɨ'nbalh, gu tootna'n ba' ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu booji gu tootna'n, gu chiñii'ñ ba' ja'p tu'm na gu mabii'ñ gu chiñii'ñ. Gu' ba' gu ja'ook gui' na ja'p tu'm jup tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook, gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba dai gui' jɨ' nat mɨjɨ dɨr buus suudai' ɨraab nar nobii'ñ, na sap ba' ja'xbui'p bar gɇ'kam ka' na dɨɨlh, gam na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ji na gu' panaas ja'p tu'ii' na maa'n muukixchu' gu ma'oo'n gui' jɨ' nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, panaas kux io'm jix ko'ktolhdhix, cham jɨ'xdha' ka dodhia' kam tu'ii', gu' ji nat gu' mi' jotmoda' bhai' ji dhua cham jum ɨlhdham. Ba' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na mɨt tɨɨ nat ba dua gu ma'oo'n gui' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlhdhak mu ja'k ji kai mɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' dai nam ba tu daanda' buiñor gu ja'ook gui' na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ', nam gu' bɨɨx ba kaichu' gui' na mia'n jir nobii'ñ nat pu pu kai'ñkam gɇ'kam kɨ'n dai na ba' pu'ñi ja iatgidhai bɨɨx gu ja'tkam ja chiñia' nam tu dañia' buiñor. Tu daanda' am ba' gu ja'tkam buiñor gu ja'ook gio buiñor gu nobii'ñ jup xi kai'chɨt: ―¡Ja'p moo tu' sɨlhkam jir gɇ'kam ji dhi' nach jaroi' kaichgɨt ba tu daan buiñor! Cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' jax dhooda' sia pɨk jax ka' gɨt, na gu' cham tu' jumaip jai'ch na ja'xbui'p jir gɇ'kam na dhi'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' jɨ' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook jup ja tɨtda bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na sap dhi'r di' gu Dios, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k aagi'ñ dɨɨlh gu ja'ook. Ba' bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨkat gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt. Jup tɨtda ɨp gu ja'ook na sap bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxdha' gu Dios na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' pui'p duu gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nat jax chia, jix bhaamut bhai' ji a'ga gu Dios, bɨɨx aixim ba ai'chuxi'ñ na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ ja bɨndat sia gu noonbi'ñ nam bhammɨ ja'p jup tu'ii'x dhaam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' nat bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' sia dhi' pu'ñi ja'k chia gu ja'ook na tu duñia'. Ba' jɨ'kchi ja koi nam jɨ'k kaichgɨt gu Dios, na gu'x aa' nam dai gui' kaichgɨda'. Bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨka' na jɨ'k ja'tkam, sia nam jir pa ja'k kam, piam siam jai' maakam tu ñiok.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n gu ja'tkam ba tu daan am buiñor gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nat jɨ'k pu cham ja dai gu Dios jix io'm bɨjɨk dɨr na ba' moo dhi oi'ñga'n jup ba jai'chdhɨlhia', bhaan gu u'uan nam pai' daaxix nam jɨ'k bhammɨ aaya'x dhaam, nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na pai' ja daasaim xib gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhim buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu jaroi' no'x aa' na bɨɨx jix mat ka' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na bɨɨx mo'ram baapsa' mi' na pai' ja'pnim kai'ch:

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: “Bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k daaxix nam ja da'ngɨi ja kuupa', pui' ja dooda' am, gio gui' nam jɨ'k jup daaxix nam tɇ'tɇb kukxir kɨ'n ja kooda', pui'm jup ja dooda', ba aagix am nam jaroi' pui' ja dooda'. Dhi' ba' bhaan matgilhia' na jaroi' moo tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor gu Dios, no'm moo pui' nam jax bax biiñak buiñor siam jax ja bua.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx jumai ja'p dɨr ja'k dɨbɨɨr bɨta' bhai'p ji buus gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook na pui' ɨɨbhidham tu'm ɨp gu tukga'n, gook tu a'aa' ja'p tu'm na gu kasnir gu a'ga'n, pui' ja'k tu ñiok na dɨɨlh gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'xbui' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jup daaxix na gu jumai nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom. Bɨɨx kap ja daam jup ba kɨɨk gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ja chia nam sap tu daanda' buiñor gu jumai nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom, gui' nat kia'pɨx dua gu ma'oo'n na ka muukix kat maa'n, sia ku gu' cham jɨ'xdha' ka dodhia' kam tu't.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio na joidham jix bhai'm duukam xip tu bua ja nɨi'ñchudat bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam, tai bhammɨ dɨr ja'p jix dhaam bhai' ji ii'ñxichu'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' na mɨt tɨɨ bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na joidham bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia' nam tu' cham ɨlhii'ñ, bɨɨx jix bhai'm ɨlhdhak mu ja'k jup ji kai mɨt, nat gu' dhi' kɨ'n ba ja iatgi. Ba' mi' dhɨr dai nat ba ja chia nam sap jup duñia' gui' na pui'p tu'm ka' na gu jumai nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom, gui' na mɨt tɨi sɨi tɇb kuxiir kɨ'n, gu' ji nat gu' cham tu' muu.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk tɨɨmo na mɨt jup duu, gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook gui' nat tu chia nam jup duñia', xi dhua'ñ gup duñiixim na sap ba' dɨɨlh ba tu oirɨda' gio na tu ñiokda'. Ja chia ba' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam sap tu' ka'm nɨidhat tu daanda' buiñor gup duñiixim. Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k cham aa' nam tu dañia' buiñor, pu bɨɨx ja koi.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio nat ja chia nam sap jum matgilhdha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam ja kokobtai' am piam gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam ja noonob am, na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam buiñor jup tui'dhi' gu ja'ook. Bɨɨx jamɨt ba'm matgilh gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, pui' na jax gui' nam jir jix chutumñigam gio gui' na cham, sia gui' nam jir tujuandam gio gui' na jɨ'k cham, gam bɨɨx gu a'aalh nam kia'pɨx maaxilhim, gio gui' nam jix io'm bar jagɨ'gɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' pu cham bhaai' nam tu saba'da' gio nam tu ga'ra' gui' nam jɨ'k cham bha daaxdhix ja kokobtai' am gui' na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam buiñor jup tui'dhi' gu ja'ook piam na jɨ'k ja'kɨlhi'ñ bia', nam gu' ja o'bhagi'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ya' ba' moox io'm matda' jum aa' gio na pim jix bhai' xim ga'ngada' na pim ba' machia' na jax chɨɨ' gui' na ɨɨbhidham tu'm bhaan dhi'ñi ja'kɨlhi'ñ na ya'ni daa: Xijum maa'n jix cha'tmam oo'm daman baik oo'm xijum maa'n (666). Dhi' pim ba' bhaan machia'. Ku gu' na jax chɨɨ'ka', jir pu chu'm ka' ji nam jax chɨɨ' gu ya ja'p kam ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, bhammɨ kɨɨk gɇ' oidha' ta'm na pai' Sion tɨ tɨɨ' ja bɨɨm xijum gook jix cha'tmam oo'm daman maakob miil (144,000) gu ja'tkam. Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n bha ua'ñix ja kokobtai' am na jax chɨɨ' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir gio na jax chɨɨ' gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chɨm tɨr bha ja'p jix dhaam, ja'p tum kai'ch na jax no' tɨroon gu duuk, piam pai' no' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai', gio ba' na jax jup tum kai'chdha' no'm pai' tu sab mui' dhɨt gu sasabdam kikchar kɨ'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu mui' ja'tkam nam bhai' guguuk bɨɨma'n gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, laala'n am maa'n gu xibkam alabaa'n mi' ji gu'kat ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' gio gu maakob sasoi'. Ku gu' cham bhai' ji na jaroi' machia' dhi' dhi alabaa'n, daipu' gux xijum gook jix cha'tmam oo'm daman maakob miil na mɨt mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: nam cham tu' bɨɨx aixim tu buimɨk na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ni nam cham tu' mui'x bhai' ja tɨtdaimɨk ja bɨɨm boppimɨk gu u'uub, dai ji nam tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir. Ja'p ji buus na mɨt jum makgɨrta buiñor gu Dios nat pai' dhuuk ja tulhiiñchudak ja koi gu ja'ook.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhdhak jamɨt, ni na mɨt cham pai' dhuuk iatda' tu a'gak.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ ja'p dɇdɇ' ɨrban gux dhaam, jir di' pɨx gui' na bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n tu ja a'gi'ñ gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam tu ja a'gi'ñ, siam jai' maakam tu ñiok, piam sia kum jir jax chu'm, gam sia kum jir pa ja'k kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Jup kai'ch gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Tu' ka'm japim nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' gu Dios, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam. Xib ya' bam ai na pai' dhuuk saak ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Dhi' pɨx jir di' gui' nat jup duu dhi oi'ñga'n gio dhix dhaam, gio gu suudai' na mu ja'p suusu'n mui' kap.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moo mi' dhɨr jumai bhai'p ji ñio gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, jup kai'ch ɨp: ―Xib dho gi ba' am xi ko'ya' am ji gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam, na mɨt pai' dhɨr pui' ja mamtux bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k gɇ'kam kɨ'n jum ua'tulhdha', gam nam jax ja'k ja daanda' gu didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam jup duñiixim nam jax ja'k tu jim dɨɨlh. Ja'p ji buus na mɨt ja i'iich gu biiñ nam kɨ'n jum ua'tulhdha' buiñor gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai bhai'p ji ñio gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar baikim ka', jup kai'ch ɨp gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Gu jaroi' no't tu daanɨ buiñor gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook, gio gup duñiixim na pui'p tu'm, gam no't jum matgilh bha kobtagi'ñ piam gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam nobi'ram na bhaan jix maatɨ' na ba kaichu' gu ja'ook,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: am tɨ'ñchoka' nax io'm tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios mu na pai' mɨim gu tai nax io'm jix choiñ ja nɨi'ñchudat bɨɨx na jɨ'k noonbi'ñ gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, ja'p ji buusnia' na ja i'chdha' gui' nax io'm jix xibu' nax maimda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi'm ba' pu mɨɨjidha' gammɨjɨ sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt, na gu' cham pai' dhuuk tukia' gu tai, nam gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua no' mɨt jax dhuuk tu daanɨ buiñor gu ja'ook, gio gui' nar jup duñiixim na pui'p tu'm, gio no' mɨt jum matgilh na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam gui' ba kaichu'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jum aa' nam nakga' siat pu'ñix io'm bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda gu ja'ook, dai nam mi' pui' xi chu kuugalhdhidha' pɨx na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Dhi' ba' bhaan ba matgilhia' nam sɨlhkam bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mɨkkat ba' moo bhammɨx dhaam dɨr bhai' ba tuñ a'gi mɨt, jup jiñ chɨtda am: ―Ja'pni ja'k jap mi'p xi chu daasa' u'uan ta'm: “¡Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' ba tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai ko'ya' buiñor guch Xoi'kam!” Ba' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' jup kai'ch ɨp: “Jɇɇ' dho. Cham pai' dhuuk magooñi' ja a'm ka jimia', nam gu' cham pai' dhuuk ka tu juana', ni nam tu' bhaan kam tulhiiña', dai nam gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Dhi' ba'r ja mai'chɨk ka' nam jix bhai'm duukam jup tu buimɨi bhaankamu'n gu Dios.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', maa'n gu maa'nkam bha ja'p daa joidham jix chua tɨbaa'ñ cha'm, kuruun maa'n xi kɨɨs nar jix uam totbikdam, gio ba' juus maa'n jup xi dhaa' joidham jix mu'uuk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhɨjɨ dɨr buusnɨk na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios jup tɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n gu maa'nkam na bhammɨ daa tɨbaa'ñ cha'm: ―Ba kabka ba' xib gu tiriik mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan. Bar am nap tɨ bhɨɨji kɨ'n dhim juus ba tu kaipga'. Bar bhaan gu' na pai' dhuuk tɨm bhɨɨ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' na bhai' daa tɨbaa'ñ cha'm nat jax pui'p tɨ kai, ba tɨ bhɨim gu tiriik mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan. Bɨɨx kap tɨ bhɨɨ na jɨ'k kap tɨ ɨx.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mɨkkat ba' moo jumai bhɨjɨ dɨr jup ji buus chiop gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, pui' juus jup xi dhaa'ñchu' joidham jix mu'uuk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moo jumai bhai' dhɨr jup ji buus bhaan gu kubhioñkar na ja'p tu'm na sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar, na pui' ja'k gɇ'kam kɨ'n daaxix na mɨidha' sia tu' na pɨx. Ba'p tɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios na ua' gu juus: ―Ba tɨ ɨ'kmɨra'p ba' xib gu uubas mu ja'p na tɨ ɨx bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n kɨ'n dhim juus nap daa'. Bar am gu' na pai' dhuuk jum u', na gu' bax bhai.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nat jax pui'p tɨ kai, xi mɨɨ nat tɨ ɨ'kim gu uubas mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, bɨɨx ɨ'kɨk mu xi iicha bhaan gu gɇ' na bhaan jum bakɨ' gu barga'n gu uubas na mi ja'p kɨɨk nam ba' bakɨi'ñña'. Dhi' gu ja'tkam kat jup jum kai'ch nam pui' ji buan na gu uubas, ba' na pai' dhuuk jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios, ja'p ji buusnia' na ba ja bakɨi'ñña'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat pai' dhuuk xim bakɨ' gu uubas nat mi' iicha gu nobii'ñ gu Dios gui' na bhaan jum bakɨ' na mu ja'p kɨɨk ju'ñdharan gu gɇ' kiicham, ɨ'ɨɨr pɨx bhai' ji mɨɨ gu barga'n, giilhim gɇ'p jum duu, bhammɨ ja'p xi juu ja chiichiñ am gu kakbai nam mi ja'p guguuk, gio nat mɨk ja'p juugɨt mɨɨ, chi jɨ'k baik simaan kɨ'n jum a'jɨ gu pui' nañ jimda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moop ja tɨɨ ñich xijum gook gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam pui' ja'k tu'm kɨ'n dalhxix bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n nam bɨɨx aixim bhaan ja tulhiiñchuda' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n bhaankamu'n gu Dios, na ba' moo bar daipu' ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu suudai' mi ja'p jup suu'n gɇ', joidham jix kɨɨ'x uañ, dai na bɨɨna' gui' na gɇ' mɨim ja'p na tai. Mi ja'p gai dhɨr dhi gɇ' suudai'm ba' guguuk jɨ'kchi gu ja'tkam ji chu daa'ngɨt gu ja kikchar. Jir di' am gui' na mɨt ma'iich gu ja'ook nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm tu tuuku', gio gup duñiixim na pui'p tu'm, na mɨt cham tu'm matgilh ja kokobtai' am, gio na mɨt cham tu daanɨ buiñor sia tɨi pup ja chiñiimɨ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' ji gu'kat laala'n am maa'n gu alabaa'n gui' na jax chu'm laala'nda' bɨjɨk gu Moisees gui' na bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, gio na jax chu'm jup laala'nda' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk, nap jum kai'ch: ¡Ja'p moo tu' sɨlhkam jix io'm jir gɇ'kam ap ji bak jich Gɨ'kora', gio nap bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia' jix bhai'm duukam gio gɇ'gɇr jup jum duu'nkam! Bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'kam ap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio nap bɨɨx kap ja sɨlhka'n gu ja'tkam nap jax pɨx jix aa' aap dɨɨlh.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx pɨx gu ja'tkam tu' ka'm jum nɨidhat tu daan am aap jum bui Dios jich Gɨ'kora', na gu' dai aap nap jix io'm jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨkat jix io'm jir gɇ'kam. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam tu' ka'm jum tɨɨgɨi tu dañia' am aap jum bui, nam gu' ba machia' nap aap joidham jir jix bhai'kam kat jix bhai' ja sɨlhka'n gui' nam bam kaichu'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' jim kupio' gu chiopga'n gu Dios na bhammɨ kɨɨk jix dhaam, bhai' na pai'x io'm jix chu xidhuu.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bhɨjɨ dɨr bhai' ji bubua mɨt xijum gook gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam pu chu'm kɨ'n dalhxix nam ja tulhiiñchuda' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx aixim bhaan bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Jix chooto tɨ tɨi'chu' am bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, jix kɨkɨɨ' ji gu'x u'uañ gu ja jajannulh, gio nar jix dha'ram namkɨm, ko'kmarak bhibhispara' nar jix uam totbikdam jam bha ja'p jup xi chu buupratu' ja bhabhaastu am.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maadɨt gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa gu Dios, jɨ'ma'n xi ja maa gu a'lhich jaja' nar jix uam totbikdam gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios na mɨt bhɨjɨ dɨr ji bubua chiop. Dhi jaja' bhaan mi jim gui' na tu' kɨ'n jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios na jaroi' gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ, na gu'x io'm jix bhaam ja bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx mi' dhɨr bhai' ji bam gu kuubhɨx na pai' daa gu Dios, bhɨjɨmmɨ ja'k ji baa na pai' tu chiopi', bhɨjɨ jim tɨɨmo ɨrban dɨr. Ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' na chakui jaroi' bhaai' na mu bakia' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios, na mɨt gu' chakui tu tulhiiñchuda gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ. No' mɨt pui' ba tu kuugalh na ba' bax bhaai'n ka' nam mu baapkia'. Gu kuubhɨx dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ na jax ja'k jir gɇ'kam gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chum ñio bhɨjɨ dɨr na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios, jup ja tɨtda gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam jɨ'ma'n ja daada' gu jaja': ―Nua'pu' pim mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan dhi' na kɨ'n tu tulhiiñchu'n gu Dios na mi jim dhi jaja' ta'm na pim ja daada'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'n bɨɨpɨ' mu jii mu oi'ñga'n bhaan nat ba nu'aam gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm. Ba' nat mu ɇɇk mi ja'p xeeñ ñua dɨbɨɨr ta'm. Bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k matgilhdhix ja kokobtai' am na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam kaichu' gu ja'ook na ɨɨbhidham tu'm gu tukga'n, gam nam tu' ka'm nɨidhat tu daan buiñor, sia gup duiñxim na pui'p tu'm, bhai' ji ja ai gui' na ja'p tu'm na biprɨ'x na giilhim jix ko'k.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai mɨjɨp ji dhuu gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ua'dat gu ja'aa nat ba nu'aam ɨp mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan gui' na mi jim. Ba' mu ɇɇk mi' xi ñua gɇ' suudai' chɨr. Ɨ'ɨɨr jup jum duu gu suudai' bɨɨx na jɨ'x juugɨt suu'n, ja'p tu'm na jax gu ɨ'ra'n gu jaroi' no' mɨt mua. Pu bɨɨx koi mɨt gu dudua kam nam mi' ka tu oipo nat pai' dhuuk ɨ'ɨɨr jup jum duu gu suudai'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai mɨjɨp ji dhuu gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ua'dat gu ja'aa, baik ba' moo ba jim. Ba' mu ja'p xi ñua a'kkɨ'n na pai' mɨr gu suudai' gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm gio mu ja'p na jax jir biipiatam, ɨ'ɨɨr jup jum duu ɨp gu suudai'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p kai'ch gu nobii'ñ gu Dios gui' na mu ja'p nuuka'n gu suudai': ―Aap dho gi ja maak ji Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nap jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk na tu' ja a'm bipio' dhi ja'tkam nam cham tu' ka'm jum nɨi'ñ aap nap bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch gio nap gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: na mɨt gu' dhi' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jum ua'tulh aap jum bui. Tɨɨ' na mɨt giilhim ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi gui' nam jum bui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat gio gui' nam jum a'mkam tu a'gimɨk bɨjɨk gum ñi'ook. Xib jam ba' mi' xi aaya' nam i'ya' gu ɨ'ɨɨr nam ba' mi' xi machia' na jax tu tatda' gu pui' na mɨt jax ja dooda gui' nam jum kaichgɨt gio gui' nam jum a'mkam tu a'gat. Pui' dho tu'm ja a'm bipio'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' bhai' dhɨr bhaan gu kubhioñkar na ja'p tu'm na sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar, bhai'p ji chum ñio, jup tum kai'ch: ―Pui' dho aapi' Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nap bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia'. Maaxik dho ja maak ap na jax ja'k ja a'm bipio' dhi ja'tkam, nap gu'x maat na mɨt gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua aap jum bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios mu jimɨɨk bhammɨ ja'k jup xi ñua bhaan gu tanoolh gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm na ua'. Ba' dhi' kɨ'n jix io'm jix choiñ bhai' ji chon gu tanoolh, ba ji ja mɨi'ñ gu ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Tɨi pup koi mɨt kɨ'n gu tanoolh nat ja a'm ton, na gu' giilhim jix choiñ, gu' ji na gu' ni jɨ'x ku mɨt iam soi' ba jim ɨlh buiñor gu Dios sia ku jax ja tulhiiñchu'n. Jano' mɨt dho ba' giilhim bhaak ji buiñor, bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji ai'chux jamɨt na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Cham pai' na mɨt iam soi'm ɨlhdhak ba tu daanɨ buiñor ku cham ka ja tulhiiñchu'nda' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mɨkkat gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios mui'p ji jii, mi'p xi ñua gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm na pai' dhɨr jir gɇ'kam gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom, jix chukgam jup tum duu mi' na pai' daa. Ba' gu ja'tkam nam kaichu', giilhim pɨx sasrak bɨɨt am nam jum tulhiiñ,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: na ja ɇɇ gui' na ja'p tu'm na biprɨ'x nax io'm jix ko'k. Gu' ji na gu' sia kum jax jum tulhiiñ, cham pai' iam soi' ba jim ɨlh jamɨt buiñor gu Dios, pui' nam jax jix buam ba tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, gio nam giilhim jix bhaamut bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxi'ñ gu Dios nax dhaam jup tu'ii'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr jumai mui'p ji jii gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ua'dat gu ja'aa, xijum maa'n ba' moo ba jim. Sɨlh jim mu gɇ' akkɨ'n na pai' Eupraates tɨ tɨɨ', na pai' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai'. Mu ɇɇk mi' xi ñua suudai' chɨr gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm. Ba' nai' pɨx ji gaa gu suudai', cham pai' ka mɨr, na ba'x bhaai'n ka' nam mu bubuakia' baasɨ'n dɨr ja'k gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam mu dɨr ja'k mu jiim xia'lhbui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ', gio gu nobii'ñ na pui' giilhim tu'm jup tu tuuku' nax xijum gook tu moom, gio ba' gui' na bhaankamu'n tu a'ga, bhɨjɨ dɨr ji bubua mɨt ja chiichiñ am gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' ja'p tu'm na sosbha'n,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: nam jir noonbi'ñ gu ja'ook, nam bɨxchu'x aichu'n nam pu tu duñia'. Ba' dhi' dhi cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' mu ja'p ja joot gu ja'ook ja bui bɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam pui' ja'k ja jurtu'npo' nam bɨɨx maa'n ñi'ook jup dui tu kokda' buiñor gu Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' sia jax tum bua, na gu'p kai'ch guch Xoi'kam: “Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' tu jimia' gu jaroi' no' gammɨjɨ pu tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui, ni na cham pai' dhuuk koosɨt daaka'. Na gu' no' cham tu'p jum buixdhat am ɨrdat daa, ja'p ji buusanda' nax dhaapkat oirɨda', ba' giilhim jix xi'ɨraa' nañ pai' dhuuk mu jimda'. Gu' cham ji no' gu' gammɨjɨ soi'm ɨlhii'ñ, ja'p ji buusanda' ji na tɨm tɨ'ii'ñka', ba' cham xi'ɨraam jum ɨlhdha' nañ pai' dhuuk mu aaya'. Nañ gu' aañ jotmoda' mi' pɨx ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham, ja'p na jax gu ɨxkum no' pai' bax chɨ ɨɨxdham jax chu'm ba'k chɨr, na gu' jotmoda' pɨx mu jimɨi mi bakia', pu cham mat ka' gu kiokam na jax chu'm tukaa' mu jim.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' pui' ja'k ja jujurtuda mɨt bɨɨx na jɨ'k gu gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam maa'n ñi'ook jup dui mummɨm jumpadat na pai' Armagedoon tɨ tɨɨ' gu ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n, na gɇ'x gio'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai mui'p ji jii gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' moo bar daipu' ka'. Mu ja'p jup xi ñua gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm bhaan gu jɨbɨɨlh. Ba' bhɨjɨ dɨr chiop na pai' daa gu Dios bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n, jup tum kai'ch: ―Xib dho gi gu' pu bɨɨx dappaam ba tum kuugalh ji.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr bhai' ji chɨm bɨpgɨ bha ja'p jix dhaam, gio nat gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chɨm tɨr, gam nat jix io'm bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, na cham pai' dhuuk pu'ñi pɨk jix io'm joiñdhat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨ', baik kap bhai' ji jai gu dɨbɨɨr. Ba' pu bɨɨx nai' ji ia'rɨ gu ba'bhak, sia bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na jax jir kikcham kat, nat gu' bɨɨx kap joi gu dɨbɨɨr, ba' mui' koi mɨt gu ja'tkam. Ba' gui' nam Babiloonia oi'ñkat, jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda gu Dios, na gu' pu ja bi'chulhi'ñ na pu'ñi ja dooda' jax chu'm tanoolh, na mɨt gu' gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor, ja'p ji buus nat ja i'iich gu biiñ nam kɨ'n ko'ya'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Sia bɨɨx pɨx cham pai' matgir gu a'lhich dɨppɨr na mu ja'p ka daraat suudai' ɨraab, gio gu oi'dha', nat gu'x io'm joi gu oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ja'xpɨx jix dhaam dɨr bhai' ji ii' gu chia gɇ'gɇr, chi jɨ'k gook oo'm kiilos jix bɨɨpɨt bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Ba' gu ja'tkam giilhim jix bhaak am buiñor gu Dios, bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxi'ñ am na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, na gu' giilhim ja tulhiiñchu'n kɨ'n gu chia.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maadɨt gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam ja daada' gu jaja', bha jimɨɨk jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Bhai' xi jim ya'ni ja'k nañ jum tɨɨ'ñchuda' nam jax ja'k tulhiiñchuda' gu ubii gui' nax io'm jir ganai' pɨx ka', na bɨɨx kap tu daam kɨɨka' na jɨ'k kap suusu'n gu suudai'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dhi' dhi ubii ja'p ji buusan na bɨɨx jix bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppo gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam mu ja'p na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam gu' pui' ja'k jup ba tu jim na jax gui', bɨɨx jai'p ba tu daan am ja bui gup duñiixim didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam, bɨɨx sia gui' nam jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam ja'p ji buus nat ja i'iich gu biiñ na pui' ja'k tu bua.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', bañ baidhak gu nobii'ñ gu Dios mummu pai' maa'n kap gampɨx. Ba' mi' oirɨ maa'n gu ubii bhaan gu tu'x buadam jix bɨ' na ɨɨbhidham tu'm, jix xijum gook tu moom, mambhɨɨx ba' tu a'aa'. Bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir tukgaram bha ua'ñixchu' gu ñiiñio'k na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu ubii ba' joidham jix abhaar jup xi chɨ tɨi'chu', jix bɨ' kat jix muraa'nma' gu jannulhi'ñ, jix uam totbikdam kɨ'n bha ja'p jup xi oi'chdhix gio gu joodai gui' nax a'bhar totbik. Ba' maa'n ua' gu ja'aa na suu'ngɨm mi jim na jax ja'k jir tu'm dɨɨlh, pui' na jax nax io'm jir ganai' pɨx gam na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gio pui' na jax na mui' tu didiosi' jup duiñxim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' bha kobtagi'ñ bhai' xi chu ua'ñixchu' palhɨɨp na ja'p kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch: “Mi gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨ', ja'p ji buusan na dhi'r ja naan bɨɨx gu u'uub gui' nam jir ganai' pɨx, na gu' mi' dhɨr na mɨt pui' ja mamtux gu ja'tkam nam jix buam tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ja'p moo joidham.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ji na gu'x maimtu' gu ubii kɨ'n gu ja ɨ'ɨɨr gui' nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor gu Dios gio gui' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gat. Ba' aañ mi' pɨx pui' ba tu'ii',

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jup jiñ chɨtda: ―¿Jax kup ba' mi' pui' pup tu'ii'? Xib jañ jum aagi'ñdha' na tu' pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ dhi ubii gio dhi' na bhaan jim nax xijum gook tu moom, gio ba' na jax jir jum duukam kum ba' pui' tu'ii'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dhi' nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm nax xijum gook tu moom na bhaan jim dhi ubii, dhi' maadɨt jir di' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook. Ku gu' cham tu' ya' ka oirɨ ji xib, dai bɨjɨk na jax ya' xi oilhimɨk, ku ba' gu' cham xiim gio ya'p aaya' ji, mu dɨr ja'k jimda' na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' na cham pai' ju'. Daipu' pɨx ya' xi ɇɇji, nam gu' mi' dhɨr daagɨi mu ba bua' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Ba' gu ja'tkam gui' nat jɨ'k pu cham ja dai gu Dios bhaan gu u'uan mi' na pai' ja daasaim gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhim buiñor bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na ba' moo bap duñia' dhi oi'ñga'n, giilhim bhai' ji chotdonia' am nam ba tɨgia' na gio mi'p ba aaya' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, sia ku gu' xib cham pai' maatɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Xib jap ba' moox io'm bɨɨx jum jur kɨ'n xiñ kaaya' nañ jum aagi'ñdha' na jax jir jum duukam gu pui' na jax ja'k tu'm gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook: Gux xijum gook moomo'n gui' nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm, jix xijum gook gu gɇ'gɇrkam kat jup jum kai'ch, gio ba' xijum gok kap ɨp na pai' jax tu daam kɨɨk gu ubii na bhai' daa bhaan gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' dhix xijum gook gɇ'gɇrkam, jix chamaam jamɨt jum gɇ'gɇrkamtak ba koi. Maa'n pɨx ya'r gɇ'kam xib, maa'n ba' moo chakuim gɇ'kamta. Ku ba' gu' no't ya' bam gɇ'kamta gu maa'n na ka bi'iix nam gɇ'kamta', cham tu' mɨk ya'r gɇ'kam ka' ji, alhio pɨx.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu jumai gɇ'kam na mi' dhɨr bhai'p ji jai'chdhɨlhia', jir di' ka' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom na bhaan daa dhi ubii, na gu' jano' gio ya'p ba aaya' na pu'ñi giop bam gɇ'kamta', sia ku gu' bɨjɨk pui'p jir gɇ'kam kat. Ku gu' maadɨt jir di' ka' ji gux xijum gook nam bɨɨpɨ' dɨr jum gɇ'gɇrkamta', daipu' maa'nnim pɨx bam gɇ'kamta', nam gu' mi' dhɨr daagɨi mu ba bua' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Gu' ba' gu mambhɨɨx gu a'ga'n dhi' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, mambhɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam kat jup jum kai'ch, dai nam chakui jai'ch gu xib. Ku ba' gu' ka jai'chdhɨlhia' am ji dhi' dhi gɇ'gɇrkam, ku ba' gu' alhio pɨx ji nam maap jum gɇ'gɇrkamta' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nañ aa' bɨɨpɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nam pai' dhuuk pu'ñi bam gɇ'gɇrkamta' gu mambhɨɨx nañ ja aa', maa'n ñi'ook jup dui gɇ'kam kɨ'n daasa' am mi' ja bui gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom gui' na bhaan jim gu ubii.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' nam palhbuidha' na tu kokda' buiñor guch Xoi'kam na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir. Gu' ji nam gu' cham jɨ'xkat jax dhooda', na gu' guch Xoi'kam na mu dɨr bhai'p ji chu kokda' ja bɨɨm gui' nam kaichu', pu maa'n na jax tu' pɨx dooda' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook gio gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam kaichgɨda'. Na gu' guch Xoi'kam cham jɨ'xdhat jaroi' jax dhooda', na gu' gui'r ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam nai' ja'p jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Bɨɨx oi'ñdha' am jano' gui' na mɨt jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moo ja'pnip jiñ chɨtda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios: ―Ba' dhi suudai' na mui' kap suusu'n nap nɨi'ñ, na pai' jax tu daam kɨɨk dhi ubii nar ganai' pɨx, dhi' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ, sia nam jir pa ja'k kam, sia gui' nam maakam tu ñiok, bɨɨx nam jɨ'k jai'ch ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu mambhɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam jai'chdhɨlhia' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, gio gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, bhai' ji bhaamkidha' am dhi ubii nar ganai' pɨx. Bɨɨx tu boosgidha' am gu tu' na bia', sia gu jajannulhi'ñ na tɨ tɨi'chgɨda'. Mi' dhɨr jam ba' bhai' ji jugia' gu tukga'n, ba' gu jɨ'x na bi'ya', mu xi mɨidha' am tai chɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' dɨɨlh gu Dios pui' ja'k ja jurtuda gu mambhɨɨx gɇ'gɇrkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n nam pu'ñi bɨɨx dhɨt maa'n ñi'ook jup dui gɇ'kam kɨ'n daasa' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook ja bui, na jax dhui pɨx ba' gui' pui' tu kuugalhdha' nat jax ja'k tu dai dɨɨlh gu Dios na tum buimɨi tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' dhi ubii nar ganai' pɨx nap ya' nɨi'ñ, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ gu gɇ' kiicham mi' nam pai' mui' oi'dha' gu ja'tkam, na gu' gu mi' kam gu gɇ'kam, bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨk gu jai' gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, sia gu ja'ppɨx ja'tkam. Pui' ja'k jam ba'p ba tu jim na jax gu mi' oi'ñkam gɇ' kiicham, na mɨt gu' pui' ba ja mamtux.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam bhai' ba jurnim, na gɇ'kam kɨ'n daaxix, gɇ' tonnichu', bɨɨx kap tu maaxir na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: jup kai'chim gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Am xi koi mɨt ba' xib gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam. Bɨɨx pu ia'rɨ gu ja ba'bhak, jajo'k jam pɨx mi' ba oi'dha' nam pai' oi'ñkat, gam gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda', gio gu u'ji' gux bupuichɨk nam jax chu'm cham kɨkɨɨ' ja nɨi'ñ gu ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Nam gu' giilhim cham bhai' tu jimdat dhi' dhi ja'tkam, bɨɨx pui' ja mamtux jamɨt gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k jix io'm jum ua'tulhdha' nam ba' pui'p ba tu daanda' ja bui gu didios jup duñiixim, gam jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm na cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu Dios, sia gui' nam bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Ja'p ji buus na mɨt bha ja i'iich gu biiñ gui' na pui' ja'k tu bua nam ba' pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji chu duñia' na jax cham jir am. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam bɨxchu' tu ga'ra, jix chutumñigam jup jum duu mɨt, nam gu' mi' dhi gɇ' kiicham tu ja saba'nda' gu tu' nam mu tu ga'raidha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam jup tum kai'ch ɨp: ―Aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ba kaichu' gu Dios, ja'k japim jimia' mi' dhɨr dhi gɇ' kiicham na cham jam ia'ñdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu mi' oi'ñkam, gio na ba' cham jai' jam daam jimia' gu tulhiiñara' na pai' dhuuk ja a'm gɨxia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Na mɨt gu' dhi' giilhim gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor gu Dios, ja'p ji buusan nat yammɨ ba ai jix dhaam gu ja ua'tulhdhara' mi' nam pai' jumpadim. Ba' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n nam jɨ'k mi' oi'dha' dhi gɇ' kiicham, ja bi'chulhi'ñ gu Dios nax io'm ja tulhiiñchuda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Xib na tu' jax tui'ka', aapi'm na pim jir tujuandam tugi'ñ, xi ja tulhiiñchuda' pim gu mi' oi'ñkam dhi gɇ' kiicham na jɨ'x ja a'm bipio' gu tulhiiñara' na mɨt gan ja iatgidhak buam ja mamtux gu ja'tkam, ja'p ji buusnia' na pim gookim bha ja i'chdha' gu biiñ gui' na giilhim jix xibu' nax maimda' na mɨt jax ja dooda dɨɨlh gu jai' ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Aañ pu jam tɨtda bhaankamu'n gu Dios na pim siamri xi ja tɨ'ñchoixdha' dhi' dhi ja'tkam na mɨt gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua buiñor, giilhim gu' nam gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka' tu' na pɨx bhaan, gio ba' nam mui' tu bia'kat gux dha'ram namkɨm bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñdha', jup kai'chdha' am ba': “Bɨɨx pɨx tu' ka'm jich ñɨi'ñ am gu ja'tkam dai aach nach jir ya' oi'ñkam Babiloonia, gu' chi nach gu'r jix chutumñigam. Bɨɨx tu bia' ich na tu'ch a'm jum aa', gio na joidham jix bhai' tuch jim. Ba' cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jich chulhiiña' ich.”

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ku ba' gu' xib ya' bam ai ji na pai' dhuuk ja a'm jimia' gu tulhiiñara' nam tu' cham nɨɨrat. Bhiogi' ja a'm jimia', gio ba' muuki' ɨp. Dɨɨlh gu Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam pu'ñi ja'k ja tulhiiñchuda' dhi' dhi ja'tkam, mi' dhɨr ba' mu ja'k xi ja iabu' na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai, nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam jai' pui'x buam jup tu buimɨi nam jax ji ja nɨidhat dhi' dhi ja'tkam, joi'ndam ja tɨɨgɨi bhai' ji susuañia' am nam mu pɨx mɨɨjidha' tai chɨr gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' totdonɨi nam cham pui'p ja tulhiiñchuda' ja bɨndai, dɨlhkob ja'k xi gu'kia' am, ba'p kai'chdha' am mui' ji ja nɨidhat nam jum tulhiiñdha': ―Cham pum aagɨt japim na jax jup ba tu jam buidha' aapi'm Babiloonia oi'ñkam, na pim bɨɨx kap tu daam kɨɨkat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gu' ji nat gu' jotmoda' pɨx cham jum ɨlhdham ba jam tulhiiñchuda gu Dios na pim cham pum aa'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Sia gui' nam bɨxchu' mi' ka tu ga'rat bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, bhai' ji susuañia' am nam joi'ndam ja nɨi'ñdha' nam jum tulhiiñdha' gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam, gam nam pui' xim aa'nda' na cham jaroi' ka jai'ch ka' na tu ja saba'da' gui' nam tu ga'ra nax dha'ram namɨɨk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Pui' na jax gux uam totbikdam, gio ba' gux chua totbikdam, gam gu jai' na pui'x a'bhar jup totbik nax dha'ram jup namɨɨk. Gio pui' na jax gu jajannulh gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm na pui'x dha'ram jup namɨɨk, pui' na jax gui' nar jix chooto na joidham am totbikda', gio gux mumra'nma', gio ba' gux ñankabma', gam jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm. Gio ba' pui' na jax gu bɨxchu' nam jup tu bua nar u'uux sobkoñxim na pui'x dha'ram jup namɨɨk, gio ba' gui' nar bapaiñum nax io'm jix kaapak, gio gui' nax mamoik pa'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' pui' na jax bɨɨx aixim gui' na joidham uub, pui' na jax gui' nam jum jurda' gu ja'tkam nam kɨ'n joidham uubka', gio ba' gui' nam kɨ'n tum kubhion, gam jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm. Gio gu biiñ gui' nax dha'ram namɨɨk, gio pui' na jax gu tiriik gio gu ariin nar tum kua'dam, gio gu asait. Sia pui' na jax gu bɨɨx aixim tu'm gu sasoi', pui' na jax gu kakbai gam mamchus na bhaan tum bhii'mñor, gio ba' gu karretas, gio gam kakasnir, ganai' tujuandam nam tu ja juantu'nda' pui' cham ji ja namkidhat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p kai'chdha' am ɨp tɨi mui' ji ja nɨidhat gu Babiloonia kam nam bam tulhiiñdha': ―¿Xib ba' jaroo ka tuch saba'da' dhi' nach tu' tu ga'ra? Na gu' dai aapi'm na pim jir jix chutumñigam kat gio na jam ko'raarot na pim tu bia'ka' gux dha'ram namkɨm. Xib ba' gu' cham jax kax bhaai' ji, na gu' mi' na pim pai' bam tulhiiñ xib, cham pai' dhuuk kam tutumñigamta' pim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' dhi' na mɨt jɨ'k mi' tu ga'raimɨk ja bui gu Babiloonia kam jum tutumñigamta, totdonɨi dɨlhkob ja'k xi gu'kia' am nam ba' cham pui'p ja tulhiiñchuda' ja bɨndai, tɨi joi'ndam ja nɨidhat xi suanda' am

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: jup ji kai'chɨt: ―¡Ja'p moo joi'ndam jup bua pim na pim jum tulhiiñ aapi'm na pim Babiloonia oi'ñkat! Cham pum aagɨt japim na jax jup ba tu jam buidha'. Bɨɨx tɨi tu daam kɨɨkat japim na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio na pim jir jix chutumñigam kat, jix a'bhar jix dha'ram namkɨm japim xi chɨ tɨ'ka' gu jajannulh na bɨɨx aixim tu'm kɨ'n mamxidhix, pui' na jax gux mumra'nma', gio gux ñankabma' na pɨx am oi'chdhix ka' kɨ'n gux uam totbikdam nax dha'ram namɨɨk, gam jai' gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ji na gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' ji jam tulhiiñchuda, bɨɨx pu cham pai' matgir dhix dha'ram namkɨm na pim ka tu bia'kat, ni nat tu' kɨ'n jam palhbui.
