Sia mɨk ja'k xi guguu mɨt gui' nam gammɨjɨ mu ja'p oipo suudai' dhaam kaknub ta'm na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam, gui' na mɨt pui'p jum tutumñigamta nam mi'p tu ga'raimɨk gu boptop ganai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm ja bui.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p kai'ch am gɇ' kɨ'n nam xi ja nɨi'ñ na mu pɨx mɨɨjim tai chɨr: ―Dai dhi' nam jɨ'k mi' oi'ñkat Babiloonia nam bɨɨx kap tu daam kɨɨkat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio nam dai dhi'r jix chutumñigam kat. Cham pai' dhuuk pu chu'm ka jai'chdhɨlhia' am chi ba' gu ja'tkam ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bhai' xim buidhak ja moom am gu matai gɇ'gɇr kɨ'n bhai' ji sasra mɨt jix buam jum aagɨt nam joi'ndam ja nɨi'ñ gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam nam ja tulhiiñchu'n, jup xi kai'chɨt am: ―¡Ja'p moo siamrix ɨɨbhidham ja dooda mɨt dhi' nam Babiloonia oi'ñkat! Tɨi cham tu'r ja'ppɨx ja'tkam kat am. Mi' dhɨr gu' na chich jich chutumñigamta gui' ja bui, nach mi' ja ga'lhidhimɨk gu boptop ganai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm aach nach jɨ'k ja bia' gu kaknub, nam gu' dai dhi'x io'm jir jix chutumñigam kat. Gu' ji na mɨt gu' ya' jotmoda' cham pai' matgir, sia gu tu' nam bia'kat nax dha'ram namɨɨk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bɨɨx aapi'm na pim jɨ'k bhammɨ ja'p jup tu'ii'x dhaam, jix bhai' pim jum taat ka', nat gu' ba ja tulhiiñchuda gu Dios gui' nam mi' oi'ñkat Babiloonia, nam giilhim jix buam tomaatɨt. Bɨɨx sia aapi'm jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Dios na pim bhammɨ bap tu'ii'x dhaam, gio aapi'm na pim jɨ'k bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora' mu ja'p na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na gu' xib ba ja tulhiiñchu'n gui' na mɨt jam tulhiiñchudak jam koi jano' na pim duduakat gu jam tutku' bhaan. Xib ba' ja a'm ba gɨi gui' na tu' ja a'm bipio'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia', nat jax daa maa'n gu gɇ' komaarak jodai ja'p tu'm na jax gui' na kɨ'n jum tua' gu tiriik, mɨjɨmmɨ xi bua ɨrban gu gɇ' suudai', mi' dhɨr ba'p kai'ch: ―Ja'pni ji bubuakia' pim aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mi' oi'dha' na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨ' na pai' dhuuk jam kooda' gu Dios, ba' cham pai' dhuuk ka jam tɨgia' am gu ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham pai' dhuuk ka jai'chdhɨlhia' am gu sasabdam nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm sasaasbikar kɨ'n tu sab mi' na pim pai' oi'dha' xib, gio nam cham pai' dhuuk mi' ka tu ga'ra' gux dha'ram namkɨm bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. ¿Jaroo gip ka tu jam saba'da'? Sia gui' na pim bhaan tua' gu tiriik, cham pai' matgilhia', sia aapi'm na pim bɨɨx aixim tu'm ka'm tu juan, bɨɨx sia cham pai' matgilhia' pim.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ampɨx ji chu jugia' mi' na pim pai' oi'dha', gampɨx jup tum duñia'. Tukaa' ja'k cham pai' ka mɨimda' gui' na kɨ'n jix chu maax ka', ni ku cham pai' dhuuk mi' pai' kar bhoo'n ka' na jax chum bua xib na gɇ' kɨ'n tum sabda' pai' no' mɨt bam tɨɨmo, na pimɨt gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua na pimɨt pui' ja mamtux gu ja'tkam bɨɨx na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k ja daanɨt gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' nai' tu jiboiñdha'. Nai' xi ja jootsat japim gu jam tujuandam tuk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam tu ga'rapu' gux dha'ram namkɨm.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' pu'ñi ja'k ja dooda gu Dios gui' nam mi' oi'ñkat gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨgich, nam gu' giilhim jix buam tomaatɨt. Tɨɨ' na mɨt ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi gui' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu ñio'ki'ñ, gio jai' gui' nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat, gam jai' ja'ppɨx nam ja koodaimɨk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr mui' dhɨt bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, jup tum kai'ch: ¡Ja'p moor gɇ'kam ji dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora'! Gammɨjɨch tu daanda' buiñor tu' ka'm nɨi'dhat, na gu'r gɇ'kam kat jir jix bhai'kam. Tɨɨ' nat jix bhai' duu nat tu ja uañ gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, pui' kuch ba' dai dhi' tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' gammɨjɨ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Na gu' dhi' nɨidhix kam ja tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k kuiñcha bia', cham tu' na sia gui' nam jix bhai' tu jim. Pui' ba' nat jax ba ja dooda gui' nam mi' oi'ñkat gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨgich, na mɨt gu' dhi' maaxik gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua buiñor, na mɨt pui' ja mamtux bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'k oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na tu'r ua'tulhdhara' buiñor gu Dios, gam nam tu daanda' ja bui gu didios jup duñiixim, gio na mɨt ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi gui' nam mu ja'p tɨi pup tu ja a'gidhimɨk gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Pui' kut ba' ja koi, na mɨt gu' gɇ' bam ua'tulh.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' moop kai'ch am ɨp gio gu mui' nam bhammɨ dɨr bha ñiok jix dhaam: ―Gɇ'kamtu'nda' ich gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora', na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, gio na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Jaiñ nat jax ja dooda gui' nam mu oi'ñkat gɇ' kiicham Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨgim. Dhi' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha' am tai chɨr sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa mi' na pai' daa gu Dios, gio ba' gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr jup guguuk, na mɨt jax ja o'lhia kɨ'n guguu, nai' ji mumgia mɨt, dɨɨrap xi chu sissap gu ja moom, bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios, jup kai'ch am: ―Jɇɇ', pui' dho. Bɨɨx dhɨt jach dho gɇ'kamtu'nda' dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na ya' daa.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' dhɨr bhai'p ji chum ñio sonpan na pai' daa gu Dios, jup tum kai'ch: Tu daanda' pim buiñor gu Dios bɨɨx aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mu ja'p oi'dha' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan na pim jir tɇ gɇ'gɇrkam, gio aapi'm na pim jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam, sia aapi'm na pim tu' ka'm nɨidhat bhaankamu'n tu juan, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' panaas ku mɨt mui' dhɨt bhai' ji ñio gu ja'tkam, pɨx jap tum kai'ch na jax pai' no' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai' na sasbakda', piam ja'p na jax chum kai'chdha' no' tɨm tɨroon, jup kai'ch am: Bɨɨx dhɨt jach tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' guch Gɨ'kora', na gu'r gɇ'kam kat bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k bɨɨx kap sia bar gɇ'kam ka' na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n gam sia nar pa ja'k.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Joidham jach bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n jix bhai'ch chaatɨt buiñor gɇ'kamtu'nda'. Gio na gu' xib ya'r bhoo'n ka', bam ai gu' na pai' dhuuk jum tɨɨmo' dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir. Ya' bap tu'ii' gui' na bɨɨma'n jum tɨɨmo',

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ba tɨtɨi' mɨt gux chua jannulh na joidham jir jix kɨɨ' gio nar totbikdam. Gux chua jannulh, dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch na mɨt joidham jix bhai' tu jii na jax jix aa' gu Dios nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Ja'pnip mi'p xi chu daasa' u'uan ta'm: “¡Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k baidhix nam tu jugia' gu bhoo'n, nam gu' bɨɨx dhɨt bɨɨma'n jum tɨɨmo' dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir! Ba' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' am.” Gio ba' moo ja'pnip xi chɨi: ―Dhi' nañ jɨ'k jax jum tɨtda, bhaankamu'n gu Dios jañ pui'm tɨtda, cham tu' aañ dɨɨlh. Sɨlhkam jup kai'ch gu dhi' pui' na jax kai'ch.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' aañ na ñich jax jiñ o'lhia kɨ'n kɨkbo, ba ji chu daanɨ ñich buiñor gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mi' tuñ a'gi'ñ, gu' ji na gu' gui'p jiñ chɨtda: ―Cha'p tu daanda' aañ jiñ bui, nañ gu' aañ pur cham tu'. Jir tujuandam tugi'ñ iñ pɨx gu Dios ja'p na jax aap jiñ jaduuñ gio gu jai' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax chum a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam. Gui' ji Dios nap xi dhañia'. Na gu' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k bhaankamu'n tu a'ga gu Dios, bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ am na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' jim kupio' gux dhaam, ba' bhammɨ bam maax maa'n gu maa'nkam jix chua kabai cha'm, na ja'pni tɨɨ': Na pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' jax no't ba tɨi, gio na sɨlhkam jup kai'chdha'. Na gu' gui'x bhai' ja sɨlhka'n gu ja'tkam, gio na nɨidhix kam tulhiiñchuda' gu jaroi' no't tu' bhaan cham am bua buiñor. Piam no't jaroi' jax ba ji dhooda, tu kokda' ɨp buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu buupui'ñ gɇ'gɇr mɨmɨim ja'p na tai, gio na mui' ja tuttutu' gu kukrun. Ba' bha kobtagiñ maa'n bhai' xi ua'ñixchu' gu ñi'ook na pu cham jaroi' maat na jax kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch, dai gui' dɨɨlh pɨx jix maat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu jannulh na tɨi'chu', ɨ'ɨɨr kɨ'n mamxidhix, jix chukuum jix bɨ'. Gio ba' moo ja'pni ja'k jup tɨɨ' dhi' jɨ' nax chua kabai cha'm jim: Gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mui' oi'ñchu' am ji gu' gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ gu Dios pui'x chooto kakbai cha'm ɨp, gio ba' nam jix chooto tɨtɨi'chu', jix kɨkɨɨ'x u'uañ gu ja jajannulh gio nar totbikdam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'n chiñi'ram dɨr busaak gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk. Dhi' ba' kɨ'n tu kokda' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n ja bui gui' nam jix bhaamki'ñ. Mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k ba' bar ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam, gio nax bhai' ja sɨlhka'nda' kɨ'n gu baiñum oxia'n, gio ba' na ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k tu' jax buimɨk nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai na ba ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam jɨ'k cham mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, ja'p ji buusnia' na jax gu uubas no't xi ba kɨi' tootna'n kɨ'n, gio ba' na bha ja i'chdha' gu biiñ gui' na giilhim jix xibu' gio nax maimda', na jax chu'm kɨ'n tu tulhiiñchu'n gu Gɇ'kam Dios na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bha ja'p jannulhiram gio toonaram bhai' xi ua'ñixchu' na jax chɨɨ', jup jum kai'ch: Gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'gɇrkam sia nar pa ja'k.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ ji kɨkbok bhaan gu tanoolh jup ja tɨtda bɨɨx gu u'ji' nam bha ja'p nɨnɨ'x dhaam: ―Bhai' gor sap jiim na pim tu jugia' gu koi' na tu jam makia' gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Na gu' gɇ' jai'chdhɨlhia' gux kɨɨ' bakaax na pim tu jugia', nar ja tutku' gui' nam bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu ja sandaarui'x chuk, gam jai' gui' nam jix o'jo' nam giilhim jix maatɨt tu kokda, gio gu ja tutku' gu ja'tkam gui' nam kakbai cha'm jiim gam gu ja bakxi' gu ja kakbai', gio ba' gu ja tutku' gui' nam jir tujuandam gio ba' gui' nam cham, gam gui' nam palhɨɨp gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n dalhxix, gio ba' gui' nam jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook na giilhim tu'm tu tuuku' gio nax xijum gook tu moom, ja bɨɨm gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio gu ja sandaarui'x chuk, maap bam jumaap jamɨt nam ba tu kokda' buiñor gui' nax chua kabai cha'm jim ja bɨɨm gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ji nat gu' cham tu' ma'iich gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, nat gu' tu' pɨx dooda gui' nax chua kabai cha'm jim. Ba' pu daa mɨt gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook bɨɨma'n gui' na bhaankamu'n ja iatgidhimɨk gu ja'tkam na bɨɨx aixim jix bhai'm duukam jup tu buimɨk ja nɨi'ñchudat nat bhaan pɨx ja iatgi nam ba' aaga' nam jum matgilhdha' ja kokobtai' am na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam ba kaichu' gu ja'ook, gio nam ba' tu dañia' buiñor gui' nar jup duiñxim na pui'p tu'm na gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook. Ba' ja u'uuk mummu xi ja iabu mɨt pui' dudua kam na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai, na giilhim jix mɨim nax io'm jix choiñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu jai' ba' nam kaichgɨt gam gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, ja koi dɨɨlh gui' nax chua kabai cha'm jim kɨ'n gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk na chiñi'ram dɨr busaak. Ba' bɨɨx gu u'ji' bhai' ji chu juu mɨt gu ja tutku', tu koi'mɨk am jum ju' mɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mɨkkat maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ dɨr bhai' ba jurnim jix dhaam ji ua'dat gui' na kɨ'n jum kupio'k mu na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' na cham pai' ju' gio maa'n gu baiñum tɨrbiñ sarbhak.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' daagɨk xi buupra kɨ'n gu baiñum tɨrbiñ gux bhangɨm, nar di' pɨx gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ', jir di' pɨx ɨp gu ko' gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr bax jai'ch, kuupa' ba' buuplhix kam mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm (1000) oidha' juugɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr nat xi buuprak, kupio'kak mi' na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' mɨjɨmmɨ xi bua, gio mi'p xi kuu gu ki'ñgob jix kabkam na ba' cham buusnɨi cham nai' ka ja iatgi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam. Mi' ba' na xim aaya' gu mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha', giop ka xi dho'ñcho' am gu ja'ook, dai na gu' alhio pɨx, cham tu' mɨk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maa'n kap daraa am mui' gu ja'tkam bhaan gu a'toxkar nam jax chu'm bhaan daraaka' gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam pa'. Pui' ja'k gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n dalhxix am nam ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda' nax kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam jɨ'x juugɨt ya duduaka' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan. Jir di' pɨx am gui' na mɨt ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi ja ɨ'kchulhdhak gu ja kuukxiopo jano' nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan, nam xi chuut nam gammɨjɨ pu kaichgɨda' guch Xoi'kam nam tɨi ja chian nam jum matgilhdha' ja kokobtai' am piam ja noonob am na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' gɨt nam kaichu' gu ja'ook. Ba' cham tu'm matgilh jamɨt, gio na mɨt cham tu' tu daanɨ buiñor gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook gio gup duiñxim na pui'p tu'm. Ba' duduadɨk baapmigɨk ba jii mɨt bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam nam ba' gatuuk gio bhai'p jimɨi maap bar gɇ'gɇrkam ka' guch Xoi'kam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n ja bui gu ja'tkam mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' juugɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ku gu' dai gui' ji nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam na mɨt ba' baapmigɨk jii bhammɨ ja'k buiñor. Ba' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, cham tu' dudua mɨt, mi' pup ko'iix am, nat pai' xim ai gu mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' na mɨt ba' duduadɨk bhai'p ji baapam. Gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, bɨɨpɨ' baapam jamɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ¡Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k bɨɨpɨ' duduadɨi baapmigia', cham tu' gatuuk no't bam ai gu mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha'! Nam gu' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', nam gu' bar maamra'n ka' gu Dios. Cham pai' dhuuk mu ja'k bhɨɨya' am nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt, nam gu' bhammɨ ja'k bap tui'ka' buiñor, ja'p ji buusnia' nam bhammɨ tu juanda' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios gio guch Xoi'kam, nam gu' bɨɨma'n jir gɇ'gɇrkam ka' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam ja aagi'ñdha' gu jai' ja'tkam na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda' mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' juugɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' nat xim ai gu ja'kbui' mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha', giop xi dho'ñcho mɨt gu ja'ook na kuupkat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' giop xi mɨɨ bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nat giop ba ja iatgidham gu ja'tkam nam ba' pui' tu duñia' na jax ɨlhii'ñ. Bɨɨpɨ' bhai' ji ja iatgi gui' nam mur gɇ'gɇrkam na pai' gɇ'gɇr jir kikcham na Goog tɨ tɨɨ', gio ja'pni ja'k na pai' Magoog jup tɨ tɨɨ', nam pai' dhɨr bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨk gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Ba' bɨɨx maap ja jumaap gu sandaarui'x nam jɨ'k jai'ch na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ja'p pɨx tu'ii' am na jax gu o'ya, pu cham jaroi' maat nam jɨ'k aix.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' nai' ji jii mɨt bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na mɨt ba ja gaagam gui' nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios nam ja kooda'. Ba' maa'n kap pɨx ji ja tɨɨ mɨt nam bɨɨx maap oi'dha' na pai' gɇ'r kiicham na gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu Dios. Ba' nam pai' dhuuk bax ja koodam, tai bhammɨ dɨr bha jigɨɨsɨk jix dhaam ja a'm gɨi gu sandaarui'x, pu bɨɨx jaa mɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu ja'ook nat ja iatgi, daagɨk mu xi bua mɨt na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai na giilhim jix io'm jix choiñ, mi' na mɨt pai' bua gu nobii'ñ gio gui' na bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk na pui'p ja iatgidhimɨk gu ja'tkam. Mi'm ba' pup jum tulhiiñdha' tai chɨr nam mɨɨjidha' gammɨjɨ sia na pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nañ mui' xi chɨ nɨi'ñ bhammɨx dhaam, bhammɨ pɨx dhaa gui' nax io'm jir gɇ'kam jix chua atooxkor ta'm. Ba' gu oi'ñga'n gio gux dhaam na bha ja'p jix maax jotmoda' pɨx cham pai' matgir.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gui' jɨ' gɇ'kam, mi' bam maax jamɨt gu ja i'ii'mda' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k jai'ch kat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, sia gui' nam jir jix chutumñigam kat gam gui' nam jir gampai' tuutu'm kat. Ba' gu Dios xi ja chia gu noonbi'ñ nam xi chɨgia' gux kakbok u'uan na bhaan mi chu daaxix na mɨt jax chu jii gio nam tu' jax buimɨk bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gu ja'tkam nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Mi' dhɨr ba' gu jumai u'uan jup xi chu chia nam xi chɨgia' nam bhaan daaxix nam jax chɨɨ' gui' nam jɨ'k jimia'x dhaam nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na mɨt tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'. Ba' gu Dios xi ja aagi'ñ bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jano' nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan, gio nam tu' bhaan kuiñcha bia' jai', mi' xi ñɨidhat gu u'uan na bhaan mi chu daaxix na mɨt jax chu jii.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx jamɨt sia baapmigɨk bhammɨ ai gui' na mɨt mu ja'p koi bhai'kok gɇ' suudai' chɨr, sia gui' nam jɨ'k mu ja'k jup tu't nam pai' aajidhat gui' nam ko'iidhat cham ji chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Xi ja aagi'ñ ɨp gu Dios na ja tulhiiñchuda', nam gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n kuiñcha bia' na mɨt gu' cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' dhi' jɨ' nam mu ja'k jup tu't nam pai' ja'k aajidhat gui' nam ko'iidhat cham ji chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai buiñor guch Xoi'kam, mɨjɨmmɨ xi ja iabu mɨt na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai nax io'm jix choiñ, dai na mɨt xi ja aa'ñdhak nam tu' bhaan kuiñcha bia', mi' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', ja'p ji buusnia' nam giop ba ko'ya'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bɨɨx jamɨt sia mu ja'k xi ja iabu gui' nam cham mi buan u'uan ta'm nam jax chɨɨ', mi' nam pai' buan gui' nam buiñor bap tui'ka' gu Dios jix jɨjɨkgɨm, na mɨt gu' buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', ja'p ja'k jup bam maax gu xibkam oi'ñga'n gio gu xibkam jix dhaam, na gu' gu kɨlhii'ñga'n oi'ñga'n gio gux dhaam pai' nat ja'k jax jum duu, cham pai' ka matgir bɨnkam gui' na mix chu jai'ch kat bhaan.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' ja'xpɨx bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios bhai' ba tɨmñim gu gɇ' kiicham na joidham tu tu'ii', jir di' pɨx gu xibkam Jerusaleen. Joidham jix chu abhaar ji gu', ja'p ji buusan na jax maa'n gu tɨyaa no't joidham jix chua ba tɨm tɨi' no't ba jim tɨɨmo bɨɨma'n gu chio'ñ.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chum ñio bhai' dhɨr na pai' daa gu Dios, jup tum kai'ch: ―Xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ buiñor bap tui'ka' am gu Gɇ'kam Dios dhich jaaduñ nam ya' bap tu'ii', gio gu Dios mu dɨr bha ja'k gammɨjɨ ja bɨɨm jup tui'ka' ɨp, nam gu' bar maamra'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jix buam jum aagɨt ka suanda' am ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, ni na cham pai' dhuuk ka ja aaya' gu jax chu'm ko'kdai', gio nam cham tu' bhaan jum tulhiiña', ni nam pai' dhuuk ka ko'ya', na gu' ya' cham tu' pui' kia' na jax mu ja'k nam pai'p tu't bɨɨpɨ' dɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm jup kai'ch: ―Bɨɨx jañich ba tu pataasa, cham tu' pui' kia' na jax bɨɨpɨ' dɨr. Mi' dhɨr ba'p jiñ chɨtda aañ: ―Bɨɨx jap dhi' mi' xi dhaasa' nañ jax kai'ch, nañ gu' sɨlhkam jup kai'ch.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moo mi' dhɨr jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Bɨɨx jañich pui' ba tu kuugalh ba' xib na jax tu daaxix kat, aañ nañ bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch gio nañ ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka' sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ba' gu jaroi' no'x chanoom gu ii'mdagaram bhaan, aañi' dho makia' pui' pɨx gux kɨɨ' suudai' mi' dhɨr baxbhixim bibiatam na pai' cham ga'kɨ, na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k, gio na kɨ'n cham pai' dhuuk ka tanoom ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dhi' jɨ' pu chu'm jañich ja iimchuda nañ ja makia' gui' nam jɨ'k gammɨjɨ pux biiñak ka' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n aañ jiñ bui, sia kut tu'x buam jum duukam ja daam ba ji jii. Ba' gammɨjɨ ya'ñ bɨɨm bap tui'ka' am, nam gu' bar jiñ maamar ka', aañ pur ja Dios tuk ka' gammɨjɨ sia nar pai' dhuuk.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai gui' nam jɨ'k cham jum guguuxi'ñ nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui, sia kum tɨi ba kɇɇ guñ ñi'ook, cham tu' ja makia' iñ, sia gui' nam cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui sia kum tɨi ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, ni sia gui' nam nai' pɨx jix chu bhaamki'ñdha', sia gui' nam jix buam tu bua, pui' na jax gui' nam ja koo'nda' gu ja'tkam, gio gui' nam jai' ja bia'kat gu u'uub ja bɨɨm boppda' nam cham maap tɨɨmoi'x, gio gui' nam jir u'uub no'm jai' ja bɨɨm boppo gu chichio'ñ, gio ba' gui' nam nai' tu jiboiñdha' na ja a'm jup tui'ñgɨda' gu cham kɨɨ' ii'mda', sia gui' nam ja bui tu daanda' bha ja'p ja tuttut gu didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam nam jir jup duñiixim, gio ba' gui' nam jix ia'tbi' na pu cham jir sɨlhkam ka' jax no'm kai'ch, gam sia gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu bua na tu'r ua'tulhdhara'. Bɨɨx dhi' jɨ' nam pu'ñi ja'k jir tuutu'm gu ja'tkam, mu ja'k xi chu chiñia' iñ nam ja iabu' na pai' giilhim gɇ' mɨim gu tai gio nax io'm jix choiñ, mi'm ba' pup jum tulhiiñdha' nam mɨɨjidha' gammɨjɨ sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt, ja'p ji buusnia' nam giop ba ko'ya'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nam ja daada' gu jaja' na bhaan mi jimdat gui' nat kɨ'n ja tulhiiñchuda gu Dios gu ja'tkam, bha jimɨɨk jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Bhai' xi jim ya'ni ja'k nañ jum tɨ'ñchuda' gui' na bɨɨma'n jum tɨɨmo' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' nat gu' gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', mummu pai' chich ba ai gook dɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na muñ bai'ñchu', maa'n kap gɇ' oidha' ta'm na mɨk ja'p jix chu maax. Ba' bhammɨx dhaam dɨr na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios, bhai' ba tɨmñim gu gɇ' kiicham na joidham jix chu abhaar, jir di' pɨx gu xibkam kiicham na pai' Jerusaleen tɨ tɨɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Joidham gɇ' tum tanoor ji gu' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir kiicham, na gu' gɇ' tanoor gu Dios na bhai' daa, ja'p tu'm mɨim na jax chu'm totbikda' gu jodai gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk gio na joidham ja'k dɨr jix chu maax.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr tɇ'kob kuup gu gɇ' kiicham, mambhɨɨx gok kap ba'r kiki'ñgob, bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n kap ba' bha ua'ñix nam jax chɨɨ' gu mambhɨɨx gook gu maamra'n gu Jakob.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Baik moo ja'pni xia'lhbui dhɨr ja'k bipio' gu kiki'ñgob, baik ba' moo ja'pni o'nsop dɨr ja'k, gio ba' moo ja'pni jurnip dɨr ja'k baik ɨp, gio ba' moo tai' dhɨr ja'k baik ɨp.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa mambɨɨx gook gu joodai gɇ'gɇr na bhaan kɨɨk gui' na kɨ'n kuup bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr gu gɇ' kiicham. Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n bhaan dhi joodai bha ua'ñix nam jax jup tɨɨ' gu mambhɨɨx gook gu noonbi'ñ guch Xoi'kam na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mu ja'p jiñ bai'ñchu', maa'n ua' gu jupaabdakar nar jix uam totbikdam na kɨ'n jupaabda' na jɨ'x moor gɇ' gu gɇ' kiicham, gam gu kiki'ñgobga'n, gio ba' gui' na kɨ'n tu kuup bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' xi jupaabai, mambhɨɨx gook jix cha'tmam oo'm miil (12,000) kiloometros jir tɇb maap dɨr gu gɇ' kiicham, bɨɨx maakob kap dɨr jir maa'n na jɨ'xi'ñ, cham pai' maap dɨr jir tɇb. Gio na jɨ'x jir tɇ'tɇb gu ba'bhak, ja'kbui' ɨp mambhɨɨx gook jix cha'tmam oo'm miil kiloometros.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Mi' dhɨr ba' gui' na bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr kɨ'n kuup jup xi jupaabai, maa'n oo'm daman mambhɨɨx maakob obrasaa'n jir tɇ'kob. Pui' ja'k jupaabai nam jax ja'k tu jupaaba'n gu ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gui' na bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr kɨ'n kuup gu gɇ' kiicham, jix a'bhar joodai kɨ'n bha bhi'ñbakchix na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik gio nax dha'ram namɨɨk, gu' ba' gu ba'bhak na ɨrban dɨr tuut, jix uam totbikdam nax dha'ram namɨɨk kɨ'n jup duñiix, na joidham ja'k dɨr jix chu maax.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu gɇ'gɇr joodai na bɨtaa'n dɨr daraa na bhaan kɨɨk gui' na kɨ'n tu kuup bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr gu gɇ' kiicham, bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbikdam bha bhiibhi'spidhix. Maa'n gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik bha bhi'spidhix, gu jumai ba' gui' nax chukuum jix chɨɨdo' totbik bhai'p bhi'spidhix, gio ba' moo gu jumai gui' nax io'm bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik bha bhi'spidhix, gio gu jumai na ja'p iam jup daa, jix mondora' totbikdam bhai'p bhi'spidhix.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu jumai na ja'p ja'k jup daaxdhix, gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbikdam bha bhi'spidhix, gio ba' gu jumai na ja'p ja'k, jix chukuum jix bɨ' totbikdam bhai'p xi bhi'spidhix, gio ba' moo gu jumai na ja'p ja'k iam jup daa, jix uam totbikdam bhai'p bhi'spidhix, gio ba' gu jumai na ja'p ja'k, gui' nax mondora' kat jix chɨɨdo' totbik, gio ba' gu jumai na ja'p iam jup daa, gui' nax bɨ' kat jix uam totbik bhai'p bhi'spidhix, gio ba' moo gu jumai na ja'p ja'k jup daaxdhix, jix mondora' totbikdam bha bhi'spidhix, gu jumai ba' moo gui' nax bɨ' kat jix uam totbik, gio ba' moo gui' na ja'p dɨr ja'k jup daaxdhix, gui' nax muraa'nma' kat jix chɨɨdo' totbik bhai'p bhi'spidhix.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gui' na kɨ'n jum kukpa' gu kiki'ñgob, jir joodai sobkoñxim gui' nax io'm jix kaapak gio nax a'bhar jix dha'ram namkɨm. Ba' gu komaarak boi na mu bhɨix ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham, dai gux kɨɨga'n gux uam totbikdam kɨ'n jup duñiix nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, na gu' joidham ja'k dɨr jix chu maax.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham, cham tu' ka jai'ch gu chiop na pai' dhɨr tum daan, na gu' ja'p ji buusan na gu Dios bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam bhai'r chiop, na gu' bhai'p tu'ii' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir kiicham.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' cham tu' kam aa' gu tu' na tu tonni'ñ ka' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir gɇ' kiicham, pui' na jax gu tanoolh gio gu masaa'n, na gu' gu Dios na bhai' daa joidham gɇ' tanoor, bɨɨx kap tu tonni'ñ na jɨ'x jir kiicham, gux chu maax jir di' guch Xoi'kam.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Joidham jix chu maax kɨr jam jup tui'ka' gu ja'tkam nam bhammɨ aaya' bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham. Gio gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam kat bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na mɨt mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨi xi chu makia' am gux dha'ram namkɨm gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Cham pai' dhuuk jum kukpa' gu kiki'ñgob bhai' na pai' dhɨr mu tum bapkɨ mɨjɨ ja'k na pai'r kikcham, gammɨjɨ pu kukpio'kix ka', na gu' cham pai' dhuuk tukgia', gammɨjɨ pur tataab ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' bɨɨx na jɨ'k gu ja'tkam na mɨt tu' ka'm tɨɨ gu Dios, bhammɨ ɇɇji tu dañia' am buiñor, ja'p ji buusnia' nam tu makia' gux dha'ram namkɨm gio gu tu' na joidham jix a'bhar.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bhai' cham tu' ka jai'ch ka' am gui' nam jix buam tomaat na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ni sia gui' nam bɨxchu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñdha' gam nam nai'x chu bhaamki'ñdha', gio gui' nam nai' pɨx tu iatgi'ñdha', dai ji gui' nam mi daaxix ka' nam jax chɨɨ' bhaan gu u'uan na pai' ja daasaim guch Xoi'kam gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhidhat mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' nam ba' bhai'p tui'ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k jup jiñ baidhak gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, maa'n kap jiñ aich na pai' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai' joidham jix kɨɨ', jir di' pɨx gui' na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' gu jaroi' no't xi ii. Joidham jix kɨɨ'x uañ ji gu', cham pai' palhɨɨp pɨx am jix ikoora', bhai' dhɨr ja'k bha mɨr na pai' daa gu Dios gio guch Xoi'kam dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na jax gux kɨɨ' kasnir.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Sɨlh mi' ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham buusan gu ak na bhaan mɨr gux kɨɨ' suudai', bɨxxik dɨr juu'ñdharam gu ak ba ɨ'xchix gu bhaidha' na gammɨjɨ bhɇɇ nabap masaa'n. Dhi' kɨ'n sia gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' gu jaroi' no't ba juu, gu jaaga'n ba'x bhaai' nam kɨ'n jum duduadhi'ñdha' no'm jix kako'k gu ja'tkam nam mu ja'p oi'dha' na jɨ'x jir oi'ñga'n.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham cham tu' ka jai'ch ka' gu tu' nam bhaan jum tulhiiña' gu ja'tkam no'm bhammɨ bap tu'ii', na gu' gu Dios gio guch Xoi'kam bhai'p tui'ka' ja bɨɨm na ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñdha', dai ji nam jix bhai'm taatɨt tu daanda' buiñor.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Maaxik ba nɨi'ñdha' am gu' ja buupui kɨ'n na jax jir tu'm kam gui' na pui' tɨɨ' Dios, gio na bhai' ba ua'ñix ka' ja kokobtai' am na jax chɨɨ'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Cham pai' dhuuk xia'lhidhat ka jurnidha' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k, gammɨjɨ pur tataab ka'. Gio na cham kam aa'nda' gu tu' nam kɨ'n tɨ bɨgii'ñka' piam gu tu' na tu tonni'ñka', pui' na jax gu tanoolh gio gu masaa'n, na gu' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gɇ' mɨimda' na bhai'p tui'ka'. Bɨɨx kap tu tonni'ñka' gu' na jɨ'x jir kiicham, gui' ba' nam jɨ'k bhammɨ bap tui'ka', ja sɨlhka'nda' am gu ja'tkam na mummu ja'p tu oi'ñka' oi'ñga'n bhaan.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax jum tɨtda gu Dios, sɨlhkam jup kai'ch, cham tu' na pɨx jap kai'ch, na gu' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gammɨjɨ pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' jax no't ba tɨi. Jir di' pɨx gui' na ja tajaañi'ñka' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gui' nam jɨ'k bhaankamu'n ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na jax tu duñia' gatuuk. Aañ ba' bhai'p xiñ joot nañ sap pu'ñi bɨɨx ja mattuda' gui' nam jɨ'k bhaankamu'n tu a'ga gu ñio'ki'ñ na jax tu duñia' jootom, na cham ka mɨɨkidha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Guch Xoi'kam jup kai'ch ɨp: ―Jootom jañ moo mui' ba jim. Ba' joidham jix bhai' tu jimia' gu jaroi' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na jax mi chu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm nañ jax chu duñia' gatuuk, na gu' dai na pɨx bhaan ji bamgidha' na mi' pui' ba jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Pu'ñi ja'k jañich tɨ kai gio na ñich tɨ tɨɨ aañ nañ Juan tɨɨ' nañ jax ba tu jam a'gi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ. Ba' nat pu'ñi tɨñ chɨ'ñchuda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, jiñ o'lhia kɨ'n kɨkbok ba ji chu daanɨ ñich buiñor,

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: gu' ji nat gu' gui' puñ xoo'mchulh, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Cha'p tu daanda' aañ jiñ bui, nañ gu' aañ jir ja'ppɨx tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios ja'p na jax aap gio gu jai' nam pui' bhaankamu'n jup tu a'ga, gam gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm. Dai ji gu Dios buiñor nap tu daanda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gio ba' moo ja'pnip jiñ chɨtda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios: ―Xib ba' moo dai nap bɨɨx kap ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n dhi' na pich jɨ'k tu' tu ua'na dhi u'uan ta'm, nam ba' bɨɨx pui' ba tu machia' na tu' jax dhuñia' gu Dios, na gu' dhi' cham xiim pui' tu kuugalhdha'. Cham tu' nap dɨɨlh pɨx pui'x chu mat ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Cham jax bua sia kum jai' cham aa' nam mi' pui' jimia'. No'm bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu bua na jax cham jir am, cha'p ja soo'mchulhi'ñka', sia gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñcho nar jix buam jum duukam. Dai gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', nam jix bhai'm duukam bap tu bua na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, xi ja guguuxdha' ap nam jix io'm jix bhai'm duukam xip tu buada' bhaankamu'n gu Dios. Piam gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui'p jup xi guguuxdha' nax io'm mui' xix biiñak ka' buiñor gu Dios.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p kai'ch ɨp gio guch Xoi'kam: ―Cham xiim jañ mui' ba jim. Moo pim pɨx tɨ nɨɨrada'. Pu tu ua'da' iñ gui' nañ tu jam makia' nar jam mai'chɨk ka', na tu' jam a'm bipio'da' na pim tu' jax buimɨiñ a'mkam na pim duduakat gu jam tutku' bhaan.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Aañ bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka' iñ sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba' joidham jix bhai' tu jimia' gu jaroi' no' cham tu' bɨɨx aixim ka tu bua na tu'r ua'tulhdhara', na ja'p ji buusanda' nax kɨɨ' tɨm tɨ'ii'ñka' gu jajannulhi'ñ, nam gu' dhi' ba' pɨx jix bhai' tɨɨdai mu baasa' bhai' dhɨr na pai' mu tum bapkɨ mɨjɨ ja'k gɇ' kiicham, ba' dai nam ba chiñia' na tu jugia' gu bhaidha' na mu kɨɨk ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Dai gui' nam bɨxchu' bhaan jix u'ua'tulhdhix ka'm mu dɨr ja'p pup bi'ya' dɨɨrap dɨr, pui' na jax gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gio gui' nam giilhim nai' ja jiboiñdha' gu ja'tkam, gio ba' gui' nam jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdat gu u'uub ja bɨɨm boppoda', gio gui' nam jir u'uub no'm jai' ja bɨɨm boppo gu chichio'ñ, sia gui' nam ja koo'nda' gu ja'tkam, gio ba' gui' nam tu daanda' ja bui gup duiñxim didios, gam gui' nam jix ia'tbi' nam nai' pɨx tu iatgi'ñdha'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: ’Aañi' Jesuus ya' dɨr mu joot jañich gui' nar nobii'ñ gu Dios mummu buiñor guñ chujuandam tuk Juan na ba' pui' tu mattuda' nañ jɨ'k jax tu duñia' jootom, na ba' mi' dhɨr gu Juan bɨɨx kap ba ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam ba' pui' tu machia'. Aañ pui' ji buusan na jax gu gɇ' chi'ɨɨ' gui' na katukgab bha tɨssa'n. Jir di' pɨx iñ gu boxii'ñ gu Dabii gui' na bɨjɨk jir gɇ'kam kat.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan nar bɨnga'n guch Xoi'kam, jup kai'ch am ɨp: ―Jum nɨɨra ich nap jootom bhai' xi jimda' Jesuus jich Xoi'kam. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' gu jaroi' no' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, no'x aa' na jimia' bhammɨ ja'k buiñor, jum aa' na tu' ka'm nɨidhat nɨɨrka', gio na xi bai'ñdha' na jotmoda' bha jimda'. Piam no' jaroi' maadɨt jix chanoom gu ii'mdagaram bhaan, guch Xoi'kam dho pui' pɨx toi'dha' gux kɨɨ' suudai' na kɨ'n cham pai' dhuuk ka tanoom ka' gio na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'pniñ ja'k ba' moop kai'ch bhaankamu'n gu Dios ja bui gui' nam jɨ'k jix aa' nam tu jiñkuidhai mi' pui' jimia' na jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm: Na cham jir am no't jaroi' jai' mi'p baapai gu ñi'ook na dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ ya' na pai' tu daaxix dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook, na gu'x io'm tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios mu na pai' ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm tɨgia', pui' na jax ba tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm na mi chu a'ga na pai' ja'k ja tulhiiñchuda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Gu' ba' gu jaroi' no't jai' boosolh dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na jɨ'k ya' tu daaxix u'uan ta'm, piam ku ja'p xi dhuukat, gu Dios pui'p baabo' na mi' ka daaxix ka' na jax chɨɨ' bhaan gu u'uan na pai' ja daasaim gui' nam jɨ'k bhammɨ aaya' gɇ' kiicham, na pai' joidham jix chu abhaar, bhai' na pai' gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', pui' na jax tu a'ga bhaan dhi u'uan. Ba' cham tu' ka jugia' gu bhaidha' na bhammɨ kɨɨk na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx bhai' ba tu tatda' ka' gɨt.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ba'p kai'ch ɨp gio guch Xoi'kam: ―Jix io'm jootom mu jimda' iñ no' pimɨt xim jotma'n na pim bɨɨx kap ja aagi'ñdha' gu jai' ja'tkam dhi' na jɨ'k mi chu ua'ñix u'uan ta'm. Aañ ba'p tɨtda: ―Ea nach pui' tu duñia' nap jax kai'ch Jesuus jich Xoi'kam nap ba' moo jootom bha jimda'.

book_name: NAT JAX TƗ TƗƗ GU JUAN
verse_text: Ja'pniñ ba' pɨx jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ. Moo gɨt ba' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam palhbui'ñchu' tu' na pɨx bhaan bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n aapi'm.
